[22] siila.m sirii caapi sata~nca dhammo, anvaayikaa pa~n~navato bhavanti..
[21] ``subhaasita.m te anumodiyaana, a~n~na.m ta.m pucchaami tadi"ngha bruuhi.
[27] katha.mkaro kintikaro kimaacara.m, ki.m sevamaano labhatiidha pa~n~na.m.
[22] pa~n~naaya daanippa.tipada.m vadehi, katha.mkaro pa~n~navaa hoti macco..
[21] ``sevetha vuddhe nipu.ne bahussute, uggaahako ca paripucchako siyaa.
[22] su.neyya sakkacca subhaasitaani, eva.mkaro pa~n~navaa hoti macco..
[21] ``sa pa~n~navaa kaamagu.ne avekkhati, aniccato dukkhato rogato ca.
[22] eva.m vipassii pajahaati chanda.m, dukkhesu kaamesu mahabbhayesu..
[21] ``sa viitaraago pavineyya dosa.m, metta.m citta.m bhaavaye appamaa.na.m.
[22] sabbesu bhuutesu nidhaaya da.n.da.m, anindito brahmamupeti .thaana''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0149^ea^ ^b^siila^eb^nti aacaarasiila.m. ^b^siri^eb^nti issariyasiri.m. ^b^sata~nca dhamma^eb^nti sappurisadhamma.m. ^b^pa~n~na^eb^nti supa~n~na.m. eva.m imesa.m catunna.m dhammaana.m katara.m dhamma.m se.t.thatara.m vadantiiti pucchati. ^b^pa~n~naa hii^eb^ti, sakka, etesu catuusu dhammesu yaa esaa pa~n~naa ^a^M5.0158^ea^ naama, saava se.t.thaa, iti buddhaadayo kusalaa vadanti. yathaa hi taarakaga.naa canda.m parivaarenti, candova tesa.m uttamo. eva.m siila~nca sirii caapi sata~nca dhammoti ete tayopi anvaayikaa ^b^pa~n~navato bhavanti^eb^ pa~n~navantameva anugacchanti, pa~n~naaya eva parivaaraa hontiiti attho.

[03] ``katha.mkaro''tiaadiini a~n~nama~n~navevacanaaneva. ^b^katha.mkaro^eb^ti ki.m naama kamma.m karonto ki.m aacaranto ki.m sevamaano bhajamaano payirupaasamaano idhaloke pa~n~na.m labhati, pa~n~naayameva pa.tipada.m vadehi, jaanitukaamomhi, katha.mkaro macco pa~n~navaa naama hotiiti pucchati. ^b^vuddhe^eb^ti pa~n~naavuddhippatte pa.n.dite. ^b^nipu.ne^eb^ti sukhumakaara.najaananasamatthe. ^b^eva.mkaro^eb^ti yo puggalo eva.m vuttappakaare ^a^V5.0143^ea^ puggale sevati bhajati payirupaasati, paa.li.m ugga.nhaati, punappuna.m attha.m pucchati, paasaa.ne lekha.m kha.nanto viya ka~ncananaa.liyaa siihavasa.m sampa.ticchanto viya ohitasoto sakkacca.m subhaasitaani su.naati, aya.m eva.mkaro macco pa~n~navaa hotiiti.

[03] eva.m mahaasatto paaciinalokadhaatuto suuriya.m u.t.thaapento viya pa~n~naaya pa.tipada.m kathetvaa idaani tassaa pa~n~naaya gu.na.m kathento ^b^``sa pa~n~navaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^kaamagu.ne^eb^ti kaamako.t.thaase hutvaa abhaava.t.thena ^b^aniccato,^eb^ di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaana.m dukkhaana.m vatthubhaavena ^b^dukkhato,^eb^ a.t.thanavutiyaa rogamukhaana.m kaame nissaaya uppattisambhavena ^b^rogato ca avekkhati^eb^ oloketi, so ^b^eva.m vipassii^eb^ etehi kaara.nehi kaamaana.m aniccaadita.m passanto ``kaame nissaaya uppajjanakadukkhaana.m anto natthi, kaamaana.m pahaanameva sukha''nti viditvaa dukkhesu kaamesu mahabbhayesu chanda.m pajahaati. ^b^sa viitaraago^eb^ti, ``sakka, so puggalo eva.m viitaraago navaaghaatavatthuvasena uppajjanakasabhaavadosa.m vinetvaa mettacitta.m bhaaveyya, appamaa.nasattaaramma.nattaa appamaa.na.m ta.m bhaavetvaa aparihiinajjhaano agarahito brahmaloke uppajjatii''ti.

[03] eva.m mahaasatte kaamaana.m dosa.m kathenteyeva tesa.m ti.n.nampi raajuuna.m sabalakaayaana.m tada"ngappahaanena pa~ncakaamagu.naraago pahiino. ta.m ~natvaa mahaasatto tesa.m paha.msanavasena gaathamaaha --
[22] kaali"ngaraajassa ca uggatassa, sabbesa vo kaamaraago pahiino''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^P5.0150^ea^ ^b^mahatthiya^eb^nti mahattha.m mahaavipphaara.m mahaajutika.m. ^b^tavama.t.thakaa^eb^ti tava a.t.thakaa. ^b^pahiino^eb^ti tada"ngappahaanena pahiino.
[03] ta.m sutvaa raajaano mahaasattassa thuti.m karontaa gaathamaaha.msu --
[22] karohi okaasamanuggahaaya, yathaa gati.m te abhisambhavemaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^anuggahaayaa^eb^ti pabbajjatthaaya okaasa.m no karohi. yathaa maya.m pabbajitvaa tava gati.m nipphatti.m abhisambhavema paapu.neyyaama, tayaa pa.tividdhagu.na.m pa.tivijjheyyaamaati vadi.msu.
[03] atha ^a^V5.0144^ea^ nesa.m okaasa.m karonto mahaasatto itara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``karomi okaasamanuggahaaya, tathaa hi vo kaamaraago pahiino.
[22] pharaatha kaaya.m vipulaaya piitiyaa, yathaa gati.m me abhisambhavethaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^pharaatha kaaya^eb^nti jhaanapiitiyaa vipulaaya kaaya.m pharathaati.
[21] ``sabba.m karissaama tavaanusaasani.m, ya.m ya.m tuva.m vakkhasi bhuuripa~n~na.
[22] pharaama kaaya.m vipulaaya piitiyaa, yathaa gati.m te abhisambhavemaa''ti..
[03] atha nesa.m sabalakaayaana.m mahaasatto pabbajja.m daapetvaa isiga.na.m uyyojento gaathamaaha --
[21] ``kataaya ^a^M5.0160^ea^ vacchassa kisassa puujaa, gacchantu bhonto isayo saadhuruupaa.
[22] jhaane rataa hotha sadaa samaahitaa, esaa ratii pabbajitassa se.t.thaa''ti..

[03] isayo ^a^P5.0151^ea^ tassa sarabha"ngasatthuno vacana.m sirasaa sampa.ticchitvaa vanditvaa aakaasa.m uppatitvaa sakaani vasana.t.thaanaani gami.msu. sakkopi u.t.thaayaasanaa mahaasattassa thuti.m katvaa a~njali.m paggayha suuriya.m namassanto viya mahaasatta.m namassamaano sapariso pakkaami. etamattha.m viditvaa satthaa imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[22] te vedajaataa anumodamaanaa, pakkaamu devaa devapura.m yasassino..
[21] ``gaathaa imaa atthavatii subya~njanaa, subhaasitaa isinaa pa.n.ditena.
[27] yo kocimaa a.t.thikatvaa su.neyya, labhetha pubbaapariya.m visesa.m.
[22] laddhaana pubbaapariya.m visesa.m, adassana.m maccuraajassa gacche''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0145^ea^ ^b^paramatthasa.mhitaa^eb^ti aniccaadidiipanena nibbaananissitaa. ^b^gaathaa imaa^eb^ti ida.m satthaa sarabha"ngasatthuno nibbaanadaayaka.m subhaasita.m va.n.nento aaha. tattha ^b^atthavatii^eb^ti nibbaanadaayaka.t.thena paramatthanissitaa. ^b^subya~njanaa^eb^ti parisuddhabya~njanaa. ^b^subhaasitaa^eb^ti sukathitaa. ^b^a.t.thikatvaa^eb^ti attano atthikabhaava.m katvaa atthiko hutvaa sakkacca.m su.neyya. ^b^pubbaapariya^eb^nti pa.thamajjhaana.m pubbaviseso, dutiyajjhaana.m aparaviseso. dutiyajjhaana.m pubbaviseso, tatiyajjhaana.m aparavisesoti eva.m a.t.thasamaapatticatumaggavasena pubbaaparabhaavena .thita.m visesa.m. ^b^adassana^eb^nti pariyosaane aparavisesa.m ^a^M5.0161^ea^ arahatta.m labhitvaa nibbaana.m paapu.neyya. nibbaanappatto hi puggalo maccuraajassa adassana.m gato naama hotiiti.

[03] eva.m satthaa arahattena desanaaya kuu.ta.m ga.nhitvaa ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepi moggallaanassa aa.laahane pupphavassa.m vassii''ti vatvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanento aaha --
[22] pabbato anuruddho ca, kaccaayano ca devalo.

[03] ^b^athabravii^eb^ti ^a^P5.0152^ea^ ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto puraa.nadutiyikaapalobhana.m aarabbha kathesi. vatthu ^b^indriyajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 1.8.60 aadayo) vitthaaritameva. satthaa pana ta.m bhikkhu.m ``sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, ukka.n.thitosii''ti pucchitvaa ``sacca.m, bhante''ti vutte ``kena ukka.n.thaapitosii''ti vatvaa ``puraa.nadutiyikaayaa''ti vutte ``bhikkhu esaa itthii tuyha.m anatthakaarikaa, tva.m eta.m nissaaya jhaana.m naasetvaa tii.ni sa.mvaccharaani muu.lho visa~n~nii nipajjitvaa uppannaaya sa~n~naaya mahaaparideva.m paridevii''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite ^a^V5.0146^ea^ baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto kaasira.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto sabbasippesu nipphatti.m patvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~naayatane vanamuulaphalaahaaro yaapesi. athekaa migii tassa passaava.t.thaane sambhavamissaka.m ti.na.m khaaditvaa udaka.m pivi. ettakeneva ca tasmi.m pa.tibaddhacittaa gabbha.m pa.tilabhitvaa tato pa.t.thaaya katthaci agantvaa tattheva ti.na.m khaaditvaa assamassa saamanteyeva vicarati ^a^M5.0162^ea^. mahaasatto parigga.nhanto ta.m kaara.na.m a~n~naasi. saa aparabhaage manussadaaraka.m vijaayi. mahaasatto ta.m puttasinehena pa.tijaggi, ``isisi"ngo''tissa naama.m akaasi. atha na.m mahaasatto vi~n~nutappatta.m pabbaajetvaa attano mahallakakaale ta.m aadaaya naarivana.m naama gantvaa, ``taata, imasmi.m himavante imehi pupphehi sadisaa itthiyo naama honti, taa attano vasa.m gate mahaavinaasa.m paapenti, na taasa.m vasa.m naama gantu.m va.t.tatii''ti ovaditvaa aparabhaage brahmalokaparaaya.no ahosi.

[03] isisi"ngopi jhaanakii.la.m kii.lanto himavantappadese vaasa.m kappesi. ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo ahosi. athassa siilatejena sakkassa bhavana.m kampi, sakko aavajjento ta.m kaara.na.m ~natvaa ``aya.m ma.m sakkattaa caaveyya, eka.m acchara.m pesetvaa siilamassa bhindaapessaamii''ti sakaladevaloka.m upaparikkhanto attano a.d.dhateyyako.tisa"nkhaana.m paricaarikaana.m majjhe eka.m alambusa.m naama acchara.m .thapetvaa a~n~na.m tassa siila.m bhinditu.m samattha.m adisvaa ta.m pakkosaapetvaa tassa siilabheda.m kaatu.m aa.naapesi. tamattha.m ^a^P5.0153^ea^ aavikaronto satthaa pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --

[03] tattha ^b^brahaa^eb^ti mahaa. ^b^vatrabhuu^eb^ti vatrassa naama asurassa abhibhavitaa. ^b^jayata.m pitaa^eb^ti jayantaana.m jayappattaana.m sesaana.m tetti.msaaya devaputtaana.m pitukiccasaadhanena pitaa. ^b^paraabhetvaa^eb^ti hadaya.m bhinditvaa olokento viya ta.m ``pa.tibalaa aya''nti ~natvaati attho. ^b^sudhammaaya^eb^nti sudhammaaya.m devasabhaaya.m.
[03] pa.n.dukambalasilaasane nisinno ta.m alambusa.m pakkosaapetvaa idamaaha --

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0163^ea^ ^b^misse^eb^ti ta.m aalapati, ida~nca tassaa naama.m, sabbaa panitthiyo purise kilesamissanena missanato ``missaa''ti vuccanti, tena saadhaara.nena gu.nanaamenaalapanto evamaaha. ^b^isippalobhane^eb^ti isiina.m palobhanasamatthe. ^b^isisi"nga^eb^nti tassa kira matthake migasi"ngaakaarena dve cuu.laa u.t.thahi.msu, tasmaa eva.m vuccati.
[03] iti sakko ``gaccha isisi"nga.m upasa"nkamitvaa attano vasa.m aanetvaa siilamassa bhindaa''ti alambusa.m aa.naapesi.
[22] nibbaanaabhirato vuddho, tassa maggaani aavaraa''ti.. -- vacana.m aaha.

[03] tattha ^b^puraaya^eb^nti aya.m taapaso vattasampanno ca brahmacariyavaa ca, so panesa diighaayukataaya nibbaanasa"nkhaate magge abhirato gu.navuddhiyaa ca vuddho. tasmaa yaava esa amhe naatikkamati, na abhibhavitvaa imamhaa .thaanaa caaveti, taavadeva tva.m gantvaa tassa devalokagamanaani maggaani aavara, yathaa idha naagacchati, eva.m karohiiti attho.
[22] taasampi hotu pariyaayo, taapi yantu palobhanaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0154^ea^ ^b^kimeva tva^eb^nti ki.m naameta.m tva.m karosiiti diipeti. ^b^mameva tuva.m sikkhasii^eb^ti imasmi.m sakaladevaloke mameva tuva.m ikkhasi, a~n~na.m na passasiiti adhippaayena vadati. ^b^sa^eb^-kaaro panettha bya~njanasandhikaro. ^b^isippalobhane gacchaa^eb^ti ki.mkaara.naa ma~n~neva eva.m vadesiiti adhippaayo ^a^V5.0148^ea^. ^b^pavaraa cevaa^eb^ti mayaa uttaritaraa ceva. ^b^asoke^eb^ti sokarahite. ^b^nandane^eb^ti nandijanake. ^b^pariyaayo^eb^ti gamanavaaro.
[21] ``addhaa hi sacca.m bha.nasi, santi a~n~naapi accharaa.
[22] taadisiyo pavaraa ceva, asoke nandane vane..
[21] ``na taa eva.m pajaananti, paaricariya.m puma.m gataa.

[03] tattha ^b^puma.m gataa^eb^ti purisa.m upasa"nkamantaa samaanaa purisapalobhinipaaricariya.m na jaananti. ^b^va.n.naruupenaa^eb^ti sariirava.n.nena ceva ruupasampattiyaa ca. ^b^savasamaanayissasii^eb^ti ta.m taapasa.m attano vasa.m aanessasiiti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa alambusaa dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[22] vibhemi ceta.m aasaadu.m, uggatejo hi braahma.no..

[03] tattha ^b^na vaaha^eb^nti na ve aha.m. ^b^vibhemii^eb^ti bhaayaami. ^b^aasaadu^eb^nti aasaaditu.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- naaha.m, deva, tayaa pesitaa na gamissaami, apicaaha.m ta.m isi.m siilabhedanatthaaya alliiyitu.m bhaayaami, uggatejo hi soti. ^b^aasaadiyaa^eb^ti aasaadetvaa. ^b^mohasa.msaara^eb^nti mohena sa.msaara.m, mohena isi.m palobhetvaa sa.msaara.m aapannaa va.t.tadukkhe pati.t.thitaa sattaa ga.nanapatha.m atikkantaa ^a^V5.0149^ea^. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti tena kaara.nena. ^b^lomaani ha.msaye^eb^ti aha.m lomaani u.t.thapemi, ``tassa kiraaha.m siila.m bhindissaamii''ti cintayamaanaaya me lomaani paha.msantiiti vadati.
[22] aggi.t.tha.m parimajjanta.m, isisi"nga.m upaagamii''ti.. -- imaa abhisambuddhagaathaa.

[03] tattha ^b^pakkaamii^eb^ti tena hi, devaraaja, aavajjeyyaasi manti attano sayanagabbha.m pavisitvaa ala"nkaritvaa isisi"nga.m kilesena missitu.m icchantii pakkaami, bhikkhave, saa accharaa tassa assama.m gataati. ^b^bimbijaalakasa~nchanna^eb^nti ratta"nkuravanena sa~nchanna.m. ^b^paatova paataraasamhii^eb^ti, bhikkhave, paataraasavelaaya paatova pageyeva atipageva. ^b^uda.nhasamaya.m patii^eb^ti suuriyuggamanavelaayameva. ^b^aggi.t.tha^eb^nti aggisaala.m. ratti.m padhaanamanuyu~njitvaa paatova nhatvaa udakakicca.m katvaa pa.n.nasaalaaya.m thoka.m jhaanasukhena viitinaametvaa nikkhamitvaa aggisaala.m sammajjanta.m ta.m isisi"nga.m saa upaagami, itthivilaasa.m dassentii tassa purato a.t.thaasi.
[22] gamanaa kaamaniiyaa te, harantiyeva me mano..
[22] vima.t.thaa tuyha.m susso.nii, akkhassa phalaka.m yathaa..
[22] aayataa ca visaalaa ca, nettaa tava sudassanaa..
[22] ko vaa tva.m kassa vaa putto, katha.m jaanemu ta.m maya''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^vicittahatthaabhara.naa^eb^ti vicittehi hatthaabhara.nehi samannaagataa. ^b^hemacandanagandhinii^eb^ti suva.n.nava.n.nacandanagandhavilepanaa. ^b^sa~n~natuuruu^eb^ti suva.t.titaghanauuru sampannauurulakkha.naa. ^b^vilaggaa^eb^ti sa.mkhittamajjhaa. ^b^mudukaa^eb^ti mudu sukhumaalaa. ^b^suddhaa^eb^ti nimmalaa. ^b^suppati.t.thitaa^eb^ti sama.m pathavi.m phusantaa ^a^V5.0151^ea^ su.t.thu pati.t.thitaa. ^b^gamanaa^eb^ti gacchamaanaa. ^b^kaamaniiyaa^eb^ti kantaa kaamitabbayuttakaa. ^b^harantiyeva me mano^eb^ti ete evaruupena paramena itthivilaasena ca"nkamantiyaa tava paadaa mama citta.m harantiyeva. ^b^vima.t.thaa^eb^ti visaalaa. ^b^susso.nii^eb^ti sundaraso.nii. ^b^akkhassaa^eb^ti sundarava.n.nassa akkhassa suva.n.naphalaka.m viya visaalaa te so.niiti vadati. ^b^uppalasseva ki~njakkhaa^eb^ti niiluppalaka.n.nikaa viya. ^b^ka.nha~njanassevaa^eb^ti sukhumaka.nhalomacittattaa evamaaha.

[03] ``duvidhaa''tigaatha.m thane va.n.nayanto aaha. te hi dve hutvaa ure jaataa va.n.tassa abhaavaa ^b^ava.n.taa,^eb^ ure laggaa eva hutvaa su.t.thu nikkhantattaa ^a^M5.0167^ea^ ^b^saadhupaccudaa,^eb^ payassa dhaara.nato ^b^payodharaa, apatitaa^eb^ti na patitaa, amilaatataaya vaa alambanataaya vaa na anto pavi.t.thaati apatitaa, suva.n.naphalake .thapitasuva.n.namayava.t.taalaabuno a.d.dhena sadisataaya ^b^a.d.dhalaabusamaa thanaa. e.neyyakaa yathaa^eb^ti e.niimigassa hi diighaa ca va.t.taa ca giivaa sobhati yathaa, eva.m tava giivaa thoka.m diighaa. ^b^kambutalaabhaasaa^eb^ti suva.n.naali"ngatalasannibhaa giivaati attho. ^b^pa.n.daraavara.naa^eb^ti dantaavara.naa. ^b^catutthamanasannibhaa^eb^ti catutthamano vuccati catutthamanavatthubhuutaa jivhaa. abhirattabhaavena jivhaasadisa.m te o.t.thapariyosaananti vadati. ^b^uddhaggaa^eb^ti he.t.thimadantaa. ^b^adhaggaa^eb^ti uparimadantaa. ^b^dumaggaparimajjitaa^eb^ti ^a^P5.0157^ea^ dantaka.t.thaparimajjitaa parisuddhaa. ^b^duvijaa^eb^ti dvijaa. ^b^nelasambhuutaa^eb^ti niddosesu hanuma.msapariyosaanesu sambhuutaa.

[03] ^b^apa.n.daraa^eb^ti ka.nhaa. ^b^lohitantaa^eb^ti rattapariyantaa. ^b^ji~njuukaphalasannibhaa^eb^ti ratta.t.thaane ji~njukaphalasadisaa. ^b^sudassanaa^eb^ti passantaana.m atittikaraa pa~ncapasaadasamannaagataa. ^b^naatidiighaa^eb^ti pamaa.nayuttaa. ^b^susamma.t.thaa^eb^ti su.t.thu samma.t.thaa. ^b^kanakabyaasamocitaa^eb^ti kanakabyaa vuccati suva.n.napha.nikaa, taaya gandhatela.m aadaaya paharitaa suracitaa. ^b^kasigorakkhaa^eb^ti iminaa kasi~nca gorakkha~nca nissaaya jiivanakasatte dasseti. ^b^yaa gatii^eb^ti yattakaa nipphatti. ^b^parakkanta^eb^nti yattaka.m isiina.m parakkanta.m, vitthaariikataa imasmi.m himavante yattakaa isayo vasantiiti attho. ^b^na te samasama^eb^nti tesu sabbesu ekampi ruupalii.laavilaasaadisamataaya tayaa samaana.m na passaami. ^b^ko vaa tva^eb^nti ida.m tassaa itthibhaava.m jaananto purisavohaaravasena pucchati.
[03] eva.m paadato pa.t.thaaya yaava kesaa attano va.n.na.m bhaasante taapase alambusaa tu.nhii hutvaa tassaa kathaaya yathaanusandhi.m gataaya tassa sammuu.lhabhaava.m ~natvaa gaathamaaha --
[22] ehi ta.m upaguuhissa.m, ratiina.m kusalo bhavaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0168^ea^ ^b^kassapeva.m gate satii^eb^ti kassapagotta eva.m tava citte pavatte sati pa~nhakaalo na hoti. ^b^sammaa^eb^ti vayassa, piyavacanaalapanameta.m. ^b^ratiina^eb^nti pa~ncakaamagu.naratiina.m.

[03] eva.m vatvaa alambusaa cintesi -- ``naaya.m mayi .thitaaya hatthapaasa.m aagamissati, gacchantii viya bhavissaamii''ti. saa itthimaayaakusalataaya taapasa.m anupasa"nkamitvaa aagatamaggaabhimukhii paayaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --

[03] atha ^a^P5.0158^ea^ na.m taapaso gacchanti.m disvaa ``aya.m gacchatii''ti attano dandhaparakkama.m mandagamana.m chinditvaa vegena dhaavitvaa kesesu hatthena paraamasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] cavitamhi brahmacariyaa, yathaa ta.m atha tositaa..
[21] ``na ^a^M5.0169^ea^ juhe na jape mante, aggihutta.m pahaapita.m.
[22] ko nu me paaricariyaaya, pubbe citta.m palobhayi..
[21] ``ara~n~ne me viharato, yo me tejaa ha sambhuta.m.

[03] tattha ^b^ajjhappatto^eb^ti sampatto. ^b^tamudaavatta kalyaa.nii^eb^ti ta.m kese paraamasitvaa .thita.m isi.m udaavattitvaa nivattitvaa kalyaa.nadassanaa saa su.t.thu sobhanaa. ^b^palissajii^eb^ti aali"ngi. ^b^cavitamhi brahmacariyaa, yathaa ta.m atha tositaa^eb^ti, bhikkhave, tassa isino taavadeva jhaana.m antaradhaayi. tasmi.m tamhaa jhaanaa brahmacariyaa cavite yathaa ta.m sakkena patthita.m, tatheva ahosi. atha sakkassa patthanaaya samiddhabhaava.m viditvaa saa devaka~n~naa tositaa, tassa tena brahmacariyavinaasena sa~njanitapiitipaamojjaati attho.

[03] ^b^manasaa agamaa^eb^ti saa ta.m aali"ngitvaa .thitaa ``aho vata sakko palla"nka.m me peseyyaa''ti eva.m pavattena manasaa inda.m agamaa. ^b^nandane vane^eb^ti nandijananasamatthataaya nandanavanasa"nkhaate taavati.msabhavane vasanta.m. ^b^devaku~njaro^eb^ti devase.t.tho ^a^P5.0159^ea^. ^b^pahi.nii^eb^ti pesesi. ``paahi.nii''tipi paa.tho. ^b^sopavaahana^eb^nti saparivaara.m. ^b^sauttaracchadapa~n~naasa^eb^nti pa~n~naasaaya uttaracchadehi pa.ticchaadita.m. ^b^sahassapa.tiyatthata^eb^nti sahassadibbakojavatthata.m. ^b^tamena.m tatthaa^eb^ti ta.m isisi"nga.m tattha dibbapalla"nke nisinnaa saa ure katvaa dhaaresi. ^b^tii.ni vassaanii^eb^ti ekamuhutta.m viya manussaga.nanaaya tii.ni vassaani ta.m ure nipajjaapetvaa tattha nisinnaa dhaaresi.

[03] ^b^vimado^eb^ti ^a^V5.0154^ea^ nimmado vigatasa~n~nabhaavo. so hi tii.ni sa.mvaccharaani visa~n~no sayitvaa pacchaa pa.tiladdhasa~n~no pabujjhi. tasmi.m pabujjhamaane hatthaadiphandana.m disvaava alambusaa tassa pabujjhanabhaava.m ~natvaa palla"nka.m antaradhaapetvaa sayampi antarahitaa a.t.thaasi. ^b^addasaasii^eb^ti so assamapada.m olokento ``kena nu khomhi siilavinaasa.m paapito''ti cintetvaa mahantena saddena paridevamaano addasaasi. ^b^haritarukkhe^eb^ti aggiyaayanasa"nkhaata.m aggisaala.m samantaa parivaaretvaa .thite haritapattarukkhe. ^b^navapattavana^eb^nti taru.nehi navapattehi sa~nchanna.m vana.m. ^b^ruda^eb^nti paridevanto.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^M5.0170^ea^ ^b^juhe na jape mante^eb^ti ayamassa paridevanagaathaa. ^b^pahaapita^eb^nti haapita.m, ^b^pa^eb^-kaaro upasaggamatta.m. ^b^paaricariyaayaa^eb^ti ko nu kilesapaaricariyaaya ito pubbe mama citta.m palobhayiiti paridevati. ^b^yo me tejaa ha sambhuta^eb^nti ^b^ha^eb^-kaaro nipaatamatta.m. yo mama sama.natejena sambhuuta.m jhaanagu.na.m naanaaratanaparipu.n.na.m mahanta.m maha.n.nave naava.m viya ga.nhi, vinaasa.m paapesi, ko naamesoti paridevatiiti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa alambusaa cintesi -- ``sacaaha.m na kathessaami, aya.m me abhisapissati, handassa kathessaamii''ti. saa dissamaanena kaayena .thatvaa gaathamaaha --
[22] avadhi.m citta.m cittena, pamaado tva.m na bujjhasii''ti..
[03] so tassaa katha.m sutvaa pitaraa dinnaovaada.m saritvaa ``pitu vacana.m akatvaa mahaavinaasa.m pattomhii''ti paridevanto catasso gaathaayo abhaasi --
[22] iccaanusaasi ma.m taato, yathaa ma.m anukampako..
[22] puna vaa taadiso hessa.m, mara.na.m me bhavissatii''ti..

[01] tattha ^b^imaanii^eb^ti imaani vacanaani. ^b^kamalaasadisitthiyo^eb^ti kamalaa vuccati naaripupphalataa, taasa.m pupphasadisaa itthiyo. ^b^taayo bujjhesi maa.navaa^eb^ti maa.nava tva.m taayo jaaneyyaasi, ~natvaa dassanapatha.m agantvaa palaapeyyaasiiti yaani evaruupaani vacanaani tadaa ma.m taato anusaasati, imaani kira taaniiti. ^b^urega.n.daayo^eb^ti uramhi dviihi ga.n.dehi samannaagataa. ^b^taayo bujjhesi, maa.navaa^eb^ti, maa.nava, taayo attano ^a^M5.0171^ea^ vasa.m gate vinaasa.m paapentiiti tva.m jaaneyyaasi. ^b^naaka^eb^nti naakari.m. ^b^jhaayaamii^eb^ti pajjhaayaami paridevaami. ^b^dhiratthu jiivitena me^eb^ti dhiratthu garahita.m mama jiivita.m, jiivitena me ko attho. ^b^puna vaa^eb^ti tathaa karissaami, yathaa puna vaa taadiso bhavissaami, na.t.tha.m jhaana.m uppaadetvaa viitaraago bhavissaami, mara.na.m vaa me bhavissatiiti.

[01] so kaamaraaga.m pahaaya puna jhaana.m uppaadesi. athassa sama.nateja.m disvaa jhaanassa ca uppaaditabhaava.m ~natvaa alambusaa bhiitaa khamaapesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa dve gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``maa me kujjha mahaaviira, maa me kujjha mahaaise.
[27] mahaa attho mayaa ci.n.no, tidasaana.m yasassina.m.
[22] tayaa pakampita.m aasi, sabba.m devapura.m tadaa''ti..
[03] atha na.m so ``khamaami te, bhadde, yathaasukha.m gacchaa''ti vissajjento gaathamaaha --
[22] tva~nca bhadde sukhii hohi, gaccha ka~n~ne yathaasukha''nti..
[03] saa ta.m vanditvaa teneva suva.n.napalla"nkena devapura.m gataa. tamattha.m ^a^P5.0161^ea^ pakaasento satthaa tisso gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``tassa ^a^V5.0156^ea^ paade gahetvaana, katvaa ca na.m padakkhi.na.m.
[22] patiito sumano vitto, devindo adadaa vara''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^M5.0172^ea^ ^b^okkamivaa^eb^ti diipaka.m viya. ``patiito''tiaadiihi tu.t.thaakaarova dassito ^b^adadaa vara^eb^nti aagantvaa vanditvaa .thitaaya tu.t.tho vara.m adaasi.
[03] saa tassa santike vara.m ga.nhantii osaanagaathamaaha --
[21] nisippalobhikaa gacche, eta.m sakka vara.m vare''ti..
[03] tassattho -- ``sakka devaraaja, sace me tva.m vara.m ado, puna isipalobhikaaya na gaccheyya.m, maa ma.m etadatthaaya pahi.neyyaasi, eta.m vara.m vare yaacaamii''ti.

[01] satthaa tassa bhikkhuno ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane so bhikkhu sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi. tadaa alambusaa puraa.nadutiyikaa ahosi, isisi"ngo ukka.n.thitabhikkhu, pitaa mahaaisi pana ahameva ahosinti.

[03] ^b^ariyaavakaasosii^eb^ti ^a^V5.0157^ea^ ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto uposathakamma.m aarabbha kathesi. tadaa hi satthaa uposathike upaasake sampaha.msetvaa ``poraa.nakapa.n.ditaa mahati.m naagasampatti.m pahaaya uposathavaasa.m upavasi.msuyevaa''ti vatvaa tehi yaacito atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite raajagahe magadharaajaa naama rajja.m kaaresi. tadaa bodhisatto tassa ra~n~no aggamahesiyaa kucchimhi nibbatti, ``duyyodhano''tissa naama.m kari.msu. so vayappatto takkasilaaya.m sabbasippaani ugga.nhitvaa aagantvaa pitu sippa.m dassesi. atha na.m pitaa rajje abhisi~ncitvaa isipabbajja.m ^a^P5.0162^ea^ pabbajitvaa uyyaane vasi. bodhisatto divasassa tikkhattu.m pitu santika.m agamaasi. tassa mahaalaabhasakkaaro udapaadi. so teneva palibodhena kasi.naparikammamattampi kaatu.m asakkonto cintesi -- ``mahaa me ^a^M5.0173^ea^ laabhasakkaaro, na sakkaa mayaa idha vasantena ima.m ja.ta.m chinditu.m, puttassa me anaarocetvaava a~n~nattha gamissaamii''ti. so ka~nci ajaanaapetvaa uyyaanaa nikkhamitvaa magadhara.t.tha.m atikkamitvaa mahisakara.t.the sa"nkhapaaladahato naama nikkhantaaya ka.n.nave.n.naaya nadiyaa nivattane candakapabbata.m upanissaaya pa.n.nasaala.m katvaa tattha vasanto kasi.naparikamma.m katvaa jhaanaabhi~n~naa nibbattetvaa u~nchaacariyaaya yaapesi. tamena.m sa"nkhapaalo naama naagaraajaa mahantena parivaarena ka.n.nave.n.nanadito nikkhamitvaa antarantaraa upasa"nkamati. so tassa dhamma.m desesi. athassa putto pitara.m da.t.thukaamo gata.t.thaana.m ajaananto anuvicaaraapetvaa ``asuka.t.thaane naama vasatii''ti ~natvaa tassa dassanatthaaya mahantena parivaarena tattha gantvaa ekamante khandhavaara.m nivaasetvaa katipayehi amaccehi saddhi.m assamapadaabhimukho paayaasi.

[03] tasmi.m kha.ne sa"nkhapaalo mahantena parivaarena dhamma.m su.nanto nisiidi. so ta.m raajaana.m aagacchanta.m disvaa isi.m vanditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. raajaa pitara.m vanditvaa pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa nisiiditvaa pucchi -- ``bhante, katararaajaa naamesa tumhaaka.m santika.m aagato''ti. taata, sa"nkhapaalanaagaraajaa naamesoti. so tassa sampatti.m nissaaya naagabhavane lobha.m katvaa katipaaha.m vasitvaa pitu bhikkhaahaara.m nibaddha.m daapetvaa attano nagarameva gantvaa catuusu dvaaresu daanasaalaayo kaaretvaa sakalajambudiipa.m sa"nkhobhento daana.m datvaa siila.m rakkhitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa naagabhavana.m patthetvaa aayupariyosaane naagabhavane nibbattitvaa sa"nkhapaalanaagaraajaa ahosi ^a^P5.0163^ea^. so gacchante kaale taaya sampattiyaa vippa.tisaarii hutvaa tato pa.t.thaaya manussayoni.m patthento ^a^V5.0158^ea^ uposathavaasa.m vasi. athassa naagabhavane vasantassa uposathavaaso na sampajjati, siilavinaasa.m paapu.naati. so tato pa.t.thaaya naagabhavanaa nikkhamitvaa ka.n.nave.n.naaya nadiyaa aviduure mahaamaggassa ca ekapadikamaggassa ca antare eka.m vammika.m parikkhipitvaa uposatha.m adhi.t.thaaya samaadinnasiilo ``mama cammama.msaadiihi atthikaa cammama.msaadiini harantuu''ti attaana.m daanamukhe vissajjetvaa vammikamatthake nipanno sama.nadhamma.m karonto caatuddase pannarase vasitvaa paa.tipade naagabhavana.m gacchati.

[03] tasmi.m ^a^M5.0174^ea^ ekadivasa.m eva.m siila.m samaadiyitvaa nipanne paccantagaamavaasino so.lasa janaa ``ma.msa.m aaharissaamaa''ti aavudhahatthaa ara~n~ne vicarantaa ki~nci alabhitvaa nikkhantaa ta.m vammikamatthake nipanna.m disvaa ``maya.m ajja godhaapotakampi na labhimhaa, ima.m naagaraajaana.m vadhitvaa khaadissaamaa''ti cintetvaa ``mahaa kho panesa gayhamaano palaayeyya, yathaanipannameva ta.m bhogesu suulehi vijjhitvaa dubbala.m katvaa ga.nhissaamaa''ti suulaani aadaaya upasa"nkami.msu. bodhisattassa sariira.m mahanta.m ekado.nikanaavappamaa.na.m va.t.tetvaa .thapitasumanapupphadaama.m viya ji~njukaphalasannibhehi akkhiihi jayasumanapupphasadisena ca siisena samannaagata.m ativiya sobhati. so tesa.m so.lasanna.m janaana.m padasaddena bhogantarato siisa.m niiharitvaa rattakkhiini ummiiletvaa te suulahatthe aagacchante disvaa cintesi -- ``ajja mayha.m manoratho matthaka.m paapu.nissati, aha.m attaana.m daanamukhe niyyaadetvaa viiriya.m adhi.t.thahitvaa nipanno, ime mama sariira.m sattiihi ko.t.tetvaa chiddaavachidda.m karonte kodhavasena akkhiini ummiiletvaa na olokessaamii''ti attano siilabhedabhayena da.lha.m adhi.t.thaaya ^a^P5.0164^ea^ siisa.m bhogantareyeva pavesetvaa nipajji. atha na.m te upagantvaa na"ngu.t.the gahetvaa ka.d.dhantaa bhuumiya.m pothetvaa tikhi.nasuulehi a.t.thasu .thaanesu vijjhitvaa saka.n.takakaa.lavettaya.t.thiyo pahaaramukhehi pavesetvaa a.t.thasu .thaanesu kaajenaadaaya mahaamagga.m pa.tipajji.msu, mahaasatto suulehi vijjhanato pa.t.thaaya eka.t.thaanepi kodhavasena akkhiini ummiiletvaa te na olokesi. tassa a.t.thahi kaajehi aadaaya niiyamaanassa siisa.m olambetvaa bhuumiya.m pahari. atha na.m ``siisamassa olambatii''ti mahaamagge nipajjaapetvaa taru.nasuulena naasaapu.ta.m vijjhitvaa rajjuka.m pavesetvaa siisa.m ukkhipitvaa kaajako.tiya.m laggitvaa punapi ukkhipitvaa magga.m pa.tipajji.msu.

[03] tasmi.m kha.ne videhara.t.the mithilanagaravaasii aa.laaro naama ku.tumbiko pa~nca saka.tasataani aadaaya sukhayaanake nisiiditvaa gacchanto te bhojaputte bodhisatta.m tathaa ga.nhitvaa gacchante disvaa tesa.m so.lasannampi so.lasahi vaahago.nehi saddhi.m pasata.m pasata.m suva.n.namaasake sabbesa.m nivaasanapaarupanaani ^a^V5.0159^ea^ bhariyaanampi nesa.m vatthaabhara.naani datvaa vissajjaapesi. atha so naagabhavana.m gantvaa tattha papa~nca.m akatvaa mahantena ^a^M5.0175^ea^ parivaarena nikkhamitvaa aa.laara.m upasa"nkamitvaa naagabhavanassa va.n.na.m kathetvaa ta.m aadaaya naagabhavana.m gantvaa tiihi naagaka~n~naasatehi saddhi.m mahantamassa yasa.m datvaa dibbehi kaamehi santappesi. aa.laaro naagabhavane ekavassa.m vasitvaa dibbakaame paribhu~njitvaa ``icchaamaha.m, samma, pabbajitu''nti naagaraajassa kathetvaa pabbajitaparikkhaare gahetvaa naagabhavanato himavantappadesa.m gantvaa pabbajitvaa tattha cira.m vasitvaa aparabhaage caarika.m caranto baaraa.nasi.m patvaa raajuyyaane vasitvaa punadivase bhikkhaaya nagara.m pavisitvaa raajadvaara.m agamaasi. atha na.m baaraa.nasiraajaa disvaa iriyaapathe pasiiditvaa pakkosaapetvaa pa~n~nattaasane nisiidaapetvaa naanaggarasabhojana.m bhojetvaa ^a^P5.0165^ea^ a~n~natarasmi.m niice aasane nisinno vanditvaa tena saddhi.m sallapanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[22] katha.m nu vittaani pahaaya bhoge, pabbaji nikkhamma gharaa sapa~n~naa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ariyaavakaasosii^eb^ti niddosasundarasariiraavakaasosi, abhiruuposiiti attho. ^b^pasannanetto^eb^ti pa~ncahi pasaadehi yuttanetto. ^b^kulamhaa^eb^ti khattiyakulaa vaa braahma.nakulaa vaa se.t.thikulaa vaa pabbajitosiiti ma~n~naami. ^b^katha.m nuu^eb^ti kena kaara.nena ki.m aaramma.na.m katvaa dhana~nca upabhoge ca pahaaya gharaa nikkhamitvaa pabbajitosi sapa~n~na pa.n.ditapurisaati pucchati.
[03] tato para.m taapasassa ca ra~n~no ca vacanappa.tivacanavasena gaathaana.m sambandho veditabbo --
[22] disvaana pu~n~naana mahaavipaaka.m, saddhaayaha.m pabbajitomhi raaja..
[21] ``na ^a^M5.0176^ea^ kaamakaamaa na bhayaa na dosaa, vaaca.m musaa pabbajitaa bha.nanti.
[22] akkhaahi me pucchito etamattha.m, sutvaana me jaayihitippasaado..
[22] pava.d.dhakaaya.m uraga.m mahanta.m, aadaaya gacchante pamodamaane..
[21] ``soha.m ^a^V5.0160^ea^ samaagamma janinda tehi, paha.t.thalomo avacamhi bhiito.
[22] kuhi.m aya.m niiyati bhiimakaayo, naagena ki.m kaahatha bhojaputtaa..
[21] ``naago ^a^P5.0166^ea^ aya.m niiyati bhojanatthaa, pava.d.dhakaayo urago mahanto.
[22] saadu~nca thuula~nca mudu~nca ma.msa.m, na tva.m rasa~n~naasi videhaputta..
[21] ``ito maya.m gantvaa saka.m niketa.m, aadaaya satthaani vikopayitvaa.
[22] ma.msaani bhokkhaama pamodamaanaa, maya~nhi ve sattavo pannagaana.m..
[21] ``sace aya.m niiyati bhojanatthaa, pava.d.dhakaayo urago mahanto.
[22] dadaami vo balibaddaani so.lasa, naaga.m ima.m mu~ncatha bandhanasmaa..
[21] ``addhaa hi no bhakkho aya.m manaapo, bahuu ca no uragaa bhuttapubbaa.
[22] karoma te ta.m vacana.m a.laara, mitta~nca no hohi videhaputta..
[21] ``tadaassu ^a^M5.0177^ea^ te bandhanaa mocayi.msu, ya.m natthuto pa.timokkassa paase.
[22] mutto ca so bandhanaa naagaraajaa, pakkaami paaciinamukho muhutta.m..
[21] ``gantvaana paaciinamukho muhutta.m, pu.n.nehi nettehi palokayii ma.m.
[22] tadaassaha.m pi.t.thito anvagacchi.m, dasa"nguli.m a~njali.m paggahetvaa..
[21] ``gaccheva kho tva.m taramaanaruupo, maa ta.m amittaa punaraggahesu.m.
[22] dukkho hi luddehi punaa samaagamo, adassana.m bhojaputtaana gaccha..
[21] ``agamaasi so rahada.m vippasanna.m, niilobhaasa.m rama.niiya.m sutittha.m.
[22] samotata.m ^a^P5.0167^ea^ jambuhi vetasaahi, paavekkhi nitti.n.nabhayo patiito..
[21] ``so ta.m pavissa nacirassa naago, dibbena me paaturahuu janinda.
[22] upa.t.thahii ma.m pitara.mva putto, hadaya"ngama.m ka.n.nasukha.m bha.nanto..
[21] ``tva.m ^a^V5.0161^ea^ mesi maataa ca pitaa a.laara, abbhantaro paa.nadado sahaayo.
[27] saka~nca iddhi.m pa.tilaabhakosmi, a.laara passa me nivesanaani.

[03] tattha ^b^vimaana^eb^nti sa"nkhapaalanaagara~n~no anekasatanaa.takasampattisampanna.m ka~ncanama.nivimaana.m. ^b^pu~n~naana^eb^nti tena katapu~n~naana.m mahanta.m vipaaka.m disvaa kamma~nca ^a^M5.0178^ea^ phala~nca paraloka~nca saddahitvaa pavattaaya saddhaaya aha.m pabbajito. ^b^na kaamakaamaa^eb^ti na vatthukaamenapi bhayenapi dosenapi musaa bha.nanti. ^b^jaayihitii^eb^ti, bhante, tumhaaka.m vacana.m sutvaa mayhampi pasaado somanassa.m jaayissati. ^b^vaa.nijja^eb^nti vaa.nijjakamma.m karissaamiiti gacchanto. ^b^pathe addasaasimhii^eb^ti pa~ncanna.m saka.tasataana.m purato sukhayaanake nisiiditvaa gacchanto mahaamagge janapadamanusse addasa.m. ^b^pava.d.dhakaaya^eb^nti va.d.dhitakaaya.m. ^b^aadaayaa^eb^ti a.t.thahi kaajehi gahetvaa. ^b^avacamhii^eb^ti abhaasi.m. ^b^bhiimakaayo^eb^ti bhayajanakakaayo. ^b^bhojaputtaa^eb^ti luddaputtake piyasamudaacaarenaalapati. ^b^videhaputtaa^eb^ti videhara.t.thavaasitaaya aa.laara.m aalapi.msu. ^b^vikopayitvaa^eb^ti chinditvaa. ^b^maya~nhi vo sattavo^eb^ti maya.m pana naagaana.m verino naama. ^b^bhojanatthaa^eb^ti bhojanatthaaya. ^b^mitta~nca no hohii^eb^ti tva.m amhaaka.m mitto hohi, katagu.na.m jaana.

[03] ^b^tadaassu te^eb^ti, mahaaraaja, tehi bhojaputtehi eva.m vutte aha.m tesa.m so.lasa vaahago.ne nivaasanapaarupanaani pasata.m pasata.m suva.n.namaasake bhariyaana~nca nesa.m vatthaala"nkaara.m adaasi.m, atha te sa"nkhapaalanaagaraajaana.m bhuumiya.m nipajjaapetvaa attano kakkha.lataaya saka.n.takakaa.lavettalataaya ko.tiya.m gahetvaa aaka.d.dhitu.m aarabhi.msu. athaaha.m naagaraajaana.m kilamanta.m disvaa akilamentova asinaa taa lataa chinditvaa daarakaana.m ka.n.navedhato va.t.tiniihara.naniyaamena adukkhaapento sa.nika.m niihari.m, tasmi.m kaale te bhojaputtaa ya.m bandhana.m assa natthuto pavesetvaa paase pa.timokka.m, tasmaa bandhanaa ta.m ^a^P5.0168^ea^ uraga.m mocayi.msu. tassa naasato saha paasena ta.m rajjuka.m niihari.msuuti diipeti. iti te uraga.m vissajjetvaa thoka.m gantvaa ``aya.m urago dubbalo, matakaale na.m gahetvaa gamissaamaa''ti niliiyi.msu.

[03] ^b^pu.n.nehii^eb^ti sopi muhutta.m paaciinaabhimukho gantvaa assupu.n.nehi nettehi ma.m palokayi. ^b^tadaassaha^eb^nti tadaa assa aha.m. ^b^gacchevaa^eb^ti eva.m ta.m avacanti vadati. ^b^rahada^eb^nti ka.n.nave.n.nadaha.m. ^b^samotata^eb^nti ubhayatiiresu jamburukkhavetasarukkhehi otata.m vitata.m. ^b^nitti.n.nabhayo patiito^eb^ti so ^a^M5.0179^ea^ kira ta.m daha.m pavisanto aa.laarassa nipaccakaara.m dassetvaa yaava na"ngu.t.thaa otari, udake ^a^V5.0162^ea^ pavi.t.tha.t.thaanamevassa nibbhaya.m ahosi, tasmaa nitti.n.nabhayo patiito ha.t.thatu.t.tho paavekkhiiti. ^b^pavissaa^eb^ti pavisitvaa. ^b^dibbena me^eb^ti naagabhavane pamaada.m anaapajjitvaa mayi ka.n.nave.n.natiira.m anatikkanteyeva dibbena parivaarena mama purato paaturahosi. ^b^upa.t.thahii^eb^ti upaagami. ^b^abbhantaro^eb^ti hadayama.msasadiso. tva.m mama bahupakaaro, sakkaara.m te karissaami. ^b^passa me nivesanaanii^eb^ti mama naagabhavana.m passa. ^b^masakkasaara.m viyaa^eb^ti masakkasaaro vuccati osakkanaparisakkanaabhaavena ghanasaarataaya ca sinerupabbataraajaa. aya.m tattha maapita.m taavati.msabhavana.m sandhaayevamaaha.
[03] mahaaraaja! eva.m vatvaa so naagaraajaa uttari attano naagabhavana.m va.n.nento gaathaadvayamaaha --
[21] ``ta.m bhuumibhaagehi upetaruupa.m, asakkharaa ceva muduu subhaa ca.
[22] niicatti.naa apparajaa ca bhuumi, paasaadikaa yattha jahanti soka.m..
[22] pakkaa ca pesii ca phalaa suphullaa, niccotukaa dhaarayantii phalaanii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^asakkharaa^eb^ti yaa tattha bhuumi paasaa.nasakkhararahitaa mudu subhaa ka~ncanarajatama.nimayaa sattaratanavaalukaaki.n.naa. ^b^niicatti.naa^eb^ti indagopakapi.t.thisadisava.n.nehi niicati.nehi samannaagataa. ^b^apparajaa^eb^ti pa.msurahitaa. ^b^yattha jahanti soka^eb^nti yattha pavi.t.thamattaava nissokaa honti. ^b^anaavakulaa^eb^ti ^a^P5.0169^ea^ na avakulaa akhaa.numaa upari ukkulavikulabhaavarahitaa vaa samasa.n.thitaa. ^b^ve.luriyuupaniilaa^eb^ti ve.luriyena upaniilaa, tasmi.m naagabhavane ve.luriyamayaa pasannasalilaa niilobhaasaa anekava.n.nakamaluppalasa~nchannaa pokkhara.niiti attho. ^b^catuddisa^eb^nti tassaa pokkhara.niyaa catuusu disaasu. ^b^pakkaa caa^eb^ti tasmi.m ambavane ambarukkhaa pakkaphalaa ca ^a^M5.0180^ea^ a.d.dhapakkaphalaa ca taru.naphalaa ca phullitaayevaati attho. ^b^niccotukaa^eb^ti channampi utuuna.m anuruupehi pupphaphalehi samannaagataati.
[21] tesa.m vanaana.m naradeva majjhe, nivesana.m bhassarasannikaasa.m.
[22] sahassathambha.m atulaanubhaava.m, yatthassa bhariyaa mahesii ahosi..
[21] ``ekaa ca naarii taramaanaruupaa, aadaaya ve.luriyamaya.m mahaggha.m.
[21] ``tato ma.m urago hatthe gahetvaa, nisiidayii paamukhaaasanasmi.m.
[22] idamaasana.m atra bhava.m nisiidatu, bhava~nhi me a~n~nataro garuuna.m..
[21] ``a~n~naa ca naarii taramaanaruupaa, aadaaya vaari.m upasa"nkamitvaa.
[22] paadaani pakkhaalayii me janinda, bhariyaava bhattuu patino piyassa..
[21] ``aparaa ^a^P5.0170^ea^ ^a^M5.0181^ea^ ca naarii taramaanaruupaa, paggayha sova.n.namayaaya paatiyaa.
[22] anekasuupa.m vividha.m viya~njana.m, upanaamayii bhatta manu~n~naruupa.m..
[21] ``turiyehi ma.m bhaarata bhuttavanta.m, upa.t.thahu.m bhattu mano viditvaa.
[22] tatuttari.m ma.m nipatii mahanta.m, dibbehi kaamehi anappakehii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^nivesana^eb^nti paasaado. ^b^bhassarasannikaasa^eb^nti pabhassaradassana.m. ^b^rajatagga.la^eb^nti rajatadvaarakavaa.ta.m. ^b^ma.niimayaa^eb^ti evaruupaa tattha kuu.taagaaraa ca gabbhaa ca. ^b^paripuuraa^eb^ti sampu.n.naa. ^b^so sa"nkhapaalo^eb^ti, mahaaraaja, aha.m eva.m tasmi.m naagabhavana.m va.n.nente ta.m da.t.thukaamo ahosi.m, atha ma.m tattha netvaa so sa"nkhapaalo hatthe gahetvaa taramaano ve.luriyathambhehi sahassathambha.m paasaada.m aaruyha yasmi.m .thaane assa mahesii ahosi, ta.m .thaana.m netiiti diipeti. ^b^ekaa caa^eb^ti mayi paasaada.m abhiru.lhe ekaa itthii a~n~nehi ma.niihi jaatimahantehi upeta.m subha.m ve.luriyaasana.m tena naagaraajena avuttaava. ^b^abbhihaasii^eb^ti abhihari, atthariiti vutta.m hoti.

[03] ^b^paamukhaaasanasmi^eb^nti pamukhaasanasmi.m, uttamaasane nisiidaapesiiti attho. ^b^garuuna^eb^nti maataapituuna.m ^a^V5.0164^ea^ me tva.m a~n~nataroti eva.m vatvaa nisiidaapesi. ^b^vividha.m viya~njana^eb^nti vividha.m bya~njana.m. ^b^bhatta manu~n~naruupa^eb^nti bhatta.m manu~n~naruupa.m. ^b^bhaarataa^eb^ti raajaana.m aalapati. ^b^bhuttavanta^eb^nti bhuttaavi.m katabhattakicca.m. ^b^upa.t.thahu^eb^nti anekasatehi turiyehi gandhabba.m kurumaanaa upa.t.thahi.msu. ^b^bhattu mano viditvaa^eb^ti attano patino citta.m jaanitvaa. ^b^tatuttari^eb^nti tato gandhabbakara.nato uttari.m. ^b^ma.m nipatii^eb^ti so naagaraajaa ma.m upasa"nkami. ^b^mahanta.m dibbehii^eb^ti mahantehi u.laarehi dibbehi kaamehi tehi ca anappakehi.
[22] a.laara etaassu te kaamakaaraa, dadaami te taa paricaarayassuu''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0182^ea^ ^b^sabbattamajjhaa^eb^ti sabbaa attamajjhaa, paa.ninaa gahitappamaa.namajjhaati attho. a.t.thakathaaya.m pana ``sumajjhaa''ti paa.tho. ^b^padumuttaraabhaa^eb^ti ^a^P5.0171^ea^ padumava.n.nauttaraabhaa, padumava.n.nauttaracchaviyoti attho. ^b^paricaarayassuu^eb^ti taa attano paadaparicaarikaa karohiiti vatvaa tiihi itthisatehi saddhi.m mahaasampatti.m mayha.m adaasi.
[22] naagassida.m kinti katha~nca laddha.m, kathajjhagamaasi vimaanase.t.tha.m..
[21] ``adhiccaladdha.m pari.naamaja.m te, saya.mkata.m udaahu devehi dinna.m.

[03] tattha ^b^dibbarasaanubhutvaa^eb^ti dibbe kaamagu.narase anubhavitvaa. ^b^tadaassuha^eb^nti tadaa assu aha.m. ^b^naagassida^eb^nti bhadramukhassa sa"nkhapaalanaagaraajassa ida.m sampattijaata.m ^b^kinti^eb^ ki.m naama kamma.m katvaa katha~nca katvaa laddha.m, kathameta.m vimaanase.t.tha.m tva.m ajjhagamaasi, iti na.m aha.m pucchi.m. ^b^adhiccaladdha^eb^nti ahetunaa laddha.m. ^b^pari.naamaja.m te^eb^ti kenaci tava atthaaya pari.naamitattaa pari.naamato jaata.m. ^b^saya.mkata^eb^nti kaarake pakkosaapetvaa ratanaani datvaa kaaritanti.
[21] ``naadhiccaladdha.m na pari.naamaja.m me, na saya.mkata.m naapi devehi dinna.m.
[22] sakehi kammehi apaapakehi, pu~n~nehi me laddhamida.m vimaana.m..
[21] ``ki.m ^a^M5.0183^ea^ te vata.m ki.m pana brahmacariya.m, kissa suci.n.nassa aya.m vipaako.
[22] akkhaahi me naagaraajetamattha.m, katha.m nu te laddhamida.m vimaana.m..
[22] so ^a^P5.0172^ea^ ittara.m jiivita.m sa.mviditvaa, asassata.m vipari.naamadhamma.m..
[21] ``anna~nca paana~nca pasannacitto, sakkacca daana.m vipula.m adaasi.m.
[22] opaanabhuuta.m me ghara.m tadaasi, santappitaa sama.nabraahma.naa ca..
[22] acchaadana.m sayanamathannapaana.m, sakkacca daanaani adamha tattha..
[21] ``ta.m me vata.m ta.m pana brahmacariya.m, tassa suci.n.nassa aya.m vipaako.
[27] teneva me laddhamida.m vimaana.m, pahuutabhakkha.m bahuannapaana.m.
[22] naccehi giitehi cupetaruupa.m, cira.t.thitika.m na ca sassataaya.m..
[22] kimeva daa.thaavudha ki.m pa.ticca, hatthattamaagacchi vanibbakaana.m..
[21] ``bhaya.m nu te anvagata.m mahanta.m, tejo nu te naanvaga.m dantamuula.m.
[22] kimeva daa.thaavudha ki.m pa.ticca, kilesamaapajji vanibbakaana.m..
[21] ``na ^a^M5.0184^ea^ me bhaya.m anvagata.m mahanta.m, tejo na sakkaa mama tehi hantu.m.
[22] athaagamu.m so.lasa bhojaputtaa, rajju.m gahetvaana da.lha~nca paasa.m..
[21] ``bhetvaana ^a^P5.0173^ea^ naasa.m atikassa rajju.m, nayi.msu ma.m samparigayha luddaa.
[21] ``ekaayane ta.m pathe addasa.msu, balena va.n.nena cupetaruupa.m.
[22] siriyaa pa~n~naaya ca bhaavitosi, ki.m patthaya.m naaga tapo karosi..
[21] ``na puttahetuu na dhanassa hetuu, na aayuno caapi a.laara hetu.
[22] manussayoni.m abhipatthayaano, tasmaa parakkama tapo karomi..
[22] pucchaami ta.m naagaraajetamattha.m, seyyo ito kena manussaloko..
[21] ``a.laara ^a^M5.0185^ea^ naa~n~natra manussalokaa, suddhiiva sa.mvijjati sa.myamo vaa.
[22] aha~nca laddhaana manussayoni.m, kaahaami jaatimara.nassa anta.m..
[21] ``sa.mvaccharo me vasato tavantike, annena paanena upa.t.thitosmi.
[22] aamantayitvaana palemi naaga, cirappavu.t.thosmi aha.m janinda..
[21] ``puttaa ca daaraa anujiivino ca, niccaanusi.t.thaa upati.t.thatheta.m.
[22] kaccinnu ^a^P5.0174^ea^ ta.m naabhisapittha koci, piya~nhi me dassana.m tuyha.m a.laara..
[21] ``yathaapi maatuu ca pituu agaare, putto piyo pa.tivihito vaseyya.
[22] tatopi mayha.m idhameva seyyo, citta~nhi te naaga mayii pasanna.m..
[21] ``ma.nii ^a^V5.0167^ea^ mama.m vijjati lohita"nko, dhanaaharo ma.niratana.m u.laara.m.
[22] aadaaya tva.m gaccha saka.m niketa.m, laddhaa dhana.m ta.m ma.nimossajassuu''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ki.m te vata^eb^nti ki.m tava vatasamaadaana.m. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti se.t.thacariya.m. ^b^opaanabhuuta^eb^nti catumahaapathe khatapokkhara.nii viya dhammikasama.nabraahma.naana.m yathaasukha.m paribhu~njitabbavibhava.m. ^b^na ca sassataaya^eb^nti cira.t.thitika.m samaanampi ce ta.m mayha.m sassata.m na hotiiti me katheti.

[03] ^b^appaanubhaavaa^eb^ti bhojaputte sandhaayaaha. ^b^hantii^eb^ti a.t.thasu .thaanesu suulehi vijjhantaa ki.mkaara.naa hani.msu. ^b^ki.m pa.ticcaa^eb^ti ki.m sandhaaya tva.m tadaa tesa.m hatthatta.m aagacchi vasa.m upagato. ^b^vanibbakaana^eb^nti bhojaputtaa idha ``vanibbakaa''ti vuttaa. ^b^tejo nu te naanvaga.m dantamuula^eb^nti ki.m nu tava tejo ^a^M5.0186^ea^ bhojaputte disvaa tadaa bhaya.m mahanta.m anvagata.m, udaahu visa.m dantamuula.m na anvagata.m. ^b^kilesa^eb^nti dukkha.m. ^b^vanibbakaana^eb^nti bhojaputtaana.m santike, bhojaputte nissaayaati attho.

[03] ^b^tejo na sakkaa mama tehi hantu^eb^nti mama visatejo a~n~nassa tejena abhihantumpi na sakkaa. ^b^sata^eb^nti buddhaadiina.m. ^b^dhammaanii^eb^ti siilasamaadhipa~n~naakhantianuddayamettaabhaavanaasa"nkhaataani dhammaani. ^b^sukittitaanii^eb^ti suva.n.nitaani sukathitaani. kinti katvaa? ^b^samuddavelaava duraccayaanii^eb^ti tehi samuddavelaa viya sappurisehi jiivitatthampi duraccayaaniiti va.n.nitaani, tasmaa aha.m siilabhedabhayena khantimettaadisamannaagato hutvaa mama kopassa siilavelanta.m atikkamitu.m na adaasinti aaha.

[02] ``imissaa pana sa"nkhapaaladhammadesanaaya dasapi paaramiyo labbhanti. tadaa hi mahaasattena sariirassa pariccattabhaavo daanapaaramii naama hoti, tathaaruupenaapi visatejena siilassa abhinnataa siilapaaramii, naagabhavanato nikkhamitvaa sama.nadhammakara.na.m nekkhammapaaramii, `ida~ncida~nca kaatu.m va.t.tatii'ti sa.mvidahana.m pa~n~naapaaramii, adhivaasanaviiriya.m viiriyapaaramii, adhivaasanakhanti khantipaaramii, saccasamaadaana.m saccapaaramii, `mama siila.m na bhindissaamii'ti adhi.t.thaana.m adhi.t.thaanapaaramii, anuddayabhaavo ^a^P5.0175^ea^ mettaapaaramii, vedanaaya majjhattabhaavo upekkhaapaaramii''ti.

[03] ^b^athaagamu^eb^nti athekadivasa.m vammikamatthake nipanna.m disvaa so.lasa bhojaputtaa khararajju~nca da.lhapaasa~nca ^a^V5.0168^ea^ suulaani ca gahetvaa mama santika.m aagataa. ^b^bhetvaanaa^eb^ti mama sariira.m a.t.thasu .thaanesu bhinditvaa saka.n.takakaa.lavettalataa pavesetvaa. ^b^naasa.m atikassa rajju^eb^nti thoka.m gantvaa siisa.m me olambanta.m disvaa mahaamagge nipajjaapetvaa puna naasampi me bhinditvaa va.t.tarajju.m atikassa aavunitvaa kaajako.tiya.m laggetvaa samantato pariggahetvaa ma.m nayi.msu.

[03] ^b^addasa.msuu^eb^ti, samma sa"nkhapaala, te bhojaputtaa ekaayane ekagamane ja"nghapadikamagge ta.m balena ca va.n.nena ca upetaruupa.m passi.msu, tva.m pana issariyasobhaggasiriyaa ca pa~n~naaya ca bhaavito va.d.dhito, so tva.m evaruupo samaanopi ^a^M5.0187^ea^ kimattha.m tapa.m karosi, kimicchanto uposathavaasa.m vasasi, siila.m rakkhasi. ``addasaasi''ntipi paa.tho, aha.m ekaayane mahaamagge ta.m addasinti attho. ^b^abhipatthayaano^eb^ti patthento. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa manussayoni.m patthemi, tasmaa viiriyena parakkamitvaa tapokamma.m karomi.

[03] ^b^surosito^eb^ti su.t.thu manulitto. ^b^ito^eb^ti imamhaa naagabhavanaa manussaloko kena uttaritaro. ^b^suddhii^eb^ti maggaphalanibbaanasa"nkhaataa visuddhi. ^b^sa.myamo^eb^ti siila.m. ida.m so manussalokeyeva buddhapaccekabuddhaana.m uppatti.m sandhaayaaha. ^b^kaahaamii^eb^ti attano appa.tisandhikabhaava.m karonto jaatijaraamara.nassanta.m karissaamiiti. eva.m, mahaaraaja, so sa"nkhapaalo manussaloka.m va.n.nesi. ^b^sa.mvaccharo me^eb^ti eva.m, mahaaraaja, tasmi.m manussaloka.m va.n.nente aha.m pabbajjaaya sineha.m katvaa etadavoca.m. tattha ^b^upa.t.thitosmii^eb^ti annapaanena ceva dibbehi ca kaamagu.nehi parici.n.no maanito asmi. ^b^palemii^eb^ti paremi gacchaami. ^b^cirappavu.t.thosmii^eb^ti aha.m manussalokato cirappavu.t.tho asmi.

[03] ^b^naabhisapitthaa^eb^ti kacci nu kho mama puttaadiisu koci ta.m na akkosi na paribhaasiiti pucchati. ``naabhisajjethaa''tipi paa.tho, na kopesiiti attho. ^b^pa.tivihito^eb^ti pa.tijaggito. ^b^ma.nii mama^eb^nti sace, samma aa.laara, gacchasiyeva, eva.m sante mama lohita"nko dhanahaarako sabbakaamadado ma.ni sa.mvijjati, ta.m u.laara.m ma.niratana.m aadaaya tava geha.m gaccha, tattha imassaanubhaavena yaavadicchaka.m dhana.m laddhaa puna ima.m ma.ni.m ossajassu, ossajanto ca a~n~nattha anossajitvaa attano udakacaa.tiya.m ossajeyyaasiiti vatvaa mayha.m ma.niratana.m upanesiiti vadati.

[03] eva.m vatvaa aa.laaro ``athaaha.m, mahaaraaja, naagaraajaana.m etadavoca.m -- `samma, naaha.m dhanenatthiko, pabbajitu.m pana icchaamii'ti ^a^P5.0176^ea^ pabbajitaparikkhaara.m yaacitvaa teneva saddhi.m naagabhavanaa ^a^V5.0169^ea^ nikkhamitvaa ta.m nivattetvaa himavanta.m pavisitvaa pabbajitomhii''ti vatvaa ra~n~no dhammakatha.m kathento gaathaadvayamaaha --
[22] aadiinava.m kaamagu.nesu disvaa, saddhaayaha.m pabbajitomhi raaja..
[21] ``dumapphalaaniiva ^a^M5.0188^ea^ patanti maa.navaa, daharaa ca vuddhaa ca sariirabhedaa.
[22] etampi disvaa pabbajitomhi raaja, apa.n.naka.m saama~n~nameva seyyo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^saddhaayaa^eb^ti kamma~nca phala~nca nibbaana~nca saddahitvaa. ^b^dumapphalaaniiva patantii^eb^ti yathaa rukkhaphalaani pakkaanipi apakkaanipi patanti, tathaa maa.navaa daharaa ca vuddhaa ca patanti. ^b^apa.n.naka^eb^nti aviraddha.m niyyaanika.m. ^b^saama~n~nameva seyyo^eb^ti pabbajjaava uttamaati pabbajjaaya gu.na.m disvaa pabbajitomhi, mahaaraajaati.
[21] ``addhaa have sevitabbaa sapa~n~naa, bahussutaa ye bahu.thaanacintino.
[22] naaga~nca sutvaana tava~nca.laara, kaahaami pu~n~naani anappakaanii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^ye bahu.thaanacintino^eb^ti ye bahuuni kaara.naani jaananti. ^b^naaga~ncaa^eb^ti tathaa appamaadavihaarina.m naagaraajaana~nca tava ca vacana.m sutvaa.
[21] ``addhaa have sevitabbaa sapa~n~naa, bahussutaa ye bahu.thaanacintino.
[22] naaga~nca sutvaana mama~nca raaja, karohi pu~n~naani anappakaanii''ti..

[03] eva.m ^a^P5.0177^ea^ so ra~n~no dhamma.m desetvaa tattheva cattaaro vassaanamaase vasitvaa puna himavanta.m gantvaa yaavajiiva.m cattaaro brahmavihaare bhaavetvaa brahmalokuupago ahosi. sa"nkhapaalopi yaavajiiva.m uposathavaasa.m vasitvaa raajaa ca daanaadiini pu~n~naani karitvaa yathaakamma.m gataa.

[01] satthaa ^a^V5.0170^ea^ ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa pitaa taapaso kassapo ahosi, baaraa.nasiraajaa aanando, aa.laaro saariputto, sa"nkhapaalanaagaraajaa pana ahameva ahosi''nti.

[03] ^b^aamantayaami^eb^ ^a^M5.0189^ea^ ^b^nigama^eb^nti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto nekkhammapaarami.m aarabbha kathesi. paccuppannavatthu ^b^mahaanaaradakassapajaataka^eb^sadisameva (jaa0 2.22.1153 aadayo). atiite pana baaraa.nasii sudassana.m naama nagara.m ahosi, tattha brahmadatto naama raajaa ajjhaavasi. bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyaa kucchimhi nibbatti, dasamaasaccayena maatukucchito nikkhami. tassa pana pu.n.nacandasassirika.m mukha.m ahosi, tenassa ``somakumaaro''ti naama.m kari.msu. so vi~n~nuta.m patto sutavittako savanasiilo ahosi, tena na.m ``sutasomo''ti sa~njaani.msu. so vayappatto takkasilaaya.m sabbasippaani uggahetvaa aagato pitu santaka.m setacchatta.m labhitvaa dhammena rajja.m kaaresi, mahanta.m issariya.m ahosi. tassa candaadevippamukhaani so.lasa itthisahassaani ahesu.m. so aparabhaage puttadhiitaahi va.d.dhanto gharaavaase anabhirato ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa pabbajitukaamo ahosi.

[03] so ekadivasa.m kappaka.m aamantetvaa ``yadaa me, samma, sirasmi.m palita.m passeyyaasi, tadaa me aaroceyyaasii''ti aaha. kappako tassa vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa aparabhaage palita.m disvaa aarocetvaa ``tena hi na.m, samma kappaka, uddharitvaa mama hatthe pati.t.thapehii''ti vutte suva.n.nasa.n.daasena uddharitvaa ra~n~no hatthe .thapesi. ta.m disvaa mahaasatto ``jaraaya me sariira.m abhibhuuta''nti bhiito ta.m palita.m gahetvaava paasaadaa otaritvaa mahaajanassa ^a^P5.0178^ea^ dassana.t.thaane pa~n~natte raajapalla"nke nisiiditvaa senaapatippamukhaani asiitiamaccasahassaani purohitappamukhaani sa.t.thibraahma.nasahassaani a~n~ne ca ra.t.thikajaanapadanegamaadayo bahuu jane pakkosaapetvaa ``sirasmi.m me palita.m jaata.m, aha.m mahallakosmi, mama pabbajitabhaava.m jaanaathaa''ti vatvaa pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[22] sirasmi.m palita.m jaata.m, pabbajja.m daani rocaha''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^V5.0171^ea^ ^b^aamantayaamii^eb^ti jaanaapemi. ^b^rocaha^eb^nti ``rocemi aha.m, tassa me, bhonto! pabbajitabhaava.m jaanaathaa''ti.
[03] ta.m ^a^M5.0190^ea^ sutvaa tesu eko visaaradappatto hutvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``abhu.m me katha.m nu bha.nasi, salla.m me deva urasi kappesi.
[22] sattasataa te bhariyaa, katha.m nu te taa bhavissantii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^abhu^eb^nti ava.d.dhi.m. ^b^urasi kappesii^eb^ti urasmi.m sunisitadhotasatti.m caaresi. ^b^sattasataa^eb^ti samajaatikaa khattiyaka~n~naa sandhaayeta.m vutta.m. ^b^katha.m nu te taa bhavissantii^eb^ti taa tava bhariyaa tayi pabbajite anaathaa nippaccayaa katha.m bhavissanti, etaa anaathaa katvaa tumhaaka.m pabbajjaa naama na yuttaati.
[03] tattha ^b^pa~n~naayihintii^eb^ti attano kammena pa~n~naayissanti. aha.m etaasa.m ki.m homi, sabbaapetaa daharaa, yo a~n~no raajaa bhavissati, ta.m etaa gamissantiiti.

[03] amaccaadayo bodhisattassa pa.tivacana.m daatu.m asakkontaa tassa maatu santika.m gantvaa tamattha.m aarocesu.m. saa turitaturitaa aagantvaa ^a^P5.0179^ea^ ``sacca.m kira tva.m, taata, pabbajitukaamosii''ti vatvaa dve gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``dulladdha.m me aasi sutasoma, yassa te homaha.m maataa.
[22] ya.m me vilapantiyaa, anapekkho pabbajasi deva..
[21] ``dulladdha.m me aasi sutasoma, ya.m ta.m aha.m vijaayissa.m.
[22] ya.m me vilapantiyaa, anapekkho pabbajasi devaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0172^ea^ ^a^M5.0191^ea^ ^b^dulladdha^eb^nti ya.m eta.m mayaa labhantiyaa putta.m jamma.m laddha.m dulladdha.m. ^b^ya.m me^eb^ti yena kaara.nena mayi naanappakaaraka.m vipalantiyaa tva.m pabbajitu.m icchasi, tena kaara.nena taadisassa puttassa labhana.m mama dulladdha.m naamaati.
[03] bodhisatto eva.m paridevamaanaayapi maataraa saddhi.m ki~nci na kathesi. saa roditvaa kanditvaa sayameva ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. athassa pitu aarocesu.m. so aagantvaa eka.m taava gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ko naameso dhammo, sutasoma kaa ca naama pabbajjaa.
[22] ya.m no amhe ji.n.ne, anapekkho pabbajasi devaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ya.m no amhe^eb^ti ya.m tva.m amhaaka.m putto samaano amhe ji.n.ne pa.tijaggitabbakaale appa.tijaggitvaa papaate sila.m pava.t.tento viya cha.d.detvaa anapekkho pabbajasi, tena ta.m vadaami ko naameso tava dhammoti adhippaayo.

[03] ta.m sutvaa mahaasatto tu.nhii ahosi. atha na.m pitaa, ``taata sutasoma, sacepi te maataapituusu sineho natthi, puttadhiitaro te bahuu taru.naa, tayaa vinaa vattitu.m na sakkhissanti, tesa.m vu.d.dhippattakaale pabbajissasii''ti vatvaa sattama.m gaathamaaha --
[22] ma~njuu tepita.m apassantaa, ma~n~ne dukkha.m nigacchantii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^ma~njuu^eb^ti madhuravacanaa. ^b^nigacchantii^eb^ti nigacchissanti kaayikacetasikadukkha.m pa.tilabhissantiiti ma~n~naami.

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0173^ea^ ^a^M5.0192^ea^ ^b^sabbehipi tumhehii^eb^ti, taata, na kevala.m putteheva, atha kho tumhehipi a~n~nehipi sabbasa"nkhaarehi cira.m .thatvaapi diighamaddhaana.m .thatvaapi vinaasabhaavova niyato. sakalasmimpi hi lokasannivaase ekasa"nkhaaropi nicco naama natthiiti.

[03] eva.m mahaasatto pitu dhammakatha.m kathesi. so tassa dhammakatha.m sutvaa tu.nhii ahosi. athassa sattasataana.m bhariyaana.m aarocayi.msu. taa ca paasaadaa oruyha tassa santika.m gantvaa gopphakesu gahetvaa paridevamaanaa gaathamaaha.msu --
[21] ``chinna.m nu tuyha.m hadaya.m, adu te karu.naa ca natthi amhesu.
[22] ya.m no vikandantiyo, anapekkho pabbajasi devaa''ti..

[03] tassattho -- saami sutasoma, amhe vidhavaa katvaa gacchantassa appamattakassapi sinehassa abhaavena tava hadaya.m amhesu chinna.m nu, udaahu karu.naaya abhaavena kaaru~n~na.m vaa natthi, ya.m no eva.m vikandantiyo pahaaya pabbajasiiti.
[03] mahaasatto taasa.m paadamuule parivattitvaa paridevamaanaana.m paridevanasadda.m sutvaa anantara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na ^a^P5.0181^ea^ ca mayha.m chinna.m hadaya.m, atthi karu.naapi mayha.m tumhesu.
[03] tattha ^b^sagga~ncaa^eb^ti aha.m sagga~nca patthayanto yasmaa aya.m pabbajjaa naama buddhaadiihi va.n.nitaa, tasmaa pabbajissaami, tumhe maa cintayitthaati taa assaasesi.
[03] athassa aggamahesiyaa aarocesu.m. saa garubhaaraa paripu.n.nagabbhaapi samaanaa aagantvaa mahaasatta.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m .thitaa tisso gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``dulladdha.m ^a^M5.0193^ea^ me aasi sutasoma, yassa te aha.m bhariyaa.
[22] ya.m me vilapantiyaa, anapekkho pabbajasi deva..
[21] ``dulladdha.m ^a^V5.0174^ea^ me aasi sutasoma, yassa te aha.m bhariyaa.
[22] ya.m me kucchipa.tisandhi.m, anapekkho pabbajasi deva..
[21] ``paripakko me gabbho, kucchigato yaava na.m vijaayaami.
[22] maaha.m ekaa vidhavaa, pacchaa dukkhaani addakkhi''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^ya.m me^eb^ti yasmaa mama vilapantiyaa tva.m anapekkho pabbajasi, tasmaa ya.m mayaa tava santikaa aggamahesi.t.thaana.m laddha.m, ta.m dulladdhameva aasi. dutiyagaathaaya yasmaa ma.m tva.m kucchipa.tisandhi.m pahaaya anapekkho pabbajasi, tasmaa ya.m mayaa tava bhariyatta.m laddha.m, ta.m dulladdha.m meti attho. ^b^yaava na^eb^nti yaavaaha.m ta.m gabbha.m vijaayaami, taava adhivaasehiiti.
[21] ``paripakko te gabbho, kucchigato i"ngha tva.m vijaayassu.

[03] tattha ^b^putta^eb^nti, bhadde, tava gabbho paripakkoti jaanaami, tva.m pana vijaayamaanaa putta.m vijaayissasi, na dhiitara.m, saa tva.m sotthinaa vijaayassu putta.m, aha.m pana saddhi.m tayaa ta.m putta.m hitvaa pabbajissaamiyevaati.

[03] saa tassa vacana.m sutvaa soka.m sandhaaretu.m asakkontii ``ito daani pa.t.thaaya, deva, amhaaka.m sirii naama natthii''ti ubhohi hatthehi hadaya.m dhaarayamaanaa assuuni mu~ncantii mahaasaddena paridevi. atha na.m samassaasento mahaasatto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``maa ^a^M5.0194^ea^ tva.m cande rudi, maa soci vanatimiramattakkhi.

[03] tattha ^b^maa tva.m cande rudii^eb^ti, bhadde candaadevi, tva.m maa rodi maa soci. ^b^vanatimiramattakkhii^eb^ti girika.n.nikapupphasamaananette. paa.liya.m pana ``kovi.laaratambakkhii''ti likhita.m, tassaa kovi.laarapuppha.m viya tambanetteti attho.

[03] saa ^a^V5.0175^ea^ tassa vacana.m sutvaa .thaatu.m asakkontii paasaada.m aaruyha rodamaanaa nisiidi. atha na.m bodhisattassa je.t.thaputto disvaa ``ki.m nu kho me maataa rodantii nisinnaa''ti ta.m pucchanto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ko ta.m amma kopesi, ki.m rodasi pekkhasi ca ma.m baa.lha.m.

[03] tattha ^b^kopesii^eb^ti, amma! ko naama ta.m kopesi, ko te appiya.m akaasi. ^b^pekkhasi caa^eb^ti ma.m baa.lha.m pekkhantii ki.mkaara.naa rodasiiti adhippaayo. ^b^ka.m avajjha.m ghaatemii^eb^ti aghaatetabbampi ka.m ghaatemi attano ~naatiina.m udikkhamaanaana~n~neva, akkhaahi meti pucchati.
[21] ``na hi so sakkaa hantu.m, vijitaavii yo ma.m taata kopesi.
[22] pitaa ^a^P5.0183^ea^ te ma.m taata avaca, anapekkho aha.m gamissaamii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^vijitaavii^eb^ti, taata, yo ma.m imissaa pathaviyaa vijitaavii kopesi, appiyasamudaacaarena me hadaye kopa~nca soka~nca pavesesi, so tayaa hantu.m na sakkaa, ma~nhi, taata, tava pitaa ``aha.m rajjasiri~nca ta~nca pahaaya ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa pabbajissaamii''ti avaca, ida.m me rodanakaara.nanti.
[03] so ^a^M5.0195^ea^ tassaa vacana.m sutvaa ``amma! ki.m naama tva.m kathesi, nanu eva.m sante maya.m anaathaa naama bhavissaamaa''ti paridevanto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``yoha.m pubbe niyyaami, uyyaana.m mattaku~njare ca yodhemi.
[22] sutasome pabbajite, katha.m nu daani karissaamii''ti..

[03] tassattho -- yo aha.m pubbe catuaaja~n~nayutta.m sabbaala"nkaarapa.tima.n.dita.m ratha.m abhiruyha uyyaana.m gacchaami, mattaku~njare ca yodhemi, a~n~nehi ca assakii.laadiihi kii.laami, svaaha.m idaani sutasome pabbajite katha.m karissaamiiti?

[03] athassa ^a^V5.0176^ea^ kani.t.thabhaataa sattavassiko te ubhopi rodante disvaa maatara.m upasa"nkamitvaa, ``amma! ki.mkaara.naa tumhe rodathaa''ti pucchitvaa tamattha.m sutvaa ``tena hi maa rodatha, aha.m taatassa pabbajitu.m na dassaamii''ti ubhopi te assaasetvaa dhaatiyaa saddhi.m paasaadaa oruyha pitu santika.m gantvaa, ``taata, tva.m kira amhe akaamake pahaaya `pabbajaamii'ti vadasi, aha.m te pabbajitu.m na dassaamii''ti pitara.m giivaaya da.lha.m gahetvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``maatucca me rudantyaa, je.t.thassa ca bhaatuno akaamassa.
[22] hatthepi te gahessa.m, na hi gacchasi no akaamaana''nti..

[03] mahaasatto cintesi -- ``aya.m me paripantha.m karoti, kena nu kho na.m upaayena pa.tikkamaapeyya''nti. tato dhaati.m oloketvaa, ``amma! dhaati handima.m ma.nikkhandhapi.landhana.m, taveso hotu ^a^P5.0184^ea^ hatthe, putta.m apanehi, maa me antaraaya.m karii''ti saya.m putta.m hatthe gahetvaa apanetu.m asakkonto tassaa la~nja.m pa.tijaanetvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``u.t.thehi tva.m dhaati, ima.m kumaara.m ramehi a~n~nattha.
[22] maa me paripanthamakaasi, sagga.m mama patthayaanassaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^M5.0196^ea^ ^b^ima.m kumaara^eb^nti, amma! dhaati tva.m u.t.thehi, ima.m kumaara.m apanetvaa aagantvaa ima.m ma.ni.m gahetvaa a~n~nattha na.m abhiramehiiti.
[01] saa la~nja.m labhitvaa kumaara.m sa~n~naapetvaa aadaaya a~n~nattha gantvaa paridevamaanaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ya.m nuunima.m dadeyya.m pabha"nkara.m, ko nu me iminaattho.
[22] sutasome pabbajite, ki.m nu mena.m karissaamii''ti..

[01] tassattho -- ya.m nuuna aha.m ima.m la~njatthaaya gahita.m pabha"nkara.m suppabhaasa.m ma.ni.m dadeyya.m, ko nu mayha.m sutasomanarinde pabbajite iminaa attho, ^b^ki.m nu mena.m karissaami,^eb^ aha.m tasmi.m pabbajite ima.m labhissaami, labhantiipi ca ki.m nu kho eta.m karissaami, passatha me kammanti.
[03] tato ^a^V5.0177^ea^ mahaasenagutto cintesi -- ``aya.m raajaa ``gehe me dhana.m manda'nti sa~n~na.m karoti ma~n~ne, bahubhaavamassa kathessaamii''ti. so u.t.thaaya vanditvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``koso ca tuyha.m vipulo, ko.t.thaagaara~nca tuyha.m paripuura.m.
[22] pathavii ca tuyha.m vijitaa, ramassu maa pabbaji devaa''ti..
[21] ``koso ca mayha.m vipulo, ko.t.thaagaara~nca mayha.m paripuura.m.
[22] pathavii ca mayha.m vijitaa, ta.m hitvaa pabbajissaamii''ti..
[03] ta.m ^a^P5.0185^ea^ sutvaa tasmi.m apagate kulava.d.dhanase.t.thi naama u.t.thaaya vanditvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``mayhampi ^a^M5.0197^ea^ dhana.m pahuuta.m, sa"nkhyaatu.m nopi deva sakkomi.
[22] ta.m te dadaami sabbampi, ramassu maa pabbaji devaa''ti..
[21] ``jaanaami dhana.m pahuuta.m, kulava.d.dhana puujito tayaa casmi.

[03] ta.m sutvaa kulava.d.dhane apagate mahaasatto somadatta.m kani.t.thabhaatara.m aamantetvaa, ``taata, aha.m pa~njarapakkhitto vanakukku.to viya ukka.n.thito, ma.m gharaavaase anabhirati abhibhavati, ajjeva pabbajissaami, tva.m ima.m rajja.m pa.tipajjaa''ti rajja.m niyyaadento gaathamaaha --
[03] ta.m sutvaa sopi pabbajitukaamo ta.m diipento itara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ida~nca ^a^V5.0178^ea^ tuyha.m rucita.m, sutasoma ajjeva daani tva.m pabbaja.
[22] ahampi pabbajissaami, na ussahe tayaa vinaa aha.m .thaatu''nti..
[03] atha na.m so pa.tikkhipitvaa upa.d.dha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na hi sakkaa pabbajitu.m, nagare na hi paccati janapade caa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0186^ea^ ^b^na hi paccatii^eb^ti idaaneva taava mama pabbajjaadhippaaya.m sutvaava imasmi.m dvaadasayojanike sudassananagare ca sakalajanapade ca na paccati, koci uddhane aggi.m na jaaleti, amhesu pana dviisu pabbajitesu anaathaava ra.t.thavaasino bhavissanti, tasmaa na hi sakkaa tayaa pabbajitu.m, ahameva pabbajissaamiiti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa mahaajano mahaasattassa paadamuule parivattitvaa paridevanto upa.d.dhagaathamaaha --
[03] tato mahaasatto ``ala.m maa socayittha, aha.m cirampi .thatvaa tumhehi vinaa bhavissaami, uppannasa"nkhaaro hi nicco naama natthii''ti mahaajanassa dhamma.m kathento aaha --
[22] eva.m suparittake jiivite, na ca pamajjitu.m kaalo..

[03] tattha ^b^upaniiyatida.m ma~n~ne^eb^ti, taata, ``ida.m jiivita.m upaniiyatii''ti aha.m ma~n~naami. a~n~nesu suttesu upasa.mhara.nattho upaniyyanattho, idha pana pariyaadaanattho. tasmaa yathaa paritta.m udaka.m ^a^V5.0179^ea^ rajakaana.m khaaraca"nkavaare pakkhitta.m siigha.m pariyaadiyati, tathaa jiivitampi. eva.m suparittake jiivite ta.m parittaka.m aayusa"nkhaara.m gahetvaa vicarantaana.m sattaana.m na pu~n~nakiriyaaya pamajjitu.m kaalo, appamaadova kaatu.m va.t.tatiiti ayamettha attho. ^b^andhabaalaa pamajjantii^eb^ti ajaraamaraa viya hutvaa guuthakalale suukaraa viya hutvaa kaamapa"nke nimujjantaa ^a^P5.0187^ea^ pamajjanti. ^b^asurakaaya^eb^nti kaa.laka~njikaasurayoni~nca va.d.dhentiiti attho.

[03] eva.m mahaasatto mahaajanassa dhamma.m desetvaa pubbaka.m naama paasaada.m aaruyha sattamaaya bhuumiyaa .thito khaggena cuu.la.m chinditvaa ``aha.m tumhaaka.m ki~nci na homi, attano raajaana.m ga.nhathaa''ti save.thana.m cuu.la.m mahaajanassa antare khipi. ta.m gahetvaa mahaajano bhuumiya.m pariva.t.tento pariva.t.tento paridevi. tasmi.m .thaane mahanta.m rajagga.m u.t.thahi. pa.tikkamitvaa .thitajano ta.m oloketvaa ``ra~n~naa cuu.la.m chinditvaa save.thanaa cuu.laa mahaajanassa antare khittaa bhavissati, tenaaya.m paasaadassa aviduure rajava.t.ti uggataa''ti paridevanto gaathamaaha --
[22] ma~n~ne no kesaa chinnaa, yasassino dhammaraajassaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^uuha~n~nate^eb^ti u.t.thahati. ^b^rajagga^eb^nti rajakkhandho. ^b^aviduure^eb^ti ito amhaaka.m .thita.t.thaanato aviduure. ^b^pubbakamhii^eb^ti pubbakapaasaadassa samiipe. ^b^ma~n~ne no^eb^ti amhaaka.m dhammaraajassa kesaa chinnaa bhavissantiiti ma~n~naama.

[03] mahaasatto ^a^M5.0199^ea^ paricaarika.m pesetvaa pabbajitaparikkhaare aaharaapetvaa kappakena kesamassu.m ohaaraapetvaa ala"nkaara.m sayanapi.t.the paatetvaa rattapa.taana.m dasaani chinditvaa taani kaasaayaani nivaasetvaa mattikaapatta.m vaamaa.msakuu.te laggetvaa kattarada.n.da.m aadaaya mahaatale aparaapara.m ca"nkamitvaa paasaadaa otaritvaa antaraviithi.m pa.tipajji. gacchanta.m pana na.m na koci sa~njaani. athassa sattasataa khattiyaka~n~naa paasaada.m abhiruhitvaa ta.m adisvaa aabhara.nabha.n.dameva disvaa otaritvaa avasesaana.m so.lasasahassaana.m itthiina.m santika.m gantvaa ``amhaaka.m piyasaamiko sutasomamahissaro pabbajito''ti mahaasaddena paridevamaanaava bahi nikkhami.msu. tasmi.m kha.ne mahaajano ^a^P5.0188^ea^ tassa pabbajitabhaava.m a~n~naasi, sakalanagara.m sa"nkhubhitvaa ``raajaa kira no pabbajito''ti raajadvaare sannipati, mahaajano ``idha raajaa bhavissati, ettha bhavissatii''ti paasaadaadiini ra~n~no paribhoga.t.thaanaani gantvaa raajaana.m adisvaa --

[03] tattha ^b^viitiki.n.no^eb^ti sova.n.napupphehi ca naanaamaalyehi ca samoki.n.no. ^b^pariki.n.no^eb^ti parivaarito. ^b^itthaagaarehii^eb^ti daasiyo upaadaaya itthiyo itthaagaaraa naama. ^b^~naatisa"nghenaa^eb^ti amaccaapi idha ~naatayo eva. ^b^kuu.taagaara^eb^nti sattaratanavicitto sayanakuu.taagaaragabbho. ^b^asokavanikaa^eb^ti asokavanabhuumi. ^b^sabbakaalikaa^eb^ti sabbakaalaparibhogakkhamaa niccapupphitaa vaa. ^b^uyyaana^eb^nti nandanavanacittalataavanasadisa.m uyyaana.m ^a^M5.0201^ea^. ^b^sabbakaalika^eb^nti chasupi utuusu uppajjanakapupphaphalasa~nchanna.m. ka.nikaaravanaadiisu ^b^sabbakaalika^eb^nti sabbakaale supupphitaphalitameva. ^b^sa~nchannaa^eb^ti naanaavidhehi jalajathalajakusumehi su.t.thu sa~nchannaa. ^b^a.n.dajehi viitiki.n.naa^eb^ti saku.nasa"nghehi oki.n.naa.
[03] eva.m tesu tesu .thaanesu paridevitvaa mahaajano puna raaja"nga.na.m aagantvaa --
[21] ``raajaa ^a^V5.0182^ea^ vo kho pabbajito, sutasomo rajja.m ima.m pahatvaana.

[25] gaatha.m vatvaa attano ghare vibhava.m pahaaya puttadhiitaro hatthesu gahetvaa nikkhamitvaa bodhisattasseva santika.m agamaasi, tathaa maataapitaro puttadaaraa so.lasasahassaa ca naa.takitthiyo. sakalanagara.m tuccha.m viya ahosi, janapadavaasinopi tesa.m pacchato pacchato gami.msu. bodhisatto dvaadasayojanika.m parisa.m gahetvaa himavantaabhimukho paayaasi. athassa abhinikkhamana.m ~natvaa sakko vissakamma.m aamantetvaa, ``taata vissakamma, sutasomamahaaraajaa abhinikkhamana.m nikkhanto, vasana.t.thaana.m ^a^P5.0191^ea^ laddhu.m va.t.tati, samaagamo ca mahaa bhavissati, gaccha himavantapadese ga"ngaatiire ti.msayojanaayaama.m pa~ncadasayojanavitthata.m assamapada.m maapehii''ti pesesi. so tathaa katvaa tasmi.m assamapade pabbajitaparikkhaare pa.tiyaadetvaa ekapadikamagga.m maapetvaa devalokameva gato.

[03] mahaasatto tena maggena gantvaa ta.m assamapada.m pavisitvaa pa.thama.m saya.m pabbajitvaa pacchaa sese pabbaajesi, aparabhaage bahuu pabbaji.msu. ti.msayojanika.m .thaana.m paripuuri. vissakammena pana assamamaapitaniyaamo ca bahuuna.m pabbajitaniyaamo ca bodhisattassa assamapadasa.mvidahitaniyaamo ca ^b^hatthipaalajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 1.15.337 aadayo) aagatanayeneva veditabbo. tattha mahaasatto yassa yasseva kaamavitakkaadi micchaavitakko uppajjati, ta.m ta.m aakaasena upasa"nkamitvaa aakaase palla"nkena nisiiditvaa ovadanto gaathaadvayamaaha --
[22] maa vo kaamaa hani.msu, ramma~nhi sudassana.m nagara.m..
[21] ``mettacitta~nca bhaavetha, appamaa.na.m divaa ca ratto ca.

[03] tattha ^b^ratikii.litaanii^eb^ti kaamaratiyo ca kaayavaacaakhi.d.daavasena pavattakii.litaani ca. ^b^maa vo kaamaa hani.msuu^eb^ti maa tumhe vatthukaamakilesakaamaa hani.msu. ^b^ramma.m hii^eb^ti sudassananagara.m naama rama.niiya.m, ta.m maa anussarittha. ^b^mettacitta^eb^nti ida.m desanaamattameva, so pana cattaaropi brahmavihaare ^a^V5.0183^ea^ aacikkhi. ^b^appamaa.na^eb^nti appamaa.nasattaaramma.na.m. ^b^agacchitthaa^eb^ti gamissatha. ^b^devapura^eb^nti brahmaloka.m.
[03] sopi ^a^P5.0192^ea^ isiga.no tassovaade .thatvaa brahmalokaparaaya.no ahosiiti sabba.m ^b^hatthipaalajaatake^eb^ aagatanayeneva kathetabba.m.

[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepi tathaagato mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhantoyevaa''ti vatvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi ``tadaa maataapitaro mahaaraajakulaani ahesu.m, candaadevii raahulamaataa, je.t.thaputto saariputto, kani.t.thaputto raahulo, dhaati khujjuttaraa, kulava.d.dhanase.t.thi kassapo, mahaasenagutto moggallaano, somadattakumaaro aanando, sesaparisaa buddhaparisaa, sutasomaraajaa pana ahameva ahosi''nti.

[03] ^b^uddayhate^eb^ ^a^V5.0184^ea^ ^a^P5.0193^ea^ ^a^M5.0203^ea^ ^b^janapado^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto puraa.nadutiyikaapalobhana.m aarabba kathesi. kathento ca ta.m bhikkhu.m ``kena ukka.n.thaapitosii''ti pucchitvaa ``puraa.nadutiyikaayaa''ti vutte ``na esaa kho, bhikkhu, idaaneva tava anatthakaarikaa, pubbepi tva.m eta.m nissaaya jhaanaa parihaayitvaa mahaavinaasa.m patto''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto udiccabraahma.namahaasaalakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto uggahitasippo isipabbajja.m pabbijitvaa jhaanaabhi~n~naa nibbattetvaa himavantapadese vaasa.m kappesi. alambusaajaatake vuttanayeneva ta.m pa.ticca ekaa migii gabbha.m pa.tilabhitvaa putta.m vijaayi, ``isisi"ngo''tvevassa naama.m ahosi. atha na.m pitaa vayappatta.m pabbaajetvaa kasi.naparikamma.m ugga.nhaapesi. so nacirasseva jhaanaabhi~n~naa uppaadetvaa jhaanasukhena kii.li, ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo ahosi. tassa siilatejena sakkassa bhavana.m kampi. sakko aavajjento ta.m kaara.na.m ~natvaa ``upaayenassa siila.m bhindissaamii''ti tii.ni sa.mvaccharaani sakalakaasira.t.the vu.t.thi.m nivaaresi, ra.t.tha.m aggida.d.dha.m viya ahosi. sasse asampajjamaane dubbhikkhapii.litaa manussaa sannipatitvaa raaja"nga.ne upakkosi.msu. atha ne raajaa vaatapaane .thito ``ki.m eta''nti pucchi. ``mahaaraaja, tii.ni ^a^P5.0194^ea^ sa.mvaccharaani devassa avassantattaa sakalara.t.tha.m uddayhati, manussaa dukkhitaa, deva.m vassaapehi, devaa''ti. raajaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposatha.m upavasantopi vassa.m vassaapetu.m naasakkhi.

[03] tasmi.m kaale sakko a.d.dharattasamaye tassa sirigabbha.m pavisitvaa ekobhaasa.m katvaa vehaase a.t.thaasi. raajaa ta.m disvaa ``kosi tva''nti pucchi. ``sakkohamasmii''ti. ``kenatthenaagatosii''ti? ``vassati te, mahaaraaja ^a^M5.0204^ea^, ra.t.the devo''ti? ``na vassatii''ti. ``jaanaasi panassa avassanakaara.na''nti? ``na jaanaami, sakkaa''ti. ``mahaaraaja, himavantapadese ^a^V5.0185^ea^ isisi"ngo naama taapaso pa.tivasati ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo. so nibaddha.m deve vassante kujjhitvaa aakaasa.m olokesi, tasmaa devo na vassatii''ti. ``idaani panettha ki.m kaatabba''nti? ``tassa tape bhinne devo vassissatii''ti. ``ko panassa tapa.m bhinditu.m samattho''ti? ``dhiitaa te, mahaaraaja, ni.linikaa samatthaa, ta.m pakkosaapetvaa `asuka.t.thaana.m naama gantvaa taapasassa tapa.m bhindaahii'ti pesehii''ti. eva.m so raajaana.m anusaasitvaa saka.t.thaanameva agamaasi. raajaa punadivase amaccehi saddhi.m mantetvaa dhiitara.m pakkosaapetvaa pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[22] ehi ni.linike gaccha, ta.m me braahma.namaanayaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^ta.m me^eb^ti ta.m mama anatthakaari.m braahma.na.m attano vasa.m aanehi, kilesarativasenassa siila.m bhindaahiiti.
[03] tattha ^b^dukkhakkhamaa^eb^ti aha.m, mahaaraaja, dukkhassa khamaa na homi, addhaanampi na jaanaami, saaha.m katha.m gamissaamiiti.
[21] ``phiita.m janapada.m gantvaa, hatthinaa ca rathena ca.

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0186^ea^ ^b^daarusa"nghaa.tayaanenaa^eb^ti, amma, ni.linike na tva.m padasaa gamissasi, phiita.m pana subhikkha.m khema.m attano janapada.m hatthivaahanehi ca rathavaahanehi ca ^a^M5.0205^ea^ gantvaa tato parampi ajjhokaase pa.ticchannena vayhaadinaa udaka.t.thaane naavaasa"nkhaatena daarusa"nghaa.tayaanena gaccha. ^b^va.n.naruupenaa^eb^ti eva.m akilamamaanaa gantvaa tava va.n.nena ceva ruupasampadaaya ca ta.m braahma.na.m attano vasa.m aanayissasiiti.

[03] eva.m so dhiitaraa saddhi.m akathetabbampi ra.t.thaparipaalana.m nissaaya kathesi. saapi ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchi. athassaa sabba.m daatabbayuttaka.m datvaa amaccehi saddhi.m uyyojesi. amaccaa ta.m aadaaya paccanta.m patvaa tattha khandhaavaara.m nivaasaapetvaa raajadhiitara.m ukkhipaapetvaa vanacarakena desitena maggena himavanta.m pavisitvaa pubba.nhasamaye tassa assamapadassa samiipa.m paapu.ni.msu. tasmi.m kha.ne bodhisatto putta.m assamapade nivaasaapetvaa saya.m phalaaphalatthaaya ara~n~na.m pavi.t.tho hoti. vanacarako saya.m assama.m agantvaa tassa pana dassana.t.thaane .thatvaa ni.linikaaya ta.m dassento dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[22] ma~n~ne no aggi.m haapeti, isisi"ngo mahiddhiko''ti..

[03] tattha kadaliisa"nkhaataa dhajaa pa~n~naa.na.m assaati ^b^kadaliidhajapa~n~naa.no. aabhujiiparivaarito^eb^ti bhujapattavanaparikkhitto. ^b^sa"nkhaato^eb^ti eso aggi assa isisi"ngassa jhaanena sa"nkhaato paccakkhagato jalati. ^b^ma~n~ne no aggi^eb^nti aggi.m no haapeti juhati paricaratiiti ma~n~naami.

[03] amaccaapi bodhisattassa ara~n~na.m pavi.t.thavelaaya assama.m parivaaretvaa aarakkha.m .thapetvaa raajadhiitara.m isivesa.m gaahaapetvaa ^a^P5.0196^ea^ suva.n.naciirakena nivaasanapaarupana.m katvaa sabbaala"nkaarehi ala"nkaritvaa tantubaddha.m cittage.n.duka.m gaahaapetvaa assamapada.m pesetvaa saya.m bahi rakkhantaa a.t.tha.msu. saa tena ge.n.dukena kii.lantii ca"nkamako.tiya.m otari. tasmi.m kha.ne isisi"ngo pa.n.nasaaladvaare paasaa.naphalake nisinno hoti. so ta.m aagacchanti.m disvaa bhiitatasito u.t.thaaya pa.n.nasaala.m ^a^V5.0187^ea^ pavisitvaa a.t.thaasi ^a^M5.0206^ea^. saapissa pa.n.nasaaladvaara.m gantvaa kii.liyeva. satthaa ta~nca tato uttari ca attha.m pakaasento tisso gaathaa abhaasi --

[03] tattha ^b^ge.n.dukenassaa^eb^ti assa isisi"ngassa assamadvaare ge.n.dukena kii.lati. ^b^vida.msayantii^eb^ti dassentii. ^b^guyha.m pakaasitaani caa^eb^ti guyha~nca rahassa"nga.m pakaasitaani ca paaka.taani mukhahatthaadiini. ^b^abravii^eb^ti so kira pa.n.nasaalaaya .thatvaa cintesi -- ``sacaaya.m yakkho bhaveyya, pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa ma.m murumuraapetvaa khaadeyya, naaya.m yakkho, taapaso bhavissatii''ti assamaa nikkhamitvaa pucchanto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ambho ko naama so rukkho, yassa teva.mgata.m phala.m.
[22] duurepi khitta.m pacceti, na ta.m ohaaya gacchatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yassa teva.mgata.m phala^eb^nti yassa tava rukkhassa eva.mgatika.m manorama.m phala.m. ^b^ko naama so rukkho^eb^ti citrage.n.dukassa adi.t.thapubbattaa ``rukkhaphalena tena bhavitabba''nti ma~n~namaano eva.m pucchati.
[27] bahavo taadisaa rukkhaa, yassa teva.mgata.m phala.m.
[22] duurepi khitta.m pacceti, na ma.m ohaaya gacchatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0188^ea^ ^a^P5.0197^ea^ ^b^samiipe gandhamaadane^eb^ti gandhamaadanapabbate mama assamassa samiipe. ^b^yassa teva.mgata^eb^nti yassa eva.mgata.m, ^b^ta^eb^-kaaro bya~njanasandhikaroti.
[03] iti ^a^M5.0207^ea^ saa musaavaada.m abhaasi. itaropi saddahitvaa ``taapaso eso''ti sa~n~naaya pa.tisanthaara.m karonto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``etuu bhava.m assamima.m adetu, pajja~nca bhakkha~nca pa.ticcha dammi.
[22] idamaasana.m atra bhava.m nisiidatu, ito bhava.m muulaphalaani bhu~njatuu''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^assamima^eb^nti assama.m ima.m bhava.m pavisatu. ^b^adetuu^eb^ti yathaasannihita.m aahaara.m paribhu~njatu. ^b^pajja^eb^nti paadabbha~njana.m. ^b^bhakkha^eb^nti madhuraphalaaphala.m. ^b^pa.ticchaa^eb^ti pa.tigga.nha. ^b^idamaasana^eb^nti pavi.t.thakaale evamaaha.

[03] tassaa pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa ka.t.thatthara.ne nisiidantiyaa suva.n.naciirake dvidhaa gate sariira.m appa.ticchanna.m ahosi. taapaso maatugaamasariirassa adi.t.thapubbattaa ta.m disvaa ``va.n.no eso''ti sa~n~naaya evamaaha --
[22] akkhaahi me pucchito etamattha.m, kose nu te uttama"nga.m pavi.t.tha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^supicchita^eb^nti dvinna.m uuruuna.m samaagamakaale suphusita.m sippipu.tamukhasa.n.thaana.m. subhalakkha.nena hi asamannaagataaya ta.m .thaana.m aavaa.tadhaatuka.m hoti, samannaagataaya abbhunnata.m sippipu.tamukhasa.n.thaana.m. ^b^ka.nharivappakaasatii^eb^ti ubhosu passesu kaa.laka.m viya khaayati. ^b^kose nu te uttama"nga.m pavi.t.tha^eb^nti tava uttama"nga.m li"ngasa.n.thaana.m na pa~n~naayati, ki.m nu ta.m tava sariirasa"nkhaate kose pavi.t.thanti pucchati.
[21] ``aha.m vane muulaphalesana.m cara.m, aasaadayi.m accha.m sughoraruupa.m.
[22] so ^a^P5.0198^ea^ ma.m patitvaa sahasaajjhapatto, panujja ma.m abbahi uttama"nga.m..
[21] ``svaaya.m ^a^V5.0189^ea^ ^a^M5.0208^ea^ va.no khajjati ka.n.duvaayati, sabba~nca kaala.m na labhaami saata.m.
[22] paho bhava.m ka.n.dumima.m vinetu.m, kuruta.m bhava.m yaacito braahma.nattha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^aasaadayi^eb^nti gha.t.tesi.m, aagacchanta.m disvaa le.d.dunaa paharinti attho. ^b^patitvaa^eb^ti upadhaavitvaa. ^b^sahasaajjhappatto^eb^ti mama.m sahasaa ajjhappatto sampatto. ^b^panujjaa^eb^ti atha ma.m potetvaa. ^b^abbahii^eb^ti mukhena mama uttama"nga.m lu~ncitvaa pakkaami, tato pa.t.thaaya imasmi.m .thaane va.no jaato. ^b^svaaya^eb^nti so aya.m tato pa.t.thaaya mayha.m va.no khajjati ceva ka.n.duva~nca karoti, tappaccayaa saaha.m sabbakaala.m kaayikacetasikasukha.m na labhaami. ^b^paho^eb^ti pahu samattho. ^b^braahma.nattha^eb^nti bhava.m mayaa yaacito ima.m braahma.nassa attha.m karotu, ida.m me dukkha.m haraahiiti vadati.
[03] so tassaa musaavaada.m ``sabhaavo''ti saddahitvaa ``sace te eva.m sukha.m hoti, karissaamii''ti ta.m padesa.m oloketvaa anantara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``gambhiiraruupo te va.no salohito, apuutiko va.nagandho mahaa ca.
[22] karomi te ki~nci kasaayayoga.m, yathaa bhava.m paramasukhii bhaveyyaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^salohito^eb^ti rattobhaaso. ^b^apuutiko^eb^ti puutima.msarahito. ^b^va.nagandho^eb^ti thoka.m duggandho. ^b^kasaayayoga^eb^nti aha.m keci rukkhakasaaye gahetvaa tava eka.m kasaayayoga.m karomiiti.
[21] ``na mantayogaa na kasaayayogaa, na osadhaa brahmacaari kamanti.
[22] ya.m te mudu tena vinehi ka.n.du.m, yathaa aha.m paramasukhii bhaveyya''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0199^ea^ ^a^M5.0209^ea^ ^b^kamantii^eb^ti, bho brahmacaari, imasmi.m mama va.ne neva mantayogaa, na kasaayayogaa, na pupphaphalaadiini osadhaani kamanti, anekavaara.m katehipi tehi etassa phaasukabhaavo na bhuutapubbo. ya.m pana te eta.m mudu a"ngajaata.m, tena gha.t.tiyamaanasseva tassa ka.n.du na hoti, tasmaa tena vinehi ka.n.dunti.

[03] so ^a^V5.0190^ea^ ``sacca.m eso bha.natii''ti sallakkhetvaa ``methunasa.msaggena siila.m bhijjati, jhaana.m antaradhaayatii''ti ajaananto maatugaamassa adi.t.thapubbattaa methunadhammassa ca ajaananabhaavena ``bhesajja''nti vadantiyaa taaya methuna.m pa.tisevi. taavadevassa siila.m bhijji, jhaana.m parihaayi. so dve tayo vaare sa.msagga.m katvaa kilanto hutvaa nikkhamitvaa sara.m oruyha nhatvaa pa.tippassaddhadaratho aagantvaa pa.n.nasaalaaya.m nisiiditvaa punapi ta.m ``taapaso''ti ma~n~namaano vasana.t.thaana.m pucchanto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ito nu bhoto katamena assamo, kacci bhava.m abhiramasi ara~n~ne.
[22] kacci nu te muulaphala.m pahuuta.m, kacci bhavanta.m na vihi.msanti vaa.laa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^katamenaa^eb^ti ito katamena disaabhaagena bhoto assamo. ^b^bhava^eb^nti aalapanameta.m.
[21] ``ito uju.m uttaraaya.m disaaya.m, khemaa nadii himavataa pabhaavii.
[22] tassaa tiire assamo mayha rammo, aho bhava.m assama.m mayha.m passe..
[21] ``ambaa ca saalaa tilakaa ca jambuyo, uddaalakaa paa.taliyo ca phullaa.
[22] samantato kimpurisaabhigiita.m, aho bhava.m assama.m mayha.m passe..
[21] ``taalaa ^a^M5.0210^ea^ ca muulaa ca phalaa ca mettha, va.n.nena gandhena upetaruupa.m.
[22] ta.m ^a^P5.0200^ea^ bhuumibhaagehi upetaruupa.m, aho bhava.m assama.m mayha.m passe..
[21] ``phalaa ca muulaa ca pahuutamettha, va.n.nena gandhena rasenupetaa.
[22] aayanti ca luddakaa ta.m padesa.m, maa me tato muulaphala.m ahaasu''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^uttaraaya^eb^nti uttaraaya. ^b^khemaa^eb^ti eva.mnaamikaa nadii. ^b^himavataa pabhaavii^eb^ti himavantato pavattati. ^b^aho^eb^ti patthanatthe nipaato. ^b^uddaalakaa^eb^ti vaataghaatakaa. ^b^kimpurisaabhigiita^eb^nti samantato parivaaretvaa madhurasaddena gaayantehi kimpurisehi abhigiita.m. ^b^taalaa ca muulaa ca phalaa ca metthaa^eb^ti ettha mama assame paasaadikaa taalarukkhaa ca tesa~n~neva va.n.nagandhaadisampannaa kandasa"nkhaataa ^a^V5.0191^ea^ muulaa ca phalaa ca. ^b^pahuutametthaa^eb^ti naanaarukkhaphalaa ca rukkhavallimuulaa ca pahuutaa ettha. ^b^maa me tato^eb^ti ta.m mama assamapada.m sambahulaa luddakaa aagacchanti, mayaa cettha aaharitvaa .thapita.m bahu madhurasamuulaphalaaphala.m atthi, te mayi ciraayante muulaphalaaphala.m hareyyu.m. te tato mama muulaphalaaphala.m maa hari.msu, tasmaa sacepi mayaa saddhi.m aagantukaamo, ehi, no ce, aha.m gamissaamiiti aaha.
[03] ta.m sutvaa taapaso yaava pitu aagamanaa adhivaasaapetu.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``pitaa mama.m muulaphalesana.m gato, idaani aagacchati saayakaale.
[22] ubhova gacchaamase assama.m ta.m, yaava pitaa muulaphalato etuu''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^ubhova gacchaamase^eb^ti mama pitu aarocetvaa ubhova gamissaama.
