[03] ^b^neva ki.naami napi vikki.naamii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto eka.m daanajjhaasaya.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha kathesi. so kira saavatthiya.m eko kulaputto hutvaa satthu dhammakatha.m sutvaa pasannacitto pabbajitvaa siilesu paripuurakaarii dhuta"ngagu.nasamannaagato sabrahmacaariisu pavattamettacitto divasassa tikkhattu.m buddhadhammasa"nghupa.t.thaane appamatto aacaarasampanno daanajjhaasayo ahosi. saara.niiyadhammapuurako attanaa laddha.m pa.tiggaahakesu vijjamaanesu chinnabhatto hutvaapi detiyeva, tasmaa ^a^V5.0380^ea^ tassa daanajjhaasayadaanaabhiratabhaavo bhikkhusa"nghe paaka.to ahosi. athekadivasa.m bhikkhuu dhammasabhaaya.m katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m, ``aavuso, asuko naama bhikkhu daanajjhaasayo daanaabhirato attanaa laddha.m pasatamattapaaniiyampi lobha.m chinditvaa sabrahmacaariina.m deti, bodhisattassevassa ajjhaasayo''ti. satthaa ta.m katha.m dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sutvaa gandhaku.tito nikkhamitvaa aagantvaa ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte ``aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pubbe adaanasiilo maccharii ti.naggena telabindumpi adaataa ahosi, atha na.m aha.m dametvaa nibbisevana.m katvaa daanaphala.m va.n.netvaa daane pati.t.thaapesi.m, so `pasatamatta.m udakampi labhitvaa adatvaa na pivissaamii'ti mama santike vara.m aggahesi, tassa phalena daanajjhaasayo daanaabhirato jaato''ti vatvaa tehi yaacito atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente eko gahapati a.d.dho ahosi asiitiko.tivibhavo. athassa raajaa se.t.thi.t.thaana.m adaasi ^a^M5.0408^ea^. so raajapuujito naagarajaanapadapuujito hutvaa ekadivasa.m attano sampatti.m oloketvaa cintesi -- ``aya.m yaso mayaa atiitabhave neva niddaayantena, na kaayaduccaritaadiini karontena laddho, sucaritaani pana ^a^P5.0383^ea^ puuretvaa laddho, anaagatepi mayaa mama pati.t.tha.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti. so ra~n~no santika.m gantvaa ``deva, mama ghare asiitiko.tidhana.m atthi, ta.m ga.nhaahii''ti vatvaa ``na mayha.m tava dhanenattho, bahu.m me dhana.m, itopi yadicchasi, ta.m ga.nhaahii''ti vutte ``ki.m nu, deva, mama dhana.m daatu.m labhaamii''ti aaha. atha ra~n~naa ``yathaaruci karohii''ti vutte catuusu nagaradvaaresu nagaramajjhe nivesanadvaare caati cha daanasaalaayo kaaretvaa devasika.m chasatasahassapariccaaga.m karonto mahaadaana.m pavattesi. so yaavajiiva.m daana.m datvaa ``ima.m mama daanava.msa.m maa upacchindathaa''ti putte anusaasitvaa jiivitapariyosaane sakko hutvaa nibbatti. puttopissa tatheva daana.m datvaa cando hutvaa nibbatti, tassa putto suuriyo hutvaa nibbatti, tassa putto maatali hutvaa nibbatti, tassa putto pa~ncasikho hutvaa nibbatti, tassa pana putto cha.t.tho se.t.thi.t.thaana.m laddhaa macchariyakosiyo naama ahosi asiitiko.tivibhavoyeva. so ``mama pitupitaamahaa baalaa ahesu.m, dukkhena sambhata.m dhana.m cha.d.desu.m, aha.m pana dhana.m rakkhissaami, kassaci ki~nci na dassaamii''ti cintetvaa daanasaalaa viddha.msetvaa agginaa jhaapetvaa thaddhamaccharii ahosi.

[03] athassa gehadvaare yaacakaa sannipatitvaa baahaa paggayha, ``mahaase.t.thi, maa attano pitupitaamahaana.m daanava.msa.m naasayi, daana.m dehii''ti mahaasaddena paridevi.msu. ta.m sutvaa mahaajano ``macchariyakosiyena ^a^V5.0381^ea^ attano daanava.mso upacchinno''ti ta.m garahi. so lajjito nivesanadvaare yaacakaana.m aagataagata.t.thaana.m nivaaretu.m aarakkha.m .thapesi. te nippaccayaa hutvaa puna tassa gehadvaara.m na olokesu.m. so tato pa.t.thaaya dhanameva sa.mharati, neva attanaa paribhu~njati, na puttadaaraadiina.m deti, ka~njikabila"ngadutiya.m saku.n.dakabhatta.m bhu~njati, muulaphalamattatantaani thuulavatthaani nivaaseti, pa.n.nachatta.m matthake dhaaretvaa jaraggo.nayuttena jajjararathakena yaati. iti tassa asappurisassa tattaka.m ^a^P5.0384^ea^ dhana.m sunakhena laddha.m naa.likera.m viya ahosi.

[03] so ^a^M5.0409^ea^ ekadivasa.m raajuupa.t.thaana.m gacchanto ``anuse.t.thi.m aadaaya gamissaamii''ti tassa geha.m agamaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne anuse.t.thi puttadhiitaadiihi parivuto navasappipakkamadhusakkharacu.n.nehi sa"nkhata.m paayaasa.m bhu~njamaano nisinno hoti. so macchariyakosiya.m disvaa aasanaa vu.t.thaaya ``ehi, mahaase.t.thi, imasmi.m palla"nke nisiida, paayaasa.m bhu~njissaamaa''ti aaha. tassa paayaasa.m disvaava mukhe khe.laa uppajji, bhu~njitukaamo ahosi, eva.m pana cintesi -- ``sacaaha.m bhu~njissaami, anuse.t.thino mama geha.m aagatakaale pa.tisakkaaro kaatabbo bhavissati, eva.m me dhana.m nassissati, na bhu~njissaamii''ti. atha punappuna.m yaaciyamaanopi ``idaani me bhutta.m, suhitosmii''ti na icchi. anuse.t.thimhi bhu~njante pana olokento mukhe sa~njaayamaanena khe.lena nisiiditvaa tassa bhattakiccaavasaane tena saddhi.m raajanivesana.m gantvaa raajaana.m passitvaa raajanivesanato otaritvaa attano geha.m anuppatto paayaasata.nhaaya pii.liyamaano cintesi -- ``sacaaha.m `paayaasa.m bhu~njitukaamomhii'ti vakkhaami, mahaajano bhu~njitukaamo bhavissati, bahuu ta.n.dulaadayo nassissanti, na kassaci kathessaamii''ti. so rattindiva.m paayaasameva cintento viitinaametvaapi dhananaasanabhayena kassaci akathetvaava pipaasa.m adhivaasesi, anukkamena adhivaasetu.m asakkonto uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato ahosi. eva.m santepi dhananaasanabhayena akathento aparabhaage dubbalo hutvaa sayana.m upaguuhitvaa nipajji.

[03] atha na.m bhariyaa upagantvaa hatthena pi.t.thi.m parimajjamaanaa ``ki.m te, saami, aphaasuka''nti pucchi. ``taveva sariire aphaasuka.m karohi, mama aphaasuka.m natthii''ti. ``saami, uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaatosi, ki.m nu te kaaci cintaa atthi, udaahu raajaa te kupito, adu puttehi avamaano kato, atha vaa pana kaaci ta.nhaa uppannaa''ti? ``aama, ta.nhaa me uppannaa''ti. ``kathehi, saamii''ti? ``kathessaami, sakkhissasi na.m rakkhitu''nti. ``rakkhitabbayuttakaa ce, rakkhissaamii''ti. evampi ^a^P5.0385^ea^ dhananaasanabhayena kathetu.m na ussahi. taaya punappuna.m pii.liyamaano kathesi -- ``bhadde, aha.m ekadivasa.m anuse.t.thi.m navasappimadhusakkharacu.n.nehi sa"nkhata.m ^a^V5.0382^ea^ paayaasa.m bhu~njanta.m disvaa tato pa.t.thaaya taadisa.m paayaasa.m bhu~njitukaamo jaato''ti. ``asappurisa, ki.m tva.m duggato, sakalamaaraa.nasivaasiina.m pahonaka.m paayaasa.m pacissaamii''ti. athassa siise da.n.dena pahara.nakaalo ^a^M5.0410^ea^ viya ahosi. so tassaa kujjhitvaa ``jaanaamaha.m tava mahaddhanabhaava.m, sace te kulagharaa aabhata.m atthi, paayaasa.m pacitvaa naagaraana.m dehii''ti aaha. ``tena hi ekaviithivaasiina.m pahonaka.m katvaa pacaamii''ti. ``ki.m te etehi, attano pana santaka.m khaadantuu''ti? ``tena hi ito cito ca sattasattagharavaasiina.m pahonaka.m katvaa pacaamii''ti. ``ki.m te etehii''ti. ``tena hi imasmi.m gehe parijanassaa''ti. ``ki.m te etenaa''ti? ``tena hi bandhujanasseva pahonaka.m katvaa pacaamii''ti. ``ki.m te etenaa''ti? ``tena hi tuyha~nca mayha~nca pacaami saamii''ti. ``kaasi tva.m, na tuyha.m va.t.tatii''ti? ``tena hi ekasseva te pahonaka.m katvaa pacaamii''ti. ``mayha~nca tva.m maa paci, gehe pana pacante bahuu paccaasiisanti, mayha.m pana pattha.m ta.n.dulaana.m catubhaaga.m khiirassa acchara.m sakkharaaya kara.n.daka.m sappissa kara.n.daka.m madhussa eka~nca pacanabhaajana.m dehi, aha.m ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa tattha pacitvaa bhu~njaamii''ti. saa tathaa akaasi. so ta.m sabba.m ce.takena gaahaapetvaa ``gaccha asuka.t.thaane ti.t.thaahii''ti ta.m purato pesetvaa ekakova ogu.n.thika.m katvaa a~n~naatakavesena tattha gantvaa nadiitiire ekasmi.m gacchamuule uddhana.m kaaretvaa daarudaka.m aaharaapetvaa ``tva.m gantvaa ekasmi.m magge .thatvaa ka~ncideva disvaa mama sa~n~na.m dadeyyaasi, mayaa pakkositakaaleva aagaccheyyaasii''ti ta.m pesetvaa aggi.m katvaa paayaasa.m paci.

[03] tasmi.m kha.ne sakko devaraajaa dasasahassayojana.m ala"nkatadevanagara.m, sa.t.thiyojana.m ^a^P5.0386^ea^ suva.n.naviithi.m, yojanasahassubbedha.m vejayanta.m, pa~ncayojanasatika.m sudhammasabha.m, sa.t.thiyojana.m pa.n.dukambalasilaasana.m, pa~ncayojanaava.t.ta.m ka~ncanamaalasetacchatta.m, a.d.dhateyyako.tisa"nkhaa devaccharaa, ala"nkatapa.tiyatta.m attabhaavanti ima.m attano siri.m oloketvaa ``ki.m nu kho katvaa mayaa aya.m yaso laddho''ti cintetvaa baaraa.nasiya.m se.t.thibhuutena pavattita.m daana.m addasa. tato ``mama puttaadayo kuhi.m nibbattaa''ti olokento ``putto me cando devaputto hutvaa nibbatti, tassa putto suuriyo, tassa putto, maatali, tassa putto, pa~ncasikho''ti sabbesa.m nibbatti.m disvaa ``pa~ncasikhassa putto kiidiso''ti olokento attano va.msassa upacchinnabhaava.m passi. athassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m asappuriso maccharii hutvaa neva attanaa paribhu~njati ^a^M5.0411^ea^, na paresa.m deti, mama va.mso tena upacchinno, kaala.m katvaa niraye nibbattissati, ovaadamassa datvaa mama va.msa.m pati.t.thaapetvaa etassa imasmi.m devanagare nibbattanaakaara.m karissaamii''ti. so candaadayo pakkosaapetvaa ``etha manussapatha.m gamissaama, macchariyakosiyena amhaaka.m va.mso upacchinno ^a^V5.0383^ea^, daanasaalaa jhaapitaa, neva attanaa paribhu~njati, na paresa.m deti, idaani pana paayaasa.m bhu~njitukaamo hutvaa `ghare paccante a~n~nassapi paayaaso daatabbo bhavissatii'ti ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa ekakova pacati, eta.m dametvaa daanaphala.m jaanaapetvaa aagamissaama, apica kho pana amhehi sabbehi ekato yaaciyamaano tattheva mareyya. mama pa.thama.m gantvaa paayaasa.m yaacitvaa nisinnakaale tumhe braahma.nava.n.nena pa.tipaa.tiyaa aagantvaa yaaceyyaathaa''ti vatvaa saya.m taava braahma.nava.n.nena ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``bho, kataro baaraa.nasigamanamaggo''ti pucchi. atha na.m macchariyakosiyo ``ki.m ummattakosi, baaraa.nasimaggampi na jaanaasi, ki.m ito esi, etto yaahii''ti aaha.

[03] sakko tassa vacana.m sutvaa asu.nanto viya ``ki.m kathesii''ti ta.m upagacchateva. sopi, ``are ^a^P5.0387^ea^, badhira braahma.na, ki.m ito esi, purato yaahii''ti viravi. atha na.m sakko, ``bho, kasmaa viravasi, dhuumo pa~n~naayati, aggi pa~n~naayati, paayaaso paccati, braahma.naana.m nimantana.t.thaanena bhavitabba.m, ahampi braahma.naana.m bhojanakaale thoka.m labhissaami, ki.m ma.m nicchubhasii''ti vatvaa ``natthettha braahma.naana.m nimantana.m, purato yaahii''ti vutte ``tena hi kasmaa kujjhasi, tava bhojanakaale thoka.m labhissaamii''ti aaha. atha na.m so ``aha.m te ekasitthampi na dassaami, thoka.m ida.m mama yaapanamattameva, mayaapi ceta.m yaacitvaava laddha.m, tva.m a~n~nato aahaara.m pariyesaahii''ti vatvaa bhariya.m yaacitvaa laddhabhaava.m sandhaayeva vatvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``neva ki.naami napi vikki.naami, na caapi me sannicayo ca atthi.
[22] sukiccharuupa.m vatida.m paritta.m, patthodano naalamaya.m duvinna''nti..
[03] ta.m ^a^M5.0412^ea^ sutvaa sakko ``ahampi te madhurasaddena eka.m siloka.m kathessaami, ta.m su.naahii''ti vatvaa ``na me tava silokena attho''ti tassa vaarentasseva gaathaadvayamaaha --
[21] ``ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0384^ea^ ^b^anumajjhato majjhaka^eb^nti appamattakampi majjhe chetvaa dve ko.t.thaase karitvaa eka.m ko.t.thaasa.m datvaa tato avasesato anumajjhatopi puna majjhe chetvaa eko ko.t.thaaso daatabboyeva. ^b^adaana.m nuupapajjatii^eb^ti appa.m vaa bahu.m vaa dinna.m hotu, adaana.m naama na hoti, tampi daanameva mahapphalameva.

[03] so ^a^P5.0388^ea^ tassa vacana.m sutvaa ``manaapa.m te, braahma.na, kathita.m, paayaase pakke thoka.m labhissasi, nisiidaahii''ti aaha. sakko ekamante nisiidi. tasmi.m nisinne cando teneva niyaamena upasa"nkamitvaa tatheva katha.m pavattetvaa tassa vaarentasseva gaathaadvayamaaha --
[22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, eko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
[21] ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.

[03] so tassa vacana.m sutvaa kicchena kasirena ``tena hi nisiida, thoka.m labhissasii''ti aaha. so gantvaa sakkassa santike nisiidi. tato suuriyo teneva nayena upasa"nkamitvaa tatheva katha.m pavattetvaa tassa vaarentasseva gaathaadvayamaaha --
[22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, neko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
[21] ``ta.m ^a^M5.0413^ea^ ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.

[03] tassapi vacana.m sutvaa kicchena kasirena ``tena hi nisiida, thoka.m labhissasii''ti aaha. so gantvaa candassa santike nisiidi. atha na.m maatali teneva nayena upasa"nkamitvaa tatheva katha.m pavattetvaa tassa vaarentasseva imaa gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``atra cassa huta.m hoti, atra cassa samiihita.m.
[22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, neko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
[21] ``ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.

[03] taasa.m attho -- yo puriso ``naagayakkhaadiina.m balikamma.m karomii''ti samuddaso.n.dipokkhara.niiaadiisu ya.m ki~nci sara~nca upagantvaa juhati, tattha balikamma.m karoti ^a^P5.0389^ea^, tathaa bahukaaya nadiyaa gayaaya pokkhara.niyaa do.nanaamake ca timbarunaamake ca titthe siighasote mahante vaarivahe. ^b^atra cassaa^eb^ti yadi atraapi etesu saraadiisu assa purisassa huta~nceva samiihita~nca hoti, saphala.m sukhudraya.m sampajjati. atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m neko bhu~njati bhojana.m, ettha vattabbameva natthi, tena ta.m vadaami -- kosiya, daanaani ca dehi, saya~nca bhu~nja, ariyaana.m daanaabhirataana.m buddhaadiina.m magga.m abhiruha. na hi ekaasii ekova bhu~njamaano sukha.m naama labhatiiti.

[03] so tassapi vacana.m sutvaa pabbatakuu.tena ottha.to viya kicchena kasirena ``tena hi nisiida, thoka.m labhissasii''ti aaha. maatali gantvaa suuriyassa santike nisiidi. tato pa~ncasikho teneva nayena upasa"nkamitvaa tatheva katha.m pavattetvaa tassa vaarentasseva gaathaadvayamaaha --
[22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, eko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
[21] ``ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.

[03] macchariyakosiyo ta.m sutvaa dukkhavedano nitthunanto ``tena hi nisiida, thoka.m labhissasii''ti aaha. pa~ncasikho gantvaa maatalissa santike nisiidi. iti tesu pa~ncasu braahma.nesu ^a^V5.0386^ea^ nisinnamattesveva paayaaso pacci. atha na.m kosiyo uddhanaa otaaretvaa ``tumhaaka.m pattaani aaharathaa''ti aaha. te anu.t.thaaya yathaanisinnaava hatthe pasaaretvaa himavantato maaluvapattaani aahari.msu. kosiyo taani disvaa ``tumhaaka.m etesu pattesu daatabbapaayaaso natthi, khadiraadiina.m pattaani aaharathaa''ti aaha. te taanipi aahari.msu. ekeka.m patta.m yodhaphalakappamaa.na.m ahosi. so sabbesa.m dabbiyaa paayaasa.m adaasi, sabbantimassa daanakaalepi ukkhaliyaa uuna.m na pa~n~naayi, pa~ncannampi datvaa saya.m ukkhali.m gahetvaa nisiidi. tasmi.m kha.ne pa~ncasikho u.t.thaaya attabhaava.m vijahitvaa sunakho hutvaa tesa.m purato passaava.m karonto agamaasi. braahma.naa attano paayaasa.m pattena pidahi.msu. kosiyassa hatthapi.t.the passaavabindu pati. braahma.naa ^a^P5.0390^ea^ ku.n.dikaahi udaka.m gahetvaa paayaasa.m abbhukiritvaa bhu~njamaanaa viya ahesu.m. kosiyo ``mayhampi udaka.m detha, hattha.m dhovitvaa bhu~njissaamii''ti aaha. ``tava udaka.m aaharitvaa hattha.m dhovaa''ti. ``mayaa tumhaaka.m paayaaso dinno, mayha.m thoka.m udaka.m dethaa''ti. ``maya.m pi.n.dapa.tipi.n.dakamma.m naama na karomaa''ti. ``tena hi ima.m ukkhali.m oloketha, hattha.m dhovitvaa aagamissaamii''ti nadi.m otari. tasmi.m kha.ne sunakho ukkhali.m passaavassa puuresi. so ta.m passaava.m karonta.m disvaa mahanta.m da.n.damaadaaya ta.m tajjento aagacchi. so assaajaaniiyamatto hutvaa ta.m anubandhanto naanaava.n.no ahosi, kaa.lopi hoti setopi suva.n.nava.n.nopi kabaropi uccopi niicopi, eva.m naanaava.n.no hutvaa macchariyakosiya.m anubandhi. so mara.nabhayabhiito braahma.ne upasa"nkami. tepi uppatitvaa aakaase .thitaa. so tesa.m ta.m iddhi.m disvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``u.laarava.n.naa ^a^M5.0415^ea^ vata braahma.naa ime, aya~nca vo sunakho kissa hetu.
[03] uccaavaca.m va.n.nanibha.m vikubbati, akkhaatha no braahma.naa ke nu tumhe''ti..
[21] ``cando ca suuriyo ca ubho idhaagataa, aya.m pana maatali devasaarathi.
[22] sakkohamasmi tidasaanamindo. eso ca kho pa~ncasikhoti vuccatii''ti..
[03] gaatha.m vatvaa tassa yasa.m va.n.nento gaathamaaha --

[03] so tassa vacana.m sutvaa ``sakka, evaruupa.m dibbasampatti.m kinti katvaa labhasii''ti pucchi. sakko ``adaanasiilaa taava paapadhammaa maccharino devaloka.m na gacchanti, niraye nibbattantii''ti dassento --
[22] idheva nikkhippa sariiradeha.m, kaayassa bhedaa niraya.m vajantii''ti.. --
[25] ima.m gaatha.m vatvaa dhamme .thitaana.m devalokapa.tilaabha.m dassetu.m gaathamaaha --
[22] idheva nikkhippa sariiradeha.m, kaayassa bhedaa sugati.m vajantii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^aasamaanaa^eb^ti aasiisantaa. ye keci sugati.m aasiisanti, sabbe te sa.myamasa"nkhaate dasasiiladhamme sa.mvibhaagasa"nkhaate daanadhamme ca .thitaa ^a^M5.0416^ea^ hutvaa idha sariirasa"nkhaata.m deha.m nikkhipitvaa tassa kaayassa bhedaa sugati.m vajantiiti attho.
[03] eva.m vatvaa ca pana, ``kosiya, na maya.m tava santike paayaasatthaaya aagataa, kaaru~n~nena pana ta.m anukampamaanaa aagataamhaa''ti tassa pakaasetu.m aaha --
[21] ``tva.m nosi ~naati purimaasu jaatisu, so maccharii rosako paapadhammo.
[22] taveva atthaaya idhaagatamhaa, maa paapadhammo niraya.m gamitthaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ti so tva.m. ^b^maa paapadhammo^eb^ti aya.m amhaaka.m ~naati paapadhammo maa niraya.m agamaati etadattha.m aagatamhaati attho.
[03] ta.m sutvaa kosiyo ``atthakaamaa kira me, ete ma.m nirayaa uddharitvaa sagge pati.t.thaapetukaamaa''ti tu.t.thacitto aaha --
[21] ``addhaa ^a^V5.0388^ea^ ma.m vo hitakaamaa, ya.m ma.m samanusaasatha.
[22] soha.m tathaa karissaami, sabba.m vutta.m hitesibhi..
[21] ``esaahamajjeva uparamaami, na caaha.m ki~nci kareyya paapa.m.
[22] na ^a^P5.0392^ea^ caapi me ki~nci adeyyamatthi, na caapidatvaa udaka.m pivaami..
[21] ``eva~nca me dadato sabbakaala.m, bhogaa ime vaasava khiiyissanti.
[22] tato aha.m pabbajissaami sakka, hitvaana kaamaani yathodhikaanii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ma^eb^nti mama. ^b^vo^eb^ti tumhe. ^b^ya.m ma^eb^nti yena ma.m samanusaasatha, tena me tumhe hitakaamaa. ^b^tathaa^eb^ti yathaa vadatha, tatheva karissaami. ^b^uparamaamii^eb^ti maccharibhaavato uparamaami. ^b^adeyyamatthii^eb^ti ito pa.t.thaaya ca mama aalopato upa.d.dhampi adeyya.m naama natthi, ^b^na caapidatvaa^eb^ti udakapasatampi ^a^M5.0417^ea^ caaha.m labhitvaa adatvaa na pivissaami. ^b^khiiyissantii^eb^ti vikkhiiyissanti. ^b^yathodhikaanii^eb^ti vatthukaamakilesakaamavasena yathaa.thitako.t.thaasaaniyeva.

[03] sakko macchariyakosiya.m dametvaa nibbisevana.m katvaa daanaphala.m jaanaapetvaa dhammadesanaaya pa~ncasu siilesu pati.t.thaapetvaa saddhi.m tehi devanagarameva gato. macchariyakosiyopi nagara.m pavisitvaa raajaana.m anujaanaapetvaa ``gahitagahitabhaajanaani puuretvaa ga.nhantuu''ti yaacakaana.m dhana.m datvaa tasmi.m khii.ne nikkhamma himavantato dakkhi.napasse ga"ngaaya ceva ekassa ca jaatassarassa antare pa.n.nasaala.m katvaa pabbajitvaa vanamuulaphalaahaaro tattha cira.m vihaasi, jara.m paapu.ni. tadaa sakkassa aasaa saddhaa sirii hiriiti catasso dhiitaro honti. taa bahu.m dibbagandhamaala.m aadaaya udakakii.lanatthaaya anotattadaha.m gantvaa tattha kii.litvaa manosilaatale nisiidi.msu. tasmi.m kha.ne naarado naama braahma.nataapaso taavati.msabhavana.m divaavihaaratthaaya gantvaa nandanavanacittalataavanesu divaavihaara.m katvaa paaricchattakapuppha.m chatta.m viya chaayatthaaya dhaarayamaano manosilaatalamatthakena attano vasana.t.thaana.m ka~ncanaguha.m gacchati. atha taa tassa hatthe ta.m puppha.m disvaa yaaci.msu. tamattha.m ^a^P5.0393^ea^ pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``suci.m ^a^V5.0389^ea^ sugandha.m tidasehi sakkata.m, pupphuttama.m amaravarehi sevita.m.
[22] aladdha maccehiva daanavehi vaa, a~n~natra devehi tadaaraha.m hida.m..
[21] ``tato ^a^M5.0418^ea^ catasso kanakattacuupamaa, u.t.thaaya naariyo pamadaadhipaa muni.m.
[22] aasaa ca saddhaa ca sirii tato hirii, iccabravu.m naaradadeva braahma.na.m..
[21] ``sace anuddi.t.tha.m tayaa mahaamuni, puppha.m ima.m paarichattassa bramhe.
[22] dadaahi no sabbaa gati te ijjhatu, tuvampi no hohi yatheva vaasavo..
[22] na mayhamatthatthi imehi koci na.m, yaayeva vo seyyasi saa pi.landhathaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^girivare^eb^ti purimassa vevacana.m. ^b^devavaraabhipaalitaa^eb^ti sakkena rakkhitaa. ^b^sabbalokaguu^eb^ti devaloke ca manussaloke ca sabbattha gamanasamattho. ^b^dumavarasaakhamaadiyaa^eb^ti saakhaaya jaatattaa dumavarasaakhanti laddhanaama.m puppha.m gahetvaa. ^b^sakkata^eb^nti katasakkaara.m. ^b^amaravarehii^eb^ti sakka.m sandhaaya vutta.m. ^b^a~n~natra devehii^eb^ti .thapetvaa deve ca iddhimante ca a~n~nehi manussehi vaa yakkhaadiihi vaa aladdha.m. ^b^tadaaraha.m hida^eb^nti tesa.myeva hi ta.m araha.m anucchavika.m. ^b^kanakattacuupamaa^eb^ti kanakuupamaa tacaa. ^b^u.t.thaayaa^eb^ti ayyo maalaagandhavilepanaadipa.tivirato puppha.m na pi.landhissati, ekasmi.m padese cha.d.dessati, etha ta.m yaacitvaa puppha.m pi.landhissaamaati hatthe pasaaretvaa yaacamaanaa ekappahaareneva u.t.thahitvaa. ^b^pamadaadhipaa^eb^ti pamadaana.m uttamaa. ^b^muni^eb^nti isi.m.

[01] ^b^anuddi.t.tha^eb^nti ``asukassa naama dassaamii''ti na uddi.t.tha.m. ^b^sabbaa gati te ijjhatuu^eb^ti sabbaa te cittagati ijjhatu, patthitapatthitassa ^a^P5.0394^ea^ laabhii hohiiti tassa thulima"ngala.m vadanti. ^b^yatheva vaasavo^eb^ti yathaa amhaaka.m pitaa vaasavo icchiticchita.m deti, tatheva no tvampi hohiiti. ^b^ta^eb^nti ta.m puppha.m. ^b^abhisamekkhaa^eb^ti disvaa. ^b^sa.mkalaha^eb^nti naanaagaaha.m kalahava.d.dhana.m katha.m udiirayi. ^b^imehii^eb^ti imehi pupphehi naama mayha.m attho natthi, pa.tivirato aha.m ^a^M5.0419^ea^ maalaadhaara.natoti diipeti. ^b^yaayeva vo seyyasii^eb^ti yaa tumhaaka.m antare je.t.thikaa. ^b^saa pi.landhathaa^eb^ti saa eta.m pi.landhatuuti attho.
[03] taa ^a^V5.0390^ea^ catassopi tassa vacana.m sutvaa gaathamaaha.msu --
[22] yassaa hi no naarada tva.m padassasi, saayeva no hehiti se.t.thasammataa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^tva.m nottamevaa^eb^ti uttamamahaamuni tvameva no upadhaarehi. taasa.m vacana.m sutvaa naarado taa aalapanto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``akallameta.m vacana.m sugatte, ko braahma.no sa.mkalaha.m udiiraye.
[22] gantvaana bhuutaadhipameva pucchatha, sace na jaanaatha idhuttamaadhame''nti..

[03] tassattho -- bhadde sugatte, ida.m tumhehi vutta.m vacana.m mama ayutta.m, eva~nhi sati mayaa tumhesu eka.m se.t.tha.m, sesaa hiinaa karontena kalaho va.d.dhito bhavissati, ko baahitapaapo braahma.no kalaha.m udiiraye va.d.dheyya. evaruupassa hi kalahava.d.dhana.m naama ayutta.m, tasmaa ito gatvaa attano pitara.m bhuutaadhipa.m sakkameva pucchatha, sace attano uttama.m adhama~nca na jaanaathaati.
[22] sakaase gantvaana sahassacakkhuno, pucchi.msu bhuutaadhipa.m kaa nu seyyasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0420^ea^ ^b^paramappakopitaa^eb^ti puppha.m adadantena ativiya kopitaa tassa kupitaa hutvaa. ^b^udiiritaa^eb^ti ``bhuutaadhipameva pucchathaa''ti vuttaa. ^b^sahassacakkhuno^eb^ti sakkassa santika.m gantvaa. ^b^kaa nuu^eb^ti amhaaka.m antare katamaa uttamaati pucchi.msu.
[21] ``taa disvaa aayattamanaa purindado, iccabravii devavaro kata~njalii.
[22] sabbaava vo hotha sugatte saadisii, koneva bhadde kalaha.m udiirayii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0391^ea^ ^b^taa disvaa^eb^ti, bhikkhave, catassopi attano santika.m aagataa disvaa. ^b^aayattamanaa^eb^ti ussukkamanaa byaava.tacittaa. ^b^kata~njalii^eb^ti namassamaanaahi devataahi paggahita~njalii. ^b^saadisii^eb^ti sabbaava tumhe saadisiyo. ^b^ko nevaa^eb^ti ko nu eva.m. ^b^kalaha.m udiirayii^eb^ti ida.m naanaagaaha.m viggaha.m kathesi va.d.dhesi.
[27] so nobravi girivare gandhamaadane, gantvaana bhuutaadhipameva pucchatha.

[03] ta.m sutvaa sakko ``imaa catassopi mayha.m dhiitarova, sacaaha.m `etaasu ekaa gu.nasampannaa uttamaa'ti vakkhaami, sesaa kujjhissanti, na sakkaa aya.m a.d.do vinicchinitu.m, imaa himavante kosiyataapasassa santika.m pesesaami, so etaasa.m a.d.da.m vinicchinissatii''ti cintetvaa ``aha.m tumhaaka.m a.d.da.m na vinicchinissaami, himavante kosiyo naama taapaso atthi, tassaaha.m attano sudhaabhojana.m pesessaami, so parassa adatvaa na bhu~njati, dadanto ^a^M5.0421^ea^ ca vicinitvaa gu.navantaana.m deti, yaa tumhesu tassa hatthato bhatta.m labhissati, saa uttamaa bhavissatii''ti aacikkhanto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``asu brahaara~n~nacaro mahaamuni, naadatvaa bhatta.m varagatte bhu~njati.
[22] yassaa hi so dassati saava seyyasii''ti..
[03] iti so taapasassa santika.m pesetvaa maatali.m pakkosaapetvaa tassa santika.m pesento anantara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``asuu ^a^V5.0392^ea^ hi yo sammati dakkhi.na.m disa.m, ga"ngaaya tiire himavantapassani.
[22] sa kosiyo dullabhapaanabhojano, tassa sudha.m paapaya devasaarathii''ti..
[01] tattha ^b^sammatii^eb^ti vasati. ^b^dakkhi.na^eb^nti himavantassa dakkhi.naaya disaaya. ^b^passanii^eb^ti passe.
[21] ``sa maatalii devavarena pesito, sahassayutta.m abhiruyha sandana.m.
[22] sukhippameva upagamma assama.m, adissamaano munino sudha.m adaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^adissamaano^eb^ti, bhikkhave, so maatali devaraajassa vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa ta.m assama.m gantvaa adissamaanakaayo hutvaa tassa sudha.m adaasi, dadamaano ca ratti.m padhaanamanuyu~njitvaa paccuusasamaye aggi.m paricaritvaa vibhaataaya rattiyaa udenta.m suuriya.m namassamaanassa .thitassa tassa hatthe sudhaabhojanapaati.m .thapesi.
[22] ko neva me paa.nisu ki.m sudhodahi..
[22] adi.t.thapubba.m mama jaatu cakkhubhi, kaa devataa paa.nisu ki.m sudhodahii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^udaggihutta^eb^nti udakaaggihutta.m paricaritvaa aggisaalato nikkhamma pa.n.nasaaladvaare .thatvaa pabha"nkara.m lokatamonuda.m uttama.m aadicca.m upati.t.thato mama sabbaani bhuutaani adhicca atikkamitvaa vattamaano vaasavo nu kho eva.m mama paa.niisu ki.m sudha.m ki.m naameta.m odahi. ``sa"nkhuupama''ntiaadiihi .thitakova sudha.m va.n.neti.
[21] ``aha.m ^a^V5.0393^ea^ mahindena mahesi pesito, sudhaabhihaasi.m turito mahaamuni.
[22] jaanaasi ma.m maatali devasaarathi, bhu~njassu bhattuttama maabhivaarayi..
[21] ``bhuttaa ca saa dvaadasa hanti paapake, khuda.m pipaasa.m arati.m daraklama.m.
[22] kodhuupanaaha~nca vivaadapesu.na.m, siitu.nha tandi~nca rasuttama.m ida''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^sudhaabhihaasi^eb^nti ima.m sudhaabhojana.m tuyha.m abhihari.m. ^b^jaanaasii^eb^ti jaanaahi ma.m tva.m, aha.m maatali naama devasaarathiiti attho. ^b^maabhivaarayii^eb^ti na bhu~njaamiiti appa.tikkhipitvaa bhu~nja maa papa~nca kari. ^b^paapake^eb^ti aya~nhi ^a^M5.0423^ea^ sudhaa bhuttaa dvaadasa paapadhamme hanati. ^b^khuda^eb^nti pa.thama.m taava chaatabhaava.m hanati, dutiya.m paaniiyapipaasa.m, tatiya.m ukka.n.thita.m, catuttha.m kaayadaratha.m, pa~ncama.m kilantabhaava.m, cha.t.tha.m kodha.m, sattama.m upanaaha.m, a.t.thama.m vivaada.m, navama.m pesu.na.m, dasama.m siita.m, ekaadasama.m u.nha.m, dvaadasama.m tandi.m aalasiyabhaava.m, ida.m rasuttama.m uttamarasa.m sudhaabhojana.m ime dvaadasa paapadhamme hanati.
[03] ta.m sutvaa kosiyo attano vatasamaadaana.m aavikaronto --
[21] ``na kappatii maatali mayha bhu~njitu.m, pubbe adatvaa iti me vatuttama.m.
[22] na caapi ekaasnamariyapuujita.m, asa.mvibhaagii ca sukha.m na vindatii''ti.. --
[25] gaatha.m vatvaa, ``bhante, tumhehi parassa adatvaa bhojane ka.m dosa.m disvaa ida.m vata.m samaadinna''nti maatalinaa pu.t.tho aaha --
[21] ``thiighaatakaa ye cime paaradaarikaa, mittadduno ye ca sapanti subbate.
[22] sabbe ca te maccharipa~ncamaadhamaa, tasmaa adatvaa udakampi naasniye..
[21] ``sohitthiyaa ^a^P5.0398^ea^ vaa purisassa vaa pana, dassaami daana.m vidusampava.n.nita.m.
[22] saddhaa vada~n~nuu idha viitamaccharaa, bhavanti hete sucisaccasammataa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^pubbe^eb^ti pa.thama.m adatvaa, atha vaa iti me pubbe vatuttama.m ida.m pubbeva mayaa vata.m samaadinnanti dasseti. ^b^na caapi ekaasnamariyapuujita^eb^nti ekakassa asana.m na ariyehi buddhaadiihi ^a^V5.0394^ea^ puujita.m. ^b^sukha^eb^nti dibbamaanusika.m sukha.m na labhati. ^b^thiighaatakaa^eb^ti itthighaatakaa. ^b^ye cime^eb^ti ye ca ime. ^b^sapantii^eb^ti akkosanti. ^b^subbate^eb^ti dhammikasama.nabraahma.ne. ^b^maccharipa~ncamaa^eb^ti maccharii pa~ncamo etesanti maccharipa~ncamaa. ^b^adhamaa^eb^ti ime pa~nca adhamaa naama. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa aha.m pa~ncamaadhamabhaavabhayena adatvaa udakampi ^b^naasniye^eb^ na ^a^M5.0424^ea^ paribhu~njissaamiiti ima.m vata.m samaadiyi.m. ^b^sohitthiyaa vaa^eb^ti so aha.m itthiyaa vaa. ^b^vidusampava.n.nita^eb^nti viduuhi pa.n.ditehi buddhaadiihi va.n.nita.m. ^b^sucisaccasammataa^eb^ti ete okappaniyasaddhaaya samannaagataa vada~n~nuu viitamaccharaa purisaa sucii ceva uttamasammataa ca hontiiti attho.

[03] ta.m sutvaa maatali dissamaanakaayena a.t.thaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne taa catasso devaka~n~naayo catuddisa.m a.t.tha.msu, sirii paaciinadisaaya a.t.thaasi, aasaa dakkhi.nadisaaya, saddhaa pacchimadisaaya, hirii uttaradisaaya. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``ato mataa devavarena pesitaa, ka~n~naa catasso kanakattacuupamaa.
[22] aasaa ca saddhaa ca sirii tato hirii, ta.m assama.m aagamu yattha kosiyo..
[21] ``taa disvaa sabbo paramappamodito, subhena va.n.nena sikhaarivaggino.
[22] ka~n~naa catasso caturo catuddisaa, iccabravii maatalino ca sammukhaa..
[21] ``purima.m disa.m kaa tva.m pabhaasi devate, ala"nkataa taaravaraava osadhii.
[22] pucchaami ta.m ka~ncanavelliviggahe, aacikkha me tva.m katamaasi devataa..
[22] sudhaavivaadena tavantimaagataa, ta.m ma.m sudhaaya varapa~n~na bhaajaya..
[21] ``yassaahamicchaami sudha.m mahaamuni, so sabbakaamehi naro pamodati.
[22] siriiti ma.m jaanahi juuhatuttama, ta.m ma.m sudhaaya varapa~n~na bhaajayaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0425^ea^ ^b^ato^eb^ti tato. ^b^mataa^eb^ti anumataa, atha devavarena anumataa ceva pesitaa caati attho. ^b^sabbo paramappamodito^eb^ti anavaseso hutvaa atipamodito. ``saama''ntipi paa.tho, taa devataa ^a^V5.0395^ea^ saama.m disvaati attho. ^b^caturo^eb^ti caturaa. ayameva vaa paa.tho, caaturiyena samannaagataati attho. ^b^taaravaraa^eb^ti taarakaana.m varaa. ^b^ka~ncanavelliviggahe^eb^ti ka~ncanaruupasadisasariire. ^b^siraahaa^eb^ti sirii aha.m. ^b^tavantimaagataa^eb^ti tava santika.m aagataa. ^b^bhaajayaa^eb^ti yathaa ma.m sudhaa bhajati, tathaa karohi, sudha.m me dehiiti attho. ^b^jaanahii^eb^ti jaana. ^b^juuhatuttamaa^eb^ti aggi.m juhantaana.m uttama.
[21] ``sippena vijjaacara.nena buddhiyaa, naraa upetaa pagu.naa sakammunaa.
[22] tayaa vihiinaa na labhanti ki~ncana.m, tayida.m na saadhu yadida.m tayaa kata.m..
[21] ``passaami posa.m alasa.m mahagghasa.m, sudukkuliinampi aruupima.m nara.m.
[22] tayaanugutto siri jaatimaamapi, peseti daasa.m viya bhogavaa sukhii..
[21] ``ta.m ta.m asacca.m avibhajjasevini.m, jaanaami muu.lha.m viduraanupaatini.m.
[22] na taadisii arahati aasanuudaka.m, kuto sudhaa gaccha na mayha ruccasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sippenaa^eb^ti hatthiassarathadhanusippaadinaa. ^b^vijjaacara.nenaa^eb^ti vedattayasa"nkhaataaya vijjaaya ceva siilena ca. ^b^pagu.naa sakammunaa^eb^ti attano purisakaarena padhaanagu.nasamannaagataa. ^b^ki~ncana^eb^nti ki~nci appamattakampi yasa.m vaa sukha.m vaa na labhanti. ^b^yadida^eb^nti ya.m eta.m issariyatthaaya sippaani ^a^M5.0426^ea^ ugga.nhitvaa carantaana.m ^a^P5.0400^ea^ tayaa vekalla.m kata.m, ta.m te na saadhu. ^b^aruupima^eb^nti viruupa.m. ^b^tayaanugutto^eb^ti tayaa anurakkhito. ^b^jaatimaamapii^eb^ti jaatisampannampi sippavijjaacara.nabuddhikammehi sampannampi. ^b^pesetii^eb^ti pesanakaaraka.m karoti. ^b^ta.m ta^eb^nti tasmaa ta.m. ^b^asacca^eb^nti sabhaavasa"nkhaate sacce avattanataaya asacca.m uttamabhaavarahita.m. ^b^avibhajjasevini^eb^nti avibhajitvaa yuttaayutta.m ajaanitvaa sippaadisampannepi itarepi sevamaana.m. ^b^viduraanupaatini^eb^nti pa.n.ditaanupaatini.m pa.n.dite paatetvaa pothetvaa vihe.thetvaa caramaana.m. ^b^kuto sudhaa^eb^ti taadisaaya niggu.naaya kuto sudhaabhojana.m, na me ruccasi, gaccha maa idha ti.t.thaati.
[03] saa tena pa.tikkhittaa tatthevantaradhaayi. tato so aasaaya saddhi.m sallapanto aaha --
[22] osittava.n.na.m paridayha sobhasi, kusaggiratta.m api.layha ma~njari.m..
[22] ko te dutiiyo ida mandalocane, na bhaayasi ekikaa kaanane vane''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^citta"ngadaa^eb^ti citrehi a"ngadehi samannaagataa. ^b^kambuvima.t.thadhaarinii^eb^ti kara.naparini.t.thitena vima.t.thasuva.n.naala"nkaaradhaarinii. ^b^osittava.n.na^eb^nti avasittaudakadhaarava.n.na.m dibbadukuula.m. ^b^paridayhaa^eb^ti nivaasetvaa ceva paarupitvaa ca. ^b^kusaggiratta^eb^nti kusati.naggisikhaava.n.na.m. ^b^api.layha ma~njari^eb^nti sapallava.m asokaka.n.nika.m ka.n.ne pi.landhitvaati vutta.m hoti. ^b^saracaapadhaarinaa^eb^ti luddena. ^b^viraadhitaa^eb^ti viraddhapahaaraa. ^b^mandamivaa^eb^ti yathaa saa migii bhiitaa vanantare .thatvaa ta.m manda.m manda.m oloketi, eva.m olokesi.
[21] ``na me dutiiyo idha matthi kosiya, masakkasaarappabhavamhi devataa.
[22] aasaa sudhaasaaya tavantimaagataa, ta.m ma.m sudhaaya varapa~n~na bhaajayaa''ti..

[03] ta.m ^a^P5.0401^ea^ sutvaa kosiyo ``tva.m kira yo te ruccati, tassa aasaaphalanipphaadanena aasa.m desi, yo te na ruccati, tassa na desi, natthi tayaa samaa patthitatthavinaasikaa''ti diipento aaha --
[21] ``aasaaya yanti vaa.nijaa dhanesino, naava.m samaaruyha parenti a.n.nave.
[22] te tattha siidanti athopi ekadaa, jiinaadhanaa enti vina.t.thapaabhataa..
[21] ``aasaaya khettaani kasanti kassakaa, vapanti biijaani karontupaayaso.
[22] iitiinipaatena avu.t.thitaaya vaa, na ki~nci vindanti tato phalaagama.m..
[21] ``athattakaaraani ^a^V5.0397^ea^ karonti bhattusu, aasa.m purakkhatvaa naraa sukhesino.
[22] te bhatturatthaa atigaa.lhitaa puna, disaa panassanti aladdha ki~ncana.m..
[22] tapanti luukhampi tapa.m cirantara.m, kumaggamaaruyha parenti duggati.m..
[21] ``aasaa ^a^M5.0428^ea^ visa.mvaadikasammataa ime, aase sudhaasa.m vinayassu attani.
[22] na taadisii arahati aasanuudaka.m, kuto sudhaa gaccha na mayha ruccasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^parentii^eb^ti pakkhandanti. ^b^jiinaadhanaa^eb^ti jiinadhanaa. iti tava vasena eke sampajjanti eke vipajjanti, natthi tayaa sadisaa paapadhammaati vadati. ^b^karontupaayaso^eb^ti ta.m ta.m kicca.m upaayena karonti. ^b^iitiinipaatenaa^eb^ti visamavaatamuusikasalabhasukapaa.nakaseta.t.thikarogaadiina.m sassupaddavaana.m a~n~nataranipaatena vaa. ^b^tato^eb^ti tato sassato te ki~nci phala.m na vindanti, tesampi aasacchedanakamma.m tvameva karosiiti vadati. ^b^athattakaaraanii^eb^ti yuddhabhuumiisu purisakaare. ^b^aasa.m purakkhatvaa^eb^ti issariyaasa.m purato katvaa. ^b^bhatturatthaa^eb^ti saamino atthaaya. ^b^atigaa.litaa^eb^ti paccatthikehi atipii.litaa viluttasaapateyyaa ddhastasenavaahanaa hutvaa. ^b^panassantii^eb^ti palaayanti. ^b^aladdha ki~ncana^eb^nti ki~nci issariya.m alabhitvaa ^a^P5.0402^ea^. iti etesampi issariyaalaabha.m tvameva karosiiti vadati. ^b^saggaadhimanaa^eb^ti sagga.m adhigantumanaa. ^b^luukha^eb^nti niroja.m pa~ncatapaadika.m kaayakilamatha.m. ^b^cirantara^eb^nti cirakaala.m. ^b^aasaa visa.mvaadikasammataa ime^eb^ti eva.m ime sattaa saggaasaaya duggati.m gacchanti, tasmaa tva.m aasaa naama visa.mvaadikasammataa visa.mvaadikaati sa"nkha.m gataa. ^b^aase^eb^ti ta.m aalapati.
[03] saapi tena pa.tikkhittaa antaradhaayi. tato saddhaaya saddhi.m sallapanto gaathamaaha --
[22] pucchaami ta.m ka~ncanavelliviggahe, aacikkha me tva.m katamaasi devate''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^daddallamaanaa^eb^ti jalamaanaa. ^b^jigha~n~nanaamavhayana^eb^nti aparaati ca pacchimaati ca eva.m jigha~n~nena laamakena naamena vuccamaana.m disa.m pati daddallamaanaa ti.t.thasi.
[22] sudhaavivaadena tavanti maagataa, ta.m ma.m sudhaaya varapa~n~na bhaajayaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^saddhaa^eb^ti yassa kassaci vacanapattiyaayanaa saavajjaapi hoti anavajjaapi. ^b^puujitaa^eb^ti anavajjako.t.thaasavasena puujitaa. ^b^apaapasattuupanisevinii^eb^ti anavajjasaddhaaya ca ekantapattiyaayanusabhaavaara paresupi pattiyaayanavidahanasamatthaaya devataayeta.m naama.m.
[03] atha.m na.m kosiyo ``ime sattaa yassa kassaci vacana.m saddahitvaa ta.m ta.m karontaa kattabbato akattabbameva bahutara.m karonti, ta.m sabba.m tayaa kaarita.m naama hotii''ti vatvaa evamaaha --
[21] ``daana.m dama.m caagamathopi sa.myama.m, aadaaya saddhaaya karonti hekadaa.
[22] theyya.m ^a^P5.0403^ea^ musaa kuu.tamathopi pesu.na.m, karonti heke puna viccutaa tayaa..
[22] vinetvaana chanda.m kulitthiraasupi, karoti saddha.m puna kumbhadaasiyaa..
[21] ``tvameva saddhe paradaarasevinii, paapa.m karosi kusalampi ri~ncasi.
[22] na taadisii arahati aasanuudaka.m, kuto sudhaa gaccha na mayha ruccasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^daana^eb^nti dasavatthuka.m pu~n~nacetana.m. damab^nti indriyadamana.m. ^b^caaga^eb^nti deyyadhammapariccaaga.m. ^b^sa.myama^eb^nti siila.m. ^b^aadaaya saddhaayaa^eb^ti ``etaani daanaadiini mahaanisa.msaani kattabbaanii''ti vadata.m vacana.m saddhaaya aadiyitvaapi ^a^M5.0430^ea^ karonti ekadaa. ^b^kuu.ta^eb^nti tulaakuu.taadika.m vaa gaamakuu.taadika.m kamma.m vaa. ^b^karonti heke^eb^ti eke manussaa evaruupesu naama kaalesu imesa~nca atthaaya theyyaadiini kattabbaaniiti kesa~nci vacana.m saddahitvaa etaanipi karonti. ^b^puna viccutaa tayaa^eb^ti puna tayaa visuttaa saavajjadukkhavipaakaanetaani na kattabbaaniiti vadata.m vacana.m apattiyaayitvaapi karonti. iti tava vasena saavajjampi anavajjampi kareyyaasi vadati.

[03] ^b^sadisiisuu^eb^ti ^a^V5.0399^ea^ jaatigottasiilaadiihi sadisiisu. ^b^pekkhavaa^eb^ti pekkhaa vuccati ta.nhaa, sata.nhoti attho. ^b^chanda^eb^nti chandaraaga.m. ^b^karoti saddha^eb^nti kumbhadaasiyaapi vacane saddha.m karoti, tassaa ``aha.m tumhaaka.m ida.m naama upakaara.m karissaamii''ti vadantiyaa pattiyaayitvaa kulitthiyopi cha.d.detvaa tameva pa.tisevati, asukaa naama tumhesu pa.tibaddhacittaati kumbhadaasiyaapi vacane saddha.m katvaava paradaara.m sevati. ^b^tvameva saddhe paradaarasevinii^eb^ti yasmaa ta.m ta.m pattiyaayitvaa tava vasena paradaara.m sevanti paapa.m karonti kusala.m jahanti, tasmaa tvameva paradaarasevinii tva.m paapaani karosi, kusalampi ri~ncasi, natthi tayaa samaa lokavinaasikaa paapadhammaa, gaccha na me ruccasiiti.
[03] saa tattheva antaradhaayi. kosiyopi uttarato .thitaaya hiriyaa saddhi.m sallapanto gaathaadvayamaaha --
[22] tathuupamaa ^a^P5.0404^ea^ ma.m pa.tibhaasi devate, aacikkha me tva.m katamaasi accharaa..
[22] kaa ti.t.thasi mandamigaavalokaya.m, bhaasesamaanaava gira.m na mu~ncasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^jigha~n~naratti^eb^nti pacchimaratti.m, rattipariyosaaneti attho. ^b^uuhate^eb^ti aru.ne uggate. ^b^yaa^eb^ti yaa puratthimaa disaa rattasuva.n.nataaya uppamaruupadharaa ^a^M5.0431^ea^ hutvaa dissati. ^b^kaa.laa nidaagherivaa^eb^ti nidaaghasamaye kaa.lavalli viya. ^b^aggijaarivaa^eb^ti aggijaalaa iva, saapi nijjhaamakhettesu taru.nau.t.thitakaa.lavalli viyaati attho. ^b^lohitapattamaalinii^eb^ti lohitava.n.nehi pattehi parivutaa. ^b^kaa ti.t.thasii^eb^ti yathaa saa taru.nakaa.lavalli vaateritaa vilaasamaanaa sobhamaanaa ti.t.thati, eva.m kaa naama tva.m ti.t.thasi. ^b^bhaasesamaanaavaa^eb^ti mayaa saddhi.m bhaasitukaamaa viya hosi, na ca gira.m mu~ncasi.
[27] sudhaavivaadena tavantimaagataa, saaha.m na sakkomi sudhampi yaacitu.m.

[03] tattha ^b^hiraaha^eb^nti hirii aha.m. ^b^sudhampii^eb^ti saa aha.m sudhaabhojana.m ta.m yaacitumpi na sakkomi. ki.mkaara.naa? ^b^kopiinaruupaa viya yaacanitthiyaa,^eb^ yasmaa itthiyaa yaacanaa naama kopiinaruupaa viya rahassa"ngavivara.nasadisaa hoti, nillajjaa viya hotiiti attho.
[03] ta.m sutvaa taapaso dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[04] ``dhammena ~naayena sugatte lacchasi, eso hi dhammo na hi yaacanaa sudhaa.
[22] ta.m ta.m ayaacantimaha.m nimantaye, sudhaaya ya~ncicchasi tampi dammi te..
[21] ``saa ^a^P5.0405^ea^ tva.m mayaa ajja sakamhi assame, nimantitaa ka~ncanavelliviggahe.
[22] tuva~nhi me sabbarasehi puujiyaa, ta.m puujayitvaana sudhampi asniye''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dhammenaa^eb^ti sabhaavena. ^b^~naayenaa^eb^ti kaara.nena. ^b^na hi yaacanaa sudhaa^eb^ti na hi yaacanaaya sudhaa labbhati, teneva kaara.nena itaraa tisso ^a^M5.0432^ea^ nalabhi.msu. ^b^ta.m ta^eb^nti tasmaa ta.m. ^b^ya~ncicchasii^eb^ti na kevala.m nimantemiyeva, ya~nca sudha.m icchasi, tampi dammi te. ^b^ka~ncanavelliviggahe^eb^ti ka~ncanaraasisassirikasariire. ^b^puujiyaa^eb^ti na kevala.m sudhaaya, a~n~nehipi sabbarasehi tva.m mayaa puujetabbayuttakaava. ^b^asniye^eb^ti ta.m puujetvaa sace sudhaaya avasesa.m bhavissati, ahampi bhu~njissaami.
[21] ``saa kosiyenaanumataa jutiimataa, addhaa hiri ramma.m paavisi yassama.m.
[21] ``rukkhaggahaanaa bahukettha pupphitaa, ambaa piyaalaa panasaa ca ki.msukaa.
[22] sobha~njanaa loddamathopi paddhakaa, kekaa ca bha"ngaa tilakaa supupphitaa..
[22] mocaa kadalii bahukettha saaliyo, paviihayo aabhuujino ca ta.n.dulaa..
[27] si"nguu sava"nkaa sa.mkulaa, satava"nkaa ca rohitaa.
[27] ha.msaa ko~ncaa mayuuraa ca, cakkavaakaa ca kukkuhaa.
[27] e.neyyaa ca varaahaa ca, ga.nino niikasuukaraa.

[03] tattha ^b^jutiimataa^eb^ti aanubhaavasampannena. ^b^paavisi yassama^eb^nti paavisi assama.m, ^b^ya^eb^-kaaro bya~njanasandhikaro. ^b^udakavanta^eb^nti tesu tesu .thaanesu udakasampanna.m. ^b^phala^eb^nti anekaphalasampanna.m. ^b^ariyapuujita^eb^nti niivara.nadosarahitehi jhaanalaabhiihi ariyehi puujita.m pasattha.m. ^b^rukkhaggahaanaa^eb^ti pupphuupagaphaluupagarukkhagahanaa. ^b^sobha~njanaa^eb^ti siggurukkhaa. ^b^loddamathopi paddhakaa^eb^ti loddarukkhaa ca padumarukkhaa ^a^V5.0402^ea^ ca. ^b^kekaa ca bha"ngaa^eb^ti eva.mnaamakaa rukkhaa eva. ^b^karerii^eb^ti karerirukkhaa. ^b^uddaalakaa^eb^ti vaataghaatakaa. ^b^mucalindaketakaa^eb^ti mucalindaa ca pa~ncavidhaketakaa ca. ^b^hare.nukaa^eb^ti apara.n.najaati. ^b^ve.lukaa^eb^ti va.msabhedakaa. ^b^ke.nuu^eb^ti ara~n~namaasaa. ^b^tindukaa^eb^ti timbarurukkhaa. ^b^ciinakaa^eb^ti khuddakaraajamaasaa. ^b^mocaa^eb^ti a.t.thikakadaliyo. ^b^saaliyo^eb^ti naanappakaaraa jaatassara.m upanissaaya jaataa saaliyo. ^b^paviihayo^eb^ti naanappakaaraa viihayo. ^b^aabhuujino^eb^ti bhujapattaa. ^b^ta.n.dulaa^eb^ti nikku.n.dakathusaani saya.mjaatata.n.dulasiisaani.

[03] ^b^tassevaa^eb^ti, bhikkhave, tasseva assamassa uttaradisaabhaage. ^b^pokkhara.nii^eb^ti pa~ncavidhapadumasa~nchannaa jaatassarapokkhara.nii. ^b^akakkasaa^eb^ti macchasippikasevaalaadikakkasarahitaa. ^b^apabbhaaraa^eb^ti acchinnata.taa samatitthaa. ^b^appa.tigandhikaa^eb^ti apa.tikkuulagandhena udakena samannaagataa. ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tassaa pokkhara.niyaa. ^b^khemino^eb^ti abhayaa. ^b^``si"nguu''^eb^tiaadiini tesa.m macchaana.m ^a^M5.0434^ea^ naamaani. ^b^ku.naalakaa^eb^ti kokilaa. ^b^citraa^eb^ti citrapattaa. ^b^sikha.n.dii^eb^ti u.t.thitasikhaa moraa, a~n~nepi vaa matthake jaatasikhaa pakkhino. ^b^paanaaya maayantii^eb^ti paanaaya aayanti. ^b^palaasaadaa^eb^ti khaggaa. ^b^gavajaa^eb^ti gavayaa. ^b^ga.nino^eb^ti goka.n.naa. ^b^ka.n.nikaa^eb^ti ka.n.nikamigaa. ^b^chamaagirii^eb^ti bhuumisamapattha.taa pi.t.thipaasaa.naa. ^b^pupphavicitrasanthataa^eb^ti vicitrapupphasanthataa. ^b^dijaabhighu.t.thaa^eb^ti madhurassarehi dijehi abhighu.t.thaa. evaruupaa tattha bhuumipabbataati eva.m bhagavaa kosiyassa assama.m va.n.neti.
[03] idaani hirideviyaa tattha pavisanaadiini dassetu.m aaha --
[27] tassaa susambandhasira.m kusaamaya.m, suci.m sugandha.m ajinuupasevita.m.
[22] atricca koccha.m hirimetadabravi, nisiida kalyaa.ni sukhayidamaasana.m..
[22] navehi pattehi saya.m sahuudaka.m, sudhaabhihaasii turito mahaamuni..
[21] ``saa ta.m pa.tiggayha ubhohi paa.nibhi, iccabravi attamanaa ja.taadhara.m.
[22] handaaha.m etarahi puujitaa tayaa, gaccheyya.m brahme tidiva.m jitaavinii..
[22] sakaase gantvaana sahassacakkhuno, aya.m sudhaa vaasava dehi me jaya.m..
[22] saa pa~njalii devamanussapuujitaa, navamhi kocchamhi yadaa upaavisii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^suttacaa^eb^ti succhavii. ^b^niiladumaabhilambitaa^eb^ti niilesu dumesu abhilambitaa hutvaa, ta.m ta.m niiladumasaakha.m paraamasantiiti attho. ^b^mahaamegharivaa^eb^ti tena nimantitaa mahaameghavijju viya tassa ta.m assama.m paavisi. ^b^tassaa^eb^ti tassaa hiriyaa. ^b^susambandhasira^eb^nti su.t.thu sambandhasiisa.m. ^b^kusaamaya^eb^nti usiiraadimissakakusati.namaya.m. ^b^sugandha^eb^nti usiirena ceva a~n~nena sugandhati.nena ca missakattaa sugandha.m. ^b^ajinuupasevita^eb^nti upariatthatena ajinacammena upasevita.m. ^b^atricca koccha^eb^nti evaruupa.m kocchaasana.m pa.n.nasaaladvaare attharitvaa. ^b^sukhayidamaasana^eb^nti sukha.m nisiida idamaasana.m.

[03] ^b^ya^eb^nti yaavadattha.m. ^b^icchamaanaayaa^eb^ti sudha.m icchantiyaa. ^b^navehi pattehii^eb^ti ta"nkha.na~n~neva pokkhara.nito aabhatehi allapaduminipattehi. ^b^saya^eb^nti sahatthena. ^b^sahuudaka^eb^nti ^a^P5.0408^ea^ dakkhi.nodakasahita.m. ^b^sudhaabhihaasii^eb^ti sudha.m abhihari. ^b^turito^eb^ti somanassavegena turito. ^b^handaa^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipaato. ^b^jitaavinii^eb^ti vijayappattaa hutvaa.

[03] ^b^anumataa^eb^ti idaani yathaaruci.m gacchaati anu~n~naataa. ^b^udiiritaa^eb^ti tidasapura.m gantvaa sakkassa santike aya.m sudhaati udiirayi. ^b^suraka~n~na^eb^nti devadhiitara.m. ^b^uttama^eb^nti pavara.m. ^b^saa pa~njalii devamanussapuujitaa^eb^ti pa~njalii devehi ca manussehi ca puujitaa. ^b^yadaa^eb^ti yadaa nisiidanatthaaya sakkena daapite nave ka~ncanapii.thasa"nkhaate kocche saa upaavisi, tadaa na.m tattha nisinna.m sakko ca sesadevataa ca paaricchattakapupphaadiihi puujayi.msu.

[03] eva.m sakko ta.m puujetvaa cintesi -- ``kena nu kho kaara.nena kosiyo sesaana.m adatvaa imissaava sudha.m adaasii''ti. so tassa kaara.nassa jaananatthaaya puna maatali.m pesesi. tamattha.m aavi karonto satthaa aaha --
[27] gantvaana vaakya.m mama bruuhi kosiya.m, aasaaya saddhaa siriyaa ca kosiya.

[03] tattha ^b^sa.msii^eb^ti abhaasi. ^b^vaakya.m mamaa^eb^ti mama vaakya.m kosiya.m bruuhi. ^b^aasaaya saddhaa siriyaa caa^eb^ti aasaato ca saddhaato ca sirito ca hiriiyeva kena hetunaa sudhamalatthaati.
[03] so tassa vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa vejayantarathamaaruyha agamaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] e.neyyakaa la"nghamayettha pakkhino, migettha ve.luriyamayaa yudhaa yutaa..
[21] ``ta.m yaanase.t.tha.m abhiruyha maatali, disaa imaayo abhinaadayittha.
[22] nabha~nca sela~nca vanappatini~nca, sasaagara.m pabyathayittha medini.m..
[22] bahussuta.m vuddha.m viniitavanta.m, iccabravi maatali devabraahma.na.m..
[21] ``indassa vaakya.m nisaamehi kosiya, duuto aha.m pucchati ta.m purindado.
[22] aasaaya saddhaa siriyaa ca kosiya, hirii sudha.m kena malattha hetunaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ta.m suplavattha^eb^nti ta.m vejayantaratha.m sukhena plavanattha.m. ^b^udataarayii^eb^ti uttaaresi ukkhipitvaa gamanasajjamakaasi. ^b^upakaariyasaadisa^eb^nti upakara.nabha.n.dehi sadisa.m, yathaa tassa aggisikhaaya ^a^V5.0405^ea^ samaanava.n.naani upakara.naani jalanti, tatheva jalitanti attho. ^b^jambonadiisa^eb^nti jambunadasa"nkhaata.m rattasuva.n.namaya.m iisa.m. ^b^ka~ncanacittasannibha^eb^nti, ka~ncanamayena sattaratanavicittena a.t.thama"ngalena samannaagata.m. ^b^suva.n.nacandetthaa^eb^ti suva.n.namayaa candakaa ettha rathe. ^b^hatthii^eb^ti suva.n.narajatama.nimayaa hatthii. ^b^gavaa^eb^diisupi eseva nayo. ^b^la"nghamayettha pakkhino^eb^ti ettha rathe la"nghamayaa naanaaratanamayaa pakkhiga.naapi pa.tipaa.tiyaa .thitaa. ^b^yudhaa yutaa^eb^ti attano attano yudhena saddhi.m yuttaa hutvaa dassitaa.

[03] ^b^assaraajaharayo^eb^ti hariva.n.namanomayaassaraajaano. ^b^susunaagasaadise^eb^ti balasampattiyaa taru.nanaagasadise. ^b^ka~ncanajaaluracchade^eb^ti ka~ncanajaalamayena uracchadaala"nkaarena samannaagate. ^b^aave.line^eb^ti aave.lasa"nkhaatehi ka.n.naala"nkaarehi yutte. ^b^saddagame^eb^ti patodappahaara.m vinaa saddamatteneva gamanasiile. ^b^asa"ngiite^eb^ti nissa"nge siighajave evaruupe assaraaje tattha yojesunti attho.

[03] ^b^abhinaadayitthaa^eb^ti yaanasaddena ekaninnaada.m akaasi. ^b^vanappatini~ncaa^eb^ti vanappatinii ca vanasa.n.de caati attho. ^b^pabyathayitthaa^eb^ti kampayittha. tattha aakaasa.t.thakavimaanakampanena nabhakampana.m veditabba.m. ^b^paavaarameka.msakato^eb^ti eka.msakatapaavaaradibbavattho. ^b^vuddha^eb^nti gu.navuddha.m. ^b^viniitavanta^eb^nti viniitena ^a^M5.0438^ea^ aacaaravattena samannaagata.m. ^b^iccabravii^eb^ti ratha.m aakaase .thapetvaa otaritvaa eva.m abravi. ^b^devabraahma.na^eb^nti devasama.m braahma.na.m.
[04] ``andhaa sirii ma.m pa.tibhaati maatali, saddhaa aniccaa pana devasaarathi.
[22] aasaa visa.mvaadikasammataa hi me, hirii ca ariyamhi gu.ne pati.t.thitaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^andhaa^eb^ti sippaadisampannepi asampannepi bhajanato ``andhaa''ti ma.m pa.tibhaati. ^b^aniccaa^eb^ti saddhaa pana ta.m ta.m vatthu.m pahaaya a~n~nasmi.m a~n~nasmi.m uppajjanato hutvaa abhaavaakaarena ``aniccaa''ti ma.m pa.tibhaati. ^b^visa.mvaadikasammataa^eb^ti aasaa pana yasmaa dhanatthikaa naavaaya samudda.m pakkhanditvaa vina.t.thapaabhataa enti, tasmaa ``visa.mvaadikaa''ti ma.m pa.tibhaati. ^b^ariyamhi gu.ne^eb^ti hirii pana hirottappasabhaavasa"nkhaate parisuddhe ariyagu.ne pati.t.thitaati.
[21] ``kumaariyo yaacimaa gottarakkhitaa, ji.n.naa ca yaa yaa ca sabhattuitthiyo.
[22] taa chandaraaga.m purisesu uggata.m, hiriyaa nivaarenti sacittamattano..
[22] hiriyaa nivattanti jahitva jiivita.m, te sampa.ticchanti punaa hiriimanaa..
[21] ``velaa yathaa saagaravegavaarinii, hiraaya hi paapajana.m nivaarinii.
[22] ta.m sabbaloke hirimariyapuujita.m, indassa ta.m vedaya devasaarathii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0439^ea^ ^b^ji.n.naa^eb^ti vidhavaa. ^b^sabhattuu^eb^ti sasaamikaa taru.nitthiyo. ^b^attano^eb^ti taa sabbaapi parapurisesu attano chandaraaga.m uggata.m viditvaa ``ayuttameta.m amhaaka''nti hiriyaa sacitta.m nivaarenti, paapakamma.m na karonti. ^b^patata.m palaayina^eb^nti patantaana~nca palaayantaana~nca antare. ^b^jahitva jiivita^eb^nti ye hirimanto honti, te attano jiivita.m cajitvaa hiriyaa nivattanti, eva.m nivattaa ca pana te hiriimanaa puna attano saamika.m sampa.ticchanti, amittahatthato mocetvaa ga.nhanti. ^b^paapajana.m nivaarinii^eb^ti paapato jana.m nivaarinii, ayameva vaa paa.tho ^a^P5.0411^ea^. ^b^ta^eb^nti ta.m hiri.m. ^b^ariyapuujita^eb^nti ariyehi buddhaadiihi puujita.m. ^b^indassa ta.m vedayaa^eb^ti yasmaa eva.m mahaagu.naa ariyapuujitaavesaa, tasmaa ta.m eva.m uttamaa naamesaati indassa kathehiiti.
[21] ``ko te ima.m kosiya di.t.thimodahi, brahmaa mahindo atha vaa pajaapati.
[22] hiraaya devesu hi se.t.thasammataa, dhiitaa mahindassa mahesi jaayathaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^di.t.thi^eb^nti ``hirii naama mahaagu.naa ariyapuujitaa''ti laddhi.m. ^b^odahii^eb^ti hadaye pavesesi. ^b^se.t.thasammataa^eb^ti tava santike sudhaaya laddhakaalato pa.t.thaaya indassa santike ka~ncanaasana.m labhitvaa sabbadevataahi puujiyamaanaa uttamasammataa jaayatha.

[03] eva.m tasmi.m kathenteyeva kosiyassa ta"nkha.na~n~neva cavanadhammo jaato. atha na.m, maatali, ``kosiya ^a^V5.0407^ea^ aayusa"nkhaaro te ossa.t.tho, cavanadhammopi te sampatto, ki.m te manussalokena, devaloka.m gacchaamaa''ti tattha netukaamo hutvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``handehi daani tidiva.m apakkama, ratha.m samaaruyha mamaayita.m ima.m.
[22] indo ca ta.m indasagotta ka"nkhati, ajjeva tva.m indasahabyata.m vajaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^M5.0440^ea^ ^b^mamaayita^eb^nti piya.m manaapa.m. ^b^indasagottaa^eb^ti purimabhave indena samaanagotta. ^b^ka"nkhatii^eb^ti tavaagamana.m icchanto ka"nkhati.

[03] iti tasmi.m kosiyena saddhi.m kathenteyeva kosiyo cavitvaa opapaatiko devaputto hutvaa aaruyha dibbarathe a.t.thaasi. atha na.m, maatali, sakkassa santika.m nesi. sakko ta.m disvaava tu.t.thamaanaso attano dhiitara.m hiridevi.m tassa aggamahesi.m katvaa adaasi, aparimaa.namassa issariya.m ahosi. tamattha.m viditvaa ``anomasattaana.m kamma.m naama eva.m visujjhatii''ti satthaa osaanagaathamaaha --
[21] ``eva.m visujjhanti apaapakammino, atho suci.n.nassa phala.m na nassati.
[22] ye ^a^P5.0412^ea^ keci maddakkhu sudhaaya bhojana.m, sabbeva te indasahabyata.m gataa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^apaapakammino^eb^ti apaapakammaa sattaa eva.m visujjhanti ^b^ye keci maddakkhuu^eb^ti ye keci sattaa tasmi.m himavantapadese tadaa kosiyena hiriyaa diiyamaana.m sudhaabhojana.m addasa.msu. ^b^sabbeva te^eb^ti te sabbepi ta.m daana.m anumoditvaa citta.m pasaadetvaa indasahabyata.m gataati.

[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepeta.m adaanaabhirata.m thaddhamacchariya.m samaana.m aha.m damesi.myevaa''ti vatvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi ``tadaa hirii devataa uppalava.n.naa ahosi, kosiyo daanapati bhikkhu, pa~ncasikho anuruddho, maatali aanando, suuriyo kassapo, cando moggallaano, naarado saariputto, sakko ahameva ahosi''nti.

[03] ^b^evamakkhaayatii^eb^ti ^a^V5.0408^ea^ ida.m satthaa ku.naaladahe viharanto anabhiratipii.lite pa~ncasate bhikkhuu aarabbha kathesi. tatraaya.m anupubbikathaa -- saakiyakoliyaa ^a^M5.0441^ea^ kira kapilavatthunagarassa ca koliyanagarassa ca antare rohi.ni.m naama nadi.m ekenevaavara.nena bandhaapetvaa sassaani kaarenti. atha je.t.thamuulamaase sassesu milaayantesu ubhayanagaravaasiinampi kammakaaraa sannipati.msu. tattha koliyanagaravaasino vadi.msu -- ``ida.m udaka.m ubhayato niihariyamaana.m neva tumhaaka.m, na amhaaka.m pahossati, amhaaka.m pana sassa.m ekaudakeneva nipphajjissati, ida.m udaka.m amhaaka.m dethaa''ti. kapilavatthuvaasino vadi.msu -- ``tumhesu ko.t.the puuretvaa .thitesu maya.m rattasuva.n.naniilama.nikaa.lakahaapa.ne gahetvaa na sakkhissaama pacchipasibbakaadihatthaa tumhaaka.m gharadvaare vicaritu.m, amhaakampi sassa.m ekeneva udakena nipphajjissati, ida.m udaka.m amhaaka.m dethaa''ti. ``na maya.m dassaamaa''ti? ``mayampi na dassaamaa''ti. eva.m kalaha.m va.d.dhetvaa eko u.t.thaaya ekassa pahaara.m adaasi, sopi a~n~nassaati eva.m a~n~nama~n~na.m paharitvaa raajakulaana.m jaati.m gha.t.tetvaa kalaha.m pavattesu.m.

[03] koliyakammakaaraa vadanti -- ``tumhe kapilavatthuvaasike saakiyadaarake gahetvaa gajjatha ^a^P5.0413^ea^, ye so.nasi"ngaalaadayo viya attano bhaginiihi saddhi.m vasi.msu, etesa.m hatthiassaadayo vaa phalakaavudhaani vaa amhaaka.m ki.m karissantii''ti? saakiyakammakaaraa vadanti -- ``tumhe daani ku.t.thino daarake gahetvaa gajjatha, ye anaathaa niggatikaa tiracchaanaa viya kolarukkhe vasi.msu, etesa.m hatthiassaadayo vaa phalakaavudhaani vaa amhaaka.m ki.m karissantii''ti? te gantvaa tasmi.m kamme niyuttaamaccaana.m kathesu.m, amaccaa raajakulaana.m kathesu.m. tato saakiyaa ``bhaginiihi saddhi.m sa.mvaasikaana.m thaama~nca bala~nca dassessaamaa''ti yuddhasajjaa nikkhami.msu. koliyaapi ``kolarukkhavaasiina.m thaama~nca bala~nca dassessaamaa''ti yuddhasajjaa nikkhami.msu. apare panaacariyaa ``saakiyakoliyaana.m daasiisu udakatthaaya nadi.m gantvaa cumba.taani bhuumiya.m nikkhipitvaa sukhakathaaya sannisinnaasu ekissaa cumba.ta.m ekaa sakasa~n~naaya ga.nhi, ta.m nissaaya `mama cumba.ta.m, tava cumba.ta'nti kalahe pavatte kamena ubhayanagaravaasino daasakammakaaraa ceva sevakagaamabhojakaamaccauparaajaano caati sabbe yuddhasajjaa nikkhami.msuu''ti vadanti. imamhaa pana nayaa purimanayova bahuusu a.t.thakathaasu aagato, yuttaruupo caati sveva gahetabbo.

[03] te ^a^M5.0442^ea^ ^a^V5.0409^ea^ pana saayanhasamaye yuddhasajjaa nikkhamissantiiti tasmi.m samaye bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharanto paccuusasamaye loka.m volokento ime eva.m yuddhasajje nikkhante addasa, disvaa ca ``mayi gate esa kalaho vuupasamissati nu kho, no''ti upadhaarento ``ahamettha gantvaa kalahavuupasamattha.m tii.ni jaatakaani kathessaami, tato kalaho vuupasamissati, atha saamaggidiipanatthaaya dve jaatakaani kathetvaa ^b^attada.n.dasutta.m^eb^ (su0 ni0 941 aadayo) desessaami, desana.m sutvaa ubhayanagaravaasino a.d.dhateyyaani a.d.dhateyyaani kumaarasataani dassanti, aha.m te pabbaajessaami, mahanto samaagamo bhavissatii''ti sanni.t.thaana.m katvaa paatova sariirapa.tijaggana.m katvaa saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto saayanhasamaye gandhaku.tito nikkhamitvaa kassaci anaarocetvaa sayameva pattaciivaramaadaaya dvinna.m senaana.m antare aakaase palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa tesa.m sa.mvegajananattha.m divaa andhakaara.m kaatu.m kesara.msiyo vissajjento nisiidi. atha nesa.m sa.mviggamaanasaana.m attaana.m dassento chabba.n.naa buddhara.msiyo vissajjesi. kapilavatthuvaasinopi bhagavanta.m disvaa ``amhaaka.m ~naatise.t.tho satthaa aagato, di.t.tho nu kho tena amhaaka.m kalahakara.nabhaavo''ti cintetvaa ``na kho pana sakkaa satthari aagate amhehi parassa sariire sattha.m paatetu.m, koliyanagaravaasino amhe hanantu ^a^P5.0414^ea^ vaa bajjhantu vaa''ti aavudhaani cha.d.desu.m. koliyanagaravaasinopi tatheva aka.msu.

[03] atha bhagavaa otaritvaa rama.niiye padese vaalukapuline pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisiidi anopamaaya buddhasiriyaa virocamaano. tepi raajaano bhagavanta.m vanditvaa nisiidi.msu. atha ne satthaa jaanantova ``kasmaa aagatattha, mahaaraajaa''ti pucchi. ``neva, bhante, nadidassanatthaaya, na kii.lanatthaaya, apica kho pana imasmi.m .thaane sa"ngaama.m paccupa.t.thaapetvaa aagatamhaa''ti. ``ki.m nissaaya vo kalaho, mahaaraajaa''ti? ``udaka.m nissaaya bhante''ti. ``udaka.m ki.m agghati mahaaraajaa''ti? ``appaggha.m, bhante''ti. ``pathavii naama ki.m agghati, mahaaraajaa''ti? ``anagghaa, bhante''ti. ``khattiyaa ki.m agghanti, mahaaraajaa''ti? ``khattiyaa naama anagghaa, bhante''ti. ``appaggha.m udaka.m nissaaya kasmaa anagghe khattiye naasetha, mahaaraaja, kalahasmi~nhi assaado ^a^M5.0443^ea^ naama natthi, kalahavasena hi mahaaraajaa ekaaya rukkhadevataaya kaa.lasiihena saddhi.m baddhaaghaato sakalampi ima.m kappa.m anuppattoyevaa''ti vatvaa ^b^phandanajaataka.m^eb^ (jaa0 1.13.14 aadayo) kathesi. tato ``parapattiyena naama mahaaraajaa na bhavitabba.m, parapattiyaa hi hutvaa ekassa sasassa kathaaya tiyojanasahassavitthate himavante catuppadaga.naa mahaasamudda.m pakkhandino ahesu.m, tasmaa parapattiyena na bhavitabba''nti vatvaa ^b^daddarajaataka.m^eb^ (jaa0 1.243-44; 1.4.13-16; 1.9.105 aadayo) kathesi. tato ``kadaaci mahaaraajaa dubbalopi ^a^V5.0410^ea^ mahabbalassa randha.m passati, kadaaci mahabbalopi dubbalassa randha.m passati, la.tukikaapi hi saku.nikaa hatthinaaga.m ghaatesii''ti vatvaa ^b^la.tukikajaataka.m^eb^ (jaa0 1.5.39 aadayo) kathesi. eva.m kalahavuupasamanatthaaya tii.ni jaatakaani kathetvaa saamaggiparidiipanatthaaya dve jaatakaani kathesi. ``samaggaana~nhi mahaaraajaa koci otaara.m naama passitu.m na sakkotii''ti vatvaa ^b^rukkhadhammajaataka.m^eb^ (jaa0 1.1.74) kathesi. tato ``samaggaana.m mahaaraajaa koci vivara.m passitu.m naasakkhi, yadaa pana a~n~nama~n~na.m vivaadamaka.msu, atha ne eko nesaadaputto jiivitakkhaya.m paapetvaa aadaaya gato, vivaade assaado naama natthii''ti vatvaa ^b^va.t.takajaataka.m^eb^ (jaa0 1.1.35, 118; 1.6.128-133) kathesi. eva.m imaani pa~nca jaatakaani kathetvaa avasaane ^b^attada.n.dasutta.m^eb^ (su0 ni0 941 aadayo) kathesi.

[03] atha raajaano pasannaa ``sace satthaa naagamissa, maya.m a~n~nama~n~na.m vadhitvaa lohitanadi.m pavattayissaama, satthaara.m nissaaya no jiivita.m laddha.m. sace pana satthaa agaara.m ajjhaavasissa, dvisahassadiipaparivaara.m catumahaadiiparajja.m hatthagata.m abhavissa, atirekasahassa.m kho panassa puttaa abhavissa.msu, tato khattiyaparivaarova avicarissa, ta.m kho panesa sampatti.m pahaaya nikkhamitvaa ^a^P5.0415^ea^ sambodhi.m patto, idaanipi khattiyaparivaarova vicaratuu''ti ubhayanagaravaasino a.d.dhateyyaani a.d.dhateyyaani kumaarasataani ada.msu. bhagavaa te pabbaajetvaa mahaavana.m agamaasi. punadivasato pa.t.thaaya tehi parivuto ekadaa kapilavatthunagare ekadaa koliyanagareti dviisu nagaresu pi.n.daaya carati. ubhayanagaravaasino mahaasakkaara.m kari.msu. tesa.m garugaaravena na attano ruciyaa pabbajitaana.m anabhirati uppajji. puraa.nadutiyikaayopi nesa.m anabhiratijananatthaaya ^a^M5.0444^ea^ ta.m ta.m vatvaa saasana.m pesesu.m. te atirekatara.m ukka.n.thi.msu. bhagavaa aavajjento tesa.m anabhiratabhaava.m ~natvaa ``ime bhikkhuu maadisena buddhena saddhi.m ekato vasantaa ukka.n.thanti, katha.m ruupaa nu kho tesa.m dhammakathaa sappaayaa''ti upadhaarento ku.naaladhammadesana.m passi. athassa etadahosi -- ``aha.m ime bhikkhuu himavanta.m netvaa ku.naalakathaaya nesa.m maatugaamadosa.m pakaasetvaa anabhirati.m haritvaa sotaapattimagga.m dassaamii''ti.

[03] so pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kapilavatthu.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto bhattakiccavelaayameva te pa~ncasate bhikkhuu aamantetvaa ``di.t.thapubbo vo, bhikkhave, rama.niiyo himavantapadeso''ti pucchi. ``noheta.m, bhante''ti. ``gacchissatha pana himavantacaarika''nti? ``bhante, aniddhimanto maya.m katha.m gamissaamaa''ti. ``sace pana vo koci gahetvaa gaccheyya, gaccheyyaathaa''ti? ``aama, bhante''ti. satthaa sabbepi te attano iddhiyaa ^a^V5.0411^ea^ gahetvaa aakaase uppatitvaa himavanta.m gantvaa gaganatale .thitova rama.niiye himavantapadese ka~ncanapabbata.m rajatapabbata.m ma.nipabbata.m hi"ngulikapabbata.m a~njanapabbata.m saanupabbata.m phalikapabbatanti naanaavidhe pabbate, pa~nca mahaanadiyo, ka.n.namu.n.daka.m rathakaara.m siihapapaata.m chaddanta.m tiyagga.la.m anotatta.m ku.naaladahanti satta dahe dassesi. himavanto ca naama mahaa pa~ncayojanasatubbedho tiyojanasahassavitthato, tassa ima.m rama.niiya.m ekadesa.m attano aanubhaavena dassesi. tattha katanivaasaani siihabyagghahatthikulaadiini catuppadaanipi ekadesato dassesi. tattha aaraamaraama.neyyakaadiini pupphuupagaphaluupage rukkhe naanaavidhe saku.nasa"nghe jalajathalajapupphaani himavantassa puratthimapasse suva.n.natala.m, pucchimapasse hi"ngulatala.m dassesi. imesa.m raama.neyyakaana.m di.t.thakaalato pa.t.thaaya tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m puraa.nadutiyikaasu chandaraago pahiino.

[03] atha satthaa te bhikkhuu gahetvaa aakaasato ^a^P5.0416^ea^ otaritvaa himavantapacchimapasse sa.t.thiyojanike manosilaatale sattayojanikassa kappa.t.thikasaalarukkhassa he.t.thaa tiyojanikaaya manosilaatalaaya tehi bhikkhuuhi parivuto chabba.n.narasmiyo vissajjento a.n.navakucchi.m khobhetvaa jalamaano suuriyo viya nisiiditvaa madhurassara.m nicchaarento ^a^M5.0445^ea^ te bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhave, imasmi.m himavante tumhehi adi.t.thapubba.m pucchathaa''ti. tasmi.m kha.ne dve citrakokilaa ubhosu ko.tiisu da.n.daka.m mukhena .da.msitvaa majjhe attano saamika.m nisiidaapetvaa a.t.tha citrakokilaa purato, a.t.tha pacchato, a.t.tha vaamato, a.t.tha dakkhi.nato, a.t.tha he.t.thaa, a.t.tha upari chaaya.m katvaa eva.m citrakokila.m parivaaretvaa aakaasenaagacchanti. atha te bhikkhuu ta.m saku.nasa"ngha.m disvaa satthaara.m pucchi.msu -- ``ke naamete, bhante saku.naa''ti? ``bhikkhave, esa mama poraa.nako va.mso, mayaa .thapitaa pave.nii, ma.m taava pubbe eva.m paricari.msu, tadaa panesa saku.naga.no mahaa ahosi, a.d.dhu.d.dhaani dijaka~n~naasahassaani ma.m paricari.msu. anupubbena parihaayitvaa idaani ettako jaato''ti. ``katha.m evaruupe pana, bhante, vanasa.n.de etaa dijaka~n~naayo tumhe paricari.msuu''ti? atha nesa.m satthaa ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naathaa''ti sati.m upa.t.thaapetvaa atiita.m aaharitvaa dassento aaha --

[02] ``evamakkhaayati evamanusuuyati, sabbosadhadhara.nidhare nekapupphamaalyavitate gajagavajamahi.msarurucamarapasadakhaggagoka.n.nasiihabyagghadiipiacchakokataracchauddaarakadali- migabi.laarasasaka.n.nikaanucarite aaki.n.nanelama.n.dalamahaavaraahanaagakulakare.nusa"nghaadhivu.t.the issamigasaakhamigasarabhamigae.niimigavaatamigapasadamigapurisaalukimpurisayakkharakkha- sanisevite amajjavama~njariidharapaha.t.thapupphaphusitaggaanekapaadapaga.navitake ^a^V5.0412^ea^ kuraracakoravaara.namayuuraparabhatajiiva~njiivakacelaavakabhi"nkaarakaraviikamattaviha"ngaga.nasatatasampaghu.t.the a~njanamanosilaaharitaalahi"ngulakahemarajatakanakaanekadhaatu- satavinaddhapa.tima.n.ditapadese evaruupe khalu, bho, ramme vanasa.n.de ku.naalo naama saku.no pa.tivasati ativiya ^a^P5.0417^ea^ citto ativiya cittapattacchadano''.

[02] ``tasseva khalu, bho, ku.naalassa saku.nassa a.d.dhu.d.dhaani itthisahassaani paricaarikaa dijaka~n~naayo, atha khalu, bho, dve dijaka~n~naayo ka.t.tha.m mukhena .da.msitvaa ta.m ku.naala.m saku.na.m majjhe nisiidaapetvaa u.d.dentimaa na.m ku.naala.m saku.na.m addhaanapariyaayapathe kilamatho ubbaahetthaa''ti.
[02] ``pa~ncasataa ^a^M5.0446^ea^ dijaka~n~naayo he.t.thato he.t.thato u.d.denti `sacaaya.m ku.naalo saku.no aasanaa paripatissati, maya.m ta.m pakkhehi pa.tiggahessaamaa'ti.
[02] ``pa~ncasataa dijaka~n~naayo uparuupari u.d.denti `maa na.m ku.naala.m saku.na.m aatapo paritaapesii'ti.
[02] ``pa~ncasataa dijaka~n~naayo ubhatopassena u.d.denti `maa na.m ku.naala.m saku.na.m siita.m vaa u.nha.m vaa ti.na.m vaa rajo vaa vaato vaa ussaavo vaa upapphusii'ti.

[02] ``pa~ncasataa dijaka~n~naayo purato purato u.d.denti `maa na.m ku.naala.m saku.na.m gopaalakaa vaa pasupaalakaa vaa ti.nahaarakaa vaa ka.t.thahaarakaa vaa vanakammikaa vaa ka.t.thena vaa ka.thalena vaa paa.ninaa vaa le.d.dunaa vaa da.n.dena vaa satthena vaa sakkharaahi vaa pahaara.m ada.msu, maaya.m ku.naalo saku.no gacchehi vaa lataahi vaa rukkhehi vaa saakhaahi vaa thambhehi vaa paasaa.nehi vaa balavantehi vaa pakkhiihi sa"ngamesii'ti.
[02] ``pa~ncasataa dijaka~n~naayo pacchato pacchato u.d.denti sa.nhaahi sakhilaahi ma~njuuhi madhuraahi vaacaahi samudaacarantiyo `maaya.m ku.naalo saku.no aasane pariyukka.n.thii'ti.
[02] ``pa~ncasataa ^a^V5.0413^ea^ dijaka~n~naayo disodisa.m u.d.denti anekarukkhavividhavikatiphalamaaharantiyo `maaya.m ku.naalo saku.no khudaaya parikilamitthaa'ti.

[02] ``atha khalu, bho, taa dijaka~n~naayo ta.m ku.naala.m saku.na.m aaraameneva aaraama.m, uyyaaneneva uyyaana.m, nadiitittheneva nadiitittha.m, pabbatasikhareneva pabbatasikhara.m, ambavaneneva ambavana.m, jambuvaneneva jambuvana.m, labujavaneneva labujavana.m, naa.likerasa~ncaariyeneva naa.likerasa~ncaariya.m khippameva abhisambhonti ratitthaaya.

[02] ``atha ^a^M5.0447^ea^ khalu, bho, ku.naalo saku.no taahi dijaka~n~naahi divasa.m paribyuu.lho eva.m apasaadeti ^a^P5.0418^ea^ `nassatha tumhe vasaliyo, vinassatha tumhe vasiliyo coriyo dhuttiyo asatiyo lahucittaayo katassa appa.tikaarikaayo anilo viya yenakaama.mgamaayo''' ti.

[03] tatraaya.m atthava.n.nanaa -- bhikkhave, so vanasa.n.do eva.m akkhaayati eva~nca anusuuyati. kinti? sabbosadhadhara.nidhareti vitthaaro. tattha ^b^sabbosadhadhara.nidhare^eb^ti muulatacapattapupphaadisabbosadhadharaaya dhara.niyaa samannaagateti attho, sabbosadhayutto vaa dhara.nidharo. so hi padeso sabbosadhadhara.nidharoti evamakkhaayati eva~nca anusuuyati, tasmi.m vanasa.n.deti vutta.m hoti. sesapadayojanaayapi eseva nayo. ^b^nekapupphamaalyavitate^eb^ti anekehi phalatthaaya uppannapupphehi ceva pi.landhanamaalyehi ca vitate. ^b^ruruu^eb^ti suva.n.nava.n.naa migaa. ^b^uddaaraa^eb^ti uddaa. ^b^bi.laaraa^eb^ti mahaabi.laaraa. ^b^nelama.n.dala.m^eb^ vuccati taru.nabhi"nkacchaapama.n.dala.m. ^b^mahaavaraahaa^eb^ti mahaahatthino, aaki.n.nanelama.n.dalamahaavaraahena gocariyaadibhedena dasavidhena naagakulena ceva kare.nusa"nghena ca adhivu.t.theti attho. ^b^issamigaa^eb^ti kaa.lasiihaa. ^b^vaatamigaa^eb^ti mahaavaatamigaa. ^b^pasadamigaa^eb^ti citramigaa. ^b^purisaaluu^eb^ti va.lavaamukhayakkhiniyo. ^b^kimpurisaa^eb^ti devakinnaracandakinnaradumakinnarada.n.damaa.navakakonti- saku.naka.n.napaavura.naadibhedaa kinnaraa. ^b^amajjavama~njariidharapaha.t.thapupphaphusitaggaanekapaadapaga.navitate^eb^ti makuladharehi ceva ma~njariidharehi ca supupphitehi ca aggamattapupphitehi ca anekehi paadapaga.nehi vitate. ^b^vaara.naa^eb^ naama hatthili"ngasaku.naa. ^b^celaavakaa^eb^tipi ete saku.naayeva. ^b^hema~nca kanaka~ncaa^eb^ti dve suva.n.najaatiyo. etehi a~njanaadiihi anekadhaatusatehi anekehi va.n.nadhaaturaasiihi vinaddhapa.tima.n.ditapadese. ^b^bho^eb^ti dhammaalapanamattameta.m. ^b^citto^eb^ti mukhatu.n.dakepi he.t.thaaudarabhaagepi citrova.

[03] ^b^a.d.dhu.d.dhaanii^eb^ti ^a^V5.0414^ea^ a.d.dhacatutthaani, tii.ni sahassaani pa~nceva sataaniiti attho. ^b^addhaanapariyaayapathe^eb^ti addhaanasa"nkhaate gamanamagge. ^b^ubbaahetthaa^eb^ti ^a^M5.0448^ea^ baadhayittha. ^b^upapphusii^eb^ti upagantvaa phusi. ^b^pahaara.m ada.msuu^eb^ti ettha ``maa na''nti padassa saamivasena attho veditabbo. ^b^sa"ngamesii^eb^ti samaagacchi. ^b^sa.nhaahii^eb^ti ma.t.thaahi. ^b^sakhilaahii^eb^ti piyaahi. ^b^ma~njuuhii^eb^ti sakhilaahi. ^b^madhuraahii^eb^ti madhurassaraahi. ^b^samudaacarantiyo^eb^ti gandhabbakara.navasena paricarantiyo. ^b^anekarukkhavividhavikatiphala^eb^nti anekehi rukkhehi vividhavikatiphala.m. ^b^aaraameneva aaraama^eb^nti pupphaaraamaadiisu a~n~natarena aaraameneva a~n~natara.m aaraama.m nentiiti attho. ^b^uyyaanaa^eb^diisupi eseva nayo. ^b^naa.likerasa~ncaariyenevaa^eb^ti naa.likeravaneneva a~n~na.m naa.likeravana.m. ^b^atisambhontii^eb^ti eva.m netvaa tattha na.m khippa~n~neva ^a^P5.0419^ea^ ratitthaaya paapu.nanti.

[03] ^b^divasa.m paribyuu.lho^eb^ti sakaladivasa.m paribyuu.lho. ^b^apasaadetii^eb^ti taa kira ta.m eva.m divasa.m paricaritvaa nivaasarukkhe otaaretvaa parivaaretvaa rukkhasaakhaasu nisiiditvaa ``appeva naama madhuravacana.m labheyyaamaa''ti patthayantiyo iminaa uyyojitakaale attano vasana.t.thaana.m gamissaamaati vasanti. ku.naalaraajaa pana taa uyyojento ``nassathaa''tiaadivacanehi apasaadeti. tattha ^b^nassathaa^eb^ti gacchatha. ^b^vinassathaa^eb^ti sabbatobhaagena nassatha. gehe dhanadha~n~naadiina.m naasanena ^b^coriyo,^eb^ bahumaayataaya ^b^dhuttiyo,^eb^ na.t.thassatitaaya ^b^asatiyo,^eb^ anava.t.thitacittataaya ^b^lahucittaayo,^eb^ katavinaasanena mittadubbhitaaya ^b^katassa appa.tikaarikaayo^eb^ti.

[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa ``iti kho, bhikkhave, aha.m tiracchaanagatopi itthiina.m akata~n~nuta.m bahumaayata.m anaacaarata.m dussiilata~nca jaanaami, tadaapaaha.m taasa.m vase avattitvaa taa eva attano vase vattemii''ti imaaya kathaaya tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m anabhirati.m haritvaa satthaa tu.nhii ahosi. tasmi.m kha.ne dve kaa.lakokilaa saamika.m da.n.dakena ukkhipitvaa he.t.thaabhaagaadiisu catasso catasso hutvaa ta.m padesa.m aagami.msu. te bhikkhuu taapi disvaa satthaara.m pucchi.msu. satthaa ``pubbe, bhikkhave, mama sahaayo pu.n.namukho naama phussakokilo ahosi, tassaaya.m va.mso''ti vatvaa purimanayeneva tehi bhikkhuuhi pucchito aaha --

[03] tattha su.t.thu sukhumasa.nhasalilataaya susukhumasunipu.naa, giri etaasa.m pabhavoti girippabhavaa ^a^V5.0415^ea^, himavantato sandamaanaharitati.namissaoghataaya haritaa, ku.naaladaha.m upagamanena upayantiyoti ^b^susukhumasunipu.nagirippabhavaharitupayantiyo,^eb^ evaruupaa nadiyo yasmi.m sandantiiti attho.
[03] idaani ya.m ku.naaladaha.m taa upayanti, tattha pupphaani va.n.nento aaha --

[03] tattha ^b^uppala^eb^nti niiluppala.m. ^b^nalina^eb^nti setapaduma.m. ^b^satapatta^eb^nti paripu.n.nasatapattapaduma.m. ^b^sampatii^eb^ti etehi sampativiru.lhehi abhinavajaatehi sucigandhena ceva manu~n~nena ca hadayabandhanasamatthataaya maavakena ca padesena samannaagateti attho.
[03] idaani tasmi.m dahe rukkhaadayo va.n.nento aaha --

[02] ``kuravakamucalindaketakavedisava~njulapunnaagabakulatilakapiyakahasanasaalasa.lala- campakaasokanaagarukkhatirii.tibhujapattaloddacandanoghavane ^a^P5.0420^ea^ kaa.laagarupadmakapiya"ngudevadaarukacocagahane kakudhaku.tajaa"nkolakaccikaaraka.nikaaraka.n.nikaara- kanaverakora.n.dakakovi.laaraki.msukayodhikavanamallikamana"nga.namanavajjabha.n.disurucira- bhaginimaalaamalyadhare jaatisumanamadhugandhikadhanutakkaaritaaliisatagaramusiirako.t.thakacchavitate atimuttakasa.mkusumitalataavitatapa.tima.n.ditappadese ha.msapilavakaadambakaara.n.davaabhinadite vijjaadharasiddhasama.nataapasaga.naadhivu.t.the varadevayakkharakkhasadaanavagandhabbakinnaramahoragaanuci.n.nappadese -- evaruupe khalu, bho, ramme vanasa.n.de pu.n.namukho naama phussakokilo pativasati ativiya madhuragiro vilaasitanayano mattakkho.

[02] ``tasseva ^a^M5.0450^ea^ khalu, bho, pu.n.namukhassa phussakokilassa a.d.dhu.d.dhaani itthisataani paricaarikaa dijaka~n~naayo. atha khalu, bho, dve dijaka~n~naayo ka.t.tha.m mukhena .da.msitvaa ta.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m majjhe nisiidaapetvaa u.d.denti `maa na.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m addhaanapariyaayapathe kilamatho ubbaahetthaa'ti.
[02] ``pa~n~naasa ^a^V5.0416^ea^ dijaka~n~naayo he.t.thato he.t.thato u.d.denti `sacaaya.m pu.n.namukho phussakokilo saku.no aasanaa paripatissati, maya.m ta.m pakkhehi pa.tiggahessaamaa'ti.
[02] ``pa~n~naasa dijaka~n~naayo uparuupari u.d.denti `maa na.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m aatapo paritaapesii'ti.
[02] ``pa~n~naasa pa~n~naasa dijaka~n~naayo ubhatopassena u.d.denti `maana.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m siita.m vaa u.nha.m vaa ti.na.m vaa rajo vaa vaato vaa ussaavo vaa upapphusii'ti.

[02] ``pa~n~naasa dijaka~n~naayo purato purato u.d.denti `maa na.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m gopaalakaa vaa pasupaalakaa vaa ti.nahaarakaa vaa ka.t.thahaarakaa vaa vanakammikaa vaa ka.t.thena vaa ka.thalaaya vaa paa.ninaa vaa le.d.dunaa vaa da.n.dena vaa satthena vaa sakkharaahi vaa pahaaramada.msu, maaya.m pu.n.namukho phussakokilo gacchehi vaa lataahi vaa rukkhehi vaa saakhaahi vaa thambhehi vaa paasaa.nehi vaa balavantehi vaa pakkhiihi sa"ngamesii'ti.

[02] ``pa~n~naasa dijaka~n~naayo pacchato pacchato u.d.denti sa.nhaahi sakhilaahi ^a^P5.0421^ea^ ma~njuuhi madhuraahi vaacaahi samudaacarantiyo `maaya.m pu.n.namukho phussakokilo aasane pariyukka.n.thii'ti.
[02] ``pa~n~naasa dijaka~n~naayo disodisa.m u.d.denti anekarukkhavividhavikatiphalamaaharantiyo `maaya.m pu.n.namukho phussakokilo khudaaya parikilamitthaa'ti.

[02] ``atha khalu, bho, taa dijaka~n~naayo ta.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m aaraameneva aaraama.m, uyyaaneneva uyyaana.m, nadiitittheneva ^a^M5.0451^ea^ nadiitittha.m, pabbatasikhareneva pabbatasikhara.m, ambavaneneva ambavana.m, jambuvaneneva jambuvana.m, labujavaneneva labujavana.m, naa.likerasa~ncaariyeneva naa.likerasa~ncaariya.m khippameva abhisambhonti ratitthaaya.

[02] ``atha khalu, bho, pu.n.namukho phussakokilo taahi dijaka~n~naahi divasa.m paribyuu.lho ^a^V5.0417^ea^ eva.m pasa.msati `saadhu saadhu, bhaginiyo, eta.m kho bhaginiyo tumhaaka.m patiruupa.m kuladhiitaana.m, ya.m tumhe bhattaara.m paricareyyaathaa'ti.

[02] ``atha khalu, bho, pu.n.namukho phussakokilo yena ku.naalo saku.no tenupasa"nkami. addasa.msu kho ku.naalassa saku.nassa paricaarikaa dijaka~n~naayo ta.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana yena pu.n.namukho phussakokilo tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m etadavocu.m -- `aya.m, samma pu.n.namukha, ku.naalo saku.no ativiya pharuso ativiya pharusavaaco, appeva naama tavampi aagamma piyavaaca.m labheyyaamaa'ti. `appeva naama bhaginiyo'ti vatvaa yena ku.naalo saku.no tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ku.naalena saku.nena saddhi.m pa.tisammoditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho pu.n.namukho phussakokilo ta.m ku.naala.m saku.na.m etadavoca -- `kissa tva.m, samma ku.naala, itthiina.m sujaataana.m kuladhiitaana.m sammaapa.tipannaana.m micchaapa.tipannosi, amanaapabhaa.niinampi kira, samma ku.naala, itthiina.m manaapabhaa.ninaa bhavitabba.m, kima"nga.m pana manaapabhaa.niina'nti.

[02] ``eva.m vutte ku.naalo saku.no ta.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m eva.m apasaadesi -- `nassa tva.m, samma jamma vasala, vinassa tva.m, samma jamma vasala, ko nu tayaa viyatto jaayaajinenaa'ti. eva.m apasaadito ca pana pu.n.namukho phussakokilo tatoyeva ^a^P5.0422^ea^ pa.tinivatti.

[02] ``atha ^a^M5.0452^ea^ khalu, bho, pu.n.namukhassa phussakokilassa aparena samayena nacirasseva kharo aabaadho uppajji, lohitapakkhandikaa baa.lhaa vedanaa vattanti maara.nantikaa. atha khalu, bho, pu.n.namukhassa phussakokilassa paricaarikaana.m dijaka~n~naana.m etadahosi -- `aabaadhiko kho aya.m pu.n.namukho phussakokilo, appeva naama imamhaa aabaadhaa vu.t.thaheyyaa'ti eka.m adutiya.m ohaaya yena ku.naalo saku.no tenupasa"nkami.msu. addasaa kho ku.naalo saku.no taa dijaka~n~naayo duuratova aagacchantiyo, disvaana taa dijaka~n~naayo etadavoca -- `kaha.m pana tumha.m vasaliyo bhattaa'ti. `aabaadhiko kho, samma ku.naala, pu.n.namukho phussakokilo appeva naama tamhaa aabaadhaa vu.t.thaheyyaa'ti. eva.m vutte ku.naalo saku.no taa dijaka~n~naayo eva.m apasaadesi -- `nassatha tumhe vasaliyo, vinassatha tumhe vasaliyo coriyo dhuttiyo asatiyo lahucittaayo katassa appa.tikaarikaayo ^a^V5.0418^ea^ anilo viya yenakaama.mgamaayo'ti vatvaa yena pu.n.namukho phussakokilo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m etadavoca -- `ha.m, samma, pu.n.namukhaa'ti. `ha.m, samma, ku.naalaa'ti.

[02] ``atha khalu, bho, ku.naalo saku.no ta.m pu.n.namukha.m phussakokila.m pakkhehi ca mukhatu.n.dakena ca pariggahetvaa vu.t.thaapetvaa naanaabhesajjaani paayaapesi. atha khalu, bho, pu.n.namukhassa phussakokilassa so aabaadho pa.tippassambhii''ti.

[03] tattha ^b^piyakaa^eb^ti setapupphaa. ^b^hasanaa^eb^ti ^b^ha^eb^-kaaro sandhikaro, asanaayeva. ^b^tirii.tii^eb^ti ekaa rukkhajaati. ^b^candanaa^eb^ti rattasurabhicandanaa. ^b^oghavane^eb^ti etesa.m oghena gha.taaya samannaagatavane. ^b^devadaarukacocagahane^eb^ti devadaarurukkhehi ceva kadaliihi ca gahane. ^b^kaccikaaraa^eb^ti ekaa rukkhajaati. ^b^ka.nikaaraa^eb^ti mahaapupphaa. ^b^ka.n.nikaaraa^eb^ti khuddakapupphaa. ^b^ki.msukaa^eb^ti vaataghaatakaa. ^b^yodhikaa^eb^ti yuuthikaa. ^b^vanamallikamana"nga.namanavajjabha.n.disurucirabhaginimaalaamalyadhare^eb^ti mallikaana~nca ana"nga.naana.m ^a^M5.0453^ea^ anavajjaana~nca bha.n.diina.m suruciraana~nca bhaginiina.m pupphehi maalyadhaarayamaane. ^b^dhanutakkaarii^eb^ti dhanupaa.tali. ^b^taaliisaa^eb^ti taaliisapattarukkhaa. ^b^kacchavitate^eb^ti etehi jaatisumanaadiihi vitate nadikacchapabbatakacche. ^b^sa.mkusumitalataa^eb^ti tesu tesu .thaanesu su.t.thu kusumitaatimuttakehi ceva naanaavidhalataahi ca vitatapa.tima.n.ditapadese. ^b^ga.naadhivu.t.the^eb^ti etesa.m vijjaadharaadiina.m ga.nehi adhivu.t.the. ^b^pu.n.namukho^eb^ti mukhaparipu.n.nataaya pu.n.namukho. parehi ^a^P5.0423^ea^ phu.t.thataaya ^b^phussakokilo. vilaasitanayano^eb^ti vilaasitanetto. ^b^mattakkho^eb^ti yathaa mattaana.m akkhiini rattaani honti, eva.m rattakkho, pamaa.nayuttanetto vaa.

[03] ^b^bhaginiyo^eb^ti ariyavohaarena aalapana.m. ^b^paricareyyaathaa^eb^ti sakaladivasa.m gahetvaa vicareyyaatha. iti so piyakatha.m kathetvaa uyyojeti. kadaaci pana ku.naalo saparivaaro pu.n.namukha.m dassanaaya gacchati, kadaaci pu.n.namukho ku.naalassa santika.m aagacchati. tenaaha ^b^``atha khalu, bho''^eb^ti. ^b^sammaa^eb^ti vayassa. ^b^aagammaa^eb^ti pa.ticca upanissaaya. ^b^labheyyaamaa^eb^ti ku.naalassa santikaa piyavacana.m labheyyaama. ^b^appeva naamaa^eb^ti api naama labheyyaatha, vakkhaami nanti. ^b^sujaataana^eb^nti samajaatikaana.m.

[03] ^b^nassaa^eb^ti palaaya. ^b^jammaa^eb^ti laamaka. ^b^viyatto^eb^ti ko nu tayaa sadiso a~n~no byatto naama atthi. ^b^jaayaajinenaa^eb^ti jaayaajitena, ayameva vaa paa.tho. eva.m itthiparaajitena tayaa sadiso ^a^V5.0419^ea^ ko naama byatto atthiiti ta.m puna evaruupassa vacanassa abha.nanatthaaya apasaadeti. ^b^tatoyevaa^eb^ti ``kuddho me ku.naalo''ti cintetvaa tatoyeva pa.tinivatti, so nivattitvaa saparivaaro attano nivaasa.t.thaanameva agamaasi.

[03] ^b^appeva naamaa^eb^ti sa.msayaparivitakko, imamhaa aabaadhaa vu.t.thaheyya vaa no vaati eva.m cintetvaa ta.m ohaaya pakkami.msu. ^b^tumha^eb^nti tumhaaka.m. ^b^appeva naamaa^eb^ti tamhaa aabaadhaa vu.t.thaheyya vaa no vaa, amhaaka.m aagatakaale mato bhavissati. maya~nhi idaaneva so marissatiiti ~natvaa tumhaaka.m paadaparicaarikaa bhavitu.m aagataa. ^b^tenupasa"nkamii^eb^ti imaa itthiyo saamikassa ^a^M5.0454^ea^ matakaale aagataa pa.tikkuulaa bhavissaamaati ta.m pahaaya aagataa, aha.m gantvaa mama sahaayaka.m pupphaphalaadiini naanaabhesajjaani sa.mharitvaa aroga.m karissaamiiti cintetvaa naagabalo mahaasatto aakaase uppatitvaa yena so tenupasa"nkami. ^b^ha^eb^nti nipaato, ``jiivasi, sammaa''ti pucchanto evamaaha. itaropissa ``jiivaamii''ti vadanto ^b^``ha.m sammaa''^eb^ti aaha. ^b^paayaapesii^eb^ti paayesi. ^b^pa.tippassambhii^eb^ti vuupasamiiti.
