[03] atha mahaasatto ``aya.m ma.m eva.m pucchati, aha.m kho paneta.m `ra~n~no ~naatii'tipi `ra~n~no uttaritaro'tipi `ra~n~no na ki~nci homii'tipi sa~n~naapetu.m sakkomi, eva.m santepi imasmi.m loke ^a^V7.0178^ea^ saccasamo avassayo ^a^P6.0285^ea^ naama natthi, saccameva kathetu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa ``maa.nava, nevaaha.m ra~n~no ~naati, na uttaritaro, catunna.m pana daasaana.m a~n~nataro''ti dassetu.m gaathaadvayamaaha --
[21] ``aamaayadaasaapi bhavanti heke, dhanena kiitaapi bhavanti daasaa.
[22] sayampi heke upayanti daasaa, bhayaa pa.nunnaapi bhavanti daasaa..
[21] ``ete naraana.m caturova daasaa, addhaa hi yonito ahampi jaato.
[27] bhavo ca ra~n~no abhavo ca ra~n~no, daasaaha.m devassa parampi gantvaa.

[03] tattha ^b^aamaayadaasaa^eb^ti daasiyaa kucchimhi jaatadaasaa. ^b^sayampi heke upayanti daasaa^eb^ti ye keci upa.t.thaakajaatikaa, sabbe te saya.m daasabhaava.m upagataa daasaa naama. ^b^bhayaa pa.nunnaa^eb^ti raajabhayena vaa corabhayena vaa attano vasana.t.thaanato pa.nunnaa karamaraa hutvaa paravisaya.m gataapi daasaayeva naama. ^b^addhaa hi yonito ahampi jaato^eb^ti maa.nava, eka.mseneva ahampi catuusu daasayoniisu ekato saya.m daasayonito nibbattadaaso. ^b^bhavo ca ra~n~no abhavo ca ra~n~no^eb^ti ra~n~no ^a^M7.0187^ea^ vu.d.dhi vaa hotu avu.d.dhi vaa, na sakkaa mayaa musaa bhaasitu.m. ^b^parampii^eb^ti duura.m gantvaapi aha.m devassa daasoyeva. ^b^dajjaa^eb^ti ma.m raajaa jayadhanena kha.n.detvaa tuyha.m dento dhammena sabhaavena dadeyyaati.
[03] ta.m sutvaa pu.n.nako ha.t.thatu.t.tho puna appho.tetvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``aya.m dutiiyo vijayo mamajja, pu.t.tho hi kattaa vivarettha pa~nha.m.
[22] adhammaruupo vata raajase.t.tho, subhaasita.m naanujaanaasi mayha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^raajase.t.tho^eb^ti aya.m raajase.t.tho adhammaruupo vata. ^b^subhaasita^eb^nti vidhurapa.n.ditena sukathita.m suvinicchita.m. ^b^naanujaanaasi mayha^eb^nti idaaneta.m vidhurapa.n.dita.m mayha.m kasmaa naanujaanaasi, kimattha.m na desiiti vadati.

[03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa anattamano hutvaa ``pa.n.dito maadisa.m yasadaayaka.m anoloketvaa idaani di.t.tha.m ^a^V7.0179^ea^ maa.navaka.m oloketii''ti mahaasattassa kujjhitvaa ``maa.nava, sace so daaso me bhaveyya, ta.m gahetvaa gacchaa''ti vatvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``eva.m ^a^P6.0286^ea^ ce no so vivarettha pa~nha.m, daasohamasmi na ca khosmi ~naati.
[22] ga.nhaahi kaccaana vara.m dhanaana.m, aadaaya yenicchasi tena gacchaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^eva.m ce no so vivarettha pa~nha^eb^nti sace so amhaaka.m pa~nha.m ``daasohamasmi, na ca khosmi ~naatii''ti eva.m vivari ettha parisama.n.dale, atha ki.m acchasi, sakalaloke dhanaana.m vara.m eta.m ga.nha, gahetvaa ca pana yena icchasi, tena gacchaati.

[03] eva~nca ^a^M7.0188^ea^ pana vatvaa raajaa cintesi ``pa.n.dita.m gahetvaa maa.navo yathaaruci gamissati, tassa gatakaalato pa.t.thaaya mayha.m madhuradhammakathaa dullabhaa bhavissati, ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m attano .thaane .thapetvaa ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiidapetvaa gharaavaasapa~nha.m puccheyya''nti. atha na.m raajaa evamaaha ``pa.n.dita, tumhaaka.m gatakaale mama madhuradhammakathaa dullabhaa bhavissati, ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiidaapetvaa attano .thaane .thatvaa mayha.m gharaavaasapa~nha.m kathethaa''ti. so ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiiditvaa ra~n~naa pa~nha.m pu.t.tho vissajjesi. tatraaya.m pa~nho --
[22] khemaa vutti katha.m assa, katha.m nu assa sa"ngaho..
[22] asmaa lokaa para.m loka.m, katha.m pecca na socatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^khemaa vutti katha.m assaa^eb^ti katha.m gharaavaasa.m vasantassa gaha.t.thassa khemaa nibbhayaa vutti bhaveyya. ^b^katha.m nu assa sa"ngaho^eb^ti catubbidho sa"ngahavatthusa"nkhaato sa"ngaho tassa katha.m bhaveyya ^a^V7.0180^ea^. ^b^abyaabajjha^eb^nti niddukkhataa. ^b^saccavaadii caa^eb^ti katha.m nu maa.navo saccavaadii naama bhaveyya. ^b^peccaa^eb^ti paraloka.m gantvaa.
[03] ta.m sutvaa pa.n.dito ra~n~no pa~nha.m kathesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] na seve lokaayatika.m, neta.m pa~n~naaya va.d.dhana.m..
[22] khemaa vutti siyaa eva.m, eva.m nu assa sa"ngaho..
[22] asmaa lokaa para.m loka.m, eva.m pecca na socatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ta.m tatthaa^eb^ti bhikkhave, ta.m raajaana.m tattha dhammasabhaaya.m ~naa.nagatiyaa ^b^gatimaa,^eb^ abbocchinnaviiriyena ^b^dhitimaa,^eb^ bhuurisamaaya vipulaaya pa~n~naaya ^b^matimaa,^eb^ sa.nhasukhumatthadassinaa ~naa.nena ^b^atthadassimaa,^eb^ paricchinditvaa jaanana~naa.nasa"nkhaataaya pa~n~naaya sabbadhammaana.m ^b^sa"nkhaataa,^eb^ vidhurapa.n.dito eta.m ``na saadhaara.nadaarassaa''tiaadivacana.m abravi. tattha yo paresa.m daaresu aparajjhati ^a^V7.0181^ea^, so saadhaara.nadaaro naama, taadiso na assa bhaveyya. ^b^na bhu~nje saadumekako^eb^ti saadurasa.m pa.niitabhojana.m a~n~nesa.m adatvaa ekakova na bhu~njeyya. ^b^lokaayatika^eb^nti anatthanissita.m saggamaggaana.m adaayaka.m aniyyaanika.m vita.n.dasallaapa.m lokaayatikavaada.m na seveyya. ^b^neta.m pa~n~naaya va.d.dhana^eb^nti na hi eta.m lokaayatika.m pa~n~naaya va.d.dhana.m. ^b^siilavaa^eb^ti akha.n.dehi pa~ncahi siilehi samannaagato. ^b^vattasampanno^eb^ti gharaavaasavattena vaa raajavattena vaa samannaagato. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti kusaladhammesu appamatto. ^b^nivaatavuttii^eb^ti atimaana.m akatvaa niicavutti ovaadaanusaasanipa.ticchako. ^b^atthaddho^eb^ti thaddhamacchariyavirahito. ^b^surato^eb^ti soraccena samannaagato. ^b^sakhilo^eb^ti pemaniiyavacano. ^b^muduu^eb^ti kaayavaacaacittehi apharuso.

[03] ^b^sa"ngahetaa ca mittaana^eb^nti kalyaa.namittaana.m sa"ngahakaro. daanaadiisu yo yena sa"ngaha.m icchati, tassa teneva sa"ngaahako. ^b^sa.mvibhaagii^eb^ti dhammikasama.nabraahma.naana~nceva kapa.naddhikava.nibbakayaacakaadiina~nca sa.mvibhaagakaro. ^b^vidhaanavaa^eb^ti ``imasmi.m kaale kasitu.m va.t.tati, imasmi.m kaale vapitu.m va.t.tatii''ti eva.m sabbakiccesu vidhaanasampanno. ^b^tappeyyaa^eb^ti gahitagahitabhaajanaani ^a^M7.0190^ea^ puuretvaa dadamaano tappeyya. ^b^dhammakaamo^eb^ti pave.nidhammampi sucaritadhammampi kaamayamaano patthayamaano. ^b^sutaadhaaro^eb^ti sutassa aadhaarabhuuto. ^b^paripucchako^eb^ti dhammikasama.nabraahma.ne upasa"nkamitvaa ``ki.m, bhante, kusala''ntiaadivacanehi paripucchanasiilo. ^b^sakkacca^eb^nti gaaravena. ^b^eva.m nu assa sa"ngaho^eb^ti sa"ngahopissa eva.m kato naama bhaveyya. ^b^saccavaadii^eb^ti eva.m pa.tipannoyeva sabhaavavaadii naama siyaa.
[03] eva.m mahaasatto ra~n~no gharaavaasapa~nha.m kathetvaa palla"nkaa oruyha raajaana.m vandi. raajaapissa mahaasakkaara.m katvaa ekasataraajuuhi parivuto attano nivesanameva gato.
[03] mahaasatto ^a^P6.0288^ea^ pana pa.tinivatto. atha na.m pu.n.nako aaha --
[21] ``ehi daani gamissaama, dinno no issarena me.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0182^ea^ ^b^dinno no^eb^ti ettha ^b^no^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m, tva.m issarena mayha.m dinnoti attho. ^b^sanantano^eb^ti mama attha.m pa.tipajjantena hi tayaa attano saamikassa attho pa.tipanno hoti. ya~nceta.m saamikassa atthakara.na.m naama, esa dhammo sanantano poraa.nakapa.n.ditaana.m sabhaavoti.
[22] tiiha~nca ta.m vaasayemu agaare, yenaddhunaa anusaasemu putte''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^tayaahamasmii^eb^ti tayaa laddhohamasmiiti jaanaami, labhantena ca na a~n~nathaa laddho. ^b^dinnohamasmi tava issarenaa^eb^ti mama issarena ra~n~naa ^a^M7.0191^ea^ aha.m tava dinno. ^b^tiiha.m caa^eb^ti maa.nava, aha.m tava bahuupakaaro, raajaana.m anoloketvaa saccameva kathesi.m, tenaaha.m tayaa laddho, tva.m me mahantagu.nabhaava.m jaanaahi, maya.m tii.nipi divasaani attano agaare vaasemu, tasmaa yenaddhunaa yattakena kaalena maya.m puttaadaare anusaasemu, ta.m kaala.m adhivaasehiiti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa pu.n.nako ``sacca.m pa.n.dito aaha, bahuupakaaro esa mama, `sattaahampi a.d.dhamaasampi nisiidaahii'ti vutte adhivaasetabbamevaa''ti cintetvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ta.m me tathaa hotu vasemu tiiha.m, kuruta.m bhavajja gharesu kicca.m.
[22] anusaasata.m puttadaare bhavajja, yathaa tayii pecca sukhii bhaveyyaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ta.m me^eb^ti ya.m tva.m vadesi, sabba.m ta.m mama tathaa hotu. ^b^bhavajjaa^eb^ti bhava.m ajja pa.t.thaaya tiiha.m anusaasatu. ^b^tayii peccaa^eb^ti yathaa tayi gate pacchaa tava puttadaaro sukhii bhaveyya, eva.m anusaasatu.
[03] eva.m vatvaa pu.n.nako mahaasattena saddhi.myeva tassa nivesana.m paavisi. tamattha.m ^a^P6.0289^ea^ pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``saadhuuti vatvaana pahuutakaamo, pakkaami yakkho vidhurena saddhi.m.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0183^ea^ ^b^pahuutakaamo^eb^ti mahaabhogo. ^b^ku~njaraaja~n~nahayaanuci.n.na^eb^nti ku~njarehi ca aaja~n~nahayehi ca anuci.n.na.m paripu.n.na.m. ^b^ariyase.t.tho^eb^ti aacaaraariyesu uttamo pu.n.nako yakkho pa.n.ditassa antepura.m paavisi.
[03] mahaasattassa pana ti.n.na.m utuuna.m atthaaya tayo paasaadaa ahesu.m. tesu eko ko~nco naama, eko mayuuro naama, eko piyaketo naama. te sandhaaya aya.m gaathaa vuttaa --
[21] ``ko~nca.m ^a^M7.0192^ea^ mayuura~nca piya~nca keta.m, upaagamii tattha surammaruupa.m.
[03] tattha ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tesu tiisu paasaadesu yattha tasmi.m samaye attanaa vasati, ta.m surammaruupa.m paasaada.m pu.n.naka.m aadaaya upaagami.

[03] so upagantvaa ca pana ala"nkatapaasaadassa sattamaaya bhuumiyaa sayanagabbha~nceva mahaatala~nca sajjaapetvaa sirisayana.m pa~n~naapetvaa sabba.m annapaanaadividhi.m upa.t.thapetvaa devaka~n~naayo viya pa~ncasataa itthiyo ``imaa te paadaparicaarikaa hontu, anukka.n.thanto idha vasaahii''ti tassa niyyaadetvaa attano vasana.t.thaana.m gato. tassa gatakaale taa itthiyo naanaatuuriyaani gahetvaa pu.n.nakassa paricariyaaya naccaadiini pa.t.thapesu.m. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[03] tattha ^b^avhayanti varaavara^eb^nti varato vara.m nacca~nca giita~nca karontiyo pakkosanti.
[21] ``sama"ngikatvaa pamadaahi yakkha.m, annena paanena ca dhammapaalo.

[03] tattha ^b^pamadaahii^eb^ti pamadaahi ceva annapaanehi ca sama"ngikatvaa. ^b^dhammapaalo^eb^ti dhammassa paalako gopako. ^b^atthatthamevaa^eb^ti atthabhuutameva attha.m. ^b^bhariyaayaa^eb^ti sabbaje.t.thikaaya bhariyaaya.
[22] bhariya.mvacaa `ehi su.nohi bhoti, puttaani aamantaya tambanette'''ti..
[21] ``sutvaana vaakya.m patino anujjaa, su.nisa.m vaca tambanakhi.m sunetta.m.

[03] tattha ^b^anujjaa^eb^ti eva.mnaamikaa. ^b^su.nisa.mvaca tambanakhi.m sunetta^eb^nti saa tassa vacana.m sutvaa assumukhii rodamaanaa ``saya.m gantvaa putte pakkositu.m ayutta.m, su.nisa.m pesessaamii''ti tassaa nivaasa.t.thaana.m gantvaa tambanakhi.m sunetta.m su.nisa.m avaca. ^b^vammadharaanii^eb^ti vammadhare suure, samattheti attho, aabhara.nabha.n.dameva vaa idha ``vamma''nti adhippeta.m, tasmaa aabhara.nadharetipi attho. ^b^cete^eb^ti ta.m naamenaalapati, ^b^puttaanii^eb^ti mama putte ca dhiitaro ca. ^b^indiivarapupphasaame^eb^ti ta.m aalapati.

[03] saa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa paasaadaa oruyha anuvicaritvaa ``pitaa vo ovaada.m daatukaamo pakkosati, ida.m kira vo tassa pacchimadassana''nti sabbamevassa suhadajana~nca puttadhiitaro ca sannipaatesi. dhammapaalakumaaro pana ta.m vacana.m sutvaava rodanto kani.t.thabhaatikaga.naparivuto pitu santika.m agamaasi. pa.n.dito te disvaava sakabhaavena sa.n.thaatu.m asakkonto assupu.n.nehi nettehi aali"ngitvaa siise cumbitvaa je.t.thaputta.m muhutta.m hadaye nipajjaapetvaa hadayaa otaaretvaa sirigabbhato nikkhamma mahaatale palla"nkamajjhe nisiiditvaa puttasahassassa ovaada.m adaasi. tamattha.m ^a^P6.0291^ea^ pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``te aagate muddhani dhammapaalo, cumbitvaa putte avikampamaano.
[22] aamantayitvaana avoca vaakya.m, dinnaaha.m ra~n~naa idha maa.navassa..
[21] ``tassajjaha.m ^a^M7.0194^ea^ attasukhii vidheyyo, aadaaya yenicchati tena gacchati.
[22] aha~nca vo saasitumaagatosmi, katha.m aha.m aparittaaya gacche..
[21] ``sace ^a^V7.0185^ea^ vo raajaa kurura.t.thavaasii, janasandho puccheyya pahuutakaamo.
[22] kimaabhijaanaatha pure puraa.na.m, ki.m vo pitaa puratthaa..
[21] ``samaasanaa hotha mayaava sabbe, koniidha ra~n~no abbhatiko manusso.
[27] tama~njali.m kariya vadetha eva.m, maa heva.m deva na hi esa dhammo.
[22] viyaggharaajassa nihiinajacco, samaasano deva katha.m bhaveyyaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dhammapaalo^eb^ti mahaasatto. ^b^dinnaaha^eb^nti aha.m jayadhanena kha.n.detvaa ra~n~naa dinno. ^b^tassajjaha.m attasukhii vidheyyo^eb^ti ajja pa.t.thaaya tiihamatta.m aha.m iminaa attano sukhena attasukhii, tato para.m pana tassa maa.navassaaha.m vidheyyo homi. so hi ito catutthe divase eka.msena ma.m aadaaya yatthicchati, tattha gacchati. ^b^aparittaayaa^eb^ti tumhaaka.m paritta.m akatvaa katha.m gaccheyyanti anusaasitu.m aagatosmi. ^b^janasandho^eb^ti mittabandhanena mittajanassa sandhaanakaro. ^b^pure puraa.na^eb^nti ito pubbe tumhe ki.m puraa.nakaara.na.m abhijaanaatha. ^b^anusaase^eb^ti anusaasi. eva.m tumhe ra~n~naa pu.t.thaa ``amhaaka.m pitaa ima~ncima~nca ovaada.m adaasii''ti katheyyaatha. ^b^samaasanaa hothaa^eb^ti sace vo raajaa mayaa dinnassa ovaadassa kathitakaale ``etha tumhe, ajja mayaa saddhi.m samaasanaa hotha, idha raajakule tumhehi a~n~no ko nu ra~n~no abbhatiko manusso''ti attano aasane nisiidaapeyya, atha tumhe a~njali.m katvaa ta.m raajaana.m eva.m vadeyyaatha ``deva, eva.m maa avaca. na hi amhaaka.m esapave.nidhammo. ^b^viyaggharaajassa^eb^ kesarasiihassa nihiinajacco jarasi"ngaalo ^a^M7.0195^ea^, deva, katha.m samaasano bhaveyya. yathaa si"ngaalo siihassa samaasano na hoti, tatheva maya.m tumhaaka''nti.

[03] ima.m ^a^P6.0292^ea^ panassa katha.m sutvaa puttadhiitaro ca ~naatisuhajjaadayo ca daasakammakaraporisaa ca te sabbe sakabhaavena sa.n.thaatu.m asakkontaa mahaavirava.m viravi.msu. tesa.m mahaasatto sa~n~naapesi.

[03] atha ne pa.n.dito puttadhiitaro ca ~naatayo ca upasa"nkamitvaa tu.nhiibhuute disvaa ``taataa, maa cintayittha, sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, yaso naama vipattipariyosaano, apica tumhaaka.m raajavasati.m ^a^V7.0186^ea^ naama yasapa.tilaabhakaara.na.m kathessaami, ta.m ekaggacittaa su.naathaa''ti buddhaliilaaya raajavasati.m naama pa.t.thapesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] yathaa raajakula.m patto, yasa.m poso nigacchatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^suhadajjane^eb^ti suhadayajane. ^b^ethayyo^eb^ti etha, ayyo. piyasamudaacaarena putte aalapati. ^b^raajavasati^eb^nti mayaa vuccamaana.m raajapaaricariya.m su.naatha. ^b^yathaa^eb^ti yena kaara.nena raajakula.m patto upasa"nkamanto ra~n~no santike caranto poso yasa.m nigacchati labhati, ta.m kaara.na.m su.naathaati attho.
[21] ``na hi raajakula.m patto, a~n~naato labhate yasa.m.
[22] atha vissasate tyamhi, guyha~ncassa na rakkhatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0196^ea^ ^b^a~n~naato^eb^ti apaaka.tagu.no aviditakammaavadaano. ^b^naasuuro^eb^ti na asuuro bhiirukajaatiko. ^b^yadaassa siila^eb^nti yadaa assa sevakassa raajaa siila~nca pa~n~na~nca soceyya~nca adhigacchati, aacaarasampatti~nca ~naa.nabala~nca sucibhaava~nca jaanaati. ^b^atha vissasate tyamhii^eb^ti atha raajaa tamhi vissasate vissaasa.m karoti, attano guyha~ncassa na rakkhati na guuhati.
[22] ajjhi.t.tho na vikampeyya, sa raajavasati.m vase..

[03] tattha ^b^tulaa^eb^ ^a^P6.0293^ea^ ^b^yathaa^eb^ti yathaa esaa vuttappakaaraa tulaa na onamati na unnamati, evameva raajasevako kismi~ncideva kamme ra~n~naa ``ida.m naama karohii''ti ajjhi.t.tho aa.natto chandaadiagativasena na vikampeyya, sabbakiccesu paggahitatulaa viya samo bhaveyya. ^b^sa raajavasati^eb^nti so evaruupo sevako raajakule vaasa.m vaseyya, raajaana.m paricareyya, eva.m paricaranto pana yasa.m labheyyaati attho. ^b^sabbaani abhisambhonto^eb^ti sabbaani raajakiccaani karonto.
[21] ``divaa vaa yadi vaa ratti.m, raajakiccesu pa.n.dito.
[22] ajjhi.t.tho na vikampeyya, sa raajavasati.m vase..
[21] ``divaa vaa yadi vaa ratti.m, raajakiccesu pa.n.dito.
[22] na tena vutto gaccheyya, sa raajavasati.m vase''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^na vikampeyyaa^eb^ti avikampamaano taani kiccaani kareyya. ^b^yo cassaa^eb^ti yo ca ra~n~no gamanamaggo sukato assa ^b^suppa.tiyaadito^eb^ suma.n.dito, ``iminaa maggena gacchaa''ti vuttopi tena na gaccheyya.
[22] sabbattha pacchato gacche, sa raajavasati.m vase..
[21] ``na ra~n~no sadisa.m vattha.m, na maala.m na vilepana.m.
[27] aakappa.m sarakutti.m vaa, na ra~n~no sadisamaacare.
[22] a~n~na.m kareyya aakappa.m, sa raajavasati.m vase''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0188^ea^ ^b^na ra~n~no^eb^ti ra~n~no kaamabhogena sama.m kaamabhoga.m na bhu~njeyya. taadisassa hi raajaa kujjhati. ^b^sabbatthaa^eb^ti sabbesu ruupaadiisu kaamagu.nesu ra~n~no pacchatova gaccheyya, hiinatarameva seveyyaati attho. ^b^a~n~na.m kareyyaa^eb^ti ra~n~no aakappato sarakuttito ca a~n~nameva aakappa.m kareyya.

[03] tattha ^b^bhaava^eb^nti vissaasavasena adhippaaya.m. ^b^acapalo^eb^ti ama.n.danasiilo. ^b^nipako^eb^ti paripakka~naa.no. ^b^sa.mvutindriyo^eb^ti pihitacha.lindriyo ra~n~no vaa a"ngapacca"ngaani orodhe vaassa na olokeyya. ^b^manopa.nidhisampanno^eb^ti acapalena su.t.thu .thapitena cittena samannaagato.
[22] naassa kosaa dhana.m ga.nhe, sa raajavasati.m vase..
[21] ``na nidda.m bahu ma~n~neyya, na madaaya sura.m pive.
[22] naassa daaye mige ha~n~ne, sa raajavasati.m vase..
[21] ``naassa pii.tha.m na palla"nka.m, na koccha.m na naava.m ratha.m.
[21] ``na ^a^M7.0198^ea^ ve raajaa sakhaa hoti, na raajaa hoti methuno.

[03] tattha ^b^na manteyyaa^eb^ti tassa ra~n~no bhariyaahi saddhi.m neva kii.leyya, na raho manteyya. ^b^kosaa dhana^eb^nti ra~n~no kosaa dhana.m thenetvaa na ga.nheyya. ^b^na madaayaa^eb^ti taataa, raajasevako naama madatthaaya sura.m na piveyya. ^b^naassa daaye mige^eb^ti assa ra~n~no dinnaabhaye mige na ha~n~neyya. ^b^koccha^eb^nti bhaddapii.tha.m. ^b^sammatomhii^eb^ti aha.m sammato hutvaa eva.m karomiiti na aaruheyya. ^b^sammukha~ncassa ti.t.theyyaa^eb^ti assa ra~n~no purato khuddakamahantakathaasavana.t.thaane ti.t.theyya. ^b^sandissanto sabhattuno^eb^ti yo raajasevako tassa bhattuno dassana.t.thaane ti.t.theyya. ^b^suukenaa^eb^ti akkhimhi patitena viihisuukaadinaa gha.t.tita.m akkhi pakatisabhaava.m jahanta.m yathaa kujjhati naama, eva.m kujjhanti, na tesu vissaaso kaatabbo. ^b^puujito ma~n~namaano^eb^ti aha.m raajapuujitomhiiti ma~n~namaano. ^b^pharusa.m patimanteyyaa^eb^ti yena so kujjhati, tathaaruupa.m na manteyya.
[22] aggiiva sa.myato ti.t.the, sa raajavasati.m vase..
[21] ``putta.m vaa bhaatara.m vaa sa.m, sampagga.nhaati khattiyo.
[27] gaamehi nigamehi vaa, ra.t.thehi janapadehi vaa.

[03] tattha ^b^laddhadvaaro^eb^ ^a^P6.0295^ea^ ^b^labhe dvaara^eb^nti aha.m nippa.tihaaro laddhadvaaroti appa.tihaaretvaa na paviseyya, punapi dvaara.m labheyya, pa.tihaaretvaava paviseyyaati attho. ^b^sa.myato^eb^ti appamatto hutvaa. ^b^bhaatara.m vaa sa^eb^nti saka.m bhaatara.m vaa. ^b^sampagga.nhaatii^eb^ti ``asukagaama.m vaa asukanigama.m vaa assa demaa''ti yadaa sevakehi saddhi.m katheti. ^b^na bha.ne chekapaapaka^eb^nti tadaa gu.na.m vaa agu.na.m vaa na bha.neyya.
[22] na tesa.m antaraa gacche, sa raajavasati.m vase..
[22] pa.tiloma.m na vatteyya, sa raajavasati.m vase..
[22] appaasii nipako suuro, sa raajavasati.m vase''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^na tesa.m antaraa gacche^eb^ti tesa.m laabhassa antaraa na gacche, antaraaya.m na kareyya. ^b^va.msovaapii^eb^ti yathaa va.msagumbato uggatava.mso vaatena paha.takaale pakampati, eva.m ra~n~naa kathitakaale pakampeyya. ^b^caapovuunudaro^eb^ti yathaa caapo mahodaro na hoti, eva.m mahodaro na siyaa. ^b^ajivhavaa^eb^ti yathaa maccho ajivhataaya na katheti, tathaa sevako mandakathataaya ajivhavaa bhaveyya. ^b^appaasii^eb^ti bhojanamatta~n~nuu.
[22] kaasa.m saasa.m dara.m baalya.m, khii.namedho nigacchati..
[22] aviki.n.na.m mita.m vaaca.m, patte kaale udiiraye..
[22] sampha.m gira.m na bhaaseyya, sa raajavasati.m vase..

[03] tattha ^b^na baa.lha^eb^nti punappuna.m kilesavasena na gaccheyya. ^b^tejasa"nkhaya^eb^nti eva.m gacchanto hi puriso tejasa"nkhaya.m gacchati paapu.naati, ta.m sampassanto baa.lha.m na gaccheyya. ^b^dara^eb^nti kaayadaratha.m. ^b^baalya^eb^nti dubbalabhaava.m. ^b^khii.namedho^eb^ti punappuna.m kilesarativasena khii.napa~n~no puriso ete kaasaadayo nigacchati. ^b^naativela^eb^nti taataa raajuuna.m santike pamaa.naatikkanta.m na bhaaseyya ^a^M7.0200^ea^. ^b^patte kaale^eb^ti attano vacanakaale sampatte. ^b^asa"ngha.t.to^eb^ti para.m asa"ngha.t.tento. ^b^sampha^eb^nti niratthaka.m. ^b^gira^eb^nti vacana.m.
[22] appamatto suci dakkho, sa raajavasati.m vase..

[03] tattha ^b^viniito^eb^ti aacaarasampanno. ^b^sippavaa^eb^ti attano kule sikkhitabbasippena samannaagato. ^b^danto^eb^ti chasu dvaaresu nibbisevano. ^b^katatto^eb^ti sampaaditatto. ^b^niyato^eb^ti yasaadiini nissaaya acalasabhaavo. ^b^muduu^eb^ti anatimaanii. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti kattabbakiccesu pamaadarahito. ^b^dakkho^eb^ti upa.t.thaane cheko. ^b^nivaatavuttii^eb^ti niicavutti. ^b^sukhasa.mvaaso^eb^ti garusa.mvaasasiilo. ^b^sahitu.m patita^eb^nti pararaajuuhi sakara~n~no santika.m guyharakkha.navasena vaa pa.ticchannapaaka.takara.navasenavaa pesita.m. tathaaruupena hi saddhi.m kathentopi ra~n~no sammukhaava katheyya. ^b^bhattaara~n~nevudikkheyyaa^eb^ti attano saamikameva olokeyya. ^b^na ca a~n~nassa raajino^eb^ti a~n~nassa ra~n~no santako na bhaveyya.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0192^ea^ ^a^M7.0201^ea^ ^b^sakkacca.m payirupaaseyyaa^eb^ti gaaravena punappuna.m upasa"nkameyya. ^b^anuvaaseyyaa^eb^ti uposathavaasa.m vasanto anuvatteyya. ^b^tappeyyaa^eb^ti yaavadattha.m daanena tappeyya. ^b^aasajjaa^eb^ti upasa"nkamitvaa. ^b^pa~n~ne^eb^ti pa.n.dite, aasajjapa~n~ne vaa, asajjamaanapa~n~neti attho.
[22] na ca ki~nci nivaareyya, daanakaale va.nibbake..
[22] kaala~n~nuu samaya~n~nuu ca, sa raajavasati.m vase..

[03] tattha ^b^dinnapubba^eb^nti pakatipa.tiyatta.m daanavatta.m. ^b^sama.nabraahma.ne^eb^ti sama.ne vaa braahma.ne vaa. ^b^va.nibbake^eb^ti daanakaale va.nibbake aagate disvaa ki~nci na nivaareyya. ^b^pa~n~navaa^eb^ti vicaara.napa~n~naaya yutto. ^b^buddhisampanno^eb^ti avekallabuddhisampanno. ^b^vidhaanavidhikovido^eb^ti naanappakaaresu daasakammakaraporisaadiina.m sa.mvidahanako.t.thaasesu cheko. ^b^kaala~n~nuu^eb^ti ``aya.m daana.m daatu.m, aya.m siila.m rakkhitu.m, aya.m uposathakamma.m kaatu.m kaalo''ti jaaneyya. ^b^samaya~n~nuu^eb^ti ``aya.m kasanasamayo, aya.m vapanasamayo, aya.m vohaarasamayo, aya.m upa.t.thaanasamayo''ti jaaneyya. ^b^kammadheyyesuu^eb^ti attano kattabbakammesu.
[21] ``khala.m saala.m pasu.m khetta.m, gantaa cassa abhikkha.na.m.
[22] mita.m dha~n~na.m nidhaapeyya, mita.mva paacaye ghare..
[21] ``putta.m vaa bhaatara.m vaa sa.m, siilesu asamaahita.m.
[27] ana"ngavaa hi te baalaa, yathaa petaa tatheva te.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0193^ea^ ^a^M7.0202^ea^ ^b^pasu.m khetta^eb^nti gokula~nceva sassa.t.thaana~nca. ^b^gantaa^eb^ti gamanasiilo. ^b^mita^eb^nti minitvaa ettakanti ~natvaa ko.t.thesu nidhaapeyya. ^b^ghare^eb^ti gharepi parijana.m ga.netvaa mitameva pacaapeyya. ^b^siilesu asamaahita^eb^nti evaruupa.m dussiila.m anaacaara.m kismi~nci aadhipacca.t.thaane na .thapeyyaati attho. ^b^ana"ngavaa hi te baalaa^eb^ti ``a"ngameta.m manussaana.m, bhaataa loke pavuccatii''ti (jaa0 1.4.58) ki~ncaapi je.t.thakani.t.thabhaataro a"ngasamaanataaya ``a"nga''nti vuttaa, ime pana dussiilaa, tasmaa a"ngasamaanaa na honti. yathaa pana susaane cha.d.ditaa petaa mataa, tatheva te. tasmaa taadisaa aadhipacca.t.thaane na .thapetabbaa. ku.tumba~nhi te vinaasenti, vina.t.thaku.tumbassa ca daliddassa raajavasati naama na sampajjati. ^b^aasiinaana^eb^nti aagantvaa nisinnaana.m puttabhaataana.m matasattaana.m matakabhatta.m viya dento ghaasacchaadanamattameva padaapeyya. ^b^u.t.thaanasampanne^eb^ti u.t.thaanaviiriyena samannaagate.
[21] ``siilavaa ca alolo ca, anurakkho ca raajino.
[22] aavii raho hito tassa, sa raajavasati.m vase..
[22] aahatopi na kuppeyya, sa raajavasati.m vase''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^alolo^eb^ti aluddho. ^b^citta.t.tho^eb^ti citte .thito, raajacittavasikoti attho. ^b^asa"nkusakavuttissaa^eb^ti appa.tilomavutti assa. ^b^adhosira^eb^nti paade dhovantopi adhosira.m katvaa he.t.thaamukhova dhoveyya, na ra~n~no mukha.m ullokeyyaati attho.
[21] ``yo deti sayana.m vattha.m, yaana.m aavasatha.m ghara.m.

[03] tattha ^b^kumbhampa~njali.m kariyaa, caa.ta~ncaapi padakkhi.na^eb^nti vuddhi.m paccaasiisanto puriso udakapuurita.m kumbha.m disvaa tassa a~njali.m kareyya, caa.ta~nca saku.na.m padakkhi.na.m kareyya. a~njali.m vaa padakkhi.na.m vaa karontassa te ki~nci daatu.m na sakkonti. ^b^kimevaa^eb^ti yo pana sabbakaamaana.m daataa dhiiro ca, ta.m raajaana.m ki.mkaara.naa na namasseyya. raajaayeva hi namassitabbo ca aaraadhetabbo ca. ^b^pajjunnorivaa^eb^ti megho viya. ^b^esayyo raajavasatii^eb^ti ayyo yaa aya.m mayaa kathitaa, esaa raajavasati naama raajasevakaana.m anusaasanii. ^b^yathaa^eb^ti yaaya raajavasatiyaa vattamaano naro raajaana.m aaraadheti, raajuuna~nca santikaa puuja.m labhati, saa esaati.
[22] eva.m asamadhuro vidhurapa.n.dito buddhaliilaaya raajavasati.m kathesi.

[03] eva.m puttadaara~naatimittasuhajjaadayo anusaasantasseva tassa tayo divasaa jaataa. so divasassa paaripuuri.m ~natvaa paatova nhatvaa naanaggarasabhojana.m bhu~njitvaa ``raajaana.m apaloketvaa maa.navena saddhi.m gamissaamii''ti ~naatiga.naparivuto raajanivesana.m gantvaa raajaana.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m .thito vattabbayuttaka.m vacana.m avoca. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``vanditvaa ^a^P6.0299^ea^ sirasaa paade, katvaa ca na.m padakkhi.na.m.
[21] ``putte ca me udikkhesi, ya~nca ma~n~na.m ghare dhana.m.
[22] yathaa pecca na haayetha, ~naatisa"ngho mayii gate..
[22] eveta.m khalita.m mayha.m, eta.m passaami accaya''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^suhadehii^eb^ti suhadayehi ~naatimittaadiihi. ^b^ya~nca ma~n~na^eb^nti ya~nca me a~n~na.m tayaa ceva a~n~nehi ca raajuuhi dinna.m ghare aparimaa.na.m dhana.m, ta.m sabba.m tvameva olokeyyaasi. ^b^peccaa^eb^ti pacchaakaale. ^b^khalatii^eb^ti pakkhalati. ^b^eveta^eb^nti eva.m eta.m. aha~nhi bhuumiya.m khalitvaa tattheva pati.t.thitapuriso viya tumhesu khalitvaa tumhesuyeva pati.t.thahaami. ^b^eta.m passaamii^eb^ti yo esa ``ki.m te raajaa hotii''ti maa.navena pu.t.thassa mama tumhe anoloketvaa sacca.m apekkhitvaa ``daasohamasmii''ti vadantassa accayo, eta.m accaya.m passaami, a~n~no pana me doso natthi, ta.m me accaya.m tumhe khamatha, eta.m hadaye katvaa pacchaa mama puttadaaresu maa aparajjhitthaati.
[03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa ``pa.n.dita, tava gamana.m mayha.m na ruccati, maa.nava.m upaayena pakkosaapetvaa ghaatetvaa kila~njena pa.ticchaadetu.m mayha.m ruccatii''ti diipento gaathamaaha --
[21] ``sakkaa na gantu.m iti mayha hoti, chetvaa vadhitvaa idha kaatiyaana.m.
[22] idheva hohii iti mayha ruccati, maa tva.m agaa uttamabhuuripa~n~naa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^chetvaa^eb^ti idheva raajagehe ta.m pothetvaa maaretvaa pa.ticchaadessaamiiti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa mahaasatto ``deva, tumhaaka.m ajjhaasayo evaruupo hoti, so tumhesu ayutto''ti vatvaa aaha --
[21] ``maa ^a^M7.0205^ea^ hevadhammesu mana.m pa.niidahi, atthe ca dhamme ca yutto bhavassu.
[22] dhiratthu kamma.m akusala.m anariya.m, ya.m katvaa pacchaa niraya.m vajeyya..
[21] ``nevesa ^a^V7.0196^ea^ ^a^P6.0300^ea^ dhammo na puneta kicca.m, ayiro hi daasassa janinda issaro.
[22] ghaatetu.m jhaapetu.m athopi hantu.m, na ca mayha kodhatthi vajaami caaha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^maa hevadhammesu mana.m pa.niidahii^eb^ti adhammesu anatthesu ayuttesu tava citta.m maa heva pa.nidahiiti attho. ^b^pacchaa^eb^ti ya.m kamma.m katvaapi ajaraamaro na hoti, atha kho pacchaa nirayameva upapajjeyya. ^b^dhiratthu kamma^eb^nti ta.m kamma.m garahita.m atthu assa bhaveyya. ^b^nevesaa^eb^ti neva esa. ^b^ayiro^eb^ti saamiko. ^b^ghaatetu^eb^nti etaani ghaataadiini kaatu.m ayiro daasassa issaro, sabbaanetaani kaatu.m labhati, mayha.m maa.nave appamattakopi kodho natthi, dinnakaalato pa.t.thaaya tava citta.m sandhaaretu.m va.t.tati, vajaami aha.m narindaati aaha --

[03] eva.m vatvaa mahaasatto raajaana.m vanditvaa ra~n~no orodhe ca puttadaare ca raajaparisa~nca ovaditvaa tesu sakabhaavena sa.n.thaatu.m asakku.nitvaa mahaavirava.m viravantesuyeva raajanivesanaa nikkhami. sakalanagaravaasinopi ``pa.n.dito kira maa.navena saddhi.m gamissati, etha, passissaama na''nti mantayitvaa raaja"nga.neyeva na.m passi.msu. atha ne mahaasatto assaasetvaa ``tumhe maa cintayittha, sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sariira.m addhuva.m, yaso naama vipattipariyosaano, apica tumhe daanaadiisu pu~n~nesu appamattaa hothaa''ti tesa.m ovaada.m datvaa nivattaapetvaa attano gehaabhimukho paayaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne dhammapaalakumaaro bhaatikaga.naparivuto ``pitu paccuggamana.m karissaamii''ti nikkhanto nivesanadvaareyeva pitu sammukho ahosi. mahaasatto ta.m disvaa sakabhaavena sa.n.thaatu.m asakkonto upaguyha ure nipajjaapetvaa nivesana.m paavisi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --

[03] ghare panassa sahassaputtaa, sahassadhiitaro, sahassabhariyaayo, ca sattava.n.nadaasisataani ca santi, tehi ceva avasesadaasidaasakammakara~naatimittasuhajjaadiihi ca sakalanivesana.m yugantavaataabhighaatapatitehi saalehi saalavana.m viya nirantara.m ahosi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] senti puttaa ca daaraa ca, vidhurassa nivesane..
[21] ``orodhaa ca kumaaraa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
[22] baahaa paggayha pakkantu.m, kasmaa no vijahissasi..
[21] ``orodhaa ca kumaaraa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
[22] baahaa paggayha pakkandu.m, kasmaa no vijahissasi..
[22] baahaa paggayha pakkandu.m, kasmaa no vijahissasi..
[22] baahaa paggayha pakkandu.m, kasmaa no vijahissasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0207^ea^ ^b^sentii^eb^ti mahaatale chinnapaadaa viya patitaa aavattantaa parivattantaa sayanti. ^b^itthisahassa.m bhariyaana^eb^nti bhariyaanameva itthiina.m sahassa.m. ^b^kasmaa no vijahissasii^eb^ti kena kaara.nena amhe vijahissasiiti paridevi.msu.

[03] mahaasatto ^a^V7.0198^ea^ sabba.m ta.m mahaajana.m assaasetvaa ghare avasesakiccaani katvaa antojana~nca bahijana~nca ovaditvaa aacikkhitabbayuttaka.m sabba.m aacikkhitvaa pu.n.nakassa santika.m gantvaa attano ni.t.thitakiccata.m aarocesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] mittaamacce ca bhacce ca, puttadaare ca bandhave..
[21] ``avasii tuva.m mayha tiiha.m agaare, kataani kiccaani gharesu mayha.m.
[22] anusaasitaa puttadaaraa mayaa ca, karoma kaccaana yathaamati.m te''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^kammanta.m sa.mvidhetvaanaa^eb^ti ``eva~nca kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti ghare kattabbayuttaka.m kamma.m sa.mvidahitvaa. ^b^nidhi^eb^nti nidahitvaa .thapitadhana.m. ^b^i.nadaana^eb^nti i.navasena sa.myojitadhana.m. ^b^yathaamati.m te^eb^ti idaani tava ajjhaasayaanuruupa.m karomaati vadati.
[21] ``sace hi katte anusaasitaa te, puttaa ca daaraa anujiivino ca.
[22] handehi daanii taramaanaruupo, diigho hi addhaapi aya.m puratthaa..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0208^ea^ ^b^katte^eb^ti somanassappatto yakkho mahaasatta.m aalapati. ^b^diigho hi addhaapii^eb^ti gantabbamaggopi diigho. ^b^``achambhitovaa''^eb^ti ida.m so he.t.thaapaasaada.m anotaritvaa tatova gantukaamo hutvaa avaca.
[21] ``soha.m ^a^V7.0199^ea^ kissa nu bhaayissa.m, yassa me natthi dukka.ta.m.
[22] kaayena vaacaa manasaa, yena gaccheyya duggati''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^soha.m kissa nu bhaayissa^eb^nti ida.m mahaasatto ``achambhitova ga.nhaahii''ti vuttattaa evamaaha.

[03] eva.m mahaasatto siihanaada.m naditvaa achambhito kesarasiiho viya nibbhayo hutvaa ``aya.m saa.tako mama aruciyaa maa muccatuu''ti adhi.t.thaanapaarami.m purecaarika.m katvaa da.lha.m nivaasetvaa assassa vaaladhi.m viyuuhitvaa ubhohi hatthehi da.lha.m vaaladhi.m gahetvaa dviihi paadehi assassa uuruusu palive.thetvaa ``maa.nava, gahito me vaaladhi, yathaaruci yaahii''ti aaha. tasmi.m kha.ne pu.n.nako manomayasindhavassa sa~n~na.m adaasi. so pa.n.dita.m aadaaya aakaase pakkhandi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --

[03] tattha ^b^saakhaasu selesu asajjamaano^eb^ti pu.n.nako kira cintesi ``duura.m agantvaava ima.m himavantappadese rukkhesu pabbatesu ca pothetvaa maaretvaa hadayama.msa.m aadaaya ka.levara.m pabbatantare ^a^P6.0303^ea^ cha.d.detvaa naagabhavanameva gamissaamii''ti. so rukkhe ca pabbate ca apariharitvaa tesa.m majjheneva assa.m pesesi. mahaasattassaanubhaavena rukkhaapi pabbataapi sariirato ubhosu passesu ratanamatta.m pa.tikkamanti. so ``mato vaa, no vaa''ti parivattitvaa mahaasattassa mukha.m olokento ka~ncanaadaasamiva vippasanna.m disvaa ``aya.m eva.m na maratii''ti punapi sakalahimavantappadese rukkhe ca pabbate ca tikkhattu.m pothento pesesi ^a^M7.0209^ea^. eva.m pothentopi tatheva rukkhapabbataa duurameva pa.tikkamantiyeva. mahaasatto pana kilantakaayo ahosi. atha pu.n.nako ``aya.m neva marati, idaani vaatakkhandhe cu.n.navicu.n.na.m karissaamii''ti kodhaabhibhuuto sattama.m vaatakkhandha.m pakkhandi. bodhisattassaanubhaavena vaatakkhandho dvidhaa hutvaa bodhisattassa okaasa.m akaasi. tato verambhavaatehi paharaapesi, verambhavaataapi satasahassaasanisaddo viya hutvaa bodhisattassa okaasa.m ada.msu. so pu.n.nako tassa antaraayaabhaava.m passanto ta.m aadaaya kaa.lapabbata.m agamaasi. tena vutta.m --
[03] tattha ^b^asajjamaano^eb^ti alaggamaano appa.tiha~n~namaano vidhurapa.n.dita.m vahanto kaa.lapabbatamatthaka.m upaagato.

[03] eva.m pu.n.nakassa mahaasatta.m gahetvaa gatakaale pa.n.ditassa puttadaaraadayo pu.n.nakassa vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa tattha mahaasatta.m adisvaa chinnapaadaa viya patitvaa aparaapara.m parivattamaanaa mahaasaddena paridevi.msu. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``orodhaa ca kumaaraa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
[22] baahaa paggayha pakkandu.m, `pa.n.dito so kuhi.m gato'..
[21] ``orodhaa ^a^V7.0201^ea^ ca kumaaraa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
[22] baahaa paggayha pakkandu.m, `pa.n.dito so kuhi.m gato'..
[22] baahaa paggayha pakkandu.m, `pa.n.dito so kuhi.m gato'..
[22] baahaa paggayha pakkandu.m, `pa.n.dito so kuhi.m gato'''ti..

[03] eva.m pakkanditvaa ca pana te sabbepi sakalanagaravaasiihi saddhi.m roditvaa raajadvaara.m agama.msu. raajaa mahanta.m paridevasadda.m sutvaa siihapa~njara.m vivaritvaa ``tumhe kasmaa paridevathaa''ti pucchi. athassa te ``deva, so kira maa.navo na braahma.no, yakkho pana braahma.nava.n.nena aagantvaa pa.n.dita.m aadaaya gato, tena vinaa ^a^P6.0304^ea^ amhaaka.m jiivita.m natthi. sace so ito sattame divase naagamissati, saka.tasatehi saka.tasahassehi ca daaruuni sa"nka.d.dhitvaa sabbe maya.m aggi.m ujjaaletvaa pavisissaamaa''ti imamattha.m aarocentaa ima.m gaathamaaha.msu --
[22] sabbe aggi.m pavekkhaama, natthattho jiivitena no''ti..

[03] sammaasambuddhassa parinibbutakaalepi ``maya.m aggi.m pavisitvaa marissaamaa''ti vattaaro naama naahesu.m. aho subhaasita.m mahaasatte naagarehiiti. raajaa tesa.m katha.m sutvaa ``tumhe maa cintayittha, maa ^a^M7.0211^ea^ socittha, maa paridevittha, madhurakatho pa.n.dito maa.nava.m dhammakathaaya palobhetvaa attano paadesu paatetvaa sakalanagaravaasiina.m assumukha.m haasayanto na cirasseva aagamissatii''ti assaasento gaathamaaha --
[21] ``pa.n.dito ca viyatto ca, vibhaavii ca vicakkha.no.

[03] tattha ^b^viyatto^eb^ti veyyattiyaa vicaara.napa~n~naaya samannaagato. ^b^vibhaavii^eb^ti atthaanattha.m kaara.naakaara.na.m vibhaavetvaa dassetvaa kathetu.m samattho. ^b^vicakkha.no^eb^ti ta"nkha.neyeva .thaanuppattikaaya kaara.nacintanapa~n~naaya ^a^V7.0202^ea^ yutto. ^b^maa bhaayitthaa^eb^ti maa bhaayatha, attaana.m mocetvaa khippa.m aagamissatiiti assaaseti.
[03] naagaraapi ``pa.n.dito kira ra~n~no kathetvaa gato bhavissatii''ti assaasa.m pa.tilabhitvaa attano gehaani pakkami.msu.

[03] pu.n.nakopi mahaasatta.m kaa.laagirimatthake .thapetvaa ``imasmi.m jiivamaane mayha.m vu.d.dhi naama natthi, ima.m maaretvaa hadayama.msa.m gahetvaa naagabhavana.m gantvaa vimalaaya datvaa irandhati.m gahetvaa devaloka.m gamissaamii''ti cintesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``so tattha gantvaana vicintayanto, uccaavacaa cetanakaa bhavanti.
[22] nayimassa jiivena mamatthi ki~nci, hantvaanima.m hadayamaanayissa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ti so pu.n.nako. ^b^tattha gantvaanaa^eb^ti gantvaa tattha kaa.laagirimatthake .thito. ^b^uccaavacaa cetanakaa bhavantii^eb^ti kha.ne kha.ne uppajjamaanaa ^a^M7.0212^ea^ cetanaa uccaapi avacaapi uppajjanti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m mametassa jiivitadaanacetanaapi uppajjeyyaati. imassa ^a^P6.0305^ea^ pana jiivitena tahi.m naagabhavane mama appamattakampi ki~nci kicca.m natthi, idhevima.m maaretvaa assa hadaya.m aanayissaamiiti sanni.t.thaanamakaasiiti attho.

[03] tato puna cintesi ``ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m sahatthena amaaretvaa bheravaruupadassanena jiivitakkhaya.m paapeyya''nti. so bheravayakkharuupa.m nimminitvaa mahaasatta.m tajjento aagantvaa ta.m paatetvaa daa.thaana.m antare katvaa khaaditukaamo viya ahosi, mahaasattassa lomaha.msanamattampi naahosi. tato siiharuupena mattamahaahatthiruupena ca aagantvaa daa.thaahi ceva dantehi ca vijjhitukaamo viya ahosi. tathaapi abhaayantassa ekado.nikanaavappamaa.na.m mahanta.m sappava.n.na.m nimminitvaa assasanto passasanto ``susuu''ti sadda.m karonto aagantvaa mahaasattassa sakalasariira.m ve.thetvaa matthake pha.na.m katvaa a.t.thaasi, tassa saarajjamattampi naahosi. atha ``na.m pabbatamatthake .thapetvaa paatetvaa ^a^V7.0203^ea^ cu.n.navicu.n.na.m karissaamii''ti mahaavaata.m samu.t.thaapesi. so tassa kesaggamattampi caaletu.m naasakkhi. atha na.m tattheva pabbatamatthake .thapetvaa hatthii viya khajjuurirukkha.m pabbata.m aparaapara.m caalesi, tathaapi na.m .thita.t.thaanato kesaggamattampi caaletu.m naasakkhi.

[03] tato ``saddasantaasenassa hadayaphaalana.m katvaa maaressaamii''ti antopabbata.m pavisitvaa pathavi~nca nabha~nca ekaninnaada.m karonto mahaanaada.m nadi, evampissa saarajjamattampi naahosi. jaanaati hi mahaasatto ``yakkhasiihahatthinaagaraajavesehi aagatopi mahaavaatavu.t.thi.m samu.t.thaapakopi pabbatacalana.m karontopi antopabbata.m pavisitvaa naada.m vissajjentopi maa.navoyeva, na a~n~no''ti. tato pu.n.nako cintesi ``naaha.m ima.m baahirupakkamena maaretu.m sakkomi, sahattheneva na.m maaressaamii''ti. tato yakkho mahaasatta.m pabbatamuddhani .thapetvaa pabbatapaada.m gantvaa ma.nikkhandhe pa.n.dusutta.m pavesento viya pabbata.m pavisitvaa taasento vagganto antopabbatena uggantvaa mahaasatta.m paade da.lha.m ^a^M7.0213^ea^ gahetvaa parivattetvaa adhosira.m katvaa anaalambe aakaase vissajjesi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``so ^a^P6.0306^ea^ tattha gantvaa pabbatantarasmi.m, anto pavisitvaana padu.t.thacitto.

[03] tattha ^b^so tattha gantvaa^eb^ti so pu.n.nako pabbatamatthakaa pabbatapaada.m gantvaa tattha pabbatantare .thatvaa tassa anto pavisitvaa pabbatamatthake .thitassa he.t.thaa pa~n~naayamaano asa.mvute bhuumipadese dhaaresiiti. na aaditova dhaaresi, tattha pana ta.m khipitvaa pannarasayojanamatta.m bha.t.thakaale pabbatamuddhani .thitova hattha.m va.d.dhetvaa adhosira.m bhassanta.m paadesu gahetvaa adhosirameva ukkhipitvaa mukha.m olokento ``na maratii''ti ~natvaa dutiyampi khipitvaa ti.msayojanamatta.m bha.t.thakaale tatheva ukkhipitvaa puna tassa mukha.m olokento jiivantameva disvaa cintesi ``sace idaani sa.t.thiyojanamatta.m bhassitvaa na marissati, paadesu na.m gahetvaa pabbatamuddhani pothetvaa maaressaamii''ti atha na.m tatiyampi khipitvaa sa.t.thiyojanamatta.m bha.t.thakaale hattha.m va.d.dhetvaa paadesu gahetvaa ukkhipi. tato mahaasatto cintesi ``aya.m ma.m pa.thama.m pannarasayojana.t.thaana.m khipi, dutiyampi ti.msayojana.m, tatiyampi sa.t.thiyojana.m, idaani puna ma.m na khipissati, ukkhipantoyeva pabbatamuddhani paharitvaa maaressati, yaava ma.m ukkhipitvaa pabbatamuddhani na potheti, taava na.m adhosiro hutvaa olambantova maara.nakaara.na.m pucchissaamii''ti. eva.m cintetvaa ^a^V7.0204^ea^ ca pana so achambhito asantasanto tathaa akaasi. tena vutta.m ``dhaarayi kaatiyaano''ti, tikkhattu.m khipitvaa dhaarayiiti attho.
[21] ``so lambamaano narake papaate, mahabbhaye lomaha.mse vidugge.
[22] asantasanto kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tho, iccabravi pu.n.naka.m naama yakkha.m..
[22] accaahita.m kamma.m karosi ludra.m, bhaave ca te kusala.m natthi ki~nci..
[21] ``ya.m ma.m papaatasmi.m papaatumicchasi, ko nu tavattho mara.nena mayha.m.
[22] amaanusasseva tavajja va.n.no, aacikkha me tva.m katamaasi devataati..

[03] tattha ^b^so lambamaano^eb^ti so kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tho tatiyavaare lambamaano. ^b^ariyaavakaaso^eb^ti ruupena ariyasadiso devava.n.no hutvaa carasi. ^b^asa~n~nato^eb^ti kaayaadiihi asa~n~nato ^a^P6.0307^ea^ dussiilo. ^b^accaahita^eb^nti hitaatikkanta.m, atiahita.m vaa. ^b^bhaave ca te^eb^ti tava citte appamattakampi kusala.m natthi. ^b^amaanusasseva tavajja va.n.no^eb^ti ajja tava ida.m kaara.na.m amaanusasseva. ^b^katamaasi devataa^eb^ti yakkhaana.m antare katarayakkho naama tva.m.
[21] ``yadi te suto pu.n.nako naama yakkho, ra~n~no kuverassa hi so sajibbo.
[22] bhuumindharo varu.no naama naago, brahaa sucii va.n.nabaluupapanno..
[21] ``tassaanuja.m dhiitara.m kaamayaami, irandhatii naama saa naagaka~n~naa.
[22] tassaa sumajjhaaya piyaaya hetu, pataarayi.m tuyha vadhaaya dhiiraa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sajibbo^eb^ti sajiivo amacco. ^b^brahaa^eb^ti aarohapari.naahasampanno u.t.thaapitaka~ncanaruupasadiso. ^b^va.n.nabaluupapanno^eb^ti sariirava.n.nena ca kaayabalena ca upagato. ^b^tassaanuja^eb^nti tassa anujaata.m dhiitara.m. ^b^pataarayi^eb^nti citta.m pavattesi.m, sanni.t.thaanamakaasinti attho.

[03] ta.m ^a^V7.0205^ea^ ^a^M7.0215^ea^ sutvaa mahaasatto ``aya.m loko duggahitena nassati, naagamaa.navika.m patthentassa mama mara.nena ki.m payojana.m, tathato kaara.na.m jaanissaamii''ti cintetvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``maa heva tva.m yakkha ahosi muu.lho, na.t.thaa bahuu duggahiitena loke.
[22] ki.m te sumajjhaaya piyaaya kicca.m, mara.nena me i"ngha su.nomi sabba''nti..
[03] ta.m sutvaa tassa aacikkhanto pu.n.nako aaha --
[22] ta.m yaacamaana.m sasuro avoca, yathaa mama~n~ni.msu sukaamaniita.m..
[21] ``dajjemu kho te sutanu.m sunetta.m, sucimhita.m candanalittagatta.m.
[27] sace tuva.m hadaya.m pa.n.ditassa, dhammena laddhaa idha maaharesi.
[22] etena ^a^P6.0308^ea^ vittena kumaari labbhaa, na~n~na.m dhana.m uttari patthayaama..
[21] ``eva.m na muu.lhosmi su.nohi katte, na caapi me duggahitatthi ki~nci.
[22] hadayena te dhammaladdhena naagaa, irandhati.m naagaka~n~na.m dadanti..
[21] ``tasmaa aha.m tuyha.m vadhaaya yutto, eva.m mamattho mara.nena tuyha.m.
[22] idheva ta.m narake paatayitvaa, hantvaana ta.m hadayamaanayissa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^dhiitukaamo^eb^ti dhiitara.m kaamemi patthemi, dhiitu atthaaya vicaraami. ^b^~naatibhatohamasmii^eb^ti tasmaa tassa ~naatibhatako naama aha.m amhi. ^b^ta^eb^nti ^a^M7.0216^ea^ ta.m naagaka~n~na.m. ^b^yaacamaana^eb^nti yaacanta.m ma.m. ^b^yathaa ma^eb^nti yasmaa ma.m. ^b^a~n~ni.msuu^eb^ti jaani.msu. ^b^sukaamaniita^eb^nti su.t.thu esa kaamena niitoti sukaamaniito, ta.m sukaamaniita.m. tasmaa sasuro ^b^`dajjemu kho te''^eb^tiaadimavoca. tattha ^b^dajjemuu^eb^ti dadeyyaama. ^b^sutanu^eb^nti sundarasariira.m. ^b^idha maaharesii^eb^ti idha naagabhavane dhammena laddhaa aahareyyaasiiti.

[03] tassa ta.m katha.m sutvaa mahaasatto cintesi ``vimalaaya mama hadayena kicca.m natthi, varu.nanaagaraajena mama dhammakatha.m sutvaa ma.ninaa ma.m puujetvaa tattha gatena mama dhammakathikabhaavo va.n.nito ^a^V7.0206^ea^ bhavissati, tato vimalaaya mama dhammakathaaya doha.lo uppanno bhavissati, varu.nena duggahita.m gahetvaa pu.n.nako aa.natto bhavissati, svaaya.m attanaa duggahitena ma.m maaretu.m evaruupa.m dukkha.m paapesi, mama pa.n.ditabhaavo .thaanuppattikaara.nacintanasamatthataa imasmi.m ma.m maarente ki.m karissati, handaaha.m sa~n~naapessaami na''nti. cintetvaa ca pana ``maa.nava, saadhunaradhamma.m naama jaanaami, yaavaaha.m na maraami, taava ma.m pabbatamuddhani nisiidaapetvaa saadhunaradhamma.m naama su.nohi, pacchaa ya.m icchasi, ta.m kareyyaasii''ti vatvaa saadhunaradhamma.m va.n.netvaa attano jiivita.m aaharaapento so adhosiro olambantova gaathamaaha --
[21] ``khippa.m mama.m uddhara kaatiyaana, hadayena me yadi te atthi kicca.m.
[22] ye ^a^P6.0309^ea^ kecime saadhunarassa dhammaa, sabbeva te paatukaromi ajjaa''ti..

[03] ta.m sutvaa pu.n.nako ``aya.m pa.n.ditena devamanussaana.m akathitapubbo dhammo bhavissati, khippameva na.m uddharitvaa saadhunaradhamma.m su.nissaamii''ti cintetvaa mahaasatta.m ukkhipitvaa pabbatamuddhani nisiidaapesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``so pu.n.nako kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m, nagamuddhani khippa.m pati.t.thapetvaa.
[21] ``samuddha.to ^a^M7.0217^ea^ mesi tuva.m papaataa, hadayena te ajja mamatthi kicca.m.
[22] ye kecime saadhunarassa dhammaa, sabbeva me paatukarohi ajjaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^assatthamaasiina^eb^nti laddhassaasa.m hutvaa nisinna.m. ^b^samekkhiyaanaa^eb^ti disvaa. ^b^saadhunarassa dhammaa^eb^ti narassa saadhudhammaa, sundaradhammaati attho.
[21] ``samuddha.to tyasmi aha.m papaataa, hadayena me yadi te atthi kicca.m.
[22] ye kecime saadhunarassa dhammaa, sabbeva te paatukaromi ajjaa''ti..

[03] atha ^a^V7.0207^ea^ na.m mahaasatto ``kili.t.thagattomhi, nhaayaami taavaa''ti aaha. yakkhopi ``saadhuu''ti nhaanodaka.m aaharitvaa nhaatakaale mahaasattassa dibbadussagandhamaalaadiini datvaa ala"nkatappa.tiyattakaale dibbabhojana.m adaasi. atha mahaasatto bhuttabhojano kaa.laagirimatthaka.m ala"nkaaraapetvaa aasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiiditvaa buddhaliilaaya saadhunaradhamma.m desento gaathamaaha --
[21] ``yaataanuyaayii ca bhavaahi maa.nava, alla~nca paa.ni.m parivajjayassu.
[22] maa ^a^P6.0310^ea^ cassu mittesu kadaaci dubbhii, maa ca vasa.m asatiina.m nigacche''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^alla~nca paa.ni.m parivajjayassuu^eb^ti alla.m tinta.m paa.ni.m maa dahi maa jhaapehi.
[03] yakkho sa.mkhittena bhaasite cattaaro saadhunaradhamme bujjhitu.m asakkonto vitthaarena pucchanto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``katha.m ^a^M7.0218^ea^ nu yaata.m anuyaayi hoti, alla~nca paa.ni.m dahate katha.m so.
[22] asatii ca kaa ko pana mittadubbho, akkhaahi me pucchito etamattha''nti..
[21] ``asanthuta.m nopi ca di.t.thapubba.m, yo aasanenaapi nimantayeyya.
[22] tasseva attha.m puriso kareyya, yaataanuyaayiiti tamaahu pa.n.ditaa..
[22] na tassa paapa.m manasaapi cintaye, adubbhapaa.ni.m dahate mittadubbho..
[22] na tassa saakha.m bha~njeyya, mittadubbho hi paapako..
[21] ``pu.n.nampi cema.m pathavi.m dhanena, dajjitthiyaa puriso sammataaya.
[22] laddhaa kha.na.m atima~n~neyya tampi, taasa.m vasa.m asatiina.m na gacche..
[26] asatii ca saa so pana mittadubbho,

[03] tattha ^a^P6.0311^ea^ ^b^asanthuta^eb^nti ekaahadviihampi ekato avutthapubba.m. ^b^yo aasanenaapii^eb^ti yo evaruupa.m puggala.m aasanamattenapi nimantayeyya, pageva annapaanaadiihi. ^b^tassevaa^eb^ti tassa pubbakaarissa attha.m puriso karoteva. ^b^yaataanuyaayii^eb^ti pubbakaaritaaya yaatassa puggalassa anuyaayii ^a^M7.0219^ea^. pa.thama.m karonto hi yaayii naama, pacchaa karonto anuyaayii naamaati eva.m pa.n.ditaa kathenti. aya.m devaraaja, pa.thamo saadhunaradhammo. ^b^adubbhapaa.ni^eb^nti adubbhaka.m attano bhu~njanahatthameva dahanto hi mittadubbhii naama hoti. iti allahatthassa ajjhaapana.m naama aya.m dutiyo saadhunaradhammo. ^b^na tassaa^eb^ti tassa saakha.m vaa patta.m vaa na bha~njeyya. ki.mkaara.naa? mittadubbho hi paapako. iti paribhuttacchaayassa acetanassa rukkhassapi paapa.m karonto mittadubbhii naama hoti, kima"nga.m pana manussabhuutassaati. eva.m mittesu adubbhana.m naama aya.m tatiyo saadhunaradhammo. ^b^dajjitthiyaa^eb^ti dadeyya itthiyaa. ^b^sammataayaa^eb^ti ``ahameva tassaa piyo, na a~n~no, ma~n~neva saa icchatii''ti eva.m su.t.thu mataaya. ^b^laddhaa kha.na^eb^nti aticaarassa okaasa.m labhitvaa. ^b^asatiina^eb^nti asaddhammasamannaagataana.m itthiina.m. iti maatugaama.m nissaaya paapassa akara.na.m naama aya.m catuttho saadhunaradhammo. ^b^so dhammiko hohii^eb^ti devaraaja, so tva.m imehi catuuhi saadhunaradhammehi yutto hohiiti.
[03] eva.m mahaasatto yakkhassa cattaaro saadhunaradhamme buddhaliilaaya kathesi.

[03] te dhamme su.nantoyeva pu.n.nako sallakkhesi ``catuusupi .thaanesu pa.n.dito attano jiivitameva yaacati, aya.m kho mayha.m pubbe asanthutasseva sakkaaramakaasi, ahamassa nivesane tiiha.m mahanta.m yasa.m anubhavanto vasi.m, aha~ncima.m paapakamma.m karonto maatugaama.m nissaaya karomi, sabbathaapi ahameva mittadubbhii. sace pa.n.dita.m aparajjhaami, na saadhunaradhamme vattissaami ^a^V7.0209^ea^ naama, tasmaa ki.m me naagamaa.navikaaya, indapatthanagaravaasiina.m assumukhaani haasento ima.m vegena tattha netvaa dhammasabhaaya.m otaaressaamii''ti cintetvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``avasi.m ^a^M7.0220^ea^ aha.m tuyha tiiha.m agaare, annena paanena upa.t.thitosmi.
[22] mitto mamaasii visajjaamaha.m ta.m, kaama.m ghara.m uttamapa~n~na gaccha..
[21] api ^a^P6.0312^ea^ haayatu naagakulaa attho, alampi me naagaka~n~naaya hotu.
[22] so tva.m sakeneva subhaasitena, muttosi me ajja vadhaaya pa~n~naa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^upa.t.thitosmii^eb^ti tayaa upa.t.thitosmi. ^b^visajjaamaha.m ta^eb^nti vissajjemi aha.m ta.m. ^b^kaama^eb^nti eka.msena. ^b^vadhaayaa^eb^ti vadhato. ^b^pa~n~naa^eb^ti pa~n~navanta.
[03] atha na.m mahaasatto ``maa.nava, tva.m taava ma.m attano ghara.m maa pesehi, naagabhavanameva ma.m nehii''ti vadanto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``handa tuva.m yakkha mamampi nehi, sasura.m te attha.m mayi carassu.
[22] maya~nca naagaadhipati.m vimaana.m, dakkhemu naagassa adi.t.thapubba''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^handaa^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipaato. ^b^sasura.m te attha.m mayi carassuu^eb^ti tava sasurassa santaka.m attha.m mayi cara maa naasehi. ^b^naagaadhipati.m vimaana^eb^nti ahampi naagaadhipati~nca vimaana~ncassa adi.t.thapubba.m passeyya.m.
[21] ``ya.m ve narassa ahitaaya assa, na ta.m pa~n~no arahati dassanaaya.
[22] atha kena va.n.nena amittagaama.m, tuvamicchasi uttamapa~n~na gantu''nti..
[21] ``addhaa ^a^V7.0210^ea^ pajaanaami ahampi eta.m, na ta.m pa~n~no arahati dassanaaya.
[22] paapa~nca me natthi kata.m kuhi~nci, tasmaa na sa"nke mara.naagamaayaa''ti..

[03] apica ^a^P6.0313^ea^, devaraaja, taadiso yakkho kakkha.lo mayaa dhammakathaaya palobhetvaa mudukato, idaaneva ma.m ``ala.m me naagamaa.navikaaya, attano ghara.m yaahii''ti vadesi, naagaraajassa mudukara.na.m mama bhaaro, nehiyeva ma.m tatthaati. tassa ta.m vacana.m sutvaa pu.n.nako ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa tu.t.thacitto aaha --
[21] ``handa ca .thaana.m atulaanubhaava.m, mayaa saha dakkhasi ehi katte.
[22] yatthacchati naccagiitehi naago, raajaa yathaa vessava.no na.li~n~na.m..
[21] ``na.m naagaka~n~naa carita.m ga.nena, nikii.lita.m niccamaho ca ratti.m.
[21] ``annena paanena upetaruupa.m, naccehi giitehi ca vaaditehi.

[03] tattha ^b^handa caa^eb^ti nipaatamattameva. ^b^.thaana^eb^nti naagaraajassa vasana.t.thaana.m. ^b^na.li~n~na^eb^nti na.liniya.m naama raajadhaaniya.m. ^b^carita.m ga.nenaa^eb^ti ta.m naagaka~n~naana.m ga.nena carita.m. ^b^nikii.lita^eb^nti nicca.m aho ca ratti~nca naagaka~n~naahi kii.litaanukii.lita.m.
[03] eva~nca ^a^M7.0222^ea^ pana vatvaa pu.n.nako mahaasatta.m assapi.t.tha.m aaropetvaa tattha nesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``so pu.n.nako kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m, nisiidayii pacchato aasanasmi.m.

[03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ ^a^P6.0314^ea^ ^b^pu.n.nako^eb^ti bhikkhave, so eva.m naagabhavana.m va.n.netvaa pa.n.dita.m attano aaja~n~na.m aaropetvaa naagabhavana.m nesi. ^b^.thaana^eb^nti naagaraajassa vasana.t.thaana.m. ^b^pacchato pu.n.nakassaa^eb^ti pu.n.nakassa kira etadahosi ``sace naagaraajaa pa.n.dita.m disvaa muducitto bhavissati, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce, tassa ta.m apassantasseva sindhava.m aaropetvaa aadaaya gamissaamii''ti. atha na.m pacchato .thapesi. tena vutta.m ``pacchato pu.n.nakassaa''ti. ^b^saamaggipekkhamaano^eb^ti saamaggi.m apekkhamaano. ``saama.m apekkhii''tipi paa.tho, attano jaamaatara.m passitvaa pa.thamatara.m sayameva ajjhabhaasathaati attho.
[21] ``yannu tuva.m agamaa maccaloka.m, anvesamaano hadaya.m pa.n.ditassa.
[03] tattha ^b^kacci samiddhenaa^eb^ti kacci te manorathena samiddhena nipphannena idhaagatosiiti pucchati.
[21] ``aya~nhi so aagato ya.m tvamicchasi, dhammena laddho mama dhammapaalo.
[22] ta.m passatha sammukhaa bhaasamaana.m, sukho have sappurisehi sa"ngamo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ya.m tvamicchasii^eb^ti ya.m tva.m icchasi. ``yantu micchasii''tipi paa.tho. ^b^sammukhaa bhaasamaana^eb^nti ta.m lokasakkata.m dhammapaala.m idaani madhurena sarena dhamma.m bhaasamaana.m sammukhaava passatha, sappurisehi eka.t.thaane samaagamo hi naama sukho hotiiti.

[03] tattha ^b^byamhito^eb^ti bhiito. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- pa.n.dita, tva.m adi.t.thapubba.m naagabhavana.m disvaa mara.nabhayena a.t.tito bhiito hutvaa ya.m ma.m naabhivaadesi, ida.m kaara.na.m pa~n~navantaana.m na hotiiti.

[03] eva.m vandana.m paccaasiisanta.m naagaraajaana.m mahaasatto ``na tva.m mayaa vanditabbo''ti avatvaava attano ~naa.navantataaya upaayakosallena ``aha.m vajjhappattabhaavena na.m ta.m vandaamii''ti vadanto gaathaadvayamaaha --
[21] ``na ^a^P6.0315^ea^ camhi byamhito naaga, na ca maccubhaya.t.tito.
[22] na vajjho abhivaadeyya, vajjha.m vaa naabhivaadaye..
[22] ya.m naro hantumiccheyya, ta.m kamma.m nupapajjatii''ti..

[03] tassattho -- nevaaha.m, naagaraaja, adi.t.thapubba.m naagabhavana.m disvaa bhiito, na mara.nabhaya.t.tito. maadisassa hi mara.nabhaya.m naama natthi, vajjho pana abhivaadetu.m, vajjha.m vaa avajjhopi abhivaadaapetu.m na labhati. ya~nhi naro ^a^M7.0224^ea^ hantumiccheyya, so ta.m katha.m nu abhivaadeyya, katha.m vaa tena attaana.m abhivaadaapayetha ve. tassa hi ta.m kamma.m na upapajjati. tva~nca kira ma.m maaraapetu.m ima.m aa.naapesi, kathaaha.m ta.m vandaadhiiti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa naagaraajaa mahaasattassa thuti.m karonto dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[22] na vajjho abhivaadeyya, vajjha.m vaa naabhivaadaye..
[22] ya.m naro hantumiccheyya, ta.m kamma.m nupapajjatii''ti..
[03] idaani mahaasatto naagaraajena saddhi.m pa.tisanthaara.m karonto aaha --
[21] ``asassata.m sassata.m nu tavayida.m, iddhii jutii balaviiriyuupapatti.
[22] pucchaami ta.m naagaraajetamattha.m, katha.m nu te laddhamida.m vimaana.m..
[21] ``adhiccaladdha.m pari.naamaja.m te, saya.mkata.m udaahu devehi dinna.m.
[22] akkhaahi me naagaraajetamattha.m, yatheva te laddhamida.m vimaana''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^tavayida^eb^nti ida.m tava yasajaata.m, vimaana.m vaa asassata.m sassatasadisa.m, ``maa kho yasa.m nissaaya paapamakaasii''ti iminaa padena attano jiivita.m yaacati. ^b^iddhii^eb^ti naagaiddhi ca naagajuti ca kaayabala~nca cetasikaviiriya~nca naagabhavane upapatti ca ^a^P6.0316^ea^ ya~nca te ida.m vimaana.m, pucchaami ta.m naagaraaja, etamattha.m, katha.m nu te ida.m sabba.m laddhanti. ^b^adhiccaladdha^eb^nti ki.m nu tayaa ida.m vimaana.m eva.m sampanna.m adhicca akaara.nena laddha.m, udaahu utupari.naamaja.m te ida.m, udaahu saya.m sahattheneva kata.m, udaahu devehi te dinna.m, yatheva te ida.m laddha.m, eta.m me attha.m akkhaahiiti.
[21] ``naadhiccaladdha.m na pari.naamaja.m me, na saya.mkata.m naapi devehi dinna.m.
[22] sakehi kammehi apaapakehi, pu~n~nehi me laddhamida.m vimaana''nti..
[21] ``ki.m te vata.m ki.m pana brahmacariya.m, kissa suci.n.nassa aya.m vipaako.
[22] iddhii jutii balaviiriyuupapatti, ida~nca te naaga mahaavimaana''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^V7.0214^ea^ ^b^ki.m te vata^eb^nti naagaraaja, purimabhave tava ki.m vata.m ahosi, ko pana brahmacariyavaaso, katarassa sucaritassevesa iddhiaadiko vipaakoti.
[21] ``aha~nca bhariyaa ca manussaloke, saddhaa ubho daanapatii ahumhaa.
[22] opaanabhuuta.m me ghara.m tadaasi, santappitaa sama.nabraahma.naa ca..
[22] acchaadana.m saayanamannapaana.m, sakkacca daanaani adamha tattha..
[21] ``ta.m me vata.m ta.m pana brahmacariya.m, tassa suci.n.nassa aya.m vipaako.
[22] iddhii jutii balaviiriyuupapatti, ida~nca me dhiira mahaavimaana''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P6.0317^ea^ ^a^M7.0226^ea^ ^b^manussaloke^eb^ti a"ngara.t.the kaalacampaanagare. ^b^ta.m me vata^eb^nti ta.m sakkacca.m dinnadaanameva mayha.m vattasamaadaana~nca brahmacariya~nca ahosi, tasseva sucaritassa aya.m iddhaadiko vipaakoti.
[21] ``eva.m ce te laddhamida.m vimaana.m, jaanaasi pu~n~naana.m phaluupapatti.m.
[22] tasmaa hi dhamma.m cara appamatto, yathaa vimaana.m puna maavasesii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^jaanaasii^eb^ti sace tayaa daanaanubhaavena ta.m laddha.m, eva.m sante jaanaasi naama pu~n~naana.m phala~nca pu~n~naphalena nibbatta.m upapatti~nca. ^b^tasmaa hii^eb^ti yasmaa pu~n~nehi tayaa ida.m laddha.m, tasmaa. ^b^puna maavasesii^eb^ti punapi yathaa ima.m naagabhavana.m ajjhaavasasi, eva.m dhamma.m cara.
[21] ``nayidha ^a^V7.0215^ea^ santi sama.nabraahma.naa ca, yesannapaanaani dademu katte.
[22] akkhaahi me pucchito etamattha.m, yathaa vimaana.m puna maavasemaa''ti..
[21] ``bhogii hi te santi idhuupapannaa, puttaa ca daaraa anujiivino ca.
[22] tesu tuva.m vacasaa kammunaa ca, asampadu.t.tho ca bhavaahi nicca.m..
[21] ``eva.m tuva.m naaga asampadosa.m, anupaalaya vacasaa kammunaa ca.
[22] .thatvaa idha yaavataayuka.m vimaane, uddha.m ito gacchasi devaloka''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0227^ea^ ^b^bhogii^eb^ti bhogino, naagaati attho. ^b^tesuu^eb^ti tesu puttadaaraadiisu bhogiisu vaacaaya kammena ca nicca.m asampadu.t.tho bhava. ^b^anupaalayaa^eb^ti eva.m puttaadiisu ceva sesasattesu ca mettacittasa"nkhaata.m asampadosa.m anurakkha. ^b^uddha.m ito^eb^ti ito naagabhavanato cuto uparidevaloka.m gamissati. mettacitta~nhi daanato atirekatara.m pu~n~nanti.

[03] tato naagaraajaa ^a^P6.0318^ea^ mahaasattassa dhammakatha.m sutvaa ``na sakkaa pa.n.ditena bahi papa~nca.m kaatu.m, vimalaaya dassetvaa subhaasita.m saavetvaa doha.la.m pa.tippassambhetvaa dhana~ncayaraajaana.m haasento pa.n.dita.m pesetu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``addhaa hi so socati raajase.t.tho, tayaa vinaa yassa tuva.m sajibbo.
[22] dukkhuupaniitopi tayaa samecca, vindeyya poso sukhamaaturopii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^sajibbo^eb^ti sajiivo amacco. ^b^sameccaa^eb^ti tayaa saha samaagantvaa. ^b^aaturopii^eb^ti baa.lhagilaanopi samaano.
[03] ta.m sutvaa mahaasatto naagaraajassa thuti.m karonto itara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``addhaa sata.m bhaasasi naaga dhamma.m, anuttara.m atthapada.m suci.n.na.m.
[22] etaadisiyaasu hi aapadaasu, pa~n~naayate maadisaana.m viseso''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0216^ea^ ^b^addhaa sata^eb^nti eka.msena santaana.m pa.n.ditaana.m dhamma.m bhaasasi. ^b^atthapada^eb^nti hitako.t.thaasa.m. ^b^etaadisiyaasuu^eb^ti evaruupaasu aapadaasu etaadise bhaye upa.t.thite maadisaana.m pa~n~navantaana.m viseso pa~n~naayati.
[03] ta.m sutvaa naagaraajaa atirekatara.m tu.t.tho tameva pucchanto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``akkhaahi ^a^M7.0228^ea^ no taaya.m mudhaa nu laddho, akkhehi no taaya.m ajesi juute.
[22] dhammena laddho iti taayamaaha, katha.m nu tva.m hatthamimassa maagato''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^akkhaahi no^eb^ti aacikkha amhaaka.m. ^b^taaya^eb^nti ta.m aya.m. ^b^mudhaa nu laddho^eb^ti ki.m nu kho mudhaa amuulakeneva labhi, udaahu juute ajesi. ^b^iti taayamaahaa^eb^ti aya.m pu.n.nako ``dhammena me pa.n.dito laddho''ti vadati. ^b^katha.m nu tva.m hatthamimassa maagato^eb^ti tva.m katha.m imassa hattha.m aagatosi.
[21] ``yo missaro tattha ahosi raajaa, tamaayamakkhehi ajesi juute.
[22] so ^a^P6.0319^ea^ ma.m jito raajaa imassadaasi, dhammena laddhosmi asaahasenaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^yo missaro^eb^ti yo ma.m issaro. ^b^imassadaasii^eb^ti imassa pu.n.nakassa adaasi.
[03] ta.m sutvaa naagaraajaa tu.t.tho ahosi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] hatthe gahetvaana anomapa~n~na.m, paavekkhi bhariyaaya tadaa sakaase..
[21] ``yena tva.m vimale pa.n.du, yena bhatta.m na ruccati.
[22] na ca metaadiso va.n.no, ayameso tamonudo..
[22] tassa vaakya.m nisaamehi, dullabha.m dassana.m punaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0229^ea^ ^b^paavekkhii^eb^ti pavi.t.tho. ^b^yenaa^eb^ti bhadde vimale, yena kaara.nena tva.m pa.n.du ceva, na ca te bhatta.m ruccati. ^b^na ca metaadiso va.n.no^eb^ti pathavitale vaa devaloke vaa na ca taadiso va.n.no a~n~nassa kassaci atthi, yaadiso etassa gu.nava.n.no pattha.to. ^b^ayameso tamonudo^eb^ti ya.m nissaaya tava doha.lo uppanno, ayameva so sabbalokassa tamonudo. ^b^punaa^eb^ti puna etassa dassana.m naama dullabhanti vadati.
[03] vimalaapi ta.m disvaa pa.tisanthaara.m akaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``disvaana ta.m vimalaa bhuuripa~n~na.m, dasa"ngulii a~njali.m paggahetvaa.
[22] ha.t.thena bhaavena patiitaruupaa, iccabravi kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha''nti..
[03] ito para.m vimalaaya ca mahaasattassa ca vacanappa.tivacanagaathaa --
[21] ``na camhi byamhito naagi, na ca maccubhaya.t.tito.
[22] na vajjho abhivaadeyya, vajjha.m vaa naabhivaadaye..
[22] ya.m naro hantumiccheyya, ta.m kamma.m nupapajjati..
[22] na vajjho abhivaadeyya, vajjha.m vaa naabhivaadaye..
[22] ya.m naro hantumiccheyya, ta.m kamma.m nupapajjati..
[21] ``asassata.m sassata.m nu tavayida.m, iddhii jutii balaviiriyuupapatti.
[22] pucchaami ta.m naagaka~n~netamattha.m, katha.m nu te laddhamida.m vimaana.m..
[21] ``adhiccaladdha.m ^a^M7.0230^ea^ pari.naamaja.m te, saya.mkata.m udaahu devehi dinna.m.
[22] akkhaahi me naagaka~n~netamattha.m, yatheva te laddhamida.m vimaana.m..
[21] ``naadhiccaladdha.m na pari.naamaja.m me, na saya.mkatha.m naapi devehi dinna.m.
[22] sakehi kammehi apaapakehi, pu~n~nehi me laddhamida.m vimaana.m..
[21] ``ki.m te vata.m ki.m pana brahmacariya.m, kissa suci.n.nassa aya.m vipaako.
[22] iddhii jutii balaviiriyuupapatti, ida~nca te naagi mahaavimaana.m..
[21] ``aha~nca kho saamiko caapi mayha.m, saddhaa ubho daanapatii ahumhaa.
[22] opaanabhuuta.m me ghara.m tadaasi, santappitaa sama.nabraahma.naa ca..
[22] acchaadana.m saayanamannapaana.m, sakkacca daanaani adamha tattha..
[21] ``ta.m me vata.m ta.m pana brahmacariya.m, tassa suci.n.nassa aya.m vipaako.
[22] iddhii jutii balaviiriyuupapatti, ida~nca me dhiira mahaavimaana.m..
[21] ``eva.m ^a^P6.0321^ea^ ce te laddhamida.m vimaana.m, jaanaasi pu~n~naana.m phaluupapatti.m.
[22] tasmaa hi dhamma.m cara appamattaa, yathaa vimaana.m puna maavasesi..
[21] ``nayidha ^a^M7.0231^ea^ santi sama.nabraahma.naa ca, yesannapaanaani dademu katte.
[22] akkhaahi me pucchito etamattha.m, yathaa vimaana.m puna maavasema..
[21] ``bhogii ^a^V7.0219^ea^ hi te santi idhuupapannaa, puttaa ca daaraa anujiivino ca.
[22] tesu tuva.m vacasaa kammunaa ca, asampadu.t.thaa ca bhavaahi nicca.m..
[21] ``eva.m tuva.m naagi asampadosa.m, anupaalaya vacasaa kammunaa ca.
[22] .thatvaa idha yaavataayuka.m vimaane, uddha.m ito gacchasi devaloka.m..
[21] ``addhaa hi so socati raajase.t.tho, tayaa vinaa yassa tuva.m sajibbo.
[22] dukkhuupaniitopi tayaa samecca, vindeyya poso sukhamaaturopi..
[21] ``addhaa sata.m bhaasasi naagi dhamma.m, anuttara.m atthapada.m suci.n.na.m.
[22] etaadisiyaasu hi aapadaasu, pa~n~naayate maadisaana.m viseso..
[21] ``akkhaahi no taaya.m mudhaa nu laddho, akkhehi no taaya.m ajesi juute.
[22] dhammena laddho iti taayamaaha, katha.m nu tva.m hatthamimassa maagato..
[21] ``yo missaro tattha ahosi raajaa, tamaayamakkhehi ajesi juute.
[22] so ^a^P6.0322^ea^ ma.m jito raajaa imassadaasi, dhammena laddhosmi asaahasenaa''ti..
[03] imaasa.m gaathaana.m attho he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] mahaasattassa ^a^M7.0232^ea^ vacana.m sutvaa atirekatara.m tu.t.thaa vimalaa mahaasatta.m gahetvaa sahassagandhodakagha.tehi nhaapetvaa nhaanakaale mahaasattassa dibbadussadibbagandhamaalaadiini datvaa ala"nkatappa.tiyattakaale dibbabhojana.m bhojesi. mahaasatto bhuttabhojano ala"nkataasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiiditvaa buddhaliilaaya dhamma.m desesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``ubhopi ^a^V7.0220^ea^ te attamane viditvaa, mahoraga.m naagaka~n~na~nca dhiiro.
[22] achambhii abhiito alomaha.t.tho, iccabravi varu.na.m naagaraajaana.m..
[21] ``maa rodhayi naaga aayaahamasmi, yena tavattho ida.m sariira.m.
[22] hadayena ma.msena karohi kicca.m, saya.m karissaami yathaamati te''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^achambhii^eb^ti nikkampo. ^b^alomaha.t.tho^eb^ti bhayena aha.t.thalomo. ^b^iccabravii^eb^ti viima.msanavasena iti abravi. ^b^maa rodhayii^eb^ti ``mittadubbhikamma.m karomii''ti maa bhaayi, ``katha.m nu kho ima.m idaani maaressaamii''ti vaa maa cintayi. ^b^naagaa^eb^ti varu.na.m aalapati. ^b^aayaahamasmii^eb^ti aayo aha.m asmi, ayameva vaa paa.tho. ^b^saya.m karissaamii^eb^ti sace tva.m ``imassa santike idaani dhammo me suto''ti ma.m maaretu.m na visahasi, ahameva yathaa tava ajjhaasayo, tathaa saya.m karissaamiiti.
[21] ``pa~n~naa have hadaya.m pa.n.ditaana.m, te tyamha pa~n~naaya maya.m sutu.t.thaa.
[22] anuunanaamo labhatajja daara.m, ajjeva ta.m kuruyo paapayaatuu''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^te tyamhaa^eb^ti te maya.m tava pa~n~naaya sutu.t.thaa. ^b^anuunanaamo^eb^ti sampu.n.nanaamo pu.n.nako yakkhasenaapati. ^b^labhatajja daara^eb^nti labhatu ajja daara.m, dadaami assa dhiitara.m irandhati.m. ^b^paapayaatuu^eb^ti ajjeva ta.m kurura.t.tha.m pu.n.nako paapetu.
[03] eva~nca ^a^P6.0323^ea^ pana vatvaa varu.no naagaraajaa irandhati.m pu.n.nakassa adaasi. so ta.m labhitvaa tu.t.thacitto mahaasattena saddhi.m sallapi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``sa pu.n.nako attamano udaggo, irandhati.m naagaka~n~na.m labhitvaa.
[22] ha.t.thena bhaavena patiitaruupo, iccabravi kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m..
[21] ``bhariyaaya ma.m tva.m akari sama"ngi.m, aha~nca te vidhura karomi kicca.m.
[22] ida~nca te ma.niratana.m dadaami, ajjeva ta.m kuruyo paapayaamii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0221^ea^ ^b^ma.niratana^eb^nti pa.n.dita, aha.m tava gu.nesu pasanno arahaami tava anucchavika.m kicca.m kaatu.m, tasmaa ima~nca te cakkavattiparibhoga.m ma.niratana.m demi, ajjeva ta.m indapattha.m paapemiiti.
[03] atha mahaasatto tassa thuti.m karonto itara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ajeyyamesaa tava hotu metti, bhariyaaya kaccaana piyaaya saddhi.m.
[22] aanandi vitto sumano patiito, datvaa ma.ni.m ma~nca nayindapattha''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0234^ea^ ^b^ajeyyamesaa^eb^ti esaa tava bhariyaaya saddhi.m piyasa.mvaasametti ajeyyaa hotu. ``aanandi vitto''tiaadiihi piitisama"ngibhaavamevassa vadati. ^b^nayindapattha^eb^nti naya indapattha.m.
[03] ta.m sutvaa pu.n.nako tathaa akaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``sa pu.n.nako kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m, nisiidayii purato aasanasmi.m.
[21] ``mano manussassa yathaapi gacche, tatopissa khippatara.m ahosi.
[22] sa pu.n.nako kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m, upaanayii nagara.m indapattha.m..
[21] ``etindapattha.m ^a^P6.0324^ea^ nagara.m padissati, rammaani ca ambavanaani bhaagaso.
[22] aha~nca bhariyaaya sama"ngibhuuto, tuva~nca pattosi saka.m niketa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^yathaapi gacche^eb^ti mano naama ki~ncaapi na gacchati, duure aaramma.na.m ga.nhanto pana gatoti vuccati, tasmaa manassa aaramma.naggaha.natopi khippatara.m tassa manomayasindhavassa gamana.m ahosiiti evamettha attho da.t.thabbo. ^b^etindapattha^eb^nti assapi.t.the nisinnoyevassa dassento evamaaha. ^b^saka.m niketa^eb^nti tva~nca attano nivesana.m sampattoti aaha.

[03] tasmi.m pana divase paccuusakaale raajaa supina.m addasa. evaruupo supino ahosi -- ra~n~no nivesanadvaare pa~n~naakkhandho siilamayasaakho pa~ncagorasaphalo ala"nkatahatthigavaassapa.ticchanno mahaarukkho ^a^V7.0222^ea^ .thito. mahaajano tassa sakkaara.m katvaa a~njali.m paggayha namassamaano ^a^M7.0235^ea^ a.t.thaasi. atheko ka.nhapuriso pharuso rattasaa.takanivattho rattapupphaka.n.nadharo aavudhahattho aagantvaa mahaajanassa paridevantasseva ta.m rukkha.m samuula.m chinditvaa aaka.d.dhanto aadaaya gantvaa puna ta.m aaharitvaa pakati.t.thaaneyeva .thapetvaa pakkaamiiti. raajaa ta.m supina.m parigga.nhanto ``mahaarukkho viya na a~n~no koci, vidhurapa.n.dito. mahaajanassa paridevantasseva ta.m samuula.m chinditvaa aadaaya gatapuriso viya na a~n~no koci, pa.n.dita.m gahetvaa gatamaa.navo. puna ta.m aaharitvaa pakati.t.thaaneyeva .thapetvaa gato viya so maa.navo puna ta.m pa.n.dita.m aanetvaa dhammasabhaaya dvaare .thapetvaa pakkamissati. addhaa ajja maya.m pa.n.dita.m passissaamaa''ti sanni.t.thaana.m katvaa somanassapatto sakalanagara.m ala"nkaaraapetvaa dhammasabha.m sajjaapetvaa ala"nkataratanama.n.dape dhammaasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa ekasataraajaamaccaga.nanagaravaasijaanapadaparivuto ``ajja tumhe pa.n.dita.m passissatha, maa socitthaa''ti mahaajana.m assaasetvaa pa.n.ditassa aagamana.m olokento dhammasabhaaya.m nisiidi. amaccaadayopi nisiidi.msu. tasmi.m kha.ne pu.n.nakopi pa.n.dita.m otaaretvaa dhammasabhaaya dvaare parisamajjheyeva .thapetvaa irandhati.m aadaaya devanagarameva gato. tamattha.m ^a^P6.0325^ea^ pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``na pu.n.nako kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m, oropiya dhammasabhaaya majjhe.
[21] ``ta.m disvaa raajaa paramappatiito, u.t.thaaya baahaahi palissajitvaa.

[03] tattha ^b^anomava.n.no^eb^ti ahiinava.n.no uttamava.n.no. ^b^avikampaya^eb^nti bhikkhave, so raajaa pa.n.dita.m palissajitvaa mahaajanamajjhe avikampanto anoliiyantoyeva hatthe gahetvaa attano abhimukha.m katvaa ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiidaapesi.
[03] atha ^a^M7.0236^ea^ raajaa tena saddhi.m sammoditvaa madhurapa.tisanthaara.m karonto gaathamaaha --
[21] ``tva.m no vinetaasi ratha.mva naddha.m, nandanti ta.m kuruyo dassanena.
[22] akkhaahi me pucchito etamattha.m, katha.m pamokkho ahu maa.navassaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0223^ea^ ^b^naddha^eb^nti yathaa naddha.m ratha.m saarathi vineti, eva.m tva.m amhaaka.m kaara.nena nayena hitakiriyaasu vinetaa. ^b^nandanti ta^eb^nti ta.m disvaava ime kurura.t.thavaasino tava dassanena nandanti. ^b^maa.navassaa^eb^ti maa.navassa santikaa katha.m tava pamokkho ahosi? yo vaa ta.m mu~ncantassa maa.navassa pamokkho, so kena kaara.nena ahosiiti attho.
[21] ``ya.m maa.navotyaabhivadii janinda, na so manusso naraviirase.t.tha.
[22] yadi te suto pu.n.nako naama yakkho, ra~n~no kuverassa hi so sajibbo..
[21] ``bhuumindharo varu.no naama naago, brahaa sucii va.n.nabaluupapanno.
[22] tassaanuja.m dhiitara.m kaamayaano, irandhatii naama saa naagaka~n~naa..
[21] ``tassaa ^a^P6.0326^ea^ sumajjhaaya piyaaya hetu, pataarayittha mara.naaya mayha.m.
[22] so ceva bhariyaaya sama"ngibhuuto, aha~nca anu~n~naato ma.ni ca laddho''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ya.m maa.navotyaabhivadii^eb^ti janinda ya.m tva.m ``maa.navo''ti abhivadasi. ^b^bhuumindharo^eb^ti bhuumindharanaagabhavanavaasii. ^b^saa naagaka~n~naa^eb^ti ya.m naagaka~n~na.m so patthayamaano mama mara.naaya pataarayi citta.m pavattesi, saa naagaka~n~naa ^a^M7.0237^ea^ irandhatii naama. ^b^piyaaya hetuu^eb^ti mahaaraaja, so hi naagaraajaa catupposathikapa~nhavissajjane pasanno ma.m ma.ninaa puujetvaa naagabhavana.m gato vimalaaya naama deviyaa ta.m ma.ni.m adisvaa ``deva, kuhi.m ma.nii''ti pucchito mama dhammakathikabhaava.m va.n.nesi. saa mayha.m dhammakatha.m sotukaamaa hutvaa mama hadaye doha.la.m uppaadesi. naagaraajaa duggahitena pana dhiitara.m irandhati.m aaha -- ``maataa, te vidhurassa hadayama.mse doha.linii, tassa hadayama.msa.m aaharitu.m samattha.m saamika.m pariyesaahii''ti. saa pariyesantii vessava.nassa bhaagineyya.m pu.n.naka.m naama yakkha.m disvaa ta.m attani pa.tibaddhacitta.m ~natvaa pitu santika.m nesi. atha na.m so ``vidhurapa.n.ditassa hadayama.msa.m aaharitu.m sakkonto irandhati.m labhissasii''ti aaha. pu.n.nako vepullapabbatato cakkavattiparibhoga.m ma.niratana.m aaharitvaa tumhehi saddhi.m juuta.m kii.litvaa ma.m jinitvaa labhi. aha~nca mama nivesane tiiha.m vasaapetvaa mahanta.m sakkaara.m akaasi.m. sopi ma.m assavaaladhi.m gaahaapetvaa himavante rukkhesu ca pabbatesu ca pothetvaa maaretu.m asakkonto sattame vaatakkhandhe verambhavaatamukhe ca pakkhanditvaa anupubbena sa.t.thiyojanubbedhe ^a^V7.0224^ea^ kaa.laagirimatthake .thapetvaa siihavesaadivasena ida~ncida~nca ruupa.m katvaapi maaretu.m asakkonto mayaa attano maara.nakaara.na.m pu.t.tho aacikkhi. athassaaha.m saadhunaradhamme kathesi.m. ta.m sutvaa pasannacitto ma.m idha aanetukaamo ahosi.

[03] athaaha.m ta.m aadaaya naagabhavana.m gantvaa naagara~n~no ca vimalaaya ca dhamma.m desesi.m. tato naagaraajaa ca vimalaa ca sabbanaagaparisaa ca pasiidi.msu. naagaraajaa tattha mayaa chaaha.m vutthakaale irandhati.m pu.n.nakassa ^a^P6.0327^ea^ adaasi. so ta.m labhitvaa pasannacitto hutvaa ma.m ma.niratanena puujetvaa naagaraajena aa.natto manomayasindhava.m aaropetvaa saya.m majjhimaasane nisiiditvaa irandhati.m pacchimaasane nisiidaapetvaa ma.m purimaasane nisiidaapetvaa idhaagantvaa parisamajjhe otaaretvaa irandhati.m aadaaya attano nagarameva gato. eva.m, mahaaraaja, so pu.n.nako tassaa sumajjhaaya piyaaya hetu pataarayittha mara.naaya mayha.m. atheva.m ma.m nissaaya so ceva bhariyaaya sama"ngibhuuto, mama dhammakatha.m sutvaa pasannena naagaraajena aha~nca anu~n~naato, tassa pu.n.nakassa santikaa aya.m sabbakaamadado cakkavattiparibhogama.ni ca laddho, ga.nhatha, deva, ima.m ma.ninti ra~n~no ratana.m adaasi.
[03] tato ^a^M7.0238^ea^ raajaa paccuusakaale attanaa di.t.thasupina.m nagaravaasiina.m kathetukaamo ``bhonto, nagaravaasino ajja mayaa di.t.thasupina.m su.naathaa''ti vatvaa aaha --
[21] ``rukkho hi mayha.m padvaare sujaato, pa~n~naakkhandho siilamayassa saakhaa.
[22] atthe ca dhamme ca .thito nipaako, gavapphalo hatthigavaassachanno..
[22] so no aya.m aagato sanniketa.m, rukkhassimassaapaciti.m karotha..
[21] ``ye keci vittaa mama paccayena, sabbeva te paatukarontu ajja.
[21] ``ye keci baddhaa mama atthi ra.t.the, sabbeva te bandhanaa mocayantu.
[22] yathevaya.m bandhanasmaa pamutto, evamete mu~ncare bandhanasmaa..
[22] amajjapaa majjarahaa pivantu, pu.n.naahi thaalaahi palissutaahi..
[21] ``mahaapatha.m nicca samavhayantu, tibba~nca rakkha.m vidahantu ra.t.the.

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0239^ea^ ^b^siilamayassa saakhaa^eb^ti etassa rukkhassa siilamayaa saakhaa. ^b^atthe ca dhammecaa^eb^ti vaddhiya~nca sabhaave ca. ^b^.thito nipaako^eb^ti so pa~n~naamayarukkho pati.t.thito. ^b^gavapphalo^eb^ti pa~ncavidhagorasaphalo. ^b^hatthigavaassachanno^eb^ti ala"nkatahatthigavaassehi sa~nchanno. ^b^naccagiitatuuriyaabhinaadite^eb^ti atha tassa rukkhassa puuja.m karontena mahaajanena tasmi.m rukkhe etehi naccaadiihi abhinaadite. ^b^ucchijja sena.m puriso ahaasii^eb^ti eko ka.nhapuriso aagantvaa ta.m rukkha.m ucchijja parivaaretvaa .thita.m sena.m palaapetvaa ahaasi gahetvaa gato. puna so rukkho aagantvaa amhaaka.m nivesanadvaarayeva .thito. so no aya.m rukkhasadiso pa.n.dito sanniketa.m aagato. idaani sabbeva tumhe rukkhassa imassa apaciti.m karotha, mahaasakkaara.m pavattetha.

[03] ^b^mama paccayenaa^eb^ti ambho, amaccaa ye keci ma.m nissaaya laddhena yasena ^b^vittaa^eb^ tu.t.thacittaa, te sabbe attano vitta.m paatukarontu. ^b^tibbaanii^eb^ti bahalaani mahantaani. ^b^upaayanaanii^eb^ti pa.n.naakaare. ^b^ye kecii^eb^ti antamaso kii.lanatthaaya baddhe migapakkhino upaadaaya. ^b^mu~ncare^eb^ti mu~ncantu. ^b^unna"ngalaa maasamima.m karontuu^eb^ti ima.m maasa.m kasanana"ngalaani ussaapetvaa ekamante .thapetvaa nagare bheri.m caraapetvaa sabbeva manussaa mahaacha.na.m karontu. ^b^bhakkhayantuu^eb^ti bhu~njantu. ^b^amajjapaa^eb^ti ettha ^b^aeb^-kaaro nipaatamatta.m, majjapaa purisaa majjarahaa attano attano aapaana.t.thaanesu nisinnaa pivantuuti attho. ^b^pu.n.naahi thaalaahii^eb^ti pu.n.nehi thaalehi. ^b^palissutaahii^eb^ti atipu.n.nattaa paggharamaanehi. ^b^mahaapatha.m nicca samavhayantuu^eb^ti antonagare ala"nkatamahaapatha.m raajamagga.m nissaaya .thitaa vesiyaa niccakaala.m kilesavasena kilesatthika.m jana.m avhayantuuti attho. ^b^tibba^eb^nti gaa.lha.m. ^b^yathaa^eb^ti yathaa rakkhassa susa.mvihitattaa unna"ngalaa hutvaa rukkhassimassa apaciti.m karontaa a~n~nama~n~na.m na vihe.thayeyyu.m, eva.m rakkha.m sa.mvidahantuuti attho.
[21] ``orodhaa ^a^V7.0226^ea^ ca kumaaraa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.

[03] tattha ^b^abhihaarayu^eb^nti eva.m ra~n~naa aa.nattaa mahaacha.na.m pa.tiyaadetvaa sabbe satte bandhanaa mocetvaa ete sabbe orodhaadayo naanappakaara.m pa.n.naakaara.m sajjitvaa tena saddhi.m anna~nca paana~nca pa.n.ditassa pesesu.m. ^b^pa.n.ditamaagate^eb^ti pa.n.dite aagate ta.m pa.n.dita.m disvaa bahujano pasanno ahosi.

[03] cha.no maasena osaana.m agamaasi. tato mahaasatto buddhakicca.m saadhento viya mahaajanassa dhamma.m desento raajaana~nca anusaasanto daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa aayupariyosaane saggaparaaya.no ahosi. raajaana.m aadi.m katvaa sabbepi nagaravaasino pa.n.ditassovaade .thatvaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa aayupariyosaane saggapura.m puurayi.msu.

[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepi tathaagato pa~n~naasampanno upaayakusaloyevaa''ti vatvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa pa.n.ditassa maataapitaro mahaaraajakulaani ahesu.m, je.t.thabhariyaa raahulamaataa, je.t.thaputto raahulo, vimalaa uppalava.n.naa, varu.nanaagaraajaa saariputto, supa.n.naraajaa moggallaano, sakko anuruddho, dhana~ncayakorabyaraajaa aanando, pu.n.nako channo, parisaa buddhaparisaa, vidhurapa.n.dito pana ahameva sammaasambuddho ahosi''nti.

[03] ^b^phussatii^eb^ ^a^V7.0227^ea^ ^a^P6.0479^ea^ ^a^M7.0241^ea^ ^b^varava.n.naabhe^eb^ti ida.m satthaa kapilavatthu.m upanissaaya nigrodhaaraame viharanto pokkharavassa.m aarabbha kathesi. yadaa hi satthaa pavattitavaradhammacakko anukkamena raajagaha.m gantvaa tattha hemanta.m viitinaametvaa udaayittherena maggadesakena viisatisahassakhii.naasavaparivuto pa.thamagamanena kapilavatthu.m agamaasi, tadaa sakyaraajaano ``maya.m amhaaka.m ~naatise.t.tha.m passissaamaa''ti sannipatitvaa bhagavato vasana.t.thaana.m viima.msamaanaa ``nigrodhasakkassaaraamo rama.niiyo''ti sallakkhetvaa tattha sabba.m pa.tijagganavidhi.m katvaa gandhapupphaadihatthaa paccuggamana.m karontaa sabbaala"nkaarappa.tima.n.dite daharadahare naagaradaarake ca naagaradaarikaayo ca pa.thama.m pahi.ni.msu, tato raajakumaare ca raajakumaarikaayo ca. tesa.m antaraa saama.m gandhapupphacu.n.naadiihi satthaara.m puujetvaa bhagavanta.m gahetvaa nigrodhaaraamameva agami.msu. tattha bhagavaa viisatisahassakhii.naasavaparivuto pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisiidi. tadaa hi saakiyaa maanajaatikaa maanatthaddhaa. te ``aya.m siddhatthakumaaro amhehi daharataro, amhaaka.m kani.t.tho bhaagineyyo putto nattaa''ti cintetvaa daharadahare raajakumaare ca raajakumaarikaayo ca aaha.msu ``tumhe bhagavanta.m vandatha, maya.m tumhaaka.m pi.t.thito nisiidissaamaa''ti.

[03] tesu eva.m avanditvaa nisinnesu bhagavaa tesa.m ajjhaasaya.m oloketvaa ``na ma.m ~naatayo vandanti, handa idaaneva vandaapessaamii''ti abhi~n~naapaadaka.m catutthajjhaana.m samaapajjitvaa tato vu.t.thaaya aakaasa.m abbhuggantvaa tesa.m siise paadapa.msu.m okiramaano viya ka.n.dambarukkhamuule yamakapaa.tihaariyasadisa.m paa.tihaariya.m akaasi. raajaa suddhodano ta.m acchariya.m disvaa aaha ``bhante, tumhaaka.m jaatadivase kaa.ladevalassa vandanattha.m upaniitaana.m vo paade parivattitvaa braahma.nassa matthake .thite disvaa aha.m tumhaaka.m paade vandi.m, aya.m me pa.thamavandanaa. punapi vappama"ngaladivase jambucchaayaaya sirisayane nisinnaana.m vo jambucchaayaaya aparivattana.m ^a^M7.0242^ea^ disvaapi aha.m tumhaaka.m paade vandi.m, aya.m me dutiyavandanaa. idaani ima.m adi.t.thapubba.m paa.tihaariya.m ^a^V7.0228^ea^ disvaapi tumhaaka.m paade vandaami, aya.m me tatiyavandanaa''ti. ra~n~naa pana vandite avanditvaa .thaatu.m samattho naama ekasaakiyopi naahosi, sabbe vandi.msuyeva.

[03] iti bhagavaa ~naatayo vandaapetvaa aakaasato otaritvaa pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisiidi. nisinne ca bhagavati sikhaapatto ~naatisamaagamo ahosi, sabbe ekaggacittaa hutvaa nisiidi.msu. tato mahaamegho u.t.thahitvaa pokkharavassa.m vassi, tambava.n.na.m udaka.m he.t.thaa viravanta.m gacchati. ye temetukaamaa, te tementi. atemetukaamassa ^a^P6.0480^ea^ sariire ekabindumattampi na patati. ta.m disvaa sabbe acchariyabbhutacittajaataa ahesu.m. ``aho acchariya.m aho abbhuta.m aho buddhaana.m mahaanubhaavataa, yesa.m ~naatisamaagame evaruupa.m pokkharavassa.m vassii''ti bhikkhuu katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m. ta.m sutvaa satthaa ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepi mama ~naatisamaagame mahaamegho pokkharavassa.m vassiyevaa''ti vatvaa tehi yaacito atiita.m aahari.
