[03] atiite sivira.t.the jetuttaranagare sivimahaaraajaa naama rajja.m kaarento sa~njaya.m naama putta.m pa.tilabhi. so tassa vayappattassa maddaraajadhiitara.m phussati.m naama raajaka~n~na.m aanetvaa rajja.m niyyaadetvaa phussati.m aggamahesi.m akaasi. tassaa aya.m pubbayogo -- ito ekanavutikappe vipassii naama satthaa loke udapaadi. tasmi.m bandhumatinagara.m nissaaya kheme migadaaye viharante eko raajaa ra~n~no bandhumassa anagghena candanasaarena saddhi.m satasahassagghanika.m suva.n.namaala.m pesesi. ra~n~no pana dve dhiitaro ahesu.m. so ta.m pa.n.naakaara.m taasa.m daatukaamo hutvaa candanasaara.m je.t.thikaaya adaasi, suva.n.namaala.m kani.t.thaaya adaasi. taa ubhopi ``na maya.m ima.m attano sariire pi.landhissaama, satthaarameva puujessaamaa''ti cintetvaa raajaana.m aaha.msu ``taata, candanasaarena ca suva.n.namaalaaya ca dasabala.m puujessaamaa''ti. ta.m sutvaa raajaa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchi. je.t.thikaa sukhumacandanacu.n.na.m kaaretvaa suva.n.nasamugga.m puuretvaa ga.nhaapesi. kani.t.thabhaginii pana suva.n.namaala.m uracchadamaala.m kaaraapetvaa ^a^M7.0243^ea^ suva.n.nasamuggena ga.nhaapesi. taa ubhopi migadaayavihaara.m gantvaa je.t.thikaa candanacu.n.nena dasabalassa suva.n.nava.n.na.m sariira.m puujetvaa sesacu.n.naani gandhaku.tiya.m vikiritvaa ``bhante, anaagate tumhaadisassa buddhassa maataa bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi. kani.t.thabhaginiipi tathaagatassa suva.n.nava.na.m sariira.m suva.n.namaalaaya katena uracchadena puujetvaa ``bhante, yaava arahattappatti, taava ida.m pasaadhana.m mama sariiraa maa vigata.m hotuu''ti patthana.m akaasi. satthaapi taasa.m anumodana.m akaasi.

[03] taa ubhopi yaavataayuka.m ^a^P6.0481^ea^ .thatvaa devaloke nibbatti.msu. taasu je.t.thabhaginii devalokato manussaloka.m ^a^V7.0229^ea^, manussalokato devaloka.m sa.msarantii ekanavutikappaavasaane amhaaka.m buddhuppaadakaale buddhamaataa mahaamaayaadevii naama ahosi. kani.t.thabhaginiipi tatheva sa.msarantii kassapadasabalassa kaale kikissa ra~n~no dhiitaa hutvaa nibbatti. saa cittakammakataaya viya uracchadamaalaaya ala"nkatena urena jaatattaa uracchadaa naama kumaarikaa hutvaa so.lasavassikakaale satthu bhattaanumodana.m sutvaa sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaaya aparabhaage bhattaanumodana.m su.nanteneva pitaraa sotaapattiphala.m pattadivaseyeva arahatta.m patvaa pabbajitvaa parinibbaayi. kikiraajaapi a~n~naa satta dhiitaro labhi. taasa.m naamaani --
[22] dhammaa ceva sudhammaa ca, sa"nghadaasii ca sattamii''ti..

[03] taasu ^a^M7.0244^ea^ phussatii sudhammaa naama hutvaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa vipassisammaasambuddhassa kataaya candanacu.n.napuujaaya phalena rattacandanarasaparipphositena viya sariirena jaatattaa phussatii naama kumaarikaa hutvaa devesu ca manussesu ca sa.msarantii aparabhaage sakkassa devara~n~no aggamahesii hutvaa nibbatti. athassaa yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa pa~ncasu pubbanimittesu uppannesu sakko devaraajaa tassaa parikkhii.naayukata.m ~natvaa mahantena yasena ta.m aadaaya nandanavanuyyaana.m gantvaa tattha ta.m ala"nkatasayanapi.t.the nisinna.m saya.m sayanapasse nisiiditvaa etadavoca ``bhadde phussati, te dasa vare dammi, te ga.nhassuu''ti vadanto imasmi.m gaathaasahassapa.tima.n.dite mahaavessantarajaatake pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[22] pathabyaa caarupubba"ngi, ya.m tuyha.m manaso piya''nti..
[03] evamesaa ^a^P6.0482^ea^ mahaavessantaradhammadesanaa devaloke pati.t.thaapitaa naama hoti.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0230^ea^ ^b^phussatii^eb^ti ta.m naamenaalapati. ^b^varava.n.naabhe^eb^ti varaaya va.n.naabhaaya samannaagate. ^b^dasadhaa^eb^ti dasavidhe. ^b^pathabyaa^eb^ti pathaviya.m gahetabbe katvaa ^b^varassu^eb^ ga.nhassuuti vadati. ^b^caarupubba"ngii^eb^ti caarunaa pubba"ngena varalakkha.nena samannaagate. ^b^ya.m tuyha.m manaso piya^eb^nti ya.m ya.m tava manasaa piya.m, ta.m ta.m dasahi ko.t.thaasehi ga.nhaahiiti vadati.
[03] saa attano cavanadhammata.m ajaanantii pamattaa hutvaa dutiyagaathamaaha --
[21] ``devaraaja namo tyatthu, ki.m paapa.m pakata.m mayaa.
[03] tattha ^b^namo tyatthuu^eb^ti namo te atthu. ^b^ki.m paapa^eb^nti ki.m mayaa tava santike paapa.m pakatanti pucchati. ^b^dhara.niiruha^eb^nti rukkha.m.
[03] athassaa pamattabhaava.m ~natvaa sakko dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``na ceva te kata.m paapa.m, na ca me tvamasi appiyaa.
[22] pu~n~na~nca te parikkhii.na.m, yena teva.m vadaamaha.m..
[22] pa.tigga.nhaahi me ete, vare dasa pavecchato''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^yena teva^eb^nti yena te eva.m vadaami. ^b^tuyha.m vinaabhaavo^eb^ti tava amhehi saddhi.m viyogo bhavissati. ^b^pavecchato^eb^ti dadamaanassa.
[03] saa sakkassa vacana.m sutvaa nicchayena attano mara.na.m ~natvaa vara.m ga.nhantii aaha --
[22] kucchi anunnato assa, caapa.mva likhita.m sama.m..
[21] ``thanaa ^a^P6.0483^ea^ me nappapateyyu.m, palitaa na santu vaasava.
[22] kaaye rajo na limpetha, vajjha~ncaapi pamocaye..

[03] tattha ^b^siviraajassaa^eb^ti saa sakalajambudiipatala.m olokentii attano anucchavika.m sivira~n~no nivesana.m disvaa tattha aggamahesibhaava.m patthentii evamaaha. ^b^yathaa migii^eb^ti ekavassikaa hi migapotikaa niilanettaa hoti, tenevamaaha. ^b^tatthapassa^eb^nti tatthapi iminaava naamena ^a^M7.0246^ea^ assa.m. ^b^labhethaa^eb^ti labheyya.m. ^b^varada^eb^nti ala"nkatasiisaakkhiyugalahadayama.msarudhirasetacchattaputtadaaresu yaacitayaacitassa varabha.n.dassa daayaka.m. ^b^kucchii^eb^ti ``majjhima"nga''nti vutta.m saruupato dasseti. ^b^likhita^eb^nti yathaa chekena dhanukaarena sammaa likhita.m dhanu anunnatamajjha.m tulaava.t.ta.m sama.m hoti, evaruupo me kucchi bhaveyya.

[03] ^b^nappapateyyu^eb^nti patitvaa lambaa na bhaveyyu.m. ^b^palitaa na santu vaasavaa^eb^ti vaasava devase.t.tha, palitaanipi me sirasmi.m na santu maa pa~n~naayi.msu. ``palitaani siroruhaa''tipi paa.tho. ^b^vajjha~ncaapii^eb^ti kibbisakaaraka.m raajaaparaadhika.m vajjhappattacora.m attano balena mocetu.m samatthaa bhaveyya.m. iminaa attano issariyabhaava.m diipeti. ^b^bhuutamaagadhava.n.nite^eb^ti bhojanakaalaadiisu thutivasena ^a^V7.0232^ea^ kaala.m aarocentehi suutehi ceva maagadhakehi ca va.n.nite. ^b^citragga.lerughusite^eb^ti pa~nca"ngikatuuriyasaddasadisa.m manorama.m rava.m ravantehi sattaratanavicittehi dvaarakavaa.tehi ugghosite. ^b^suraama.msapabodhane^eb^ti ``pivatha, khaadathaa''ti suraama.msehi pabodhiyamaanajane evaruupe siviraajassa nivesane tassa aggamahesii bhaveyyanti ime dasa vare ga.nhi.

[03] tattha siviraajassa aggamahesibhaavo pa.thamo varo, niilanettataa dutiyo, niilabhamukataa tatiyo, phussatiiti naama.m catuttho, puttapa.tilaabho pa~ncamo, anunnatakucchitaa cha.t.tho, alambatthanataa sattamo, apalitabhaavo a.t.thamo, sukhumacchavibhaavo navamo, vajjhappamocanasamatthataa dasamo varoti.
[21] ``ye te dasa varaa dinnaa, mayaa sabba"ngasobhane.
[22] siviraajassa vijite, sabbe te lacchasii vare''ti..
[03] athassaa sakko devaraajaa phussatiyaa dasa vare adaasi, datvaa ca pana ``bhadde phussati, tava sabbe te samijjhantuu''ti vatvaa anumodi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[03] tattha ^b^anumoditthaa^eb^ti ``sabbe te lacchasi vare''ti eva.m vare datvaa pamuddito tu.t.thamaanaso ahosiiti attho.

[03] iti saa vare gahetvaa tato cutaa maddara~n~no aggamahesiyaa kucchimhi nibbatti. jaayamaanaa ca candanacu.n.napariki.n.nena viya sariirena jaataa. tenassaa naamaggaha.nadivase ``phussatii''tveva ^a^V7.0233^ea^ naama.m kari.msu. saa mahantena parivaarena va.d.dhitvaa so.lasavassakaale uttamaruupadharaa ahosi. atha na.m sivimahaaraajaa puttassa sa~njayakumaarassa atthaaya aanetvaa tassa chatta.m ussaapetvaa so.lasanna.m itthisahassaana.m je.t.thika.m katvaa aggamahesi.t.thaane .thapesi. tena vutta.m --

[03] saa sa~njayassa piyaa manaapaa ahosi. atha na.m sakko aavajjamaano ``mayaa phussatiyaa dinnavaresu nava varaa samiddhaa''ti disvaa ``eko pana puttavaro na taava samijjhati, tampissaa samijjhaapessaamii''ti cintesi. tadaa mahaasatto taavati.msadevaloke vasati, aayu cassa parikkhii.na.m ahosi. ta.m ~natvaa sakko tassa santika.m gantvaa ``maarisa, tayaa manussaloka.m gantu.m va.t.tati, tattha sivira~n~no aggamahesiyaa kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhitu.m va.t.tatii''ti vatvaa tassa ceva a~n~nesa~nca cavanadhammaana.m sa.t.thisahassaana.m devaputtaana.m pa.ti~n~na.m gahetvaa saka.t.thaanameva gato. mahaasattopi tato cavitvaa tatthupapanno, sesadevaputtaapi sa.t.thisahassaana.m amaccaana.m gehesu nibbatti.msu. mahaasatte kucchigate phussatii doha.linii hutvaa catuusu nagaradvaaresu nagaramajjhe ^a^M7.0248^ea^ raajanivesanadvaare caati chasu .thaanesu cha daanasaalaayo kaaraapetvaa devasika.m cha satasahassaani vissajjetvaa mahaadaana.m daatukaamaa ahosi.

[03] raajaa tassaa doha.la.m sutvaa nemittake braahma.ne pakkosaapetvaa pucchi. nemittakaa -- ``mahaaraaja, deviyaa kucchimhi daanaabhirato satto uppanno, daanena titti.m na gamissatii''ti vadi.msu. ta.m sutvaa raajaa tu.t.thamaanaso hutvaa cha daanasaalaayo kaaraapetvaa vuttappakaara.m daana.m pa.t.thapesi. bodhisattassa ^a^P6.0485^ea^ pa.tisandhiggaha.nakaalato pa.t.thaaya ra~n~no aayassa pamaa.na.m naama naahosi. tassa pu~n~naanubhaavena sakalajambudiiparaajaano pa.n.naakaara.m pahi.ni.msu. devii mahantena parivaarena gabbha.m dhaarentii dasamaase paripu.n.ne nagara.m da.t.thukaamaa hutvaa ra~n~no aarocesi. raajaa nagara.m devanagara.m viya ala"nkaaraapetvaa devi.m rathavara.m aaropetvaa nagara.m padakkhi.na.m kaaresi. tassaa vessaana.m viithiyaa vemajjha.m sampattakaale kammajavaataa cali.msu. atha amaccaa ra~n~no aarocesu.m. ta.m sutvaa vessaviithiya.myeva tassaa suutighara.m kaaraapetvaa vaasa.m ga.nhaapesi. saa tattha putta.m vijaayi. tena vutta.m --
[22] vessaana.m viithiyaa majjhe, janesi phussatii mama''nti.. (cariyaa0 1.76).

[03] mahaasatto maatu kucchito nikkhantoyeva visado hutvaa akkhiini ummiiletvaa nikkhami. nikkhantoyeva ca maatu hattha.m pasaaretvaa ``amma, daana.m dassaami, atthi ki~nci te dhana''nti aaha. athassa maataa ``taata, yathaaajjhaasayena daana.m dehii''ti pasaaritahatthe sahassatthavika.m .thapesi. mahaasatto hi uma"ngajaatake imasmi.m jaatake pacchimattabhaaveti tiisu .thaanesu jaatamatteyeva maataraa saddhi.m kathesi. athassa naamaggaha.nadivase vessaviithiya.m jaatattaa ``vessantaro''ti naama.m kari.msu.

[03] jaatadivaseyeva ^a^M7.0249^ea^ panassa ekaa aakaasacaarinii kare.nukaa abhima"ngalasammata.m sabbaseta.m hatthipotaka.m aanetvaa ma"ngalahatthi.t.thaane .thapetvaa pakkaami. tassa mahaasatta.m paccaya.m katvaa uppannattaa ``paccayo''tveva naama.m kari.msu. ta.m divasameva amaccagehesu sa.t.thisahassakumaarakaa jaayi.msu. raajaa mahaasattassa atidiighaadidose vivajjetvaa alambathaniyo madhurakhiiraayo catusa.t.thi dhaatiyo upa.t.thaapesi. tena saddhi.m jaataana~nca sa.t.thidaarakasahassaana.m ekekaa dhaatiyo upa.t.thaapesi. so sa.t.thisahassehi daarakehi saddhi.m mahantena parivaarena va.d.dhati. athassa raajaa satasahassagghanaka.m kumaarapi.landhana.m kaaraapesi. so catuppa~ncavassikakaale ta.m ^a^P6.0486^ea^ omu~ncitvaa dhaatiina.m datvaa puna taahi diiyamaanampi na ga.nhi. taa ra~n~no aarocayi.msu. raajaa ta.m sutvaa ``mama puttena dinna.m brahmadeyyameva hotuu''ti aparampi kaaresi. kumaaro tampi adaasiyeva. iti daarakakaaleyeva dhaatiina.m nava vaare pi.landhana.m adaasi.

[03] a.t.thavassikakaale pana paasaadavaragato sirisayanapi.t.the nisinnova cintesi ``aha.m baahirakadaanameva demi, ta.m ma.m na paritoseti, ajjhattikadaana.m daatukaamomhi, sace ma.m koci siisa.m yaaceyya, siisa.m chinditvaa tassa dadeyya.m. sacepi ma.m koci hadaya.m yaaceyya, ura.m bhinditvaa hadaya.m niiharitvaa dadeyya.m. sace akkhiini yaaceyya, akkhiini uppaa.tetvaa dadeyya.m. sace ^a^V7.0235^ea^ sariirama.msa.m yaaceyya, sakalasariirato ma.msa.m chinditvaa dadeyya.m. sacepi ma.m koci rudhira.m yaaceyya, rudhira.m gahetvaa dadeyya.m. atha vaapi koci `daaso me hohii'ti vadeyya, attaanamassa saavetvaa daasa.m katvaa dadeyya''nti. tasseva.m sabhaava.m cintentassa catunahutaadhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalaa aya.m mahaapathavii mattavaravaara.no viya gajjamaanaa kampi. sinerupabbataraajaa suseditavetta"nkuro viya onamitvaa jetuttaranagaraabhimukho a.t.thaasi. pathavisaddena devaa gajjanto kha.nikavassa.m vassi, akaalavijjulataa nicchari.msu, saagaro sa"nkhubhi. sakko devaraajaa appho.tesi, mahaabrahmaa saadhukaaramadaasi. pathavitalato pa.t.thaaya yaava brahmalokaa ekakolaahala.m ahosi.
[22] tadaa nisajja paasaade, daana.m daatu.m vicintayi.m..
[22] dadeyya.m kaaya.m saavetvaa, yadi koci yaacaye mama.m..

[03] bodhisatto so.lasavassikakaaleyeva sabbasippesu nipphatti.m paapu.ni. athassa pitaa rajja.m daatukaamo maataraa saddhi.m mantetvaa maddaraajakulato maatuladhiitara.m maddi.m naama raajaka~n~na.m aanetvaa so.lasanna.m itthisahassaana.m je.t.thika.m aggamahesi.m katvaa mahaasatta.m rajje abhisi~nci. mahaasatto rajje pati.t.thitakaalato pa.t.thaaya devasika.m cha satasahassaani vissajjento mahaadaana.m pavattesi. aparabhaage maddidevii putta.m ^a^P6.0487^ea^ vijaayi. ta.m ka~ncanajaalena sampa.ticchi.msu, tenassa ``jaaliikumaaro''tveva naama.m kari.msu. tassa padasaa gamanakaale dhiitara.m vijaayi. ta.m ka.nhaajinena sampa.ticchi.msu, tenassaa ``ka.nhaajinaa''tveva naama.m kari.msu. mahaasatto maasassa chakkhattu.m ala"nkatahatthikkhandhavaragato cha daanasaalaayo olokesi. tadaa kaali"ngara.t.the dubbu.t.thikaa ahosi, sassaani na sampajji.msu, manussaana.m mahanta.m chaatabhaya.m pavatti. manussaa jiivitu.m asakkontaacorakamma.m karonti. dubbhikkhapii.litaa jaanapadaa raaja"nga.ne sannipatitvaa raajaana.m upakkosi.msu ^a^V7.0236^ea^. ta.m sutvaa ra~n~naa ``ki.m, taataa''ti vutte tamattha.m aarocayi.msu. raajaa ``saadhu, taataa, deva.m vassaapessaamii''ti te uyyojetvaa samaadinnasiilo uposathavaasa.m vasantopi deva.m vassaapetu.m naasakkhi. so naagare sannipaatetvaa ``aha.m samaadinnasiilo sattaaha.m uposathavaasa.m vasantopi deva.m vassaapetu.m naasakkhi.m, ki.m nu kho kaatabba''nti pucchi. sace, deva, deva.m vassaapetu.m na sakkosi, esa jetuttaranagare sa~njayassa ra~n~no putto vessantaro naama daanaabhirato. tassa.m kira sabbaseto ma"ngalahatthii atthi, tassa gatagata.t.thaane ^a^M7.0251^ea^ devo vassi. braahma.ne pesetvaa ta.m hatthi.m yaacaapetu.m va.t.tati, aa.naapethaati.

[03] so ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa braahma.ne sannipaatetvaa tesu gu.nava.n.nasampanne a.t.tha jane vicinitvaa tesa.m paribbaya.m datvaa ``gacchatha, tumhe vessantara.m hatthi.m yaacitvaa aanethaa''ti pesesi. braahma.naa anupubbena jetuttaranagara.m gantvaa daanagge bhatta.m paribhu~njitvaa attano sariira.m rajopariki.n.na.m pa.msumakkhita.m katvaa pu.n.namadivase raajaana.m hatthi.m yaacitukaamaa hutvaa ra~n~no daanagga.m aagamanakaale paaciinadvaara.m agama.msu. raajaapi ``daanagga.m olokessaamii''ti paatova nhatvaa naanaggarasabhojana.m bhu~njitvaa ala"nkaritvaa ala"nkatahatthikkhandhavaragato paaciinadvaara.m agamaasi. braahma.naa tatthokaasa.m alabhitvaa dakkhi.nadvaara.m gantvaa unnatapadese .thatvaa ra~n~no paaciinadvaare daanagga.m oloketvaa dakkhi.nadvaaraagamanakaale hatthe pasaaretvaa ``jayatu bhava.m vessantaro''ti tikkhattu.m aaha.msu. mahaasatto te braahma.ne disvaa hatthi.m tesa.m .thita.t.thaana.m pesetvaa hatthikkhandhe nisinno pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[22] paggayha dakkhi.na.m baahu.m, ki.m ma.m yaacanti braahma.naa''ti..

[03] ta.m sutvaa mahaasatto ``aha.m siisa.m aadi.m katvaa ajjhattikadaana.m daatukaamomhi, ime pana ^a^V7.0237^ea^ ma.m baahirakadaanameva yaacanti, puuressaami tesa.m manoratha''nti cintetvaa hatthikkhandhavaragato tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``dadaami na vikampaami, ya.m ma.m yaacanti braahma.naa.

[03] tattha ^b^opavayha^eb^nti raajavaahana.m. ^b^caagaadhimaanaso^eb^ti caagena adhikamaanaso raajaa. ^b^braahma.naana.m adaa daana^eb^nti so vaara.nassa anala"nkata.t.thaana.m olokanattha.m tikkhattu.m padakkhi.na.m katvaa anala"nkata.t.thaana.m adisvaa kusumamissakasugandhodakapuurita.m suva.n.nabhi"ngaara.m gahetvaa ``ito ethaa''ti vatvaa ala"nkatarajatadaamasadisa.m hatthiso.n.da.m gahetvaa tesa.m hatthe .thapetvaa udaka.m paatetvaa ala"nkatavaara.na.m braahma.naana.m adaasi.

[03] tassa catuusu paadesu ala"nkaaro cattaari satasahassaani agghati, ubhosu passesu ala"nkaaro dve satasahassaani, he.t.thaa udare kambala.m satasahassa.m, pi.t.thiya.m muttajaala.m ma.nijaala.m ka~ncanajaalanti tii.ni jaalaani tii.ni satasahassaani, ubhosu ka.n.nesu ala"nkaaro dve satasahassaani, pi.t.thiya.m atthara.nakambala.m satasahassa.m, kumbhaala"nkaaro satasahassa.m, tayo va.ta.msakaa tii.ni satasahassaani, ka.n.nacuu.laala"nkaaro dve satasahassaani, dvinna.m dantaana.m ala"nkaaro dve satasahassaani, so.n.daaya sovatthikaala"nkaaro satasahassa.m, na"ngu.t.thaala"nkaaro satasahassa.m, aaroha.nanisse.ni satasahassa.m, bhu~njanaka.taaha.m satasahassa.m, .thapetvaa anaggha.m bha.n.da.m kaayaaru.lhapasaadhana.m dvaaviisati satasahassaani ^a^P6.0489^ea^. eva.m taava ettaka.m dhana.m catuviisatisatasahassaani agghati. chattapi.n.diya.m pana ma.ni, cuu.laama.ni, muttaahaare ma.ni, a"nkuse ma.ni, hatthika.n.the ve.thanamuttaahaare ma.ni, hatthikumbhe ma.niiti imaani cha anagghaani, hatthiipi anagghoyevaati hatthinaa saddhi.m satta anagghaaniiti sabbaani taani braahma.naana.m adaasi. tathaa hatthino paricaarakaani pa~nca kulasataani hatthime.n.dahatthigopakehi saddhi.m adaasi. saha daanenevassa he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva bhuumikampaadayo ahesu.m. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``samaakula.m pura.m aasi, ghoso ca vipulo mahaa.
[03] tattha ^b^tadaasii^eb^ti tadaa aasi. ^b^hatthinaage^eb^ti hatthisa"nkhaate naage. ^b^khubhittha nagara.m tadaa^eb^ti tadaa jetuttaranagara.m sa"nkhubhita.m ahosi.

[03] braahma.naa kira dakkhi.nadvaare hatthi.m labhitvaa hatthipi.t.the nisiiditvaa mahaajanaparivaaraa nagaramajjhena paayi.msu. mahaajano te disvaa ``ambho braahma.naa, amhaaka.m hatthi.m aaru.lhaa kuto vo hatthii laddhaa''ti aaha. braahma.naa ``vessantaramahaaraajena no hatthii dinno, ke tumhe''ti mahaajana.m hatthavikaaraadiihi gha.t.tentaa nagaramajjhena gantvaa uttaradvaarena nikkhami.msu. naagaraa devataava.t.tanena bodhisattassa kuddhaa raajadvaare sannipatitvaa mahanta.m upakkosamaka.msu. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``samaakula.m pura.m aasi, ghoso ca vipulo mahaa.
[03] tattha ^b^ghoso^eb^ti upakkosanasaddo pattha.tattaa ^b^vipulo,^eb^ uddha.m gatattaa ^b^mahaa. siviina.m ra.t.thava.d.dhane^eb^ti sivira.t.thassa vuddhikare.
[03] athassa ^a^V7.0239^ea^ ^a^P6.0490^ea^ daanena sa"nkhubhitacittaa hutvaa nagaravaasino ra~n~no aarocesu.m. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``uggaa ^a^M7.0254^ea^ ca raajaputtaa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
[22] disvaa naaga.m niiyamaana.m, te ra~n~no pa.tivedayu.m..
[21] ``vidhama.m deva te ra.t.tha.m, putto vessantaro tava.
[22] katha.m no hatthina.m dajjaa, naaga.m ra.t.thassa puujita.m..

[03] tattha ^b^uggaa^eb^ti uggataa pa~n~naataa. ^b^nigamo^eb^ti negamaku.tumbikajano. ^b^vidhama.m deva te ra.t.tha^eb^nti deva, tava ra.t.tha.m vidhama.m. ^b^katha.m no hatthina.m dajjaa^eb^ti kena kaara.nena amhaaka.m hatthina.m abhima"ngalasammata.m kaali"ngara.t.thavaasiina.m braahma.naana.m dadeyya. ^b^khetta~n~nu.m sabbayuddhaana^eb^nti sabbayuddhaana.m khettabhuumisiisajaananasamattha.m. ^b^danti^eb^nti manoramadantayutta.m. ^b^savaalabiijani^eb^nti sahavaalabiijani.m. ^b^saupaadheyya^eb^nti saatthara.na.m. ^b^saathabbana^eb^nti sahatthivejja.m. ^b^sahatthipa^eb^nti hatthiparicaarakaana.m pa~ncanna.m kulasataana.m hatthime.n.dahatthigopakaana~nca vasena sahatthipa.m.
[22] eta.m kho daana.m patiruupa.m, eta.m kho braahma.naaraha.m..
[22] katha.m vessantaro putto, gaja.m bhaajeti sa~njaya..
[21] ``sace ^a^M7.0255^ea^ tva.m na karissasi, siviina.m vacana.m ida.m.
[22] ma~n~ne ta.m saha puttena, sivii hatthe karissare''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^va.msaraajaa^eb^ti pave.niyaa aagato mahaaraajaa. ^b^bhaajetii^eb^ti deti. ^b^sivii hatthe karissare^eb^ti sivira.t.thavaasino saha puttena ta.m attano hatthe karissantiiti.
[03] ta.m ^a^P6.0491^ea^ sutvaa raajaa ``ete vessantara.m maaraapetu.m icchantii''ti sa~n~naaya aaha --
[22] pabbaajeyya.m sakaa ra.t.thaa, putto hi mama oraso..
[22] pabbaajeyya.m sakaa ra.t.thaa, putto hi mama atrajo..
[21] ``na caaha.m tasmi.m dubbheyya.m, ariyasiilavato hi so.
[27] asilokopi me assa, paapa~nca pasave bahu.m.
[03] tattha ^b^maasii^eb^ti maa aasi, maa hotuuti attho. ^b^ariyasiilavato^eb^ti ariyena siilavatena ariyaaya ca aacaarasampattiyaa samannaagato. ^b^ghaatayaamase^eb^ti ghaatayissaama.
[21] ``maa ^a^V7.0241^ea^ na.m da.n.dena satthena, na hi so bandhanaaraho.
[22] pabbaajehi ca na.m ra.t.thaa, va"nke vasatu pabbate''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^maa na.m da.n.dena satthenaa^eb^ti deva, tumhe ta.m da.n.dena vaa satthena vaa maa ghaatayittha. ^b^na hi so bandhanaaraho^eb^ti so bandhanaarahopi na hotiyeva.
[21] ``eso ce siviina.m chando, chanda.m na panudaamase.
[22] ima.m so vasatu ratti.m, kaame ca paribhu~njatu..
[22] samaggaa sivayo hutvaa, ra.t.thaa pabbaajayantu na''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^vasatuu^eb^ti puttadaarassa ovaada.m dadamaano vasatu, ekaratti~ncassa okaasa.m dethaati vadati.

[03] te ``ekarattimatta.m vasatuu''ti ra~n~no vacana.m sampa.ticchi.msu. atha raajaa ne uyyojetvaa puttassa saasana.m pesento kattaara.m aamantetvaa tassa santika.m pesesi. so ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa vessantarassa nivesana.m gantvaa ta.m pavatti.m aarocesi. tamattha.m ^a^P6.0492^ea^ pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] `sivayo deva te kuddhaa, negamaa ca samaagataa..
[21] ``uggaa ca raajaputtaa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
[22] kevalo caapi nigamo, sivayo ca samaagataa..
[22] samaggaa sivayo hutvaa, ra.t.thaa pabbaajayanti ta.m'..
[22] `dukkha.m te vedayissaami, maa me kujjhi rathesabha'..
[22] sivayo deva te kuddhaa, negamaa ca samaagataa..
[21] ``uggaa ca raajaputtaa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
[22] kevalo caapi nigamo, sivayo ca samaagataa..
[22] samaggaa sivayo hutvaa, ra.t.thaa pabbaajayanti ta''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^kumaara^eb^nti maataapituuna.m atthitaaya ``kumaaro''tveva sa"nkha.m gata.m raajaana.m. ^b^ramamaana^eb^nti attanaa dinnadaanassa va.n.na.m kathayamaana.m somanassappatta.m hutvaa nisinna.m. ^b^pariki.n.na.m amaccehii^eb^ti attanaa ^a^V7.0243^ea^ sahajaatehi sa.t.thisahassehi amaccehi parivuta.m samussitasetacchatte raajaasane nisinna.m. ^b^vedayissaamii^eb^ti kathayissaami. ^b^tattha assaasayantu ma^eb^nti tasmi.m dukkhassaasanaarocane kathetu.m avisahavasena kilanta.m ma.m, deva, te paadaa assaasayantu, vissattho kathehiiti ma.m vadathaati adhippaayenevamaaha.
[21] ``kismi.m me sivayo kuddhaa, naaha.m passaami dukka.ta.m.
[22] ta.m me katte viyaacikkha, kasmaa pabbaajayanti ma''nti..
[21] ``uggaa ca raajaputtaa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
[03] ta.m sutvaa mahaasatto somanassappatto hutvaa aaha --
[21] ``hadaya.m cakkhumpaha.m dajja.m, ki.m me baahiraka.m dhana.m.
[22] hira~n~na.m vaa suva.n.na.m vaa, muttaa ve.luriyaa ma.ni..
[22] dadeyya.m na vikampeyya.m, daane me ramate mano..
[21] ``kaama.m ma.m sivayo sabbe, pabbaajentu hanantu vaa.
[22] neva daanaa viramissa.m, kaama.m chindantu sattadhaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^yaacakamaagate^eb^ti yaacake aagate ta.m yaacaka.m disvaa. ^b^neva daanaa viramissa^eb^nti neva daanaa viramissaami.
[03] ta.m sutvaa kattaa neva ra~n~naa dinna.m na naagarehi dinna.m attano matiyaa eva apara.m saasana.m kathento aaha --
[21] ``eva.m ta.m sivayo aahu, negamaa ca samaagataa.
[22] yena pabbaajitaa yanti, tena gacchatu subbato''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0244^ea^ ^b^kontimaaraayaa^eb^ti kontimaaraaya naama nadiyaa tiirena. ^b^girimaara~njara.m patii^eb^ti aara~njara.m naama giri.m abhimukho hutvaa. ^b^yenaa^eb^ti yena maggena ra.t.thaa pabbaajitaa raajaano gacchanti, tena subbato vessantaropi gacchatuuti eva.m sivayo kathentiiti aaha. ida.m kira so devataadhiggahito hutvaa kathesi.

[03] ta.m sutvaa bodhisatto ``saadhu dosakaarakaana.m gatamaggena gamissaami, ma.m kho pana naagaraa na a~n~nena dosena pabbaajenti, mayaa hatthissa ^a^M7.0259^ea^ dinnattaa pabbaajenti. eva.m santepi aha.m sattasataka.m mahaadaana.m dassaami, naagaraa me ekadivasa.m daana.m daatu.m okaasa.m dentu, sve daana.m datvaa tatiyadivase gamissaamii''ti vatvaa aaha --
[22] rattindiva.m me khamatha, yaava daana.m dadaamaha''nti..

[03] ta.m sutvaa kattaa ``saadhu, deva, naagaraana.m vakkhaamii''ti vatvaa pakkaami. mahaasatto ta.m uyyojetvaa mahaasenagutta.m pakkosaapetvaa `taata, aha.m sve sattasataka.m naama mahaadaana.m dassaami, satta hatthisataani, satta assasataani, satta rathasataani, satta itthisataani, satta dhenusataani, satta daasasataani, satta daasisataani ca pa.tiyaadehi, naanappakaaraani ca annapaanaadiini antamaso surampi sabba.m daatabbayuttaka.m upa.t.thapehii''ti sattasataka.m mahaadaana.m vicaaretvaa amacce uyyojetvaa ekakova maddiyaa vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa sirisayanapi.t.the nisiiditvaa taaya saddhi.m katha.m pavattesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] ya.m te ki~nci mayaa dinna.m, dhana.m dha~n~na~nca vijjati..
[21] ``hira~n~na.m vaa suva.n.na.m vaa, muttaa ve.luriyaa bahuu.
[22] sabba.m ta.m nidaheyyaasi, ya~nca te pettika.m dhana''nti..
[22] kuhi.m deva nidahaami, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^tamabravii^eb^ti ``mayha.m saamikena vessantarena ettaka.m kaala.m `dhana.m nidhehii'ti na vuttapubba.m, idaaneva vadati, kuhi.m nu kho nidhetabba.m, pucchissaami na''nti cintetvaa ta.m abravi.
[22] na hi daanaa para.m atthi, pati.t.thaa sabbapaa.nina''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^dajjaasii^eb^ti bhadde, maddi ko.t.thaadiisu anidahitvaa anugaamikanidhi.m nidahamaanaa siilavantesu dadeyyaasi. ^b^na hi daanaa para^eb^nti daanato uttaritara.m pati.t.thaa naama na hi atthi.
[03] saa ^a^P6.0495^ea^ ``saadhuu''ti tassa vacana.m sampa.ticchi. atha na.m uttaripi ovadanto aaha --
[22] yo ca ta.m bhattaa ma~n~neyya, sakkacca.m ta.m upa.t.thahe..
[21] ``no ce ta.m bhattaa ma~n~neyya, mayaa vippavasena te.
[22] a~n~na.m bhattaara.m pariyesa, maa kisittho mayaa vinaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0246^ea^ ^b^dayesii^eb^ti daya.m metta.m kareyyaasi. ^b^yo ca ta.m bhattaa ma~n~neyyaa^eb^ti bhadde, yo ca mayi gate ``aha.m te bhattaa bhavissaamii''ti ta.m ma~n~nissati, tampi sakkacca.m upa.t.thaheyyaasi. ^b^mayaa vippavasena te^eb^ti mayaa saddhi.m tava vippavaasena sace koci ``aha.m te bhattaa bhavissaamii''ti ta.m na ma~n~neyya, atha sayameva a~n~na.m bhattaara.m pariyesa. ^b^maa kisittho mayaa vinaa^eb^ti mayaa vinaa hutvaa maa kisaa bhavi, maa kilamiiti attho.

[03] atha na.m maddii ``ki.m nu kho esa evaruupa.m vacana.m ma.m bha.natii''ti cintetvaa ``kasmaa, deva, ima.m ayutta.m katha.m kathesii''ti pucchi. mahaasatto ``bhadde, mayaa hatthissa dinnattaa sivayo kuddhaa ma.m ra.t.thaa pabbaajenti, sve aha.m sattasataka.m mahaadaana.m datvaa tatiyadivase nagaraa nikkhamissaamii''ti vatvaa aaha --
[03] tattha ^b^sa.msayo^eb^ti anekapaccatthike ekakassa sukhumaalassa mama vane vasato kuto jiivita.m, nicchayena marissaamiiti adhippaayeneva.m aaha.
[22] abhumme katha.m nu bha.nasi, paapaka.m vata bhaasasi..
[21] ``nesa dhammo mahaaraaja, ya.m tva.m gaccheyya ekako.
[22] ahampi tena gacchaami, yena gacchasi khattiya..
[21] ``mara.na.m vaa tayaa saddhi.m, jiivita.m vaa tayaa vinaa.
[22] tadeva mara.na.m seyyo, ya.m ce jiive tayaa vinaa..
[22] tattha me mara.na.m seyyo, ya.m ce jiive tayaa vinaa..
[22] subharaa te bhavissaami, na te hessaami dubbharaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^abhumme^eb^ti abhuuta.m vata me katheyyaasi. ^b^nesa dhammo^eb^ti na eso sabhaavo, neta.m kaara.na.m. ^b^tadevaa^eb^ti tayaa saddhi.m ya.m mara.na.m atthi, tadeva mara.na.m seyyo. ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m ekajaalabhuute daarucitake. ^b^jessanta^eb^nti vicaranta.m.
[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa saa puna di.t.thapubba.m viya himavantappadesa.m va.n.nentii aaha --
[22] kii.lante assame ramme, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] kii.lante assame ramme, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] kii.lante assame ramme, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] eka.m ara~n~ne caranta.m, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] saaya.m paato vicaranta.m, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] tassa ta.m nadato sutvaa, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] kimpurise ca naccante, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] vane sossasi vaa.laana.m, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] mora.m dakkhisi naccanta.m, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] mora.m dakkhisi naccanta.m, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] mora.m dakkhisi naccanta.m, na rajjassa sarissasi..
[22] opupphaani ca paddhaani, na rajjassa sarissasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P6.0498^ea^ ^b^ma~njuke^eb^ti madhurakathe. ^b^kare.nusa"nghassaa^eb^ti hatthinigha.taaya. ^b^yuuthassaa^eb^ti hatthiyuuthassa purato vajanto gacchanto. ^b^dubhato^eb^ti ubhayapassesu. ^b^vanavikaase^eb^ti vanagha.taayo. ^b^kaamado^eb^ti mayha.m sabbakaamado. ^b^sindhuyaa^eb^ti nadiyaa. ^b^vassamaanassuluukassaa^eb^ti uluukasaku.nassa vassamaanassa. ^b^vaa.laana^eb^nti vaa.lamigaana.m. tesa~nhi saayanhasamaye so saddo pa~nca"ngikatuuriyasaddo viya bhavissati, tasmaa tesa.m sadda.m sutvaa rajjassa na sarissasiiti vadati, ^b^barihiina^eb^nti kalaapasa~nchanna.m ^a^V7.0250^ea^. ^b^matthakaasina^eb^nti nicca.m pabbatamatthake nisinna.m. ``mattakaasina''ntipi paa.tho, kaamamadamatta.m hutvaa aasiinanti attho. ^b^bimbajaala^eb^nti ratta"nkurarukkha.m. ^b^opupphaanii^eb^ti olambakapupphaani patitapupphaani.
[03] eva.m maddii himavantavaasinii viya ettakaahi gaathaahi himavanta.m va.n.nesiiti.

[03] phussatiipi ^a^M7.0264^ea^ kho devii ``puttassa me ka.tukasaasana.m gata.m, ki.m nu kho karoti, gantvaa jaanissaamii''ti pa.ticchannayoggena gantvaa sirigabbhadvaare .thitaa tesa.m ta.m sallaapa.m sutvaa kaluna.m paridevi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[27] rajjuyaa bajjha miyyaaha.m, kasmaa vessantara.m putta.m.
[27] hita.m sabbassa ra.t.thassa, kasmaa vessantara.m putta.m.

[03] tattha ^b^raajaputtii^eb^ti phussatii maddaraajadhiitaa. ^b^papateyyaha^eb^nti papateyya.m aha.m. ^b^rajjuyaa bajjha miyyaaha^eb^nti rajjuyaa giiva.m bandhitvaa mareyya.m aha.m. ^b^kasmaa^eb^ti eva.m amataayameva mayi kena kaara.nena mama putta.m aduusaka.m ra.t.thaa pabbaajenti. ^b^ajjhaayaka^eb^nti ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paara"ngata.m, naanaasippesu ca nipphatti.m patta.m.
[03] iti ^a^P6.0499^ea^ saa kaluna.m paridevitvaa putta~nca su.nisa~nca assaasetvaa ra~n~no santika.m gantvaa aaha --
[22] eva.m hessati te ra.t.tha.m, pabbaajenti aduusaka.m..
[21] ``ta.m ta.m bruumi mahaaraaja, attho te maa upaccagaa.
[22] maa na.m siviina.m vacanaa, pabbaajesi aduusaka''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^palaataanii^eb^ti palaatamakkhikaani madhuuni viya. ^b^ambaava patitaa chamaa^eb^ti bhuumiya.m patitaambapakkaani viya. eva.m mama putte pabbaajite tava ra.t.tha.m sabbasaadhaara.na.m bhavissatiiti diipeti. ^b^nikhii.napattovaa^eb^ti paggharitapatto viya. ^b^apaviddho amaccehii^eb^ti mama puttena sahajaatehi sa.t.thisahassehi amaccehi cha.d.dito hutvaa. ^b^vihiyyasii^eb^ti kilamissasi. ^b^siviina.m vacanaa^eb^ti siviina.m vacanena maa na.m aduusaka.m mama putta.m pabbaajesiiti.
[22] pabbaajemi saka.m putta.m, paa.naa piyataro hi me''ti..

[03] tassattho -- bhadde, aha.m siviina.m dhaja.m vessantara.m kumaara.m vinayanto pabbaajento sivira.t.the poraa.nakaraajuuna.m pave.nidhammassa apaciti.m kummi karomi, tasmaa sacepi me paa.naa piyataro so, tathaapi na.m pabbaajemiiti.
[21] ``yo pubbe hatthinaa yaati, sivikaaya rathena ca.
[22] svajja vessantaro raajaa, katha.m gacchati pattiko..
[22] pavisanta.m brahaara~n~na.m, kasmaa ciira.m na bajjhare..
[22] saa kathajja anujjha"ngii, patha.m gacchati pattikaa..
[22] saa kathajja anujjha"ngii, patha.m gacchati pattikaa..
[22] saa kathajja anujjha"ngii, patha.m gacchati pattikaa..
[22] saa kathajja anujjha"ngii, vana.m gacchati ekikaa..
[22] saa kathajja anujjha"ngii, vana.m gacchati bhiirukaa..
[22] saa kathajja anujjha"ngii, vana.m gacchati bhiirukaa..
[22] cira.m dukkhena jhaayissa.m, su~n~na.m aagammima.m pura.m..
[22] kisaa pa.n.du bhavissaami, piye putte apassatii..
[22] tena tena padhaavissa.m, piye putte apassatii..
[22] cira.m dukkhena jhaayissa.m, su~n~na.m aagammima.m pura.m..
[22] kisaa pa.n.du bhavissaami, piye putte apassatii..
[22] tena tena padhaavissa.m, piye putte apassatii..
[22] cira.m dukkhena jhaayissa.m, su~n~na.m aagammima.m pura.m..
[22] kisaa pa.n.du bhavissaami, piye putte apassatii..
[22] tena tena padhaavissa.m, piye putte apassatii..
[22] pabbaajesi vana.m ra.t.thaa, ma~n~ne hissaami jiivita''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0255^ea^ ^b^ka.nikaaraavaa^eb^ti suva.n.naabhara.nasuva.n.navatthapa.tima.n.ditattaa supupphitaa ka.nikaaraa viya. ^b^yaayantamanuyaayantii^eb^ti uyyaanavanakii.laadiina.m atthaaya ^a^M7.0268^ea^ gacchanta.m vessantara.m anugacchanti. ^b^svajjekovaa^eb^ti so ajja ekova hutvaa gamissati. ^b^aniikaanii^eb^ti hatthaaniikaadiini. ^b^gandhaaraa pa.n.dukambalaa^eb^ti gandhaarara.t.the uppannaa satasahassagghanakaa senaaya paarutaa rattakambalaa. ^b^haahitii^eb^ti khandhe katvaa harissati. ^b^pavisanta^eb^nti pavisantassa. ^b^kasmaa ciira.m na bajjhare^eb^ti kasmaa bandhitu.m jaanantaa vaakaciira.m na bandhanti. ^b^raajapabbajitaa^eb^ti raajaano hutvaa pabbajitaa. ^b^khomako.tumbaraanii^eb^ti khomara.t.the ko.tumbarara.t.the uppannaani saa.takaani.

[03] ^b^saa kathajjaa^eb^ti saa katha.m ajja. ^b^anujjha"ngii^eb^ti agarahitaa"ngii. ^b^pii.lamaanaava gacchatii^eb^ti kampitvaa kampitvaa ti.t.thantii viya gacchati. ^b^yaassu itthisahassaana^eb^ntiaadiisu ^b^assuu^eb^ti nipaato, yaati attho. ``yaa saa''tipi paa.tho. ^b^sivaayaa^eb^ti si"ngaaliyaa. ^b^pure^eb^ti pubbe nagare vasantii. ^b^indasagottassaa^eb^ti kosiyagottassa. ^b^vaaru.niivaa^eb^ti devataapavi.t.thaa yakkhadaasii viya. ^b^dukkhenaa^eb^ti puttaviyogasokadukkhena. ^b^aagammi ma.m pura^eb^nti ima.m mama putte gate ^a^P6.0502^ea^ puttanivesana.m aagantvaa. ^b^piye putte^eb^ti vessantara~nceva maddi~nca sandhaayaaha. ^b^hatachaapaa^eb^ti hatapotakaa. ^b^pabbaajesi vana.m ra.t.thaa^eb^ti yadi na.m ra.t.thaa pabbaajesiiti.

[03] deviyaa paridevitasadda.m sutvaa sabbaa sa~njayassa sivika~n~naa samaagataa pakkandi.msu. taasa.m pakkanditasadda.m sutvaa mahaasattassapi nivesane tatheva pakkandi.msu. iti dviisu raajakulesu keci sakabhaavena sa.n.thaatu.m asakkontaa vaatavegena pamadditaa saalaa viya patitvaa parivattamaanaa paridevi.msu. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] senti puttaa ca daaraa ca, vessantaranivesane..
[21] ``orodhaa ca kumaaraa ca, vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
[22] atha vessantaro raajaa, daana.m daatu.m upaagami..
[22] daanena ta.m niiharanti, puna daana.m adaa tuva.m..
[21] ``ye vu.d.dhaa ye ca daharaa, ye ca majjhimaporisaa.
[21] ``thiyopi ^a^M7.0270^ea^ tattha pakkandu.m, yaa tamhi nagare ahu.
[21] ``ye braahma.naa ye ca sama.naa, a~n~ne vaapi vanibbakaa.
[22] baahaa paggayha pakkandu.m, `adhammo kira bho' iti..
[22] esa vessantaro raajaa, samhaa ra.t.thaa nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaro raajaa, samhaa ra.t.thaa nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaro raajaa, samhaa ra.t.thaa nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaraa raajaa, samhaa ra.t.thaa nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaro raajaa, samhaa ra.t.thaa nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaro raajaa, samhaa ra.t.thaa nirajjati..
[22] esa vessantaro raajaa, samhaa ra.t.thaa nirajjati..
[22] ya.m pa~njalikato raajaa, samhaa ra.t.thaa nirajjatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sivika~n~naa^eb^ti bhikkhave, phussatiyaa paridevitasadda.m sutvaa sabbaapi sa~njayassa sivira~n~no itthiyo samaagataa hutvaa pakkandu.m paridevi.msu. ^b^vessantaranivesane^eb^ti tattha itthiina.m pakkanditasadda.m sutvaa vessantarassapi nivesane tatheva pakkanditvaa dviisu raajakulesu keci sakabhaavena sa.n.thaatu.m asakkontaa vaatavegena sampamathitaa saalaa viya patitvaa parivattantaa paridevi.msu. ^b^tato ratyaa vivasaane^eb^ti bhikkhave, tato tassaa rattiyaa accayena suuriye uggate daanaveyyaavatikaa ``daana.m pa.tiyaadita''nti ra~n~no aarocayi.msu. atha vessantaro raajaa paatova nhatvaa sabbaala"nkaarappa.tima.n.dito saadurasabhojana.m bhu~njitvaa mahaajanaparivuto sattasataka.m mahaadaana.m daatu.m daanagga.m upaagami.

[03] ^b^dethaa^eb^ti ^a^V7.0259^ea^ tattha gantvaa sa.t.thisahassaamacce aa.naapento evamaaha. ^b^vaaru.ni^eb^nti ``majjadaana.m naama nipphala''nti jaanaati, eva.m santepi ``suraaso.n.daa daanagga.m patvaa `vessantarassa daanagge sura.m na labhimhaa'ti vattu.m maa labhantuu''ti daapesi. ^b^vanibbake^eb^ti vanibbakajanesu ka~nci ekampi maa vihe.thayittha. ^b^pa.tipuujitaa^eb^ti mayaa puujitaa hutvaa yathaa ma.m thomayamaanaa gacchanti ^a^P6.0504^ea^, tathaa tumhe karothaati vadati.

[03] iti so suva.n.naala"nkaaraana.m suva.n.nadhajaana.m hemajaalappa.ticchannaana.m hatthiina.m sattasataani ca, tathaaruupaana~n~neva assaana.m sattasataani ca, siihacammaadiihi parikkhittaana.m naanaaratanavicitraana.m suva.n.nadhajaana.m rathaana.m sattasataani, sabbaala"nkaarappa.tima.n.ditaana.m uttamaruupadharaana.m khattiyaka~n~naadiina.m itthiina.m sattasataani, suviniitaana.m susikkhitaana.m daasaana.m sattasataani, tathaa ^a^M7.0272^ea^ daasiina.m sattasataani, varausabhaje.t.thakaana.m ku.n.dopadohiniina.m dhenuuna.m sattasataani, aparimaa.naani paanabhojanaaniiti sattasataka.m mahaadaana.m adaasi. tasmi.m eva.m daana.m dadamaane jetuttaranagaravaasino khattiyabraahma.navessasuddaadayo ``saami, vessantara sivira.t.thavaasino ta.m `daana.m detii'ti pabbaajenti, tva.m puna daanameva desii''ti paridevi.msu. tena vutta.m --
[22] daanena ta.m niiharanti, puna daana.m adaa tuva''nti..

[03] daanapa.tiggaahakaa pana daana.m gahetvaa ``idaani kira vessantaro raajaa amhe anaathe katvaa ara~n~na.m pavisissati, ito pa.t.thaaya kassa santika.m gamissaamaa''ti chinnapaadaa viya patantaa aavattantaa parivattantaa mahaasaddena paridevi.msu. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --

[03] tattha ^b^te su mattaa^eb^ti ^b^su^eb^-kaaro nipaatamatto, te vanibbakaati attho. ^b^mattaa kilantaavaa^eb^ti mattaa viya kilantaa viya ca hutvaa. ^b^sampatantii^eb^ti parivattitvaa bhuumiya.m patanti. ^b^acchecchu.m vataa^eb^ti chindi.msu, ^b^vataa^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^yathaa^eb^ti yena kaara.nena. ^b^atiyakkhaa^eb^ti bhuutavijjaa ikkha.nikaapi. ^b^vassavaraa^eb^ti uddha.tabiijaa orodhapaalakaa. ^b^vacanatthenaa^eb^ti vacanakaara.nena. ^b^samhaa ra.t.thaa nirajjatii^eb^ti attano ra.t.thaa niggacchati. ^b^gaama.niiyehii^eb^ti hatthaacariyehi. ^b^aajaaniiyevaa^eb^ti jaatisampanne ^a^V7.0260^ea^. ^b^gaama.niiyehii^eb^ti assaacariyehi. ^b^illiyaacaapadhaaribhii^eb^ti illiya~nca caapa~nca dhaarentehi. ^b^diipe athopi veyyagghe^eb^ti diipicammabyagghacammaparikkhitte. ^b^ekamekaa rathe .thitaa^eb^ti so kira ekameka.m itthiratana.m rathe .thapetvaa a.t.thaa.t.thava.n.nadaasiihi parivuta.m katvaa adaasi.

[03] ^b^nikkharajjuuhii^eb^ti suva.n.nasuttamayehi paama"ngehi. ^b^aa.laarapamhaa^eb^ti visaalakkhiga.n.daa. ^b^hasulaa^eb^ti mhitapubba"ngamakathaa. ^b^susa~n~naa^eb^ti susso.niyo. ^b^tanumajjhimaa^eb^ti ^a^M7.0273^ea^ karatalamiva tanumajjhimabhaagaa. tadaa pana devataayo jambudiipatale raajuuna.m ``vessantaro raajaa mahaadaana.m detii''ti aarocayi.msu, tasmaa te khattiyaa devataanubhaavenaagantvaa taa ga.nhitvaa pakkami.msu. ^b^ka.msupadhaara.naa^eb^ti idha ^b^ka.msa^eb^nti rajatassa naama.m, rajatamayena khiirapa.ticchanabhaajanena saddhi~n~neva adaasiiti attho. ^b^padinnamhii^eb^ti diiyamaane. ^b^sampakampathaa^eb^ti daanatejena kampittha. ^b^ya.m pa~njalikato^eb^ti ya.m so vessantaro raajaa mahaadaana.m datvaa a~njali.m paggayha attano daana.m namassamaano ``sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nassa me ida.m paccayo hotuu''ti pa~njalikato ahosi, tadaapi bhiisanakameva ahosi, tasmi.m kha.ne pathavii kampitthaati attho. ^b^nirajjatii^eb^ti eva.m katvaa niggacchatiyeva, na koci na.m nivaaretiiti attho.

[03] apica ^a^P6.0505^ea^ kho tassa daana.m dadantasseva saaya.m ahosi. so attano nivesanameva gantvaa ``maataapitaro vanditvaa sve gamissaamii''ti cintetvaa ala"nkatarathena maataapituuna.m vasana.t.thaana.m gato. maddiideviipi ``aha.m saaminaa saddhi.m gantvaa maataapitaro anujaanaapessaamii''ti teneva saddhi.m gataa. mahaasatto pitara.m vanditvaa attano gamanabhaava.m kathesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] avaruddhasi ma.m deva, va"nka.m gacchaami pabbata.m..
[21] ``ye hi keci mahaaraaja, bhuutaa ye ca bhavissare.

[03] tattha ^b^dhammina.m vara^eb^nti dhammikaraajuuna.m antare uttama.m. ^b^avaruddhasii^eb^ti ra.t.thaa niiharasi. ^b^bhuutaa^eb^ti atiitaa. ^b^bhavissare^eb^ti ye ca anaagate bhavissanti ^a^M7.0274^ea^, paccuppanne ca nibbattaa. ^b^yamasaadhana^eb^nti yamara~n~no aa.naapavatti.t.thaana.m. ^b^svaaha.m sake abhissasi^eb^nti so aha.m attano nagaravaasinoyeva pii.lesi.m. ki.m karonto? ^b^yajamaano sake pure^eb^ti. paa.liya.m pana ``so aha''nti likhita.m. ^b^nirajjaha^eb^nti nikkhanto aha.m. ^b^agha.m ta^eb^nti ya.m ara~n~ne vasantena pa.tisevitabba.m dukkha.m, ta.m pa.tisevissaami. ^b^pa"nkamhii^eb^ti tumhe pana kaamapa"nkamhi siidathaati vadati.
[03] iti mahaasatto imaahi catuuhi gaathaahi pitaraa saddhi.m kathetvaa maatu santika.m gantvaa vanditvaa pabbajja.m anujaanaapento evamaaha --
[27] svaaha.m sake abhissasi.m, yajamaano sake pure.
[03] acchata.m saha puttehi, ki.m ara~n~ne karissatii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^samijjhatuu^eb^ti jhaanena samiddhaa hotu. ^b^acchata^eb^nti acchatu, idheva hotuuti vadati.
[22] sace icchati anvetu, sace nicchati acchatuu''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^akaamaa^eb^ti amma, ki.m naameta.m kathetha, aha.m anicchaaya daasimpi netu.m na ussahaamiiti.
[03] tato puttassa katha.m sutvaa raajaa su.nha.m yaacitu.m pa.tipajji. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] dukkho vaaso ara~n~nasmi.m, maa hi tva.m lakkha.ne gamii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^pa.tipajjathaa^eb^ti bhikkhave, puttassa katha.m sutvaa raajaa su.nha.m yaacitu.m pa.tipajji. ^b^candanasamaacaare^eb^ti lohitacandanena pariki.n.nasariire. ^b^maa hi tva.m lakkha.ne gamii^eb^ti subhalakkha.nena samannaagate maa tva.m ara~n~na.m gamiiti.
[22] naaha.m ta.m sukhamiccheyya.m, ya.m me vessantara.m vinaa''ti..
[22] i"ngha maddi nisaamehi, vane ye honti dussahaa..
[22] tepi ta.m tattha hi.m seyyu.m, ta.m te dukkhatara.m siyaa..
[22] sappaa ajagaraa naama, avisaa te mahabbalaa..
[22] na tehi puriso di.t.tho, rukkhamaaruyha muccati..
[21] ``yaa tva.m sivaaya sutvaana, muhu.m uttasayii pure.
[22] saa tva.m va"nkamanuppattaa, katha.m maddi karissasi..

[03] tattha ^b^tamabravii^eb^ti ta.m su.nha.m abravi. ^b^apare passa santaape^eb^ti a~n~nepi santaape bhayajanake pekkha. ^b^nadiinupanisevite^eb^ti nadiina.m upanisevite aasanna.t.thaane, nadiikuule vasanteti attho. ^b^avisaa^eb^ti nibbisaa. ^b^api maasanna^eb^nti aasanna.m attano sariirasamphassa.m aagatanti attho. ^b^aghammigaa^eb^ti ^a^V7.0264^ea^ aghakaraa migaa, dukkhaavahaa migaati attho. ^b^nadi.m sotumbara.m patii^eb^ti sotumbaraaya naama nadiyaa tiire. ^b^yuuthaana^eb^nti yuuthaani, ayameva vaa paa.tho. ^b^dhenuva vacchagiddhaavaa^eb^ti tava daarake apassantii vacchagiddhaa dhenu viya katha.m karissasi. ^b^va^eb^-kaaro panettha nipaatamattova. ^b^sampatite^eb^ti sampatante. ^b^ghore^eb^ti bhiisanake viruupe. ^b^plava"ngame^eb^ti makka.te. ^b^akhetta~n~naayaa^eb^ti ara~n~nabhuumiakusalataaya. ^b^bhavissate^eb^ti bhavissati. ^b^sivaaya sutvaanaa^eb^ti si"ngaaliyaa sadda.m sutvaa. ^b^muhu^eb^nti punappuna.m. ^b^uttasayii^eb^ti uttasasi. ^b^sa.natevaa^eb^ti nadati viya sa.nanta.m viya bhavissati.
[27] yaani etaani akkhaasi, vane pa.tibhayaani me.
[27] yo na.m hatthe gahetvaana, akaama.m parika.d.dhati.
[27] datvaa ca no pakkamati, bahu.m dukkha.m anappaka.m.
[27] itthiipi vidhavaa naggaa, yassaapi dasa bhaataro.
[22] ta.m ve devaa pasa.msanti, dukkara~nhi karoti saa..
[21] ``katha.m ^a^M7.0278^ea^ nu taasa.m hadaya.m, sukharaa vata itthiyo.

[03] tattha ^a^V7.0266^ea^ ^b^tamabravii^eb^ti bhikkhave, maddii ra~n~no vacana.m sutvaa ta.m raajaana.m abravi. ^b^abhisambhossa^eb^nti sahissaami adhivaasessaami. ^b^po.takila^eb^nti po.takilati.na.m. ^b^panudahissaamii^eb^ti dvedhaa katvaa vessantarassa purato gamissaami. ^b^udarassuparodhenaa^eb^ti upavaasena khudaadhivaasena. ^b^gohanuve.thanena caa^eb^ti visaalaka.tiyo onatapassaa ca itthiyo saamika.m labhantiiti ^a^P6.0509^ea^ katvaa gohanunaa ka.tiphalaka.m ko.t.taapetvaa ve.thanena ca passaani onaametvaa kumaarikaa pati.m labhati. ^b^ka.tuka^eb^nti asaata.m. ^b^gaccha~n~nevaa^eb^ti gamissaamiyeva.

[03] ^b^apissaa hoti appatto^eb^ti tassaa vidhavaaya ucchi.t.thakampi bhu~njitu.m ananucchavikova. ^b^yo na^eb^nti yo niicajacco ta.m vidhava.m anicchamaana~n~neva hatthe gahetvaa ka.d.dhati. ^b^kesaggaha.namukkhepaa, bhuumyaa ca parisumbhanaa^eb^ti asaamika.m itthi.m hatthapaadehi kesaggaha.na.m, ukkhepaa, bhuumiya.m paatananti etaani avama~n~nanaani katvaa atikkamanti. ^b^datvaa caa^eb^ti asaamikaaya itthiyaa evaruupa.m bahu.m anappaka.m dukkha.m parapuriso datvaa ca ^b^no pakkamati^eb^ niraasa"nko olokentova ti.t.thati.

[03] ^b^sukkacchavii^eb^ti nhaaniiyacu.n.nena u.t.thaapitacchaviva.n.naa. ^b^vedhaveraa^eb^ti vidhavitthikaamaa purisaa. ^b^datvaa^eb^ti ki~ncideva appamattaka.m dhana.m datvaa. ^b^subhagamaanino^eb^ti maya.m subhagaati ma~n~namaanaa. ^b^akaama^eb^nti ta.m vidhava.m asaamika.m akaama.m. ^b^uluuka~n~neva vaayasaa^eb^ti kaakaa viyauluuka.m parika.d.dhanti. ^b^ka.msapajjotane^eb^ti suva.n.nabhaajanaabhaaya pajjotante. ^b^vasa^eb^nti evaruupepi ~naatikule vasamaanaa. ^b^nevaativaakya.m na labhe^eb^ti ``aya.m itthii nissaamikaa, yaavajiiva.m amhaaka~n~neva bhaaro jaato''tiaadiini vacanaani vadantehi bhaatuuhipi sakhiniihipi ativaakya.m garahavacana.m neva na labhati. ^b^pa~n~naa.na^eb^nti paaka.tabhaavakaara.na.m.

[03] ^b^yaa^eb^ ^a^M7.0279^ea^ ^b^daliddii daliddassaa^eb^ti deva, kittisampannaa yaa itthii attano saamikassa daliddassa dukkhappattakaale sayampi daliddii samaanaa dukkhaava hoti, tassa a.d.dhakaale teneva saddhi.m a.d.dhaa sukhappattaa hoti, ta.m ve devaa pasa.msanti. abhijjantyaati abhijjantiyaa. sacepi hi itthiyaa sakalapathavii na bhijjati, taaya sakalaaya pathaviyaa saava issaraa hoti, tathaapi vedhabya.m ka.tukamevaati attho. sukharaa vata itthiyoti su.t.thu kharaa vata itthiyo.
[27] ime te daharaa puttaa, jaalii ka.nhaajinaa cubho.
[22] nikkhippa lakkha.ne gaccha, maya.m te posayaamase''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^jaalii ka.nhaajinaa cubho^eb^ti jaalii ca ka.nhaajinaa caati ubho. ^b^nikkhippaa^eb^ti ime nikkhipitvaa gacchaahiiti.
[27] piyaa me puttakaa deva, jaalii ka.nhaajinaa cubho.
[03] tattha ^b^tyamha^eb^nti te daarakaa amhaaka.m tattha ara~n~ne. ^b^jiivasokina^eb^nti avigatasokaana.m hadaya.m ramayissantiiti attho.

[03] tattha ^b^palasate ka.mse^eb^ti palasatena kataaya ka~ncanapaatiyaa. ^b^gonake cittasanthate^eb^ti mahaapi.t.thiya.m kaa.lakojave ceva vicittake santhare ca. ^b^caamaramorahatthehii^eb^ti caamarehi ceva morahatthehi ca biijita"ngaa.

[03] eva.m tesa.m sallapantaana~n~neva ratti vibhaayi, suuriyo ugga~nchi. mahaasattassa catusindhavayutta.m ala"nkataratha.m aanetvaa raajadvaare .thapayi.msu. maddiipi sassusasure vanditvaa sesitthiyo apaloketvaa dve putte aadaaya vessantarato pa.thamatara.m gantvaa rathe a.t.thaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[27] maa deva paridevesi, maa ca tva.m vimano ahu.
[22] yathaa maya.m bhavissaama, tathaa hessanti daarakaa..
[03] tattha ^b^sivimaggenaa^eb^ti sivira~n~no gantabbamaggena. ^b^anvesii^eb^ti ta.m agamaasi, paasaadaa otaritvaa ratha.m abhiruhiiti attho.
[22] pitu maatu ca vanditvaa, katvaa ca na.m padakkhi.na.m..

[03] tattha ^b^tato^eb^ti bhikkhave, tassaa maddiyaa ratha.m abhiruhitvaa .thitakaale. ^b^datvaa^eb^ti hiyyo daana.m datvaa. ^b^katvaa ca na.m padakkhi.na^eb^nti padakkhi.na~nca katvaa. ^b^na^eb^nti nipaatamatta.m.
[22] aamanta kho ta.m gacchaama, arogaa hontu ~naatayo''ti..

[03] tassattho -- bhikkhave, tato vessantaro raajaa yattha ``vessantara.m raajaana.m passissaamaa''ti bahuko jano .thito aasi, tattha ratha.m pesetvaa mahaajana.m aapucchanto ``aamanta kho ta.m gacchaama, arogaa hontu ~naatayo''ti aaha. tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipaatamatta.m. bhikkhave, tato vessantaro raajaa ~naatake aaha -- ``tumhe aamantetvaa maya.m gacchaama, tumhe sukhitaa hotha nidukkhaa''ti.

[03] eva.m mahaasatto mahaajana.m aamantetvaa ``appamattaa hotha, daanaadiini pu~n~naani karothaa''ti tesa.m ovaditvaa pakkaami. gacchante pana bodhisatte maataa ``putto me daanavittako daana.m detuu''ti aabhara.nehi saddhi.m sattaratanapuuraani saka.taani ubhosu passesu pesesi. sopi attano kaayaaru.lhameva aabhara.nabha.n.da.m omu~ncitvaa sampattayaacakaana.m a.t.thaarasa vaare datvaa avasesa.m sabba.m adaasi. so nagaraa nikkhamitvaa ca nivattitvaa oloketukaamo ahosi. athassa mana.m pa.ticca rathappamaa.na.t.thaane mahaapathavii bhijjitvaa kulaalacakka.m viya parivattitvaa ratha.m nagaraabhimukha.m akaasi. so maataapituuna.m vasana.t.thaana.m olokesi. tena kaara.nena pathaviikampo ahosi. tena vutta.m --
[03] saya.m ^a^M7.0282^ea^ pana oloketvaa maddimpi olokaapetu.m gaathamaaha --

[03] atha ^a^P6.0512^ea^ mahaasatto sahajaate sa.t.thisahassaamacce ca sesajana~nca nivattaapetvaa ratha.m paajento maddi.m aaha -- ``bhadde, sace pacchato yaacakaa aagacchanti, upadhaareyyaasii''ti. saapi olokentii nisiidi. athassa sattasataka.m mahaadaana.m sampaapu.nitu.m asakkontaa cattaaro braahma.naa nagara.m aagantvaa ``kuhi.m vessantaro raajaa''ti pucchitvaa ``daana.m datvaa gato''ti vutte ``ki~nci gahetvaa gato''ti pucchitvaa ``rathena gato''ti sutvaa ``asse na.m yaacissaamaa''ti anubandhi.msu. atha maddii te aagacchante disvaa ``yaacakaa aagacchanti, devaa''ti aarocesi. mahaasatto ratha.m .thapesi. te aagantvaa asse yaaci.msu. mahaasatto asse adaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``ta.m braahma.naa anvagamu.m, te na.m asse ayaacisu.m.

[03] assesu pana dinnesu rathadhura.m aakaaseyeva a.t.thaasi. atha braahma.nesu gatamattesuyeva cattaaro devaputtaa rohiccamigava.n.nena aagantvaa rathadhura.m sampa.ticchitvaa agama.msu. mahaasatto tesa.m devaputtabhaava.m ~natvaa ima.m gaathamaaha --
[03] tattha ^b^dakkhi.nassaa^eb^ti susikkhitaa assaa viya ma.m vahanti.

[03] atha na.m eva.m gacchanta.m aparo braahma.no aagantvaa ratha.m yaaci. mahaasatto puttadaara.m otaaretvaa tassa ratha.m adaasi. rathe pana dinne devaputtaa antaradhaayi.msu. rathassa dinnabhaava.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] tassa ta.m yaacitodaasi, na cassupahato mano..
[03] tattha ^b^athetthaa^eb^ti atha tasmi.m vane. ^b^na cassupahato mano^eb^ti na cassa mano oliino. ^b^assaasayii^eb^ti paritosento niyyaadesi.
[03] tato ^a^P6.0513^ea^ pa.t.thaaya pana te sabbepi pattikaava ahesu.m. atha mahaasatto maddi.m avoca --
[21] ``tva.m maddi ka.nha.m ga.nhaahi, lahu esaa kani.t.thikaa.
[22] aha.m jaali.m gahessaami, garuko bhaatiko hi so''ti..
[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa ubhopi khattiyaa dve daarake a"nkenaadaaya pakkami.msu. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[03] te pa.tipatha.m aagacchante manusse disvaa ``kuhi.m va"nkapabbato''ti pucchanti. manussaa ``duure''ti vadanti. tena vutta.m --

[03] maggassa ubhosu passesu vividhaphaladhaarino rukkhe disvaa daarakaa kandanti. mahaasattassaanubhaavena phaladhaarino rukkhaa onamitvaa hatthasamphassa.m ^a^M7.0284^ea^ aagacchanti. tato supakkaphalaaphalaani uccinitvaa tesa.m deti. ta.m disvaa maddii acchariya.m pavedesi. tena vutta.m --

[03] jetuttaranagarato ^a^P6.0514^ea^ suva.n.nagiritaalo naama pabbato pa~nca yojanaani, tato kontimaaraa naama nadii pa~nca yojanaani, tato a~ncaragiri naama pabbato pa~nca yojanaani, tato dunnivi.t.thabraahma.nagaamo naama pa~nca yojanaani, tato maatulanagara.m dasa yojanaani. iti ta.m magga.m jetuttaranagarato ti.msayojana.m hoti. devataa ta.m magga.m sa.mkhipi.msu. te ekadivaseneva maatulanagara.m paapu.ni.msu. tena vutta.m --
[03] upagacchantaa ^a^V7.0273^ea^ ca pana jetuttaranagarato paataraasasamaye nikkhamitvaa saayanhasamaye cetara.t.the maatulanagara.m pattaa. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --

[03] tadaa maatulanagare sa.t.thi khattiyasahassaani vasanti. mahaasatto antonagara.m apavisitvaa nagaradvaareyeva saalaaya.m nisiidi. athassa maddii ^a^M7.0285^ea^ bodhisattassa paadesu raja.m pu~nchitvaa paade sambaahitvaa ``vessantarassa aagatabhaava.m jaanaapessaamii''ti saalaato nikkhamitvaa tassa cakkhupathe saalaadvaare a.t.thaasi. nagara.m pavisantiyo ca nikkhamantiyo ca itthiyo ta.m disvaa parivaaresu.m. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --

[03] tattha ^b^lakkha.namaagata^eb^nti lakkha.nasampanna.m maddi.m aagata.m. ^b^paridhaavatii^eb^ti eva.m sukhumaalii hutvaa pattikaava vicarati. ^b^pariyaayitvaa^eb^ti jetuttaranagare vicaritvaa. ^b^sivikaayaa^eb^ti suva.n.nasivikaaya.

[03] mahaajano ^a^P6.0515^ea^ maddi~nca vessantara~nca dve putte cassa anaathaagamanena aagate disvaa gantvaa raajuuna.m aacikkhi. sa.t.thisahassaa raajaano rodantaa paridevantaa tassa santika.m aagama.msu. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[27] kacci nu deva kusala.m, kacci deva anaamaya.m.
[22] kacci pitaa arogo te, siviina~nca anaamaya.m..
[21] ``ko ^a^V7.0274^ea^ te bala.m mahaaraaja, ko nu te rathama.n.dala.m.

[03] tattha ^b^disvaa^eb^ti duuratova passitvaa. ^b^cetapaamokkhaa^eb^ti cetaraajaano. ^b^upaagamu^eb^nti upasa"nkami.msu. ^b^kusala^eb^nti aarogya.m. ^b^anaamaya^eb^nti niddukkhabhaava.m. ^b^ko te bala^eb^nti kuhi.m tava balakaayo. ^b^rathama.n.dala^eb^nti yenaasi rathena aagato, so kuhinti pucchanti. ^b^anassako^eb^ti assavirahito. ^b^arathako^eb^ti ayaanako. ^b^diighamaddhaanamaagato^eb^ti diighamagga.m aagato. ^b^pakato^eb^ti abhibhuuto.
[03] atha ^a^M7.0286^ea^ nesa.m mahaasatto attano aagatakaara.na.m kathento aaha --
[22] atho pitaa arogo me, siviina~nca anaamaya.m..
[27] avaruddhasi ma.m raajaa, va"nka.m gacchaami pabbata.m.
[22] okaasa.m sammaa jaanaatha, vane yattha vasaamase''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^tasmi.m me^eb^ti tasmi.m kaara.ne mayha.m sivayo kuddhaa. ^b^upahatomano^eb^ti upahatacitto kuddhova ^a^V7.0275^ea^ ma.m ra.t.thaa pabbaajesi. ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti yasmi.m vane maya.m vaseyyaama, tattha vasanokaasa.m jaanaathaati.
[03] tattha ^b^pavedayaa^eb^ti kathehi, sabba.m pa.tiyaadetvaa dassaama. ^b^bhisa^eb^nti bhisamuula.m, ya.mki~nci kandajaata.m vaa.
[27] avaruddhasi ma.m raajaa, va"nka.m gacchaami pabbata.m.
[22] okaasa.m sammaa jaanaatha, vane yattha vasaamase''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M7.0287^ea^ ^b^pa.tiggahita^eb^nti sabbameta.m tumhehi dinna.m mayaa ca pa.tiggahitameva hotu, sabbassa tumhehi mayha.m agghiya.m nivedana.m kata.m. raajaa pana ma.m avaruddhasi ra.t.thaa pabbaajesi, tasmaa va"nkameva gamissaami, tasmi.m me ara~n~ne vasana.t.thaana.m jaanaathaati.
[22] yaava cetaa gamissanti, ra~n~no santika yaacitu.m..
[27] ta.m ta.m cetaa purakkhatvaa, patiitaa laddhapaccayaa.

[03] tattha ^b^ra~n~no santika yaacitu^eb^nti ra~n~no santika.m yaacanatthaaya gamissanti. ^b^nijjhaapetu^eb^nti tumhaaka.m niddosabhaava.m jaanaapetu.m. ^b^laddhapaccayaa^eb^ti laddhapati.t.thaa. ^b^gacchantii^eb^ti gamissanti.
[21] ``maa vo ruccittha gamana.m, ra~n~no santika yaacitu.m.
[21] ``accuggataa hi sivayo, balaggaa negamaa ca ye.

[03] tattha ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m mama niddosabhaava.m nijjhaapane raajaapi anissaro. ^b^accuggataa^eb^ti atikuddhaa. ^b^balaggaa^eb^ti balakaayaa. ^b^vidha.msetu^eb^nti rajjato niiharitu.m. ^b^raajaana^eb^nti raajaanampi.
[22] mati.m karohi tva.m deva, rajjassa manusaasitu''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^M7.0288^ea^ ^b^sace esaa pavattetthaa^eb^ti sace etasmi.m ra.t.the esaa pavatti. ^b^rajjassa manusaasitu^eb^nti rajja.m samanusaasitu.m, ayameva vaa paa.tho.
[21] ``na ^a^V7.0277^ea^ me chando mati atthi, rajjassa anusaasitu.m.
[21] ``atu.t.thaa sivayo aasu.m, balaggaa negamaa ca ye.
[22] siviihi bha.n.dana.m caapi, viggaho me na ruccati..
[22] ekassa kaara.naa mayha.m, hi.mseyya bahuko jano..
[27] avaruddhasi ma.m raajaa, va"nka.m gacchaami pabbata.m.
[22] okaasa.m sammaa jaanaatha, vane yattha vasaamase''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^cetaa rajjebhisecayu^eb^nti cetara.t.thavaasino kira vessantara.m rajje abhisi~nci.msuuti tumhaakampi te atu.t.thaa aasu.m. ^b^asammodiya^eb^nti asaamaggiya.m. ^b^assaa^eb^ti bhaveyya. ^b^athassaa^eb^ti atha mayha.m ekassa kaara.naa tumhaaka.m bha.n.dana.m bhavissatiiti.

[03] eva.m mahaasatto anekapariyaayena yaacitopi rajja.m na icchi. athassa te cetaraajaano mahanta.m sakkaara.m kari.msu. so nagara.m pavisitu.m na icchi. atha na.m saalameva ala"nkaritvaa saa.niyaa parikkhepa.m katvaa mahaasayana.m pa~n~naapetvaa sabbe aarakkha.m kari.msu. so ekaratti.m tehi sa"ngahitaarakkho saalaaya.m sayitvaa punadivase paatova nhatvaa naanaggarasabhojana.m bhu~njitvaa tehi parivuto nikkhami. sa.t.thisahassaa khattiyaa tena saddhi.m pannarasayojanamagga.m gantvaa ^a^P6.0518^ea^ vanadvaare .thatvaa purato pannarasayojanamagga.m aacikkhantaa aaha.msu --
[22] yattha tva.m saha puttehi, saha bhariyaaya cacchasi..
[22] tattha nhatvaa pivitvaa ca, assaasetvaa saputtake..

[03] tattha ^b^raajisii^eb^ti raajaano hutvaa pabbajitaa. ^b^samaahitaa^eb^ti ekaggacittaa. ^b^esaa^eb^ti dakkhi.nahattha.m ukkhipitvaa iminaa pabbatapaadena gacchathaati aacikkhantaa vadanti. ^b^acchasii^eb^ti ^a^P6.0519^ea^ vasissasi. ^b^aapaga^eb^nti udakavaahanadiaava.t.ta.m. ^b^girigabbhara^eb^nti giriina.m kucchito pavatta.m. ^b^madhupipphala^eb^nti madhuraphala.m. ^b^rammake^eb^ti rama.niiye. ^b^kimpurisaayuta^eb^nti kimpurisehi aayuta.m pariki.n.na.m. ^b^setasogandhiikehi caa^eb^ti naanappakaarehi setuppalehi ceva sogandhikehi ca sa~nchanno. ^b^siihovaamisapekkhiivaa^eb^ti aamisa.m pekkhanto siiho viya.

[03] ^b^bindussaraa^eb^ti sampi.n.ditassaraa. ^b^vagguu^eb^ti madhurassaraa. ^b^kuujantamupakuujantii^eb^ti pa.thama.m kuujamaana.m pakkhi.m pacchaa upakuujanti. ^b^utusa.mpupphite dume^eb^ti utusamaye pupphite dume niliiyitvaa kuujanta.m upakuujanti. ^b^so dakkhisii^eb^ti so tva.m passissasiiti attho. ^b^kara~njakakudhaayuta^eb^nti kara~njarukkhehi ca kakudharukkhehi ca sampariki.n.na.m. ^b^appa.tigandhiya^eb^nti pa.tikuulagandhavirahita.m madhurodakapariki.n.na.mnaanappakaarapadumuppalaadiihi sa~nchanna.m. ^b^pa.n.nasaala.m amaapayaa^eb^ti pa.n.nasaala.m maapeyyaasi. ^b^amaapetvaa^eb^ti maapetvaa. ^b^u~nchaacariyaaya iihathaa^eb^ti atha tumhe, deva, u~nchaacariyaaya yaapentaa appamattaa iihatha, aaraddhaviiriyaa hutvaa vihareyyaathaati attho.

[01] eva.m te raajaano tassa pannarasayojanamagga.m aacikkhitvaa ta.m uyyojetvaa vessantarassa antaraayabhayassa vinodanattha.m ``maa kocideva paccaamitto okaasa.m labheyyaa''ti cintetvaa eka.m byatta.m susikkhita.m cetaputta.m aamantetvaa ``tva.m gacchante ca aagacchante ca parigga.nhaahii''ti vanadvaare aarakkha.natthaaya .thapetvaa sakanagara.m gami.msu. vessantaropi saputtadaaro gandhamaadanapabbata.m patvaa, ta.m divasa.m tattha vasitvaa tato uttaraabhimukho vepullapabbatapaadena gantvaa, ketumatiyaa naama nadiyaa tiire nisiiditvaa vanacarakena dinna.m madhuma.msa.m khaaditvaa tassa suva.n.nasuuci.m datvaa ^a^M7.0291^ea^ tattha ^a^V7.0280^ea^ nhatvaa pivitvaa pa.tippassaddhadaratho nadito uttaritvaa saanupabbatasikhare .thitassa nigrodhassa muule thoka.m nisiiditvaa nigrodhaphalaani khaaditvaa u.t.thaaya gacchanto naa.lika.m naama pabbata.m patvaa ta.m pariharanto mucalindasara.m gantvaa sarassa tiirena pubbuttaraka.n.na.m patvaa, ekapadikamaggena vanagha.ta.m pavisitvaa ta.m atikkamma girividuggaana.m nadippabhavaana.m purato catura.msapokkhara.ni.m paapu.ni.

[01] tasmi.m kha.ne sakko aavajjento ``mahaasatto himavanta.m pavi.t.tho''ti ~natvaa ``tassa vasana.t.thaana.m laddhu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa vissakamma.m ^a^P6.0520^ea^ pakkosaapetvaa ``gaccha, taata, tva.m va"nkapabbatakujhacchimhi rama.niiye .thaane assamapada.m maapetvaa ehii''ti pesesi. so ``saadhu, devaa''ti devalokato otaritvaa tattha dve pa.n.nasaalaayo dve ca"nkame ratti.t.thaanadivaa.t.thaanaani ca maapetvaa ca"nkamako.tiya.m tesu tesu .thaanesu naanaaphaladhare rukkhe ca kadalivanaani ca dassetvaa sabbe pabbajitaparikkhaare pa.tiyaadetvaa ``ye keci pabbajitukaamaa, te ime ga.nhantuu''ti akkharaani likhitvaa amanusse ca bheravasadde migapakkhino ca pa.tikkamaapetvaa saka.t.thaanameva gato.

[03] mahaasatto ekapadikamagga.m disvaa ``pabbajitaana.m vasana.t.thaana.m bhavissatii''ti maddi~nca putte ca assamapadadvaare .thapetvaa assamapada.m pavisitvaa akkharaani oloketvaa ``sakkenamhi di.t.tho''ti ~natvaa pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa khagga~nca dhanu~nca apanetvaa saa.take omu~ncitvaa rattavaakaciira.m nivaasetvaa ajinacamma.m a.mse katvaa ja.taama.n.dala.m bandhitvaa isivesa.m gahetvaa kattarada.n.da.m aadaaya pa.n.nasaalato nikkhamitvaa pabbajitasiri.m samubbahanto ``aho sukha.m, aho sukha.m, pabbajjaa me adhigataa''ti udaana.m udaanetvaa ca"nkama.m aaruyha aparaapara.m ca"nkamitvaa paccekabuddhasadisena upasamena puttadaaraana.m santika.m agamaasi. maddiipi mahaasattassa paadesu patitvaa roditvaa teneva saddhi.m assamapada.m pavisitvaa attano pa.n.nasaala.m gantvaa isivesa.m ga.nhi. pacchaa puttepi taapasakumaarake kari.msu. cattaaro khattiyaa va"nkapabbatakucchimhi vasi.msu. atha maddii mahaasatta.m vara.m yaaci ``deva, tumhe phalaaphalatthaaya vana.m agantvaa putte gahetvaa idheva hotha, aha.m phalaaphala.m aaharissaamii''ti. tato pa.t.thaaya saa ara~n~nato phalaaphalaani aaharitvaa tayo jane pa.tijaggati.

[03] bodhisattopi ^a^M7.0292^ea^ ta.m vara.m yaaci ``bhadde, maddi maya.m ito pa.t.thaaya pabbajitaa naama, itthii ca naama brahmacariyassa mala.m, ito pa.t.thaaya akaale mama santika.m maa aagacchaahii''ti. saa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchi. mahaasattassa mettaanubhaavena samantaa tiyojane sabbe tiracchaanaapi a~n~nama~n~na.m ^a^V7.0281^ea^ mettacitta.m pa.tilabhi.msu. maddiideviipi paatova u.t.thaaya paaniiyaparibhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetvaa mukhodaka.m aaharitvaa dantaka.t.tha.m datvaa assamapada.m sammajjitvaa dve putte pitu santike .thapetvaa pacchikha.nittia"nkusahatthaa ara~n~na.m ^a^P6.0521^ea^ pavisitvaa vanamuulaphalaaphalaani aadaaya pacchi.m puuretvaa saayanhasamaye ara~n~nato aagantvaa pa.n.nasaalaaya phalaaphala.m .thapetvaa nhatvaa putte nhaapesi. atha cattaaropi janaa pa.n.nasaalaadvaare nisiiditvaa phalaaphala.m paribhu~njanti. tato maddii putte gahetvaa attano pa.n.nasaala.m paavisi. iminaa niyaamena te pabbatakucchimhi satta maase vasi.msuuti.

[03] tadaa kaali"ngara.t.the dunnivi.t.thabraahma.nagaamavaasii juujako naama braahma.no bhikkhaacariyaaya kahaapa.nasata.m labhitvaa ekasmi.m braahma.nakule .thapetvaa puna dhanapariyesanatthaaya gato. tasmi.m ciraayante braahma.nakulaa kahaapa.nasata.m vala~njetvaa pacchaa itarena aagantvaa codiyamaanaa kahaapa.ne daatu.m asakkontaa amittataapana.m naama dhiitara.m tassa ada.msu. so ta.m aadaaya kaali"ngara.t.the dunnivi.t.thabraahma.nagaama.m gantvaa vasi. amittataapanaa sammaa braahma.na.m paricarati. atha a~n~ne taru.nabraahma.naa tassaa aacaarasampatti.m disvaa ``aya.m mahallakabraahma.na.m sammaa pa.tijaggati, tumhe pana amhesu ki.m pamajjathaa''ti attano attano bhariyaayo tajjenti. taa ``ima.m amittataapana.m imamhaa gaamaa palaapessaamaa''ti nadiititthaadiisu sannipatitvaa ta.m paribhaasi.msu. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``amittaa nuuna te maataa, amitto nuuna te pitaa.
[22] ye ta.m ji.n.nassa paada.msu, eva.m dahariya.m sati.m..
[22] ye ta.m ji.n.nassa paada.msu, eva.m dahariya.m sati.m..
[22] ye ta.m ji.n.nassa paada.msu, eva.m dahariya.m sati.m..
[22] ye ta.m ji.n.nassa paada.msu, eva.m dahariya.m sati.m..
[22] ye ta.m ji.n.nassa paada.msu, eva.m dahariya.m sati.m..
[22] ye ta.m ji.n.nassa paada.msu, eva.m dahariya.m sati.m..
[22] yaa tva.m vasasi ji.n.nassa, mata.m te jiivitaa vara.m..
[21] ``na hi nuuna tuyha.m kalyaa.ni, pitaa maataa ca sobhane.
[27] a~n~na.m bhattaara.m vindi.msu, ye ta.m ji.n.nassa paada.msu.
[22] ye ta.m ji.n.nassa paada.msu, eva.m dahariya.m sati.m..
[27] saa tva.m loke abhisapi, siilavante bahussute.
[22] yaa tva.m vasasi ji.n.nassa, eva.m dahariyaa satii..
[21] ``na ^a^V7.0283^ea^ ^a^M7.0294^ea^ dukkha.m ahinaa da.t.tha.m, na dukkha.m sattiyaa hata.m.
[22] ta~nca dukkha~nca tibba~nca, ya.m passe ji.n.naka.m pati.m..
[21] ``natthi khi.d.daa natthi rati, ji.n.nena patinaa saha.
[22] sabbesa.m sokaa nassanti, ye keci hadayassitaa..

[03] tattha ^b^ahuu^eb^ti ahosi. ^b^vaasii kali"ngesuu^eb^ti kaali"ngara.t.thesu dunnivi.t.thabraahma.nagaamavaasii. ^b^taa na.m tattha gataavocu^eb^nti tattha gaame taa itthiyo nadiititthe udakahaarikaa hutvaa gataa na.m avocu.m. ^b^thiyo na.m paribhaasi.msuu^eb^ti itthiyo na a~n~na.m ki~nci avocu.m, atha kho na.m paribhaasi.msu. ^b^kutuuhalaa^eb^ti kotuuhalajaataa viya hutvaa. ^b^samaagantvaa^eb^ti samantaa parikkhipitvaa. ^b^dahariya.m sati^eb^nti dahari.m taru.ni.m sobhaggappatta.m samaana.m. ^b^ji.n.nassaa^eb^ti jaraaji.n.nassa gehe. ^b^duyi.t.tha.m te navamiya^eb^nti tava navamiya.m yaaga.m duyi.t.tha.m bhavissati, so te yaagapi.n.do pa.thama.m mahallakakaakena gahito bhavissati. ``duyi.t.thaa te navamiyaa''tipi paa.tho, navamiyaa tayaa duyi.t.thaa bhavissatiiti attho. ^b^akata.m aggihuttaka^eb^nti aggijuhanampi tayaa akata.m bhavissati. ^b^abhisapii^eb^ti sama.nabraahma.ne samitapaape vaa baahitapaape vaa akkosi. tassa te paapassa ida.m phalanti adhippaayeneva aaha.msu. ^b^jagghitampi na sobhatii^eb^ti kha.n.dadante vivaritvaa hasantassa mahallakassa hasitampi na sobhati. ^b^sabbesa.m sokaa nassantii^eb^ti sabbe etesa.m sokaa vinassanti. ^b^ki.m ji.n.no^eb^ti aya.m ji.n.no ta.m pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi katha.m ramayissatiiti.
[03] saa taasa.m santikaa paribhaasa.m labhitvaa udakagha.ta.m aadaaya rodamaanaa ghara.m gantvaa ``ki.m bhoti rodasii''ti braahma.nena pu.t.thaa tassa aarocentii ima.m gaathamaaha --
[22] thiyo ma.m paribhaasanti, tayaa ji.n.nena braahma.naa''ti..
[03] tassattho ^a^V7.0284^ea^ -- braahma.na, tayaa ji.n.nena ma.m itthiyo paribhaasanti, tasmaa ito pa.t.thaaya tava udakahaarikaa hutvaa nadi.m na gacchaamiiti.
[21] ``maa me tva.m akaraa kamma.m, maa me udakamaahari.
[22] aha.m udakamaahissa.m, maa bhoti kupitaa ahuu''ti..
[21] ``naaha.m tamhi kule jaataa, ya.m tva.m udakamaahare.
[22] eva.m braahma.na jaanaahi, na te vacchaamaha.m ghare..
[21] ``sace me daasa.m daasi.m vaa, naanayissasi braahma.na.
[22] eva.m braahma.na jaanaahi, na te vacchaami santike''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^naaha^eb^nti braahma.na, yamhi kule saamiko kamma.m karoti, naaha.m tattha jaataa. ^b^ya.m tva^eb^nti tasmaa ya.m udaka.m tva.m aaharissasi, na mayha.m tena attho.
[21] ``natthi me sippa.thaana.m vaa, dhana.m dha~n~na~nca braahma.ni.
[27] kutoha.m daasa.m daasi.m vaa, aanayissaami bhotiyaa.
[22] aha.m bhoti.m upa.t.thissa.m, maa bhoti kupitaa ahuu''ti..
[21] ``ehi te ahamakkhissa.m, yathaa me vacana.m suta.m.
[22] esa vessantaro raajaa, va"nke vasati pabbate..
[21] ``ta.m tva.m gantvaana yaacassu, daasa.m daasi~nca braahma.na.
[22] so te dassati yaacito, daasa.m daasi~nca khattiyo''ti..
[01] tattha ^a^V7.0285^ea^ ^a^M7.0296^ea^ ^b^ehi te ahamakkhissa^eb^nti aha.m te aacikkhissaami. ida.m saa devataadhiggahitaa hutvaa aaha.
[27] maa bhoti paridevesi, maa ca tva.m vimanaa ahu.
[22] aha.m bhoti.m upa.t.thissa.m, maa bhoti kupitaa ahuu''ti..
[01] tattha ^b^ji.n.nohamasmii^eb^ti bhadde, aha.m ji.n.no amhi, katha.m gamissaamiiti.
[21] ``sace me daasa.m daasi.m vaa, naanayissasi braahma.na.
[27] eva.m braahma.na jaanaahi, na te vacchaamaha.m ghare.
[22] amanaapa.m te karissaami, ta.m te dukkha.m bhavissati..
[22] a~n~nehi saddhi.m ramamaana.m, ta.m te dukkha.m bhavissati..
[22] bhiyyo va"nkaa ca palitaa, bahuu hessanti braahma.naa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^amanaapa.m te^eb^ti vessantarassa santika.m gantvaa daasa.m vaa daasi.m vaa anaaharantassa tava aruccanaka.m kamma.m karissaami. ^b^nakkhatte utupubbesuu^eb^ti nakkhattayogavasena vaa channa.m utuuna.m tassa tassa pubbavasena vaa pavattesu cha.nesu.
[03] ta.m sutvaa braahma.no bhiito ahosi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``paatheyya.m ^a^M7.0297^ea^ me karohi tva.m, sa.mkulyaa sagu.laani ca.

[03] tattha ^b^a.t.tito^eb^ti upadduto pii.lito. ^b^sagu.laani caa^eb^ti sagu.lapuuve ca. ^b^sattubhatta^eb^nti baddhasattuabaddhasattu~nceva pu.tabhatta~nca. ^b^methunake^eb^ti jaatigottakulapadesehi sadise. ^b^daasakumaarake^eb^ti tava daasatthaaya kumaarake.

[03] saa khippa.m paatheyya.m pa.tiyaadetvaa braahma.nassa aarocesi. so gehe dubbala.t.thaana.m thira.m katvaa dvaara.m sa"nkharitvaa ara~n~naa daaruuni aaharitvaa gha.tena udaka.m aaharitvaa gehe sabbabhaajanaani puuretvaa tattheva taapasavesa.m gahetvaa ``bhadde, ito pa.t.thaaya vikaale maa nikkhami, yaava mamaagamanaa appamattaa hohii''ti ovaditvaa upaahana.m aaruyha paatheyyapasibbaka.m a.mse laggetvaa amittataapana.m padakkhi.na.m katvaa assupu.n.nehi nettehi roditvaa pakkaami. tamattha.m ^a^P6.0525^ea^ pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] tato so mantayitvaana, bhariya.m katvaa padakkhi.na.m..
[03] tattha ^b^ru.n.namukho^eb^ti ruda.mmukho. ^b^sahitabbato^eb^ti samaadinnavato, gahitataapasavesoti attho. ^b^cara^eb^nti daasapariyesana.m caranto siviina.m nagara.m aarabbha pakkaami.
[03] so ^a^V7.0287^ea^ ta.m nagara.m gantvaa sannipatita.m jana.m ``vessantaro kuhi''nti pucchati. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``so tattha gantvaa avaca, ye tatthaasu.m samaagataa.
[22] kuhi.m vessantaro raajaa, kattha passemu khattiya.m..
[21] ``te ^a^M7.0298^ea^ janaa ta.m avaci.msu, ye tatthaasu.m samaagataa.
[22] pabbaajito sakaa ra.t.thaa, va"nke vasati pabbate..
[03] tattha ^b^pakato^eb^ti upadduto pii.lito attano nagare vasitu.m alabhitvaa idaani va"nkapabbate vasati.

[03] eva.m ``tumhe amhaaka.m raajaana.m naasetvaa punapi aagataa idha ti.t.thathaa''ti te le.d.duda.n.daadihatthaa braahma.na.m anubandhi.msu. so devataadhiggahito hutvaa va"nkapabbatamaggameva ga.nhi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] so paavisi brahaara~n~na.m, yattha assosi kaamada.m..
[22] vikkandi so vippana.t.tho, duure panthaa apakkami..

[03] tattha ^a^P6.0526^ea^ ^b^agha.m ta^eb^nti ta.m mahaajanena anubandhanadukkha~nceva vanapariyogaahanadukkha~nca. ^b^aggihutta^eb^nti aggijuhanaka.tacchu.m. ^b^kokaa na.m parivaarayu^eb^nti so hi ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa va"nkapabbatagaamimagga.m ajaananto maggamuu.lho hutvaa ara~n~ne vicari. atha na.m aarakkha.natthaaya nisinnassa cetaputtassa sunakhaa parivaarayi.msuuti attho. ^b^vikkandi so^eb^ti so ekarukkha.m aaruyha mahantena ravena kandi. ^b^vippana.t.tho^eb^ti vina.t.thamaggo. ^b^duure panthaa^eb^ti va"nkapabbatagaamipanthato duure pakkaami. ^b^bhogaluddho^eb^ti bhogaratto. ^b^asa~n~nato^eb^ti dussiilo. ^b^va"nkassoroha.ne na.t.the^eb^ti va"nkapabbatassa gamanamagge vina.t.the.
[03] so ^a^M7.0299^ea^ sunakhehi parivaarito rukkhe nisinnova imaa gaathaa abhaasatha --
[22] bhaye khemassa daataara.m, ko me vessantara.m viduu..
[22] dhara.nuupama.m mahaaraaja.m, ko me vessantara.m viduu..
[22] saagaruupama.m mahaaraaja.m, ko me vessantara.m viduu..
[22] rahaduupama.m mahaaraaja.m, ko me vessantara.m viduu..
[22] tathuupama.m mahaaraaja.m, ko me vessantara.m viduu..
[22] tathuupama.m mahaaraaja.m, ko me vessantara.m viduu..
[22] tathuupama.m mahaaraaja.m, ko me vessantara.m viduu..
[22] tathuupama.m mahaaraaja.m, ko me vessantara.m viduu..
[22] tathuupama.m mahaaraaja.m, ko me vessantara.m viduu..
[22] aha.m jaananti yo vajjaa, nandi.m so janaye mama..
[27] aha.m jaananti yo vajjaa, taaya so ekavaacaaya.

[03] tattha ^a^P6.0527^ea^ ^b^jayanta^eb^nti maccheracitta.m vijayanta.m. ^b^ko me vessantara.m viduu^eb^ti ko mayha.m vessantara.m aacikkheyyaati vadati. ^b^pati.t.thaasii^eb^ti pati.t.thaa aasi. ^b^santaana^eb^nti parissantaana.m. ^b^kilantaana^eb^nti maggakilantaana.m. ^b^pa.tiggaha^eb^nti pa.tiggaahaka.m pati.t.thaabhuuta.m. ^b^aha.m jaananti yo vajjaa^eb^ti aha.m vessantarassa vasana.t.thaana.m jaanaamiiti yo vadeyyaati attho.

[03] tassa ta.m paridevasadda.m sutvaa aarakkha.natthaaya .thapito cetaputto migaluddako hutvaa ara~n~ne vicaranto ``aya.m braahma.no vessantarassa vasana.t.thaanatthaaya paridevati, na kho panesa dhammataaya ^a^V7.0290^ea^ aagato, maddi.m vaa daarake vaa yaacissati, idheva na.m maaressaamii''ti tassa santika.m gantvaa ``braahma.na, na te jiivita.m dassaamii''ti dhanu.m aaropetvaa aaka.d.dhitvaa tajjesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[22] pabbaajito sakaa ra.t.thaa, va"nke vasati pabbate..
[21] ``tassa tyaaha.m na dassaami, jiivita.m idha braahma.na.
[22] aya~nhi te mayaa nunno, saro pissati lohita.m..
[21] ``ta.m me suyi.t.tha.m suhuta.m, tuyha.m ma.msena braahma.na.
[22] na ca tva.m raajaputtassa, bhariya.m putte ca nessasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^akiccakaarii^eb^ti tva.m akiccakaarako. ^b^dummedho^eb^ti nippa~n~no. ^b^ra.t.thaa pavanamaagato^eb^ti ra.t.thato mahaara~n~na.m aagato. ^b^saro pissatii^eb^ti aya.m saro tava lohita.m pivissati. ^b^vajjhayitvaanaa^eb^ti ta.m maaretvaa rukkhaa patitassa te siisa.m taalaphala.m viya lu~ncitvaa sabandhana.m hadayama.msa.m ^a^V7.0291^ea^ chinditvaa panthadevataaya panthasaku.na.m naama yajissaami. ^b^na ca tva^eb^nti eva.m sante na tva.m raajaputtassa bhariya.m vaa putte vaa nessasiiti.
[03] so ^a^P6.0528^ea^ tassa vacana.m sutvaa mara.nabhayatajjito musaavaada.m kathento aaha --
[22] tasmaa hi duuta.m na hanti, esa dhammo sanantano..
[22] maataa ca dubbalaa tassa, aciraa cakkhuuni jiiyare..
[22] raajaputta.m nayissaami, yadi jaanaasi sa.msa me''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^nijjhattaa^eb^ti sa~n~nattaa. ^b^aciraa cakkhuuni jiiyare^eb^ti niccarodanena na cirasseva cakkhuuni jiiyissanti.

[03] tadaa cetaputto ``vessantara.m kira aanetu.m aagato''ti somanassappatto hutvaa sunakhe bandhitvaa .thapetvaa braahma.na.m otaaretvaa saakhaasanthare nisiidaapetvaa bhojana.m datvaa ima.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``piyassa ^a^M7.0302^ea^ me piyo duuto, pu.n.napatta.m dadaami te.
[22] ta~nca te desamakkhissa.m, yattha sammati kaamado''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^piyassa me^eb^ti mama piyassa vessantarassa tva.m piyo duuto. ^b^pu.n.napatta^eb^nti tava ajjhaasayapuura.na.m pu.n.napatta.m dadaamiiti.

[03] eva.m ^a^V7.0292^ea^ cetaputto braahma.na.m bhojetvaa paatheyyatthaaya tassa madhuno tumba~nceva pakkamigasatthi~nca datvaa magge .thatvaa dakkhi.nahattha.m ukkhipitvaa mahaasattassa vasanokaasa.m aacikkhanto aaha --
[22] yattha vessantaro raajaa, saha puttehi sammati..
[22] yattha vessantaro raajaa, saha puttehi sammati..

[03] tattha ^b^gandhamaadano^eb^ti esa gandhamaadanapabbato, etassa paadena uttaraabhimukho gacchanto yattha sakkadattiye assamapade vessantaro raajaa saha puttadaarehi vasati, ta.m passissasiiti attho. ^b^braahma.nava.n.na^eb^nti se.t.thapabbajitavesa.m. ^b^aasada~nca masa.m ja.ta^eb^nti aaka.d.dhitvaa phalaana.m gaha.nattha.m a"nkusa~nca ^a^V7.0293^ea^ aggijuhanaka.tacchu~nca ja.taama.n.dala~nca dhaarento. ^b^cammavaasii^eb^ti ajinacammadharo. ^b^chamaa setii^eb^ti pathaviya.m pa.n.nasanthare sayati. ^b^dhavassaka.n.naa khadiraa^eb^ti dhavaa ca assaka.n.naa ca khadiraa ca. ^b^saki.m piitaava maa.navaa^eb^ti ekavaarameva piitaa suraaso.n.daa viya. ^b^upari dumapariyaayesuu^eb^ti rukkhasaakhaasu. ^b^sa"ngiitiyova suyyare^eb^ti naanaasaku.naana.m vassantaana.m saddaa dibbasa"ngiitiyo viya suyyare. ^b^najjuhaa^eb^ti najjuhasaku.naa. ^b^sampatantii^eb^ti vikuujantaa vicaranti. ^b^saakhaapattasamiiritaa^eb^ti saakhaana.m pattehi sa"ngha.t.titaa hutvaa vikuujantaa saku.naa, vaatena samiiritaa pattasaakhaayeva vaa. ^b^aaganta^eb^nti aagacchanta.m jana.m. ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti yasmi.m assame vessantaro vasati, tattha gantvaa ima.m assamapadasampatti.m passissasiiti.
[22] a~n~ne aamaa ca pakkaa ca, bhekava.n.naa taduubhaya.m..
[22] puttajiivaa ca kakudhaa, asanaa cettha pupphitaa..
[27] athettha vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naa atha pacchimaa.
[21] ``nandikaa ^a^M7.0305^ea^ jiivaputtaa ca, jiivaputtaa piyaa ca no.
[22] piyaa puttaa piyaa nandaa, dijaa pokkhara.niigharaa..
[22] yattha vessantaro raajaa, saha puttehi sammati..

[03] tattha ^b^caarutimbarukkhaa^eb^ti suva.n.natimbarukkhaa. ^b^madhumadhukaa^eb^ti madhurasaa madhukaa. ^b^thevantii^eb^ti virocanti. ^b^paarevataa^eb^ti paarevatapaadasadisaa rukkhaa. ^b^bhaveyyaa^eb^ti diighaphalaa kadaliyo. ^b^madhutthikaa^eb^ti madhuttheve paggharantiyo, madhurataaya vaa madhutthevasadisaa. ^b^sakamaadaayaa^eb^ti ta.m sayameva gahetvaa paribhu~njanti. ^b^dovilaa^eb^ti patitapupphapattaa sa~njaayamaanaphalaa. ^b^bhekava.n.naa taduubhaya^eb^nti te ubhopi aamaa ca pakkaa ca ma.n.duukapi.t.thiva.n.naayeva. ^b^athettha he.t.thaa puriso^eb^ti atha ettha assame tesa.m ambaana.m he.t.thaa .thitakova puriso ambaphalaani ga.nhaati, aaroha.nakicca.m ^a^P6.0531^ea^ natthi. ^b^va.n.nagandharasuttame^eb^ti etehi va.n.naadiihi uttamaani.

[03] ^b^ateva me acchariya^eb^nti ativiya me acchariya.m. ^b^hi"nkaaro^eb^ti hinti kara.na.m. ^b^vibhedikaa^eb^ti taalaa. ^b^maalaava ganthitaa^eb^ti supupphitarukkhaana.m upari ganthitaa maalaa viya pupphaani ti.t.thanti. ^b^dhajaggaaneva dissare^eb^ti taani rukkhaani ala"nkatadhajaggaani viya dissanti. ^b^ku.tajii ku.t.thatagaraa^eb^ti ku.taji naamekaa rukkhajaati ku.t.thagacchaa ca tagaragacchaa ca. ^b^giripunnaagaa^eb^ti mahaapunnaagaa. ^b^kovi.laaraa^eb^ti kovi.laararukkhaa naama. ^b^uddaalakaa^eb^ti uddaalarukkhaa. ^b^somarukkhaa^eb^ti piitapupphava.n.naa raajarukkhaa. ^b^phalliyaa^eb^ti phalliyarukkhaa naama. ^b^puttajiivaa^eb^ti mahaanigrodhaa. ^b^labujaa^eb^ti labujarukkhaa naama. ^b^palaalakhalasannibhaa^eb^ti tesa.m he.t.thaa paggharitapupphapu~njaa palaalakhalasannibhaati vadati.

[03] ^b^pokkhara.nii^eb^ti ^a^V7.0296^ea^ caturassapokkhara.nii. ^b^nandane^eb^ti nandanavane nandaapokkhara.nii viya. ^b^puppharasamattaa^eb^ti puppharasena mattaa calitaa. ^b^makarandehii^eb^ti ki~njakkhehi. ^b^pokkhare^eb^ ^a^M7.0306^ea^ ^b^pokkhare^eb^ti paduminipa.n.ne paduminipa.n.ne. tesu hi ki~njakkhato re.nu bhassitvaa pokkharamadhu naama hoti. ^b^dakkhi.naa atha pacchimaa^eb^ti ettaavataa sabbaa disaa vidisaapi vaataa dassitaa honti. ^b^thuulaa^eb^ ^b^si"nghaa.takaa^eb^ti mahantaa si"nghaa.takaa ca. ^b^sa.msaadiyaa^eb^ti saya.m jaatasaalii, sukasaaliitipi vuccanti. ^b^pasaadiyaa^eb^ti teyeva bhuumiya.m patitaa. ^b^byaaviddhaa^eb^ti pasanne udake byaaviddhaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa gacchantaa dissanti. ^b^mupayaanakaa^eb^ti kakka.takaa. ^b^madha^eb^unti bhisako.tiyaa bhinnaaya pagghara.naraso madhusadiso hoti. ^b^khiirasappi mu.laalibhii^eb^ti mu.laalehi pagghara.naraso khiiramissakanavaniitasappi viya hoti.

[03] ^b^sammaddatevaa^eb^ti sampattajana.m madayati viya. ^b^samantaa mabhinaaditaa^eb^ti samantaa abhinadantaa vicaranti. ^b^``nandikaa''^eb^tiaadiini tesa.m naamaani. tesu hi pa.thamaa ``saami vessantara, imasmi.m vane vasanto nandaa''ti vadanti. dutiyaa ``tva~nca sukhena jiiva, puttaa ca te''ti vadanti. tatiyaa ``tva~nca jiiva, piyaa puttaa ca te''ti vadanti. catutthaa ``tva~nca nanda, piyaa puttaa ca te''ti vadanti. tena tesa.m etaaneva naamaani ahesu.m. ^b^pokkhara.niigharaa^eb^ti pokkhara.nivaasino.
[03] eva.m cetaputtena vessantarassa vasana.t.thaane akkhaate juujako tussitvaa pa.tisanthaara.m karonto ima.m gaathamaaha --
[22] madhupi.n.dikaa ca sukataayo, sattubhatta.m dadaami te''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^sattubhatta^eb^nti pakkamadhusannibha.m sattusa"nkhaata.m bhatta.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- ida.m mama atthi, ta.m te dammi, ga.nhaahi nanti.
[22] itopi brahme ga.nhaahi, gaccha brahme yathaasukha.m..
[22] ta.m tva.m gantvaana pucchassu, so te magga.m pavakkhatii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^sambala^eb^nti paatheyya.m. ^b^etii^eb^ti yo ekapadikamaggo amhaaka.m abhimukho eti, esa assama.m uju.m gacchati. ^b^accuto^eb^ti eva.mnaamako isi tattha vasati.
[03] tattha ^b^yenaasii^eb^ti yasmi.m .thaane accuto isi ahosi, tattha gatoti.
[22] disvaana ta.m bhaaradvaajo, sammodi isinaa saha..
[21] ``kacci nu bhoto kusala.m, kacci bhoto anaamaya.m.
[22] kacci u~nchena yaapesi, kacci muulaphalaa bahuu..
[22] vane vaa.lamigaaki.n.ne, kacci hi.msaa na vijjatii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^bhaaradvaajo^eb^ti juujako. ^b^appamevaa^eb^ti appaayeva. ^b^hi.msaa^eb^ti tesa.m vasena tumhaaka.m vihi.msaa.
[22] atho u~nchena yaapemi, atho muulaphalaa bahuu..
[22] vane vaa.lamigaaki.n.ne, hi.msaa mayha.m na vijjati..
[22] anto pavisa bhaddante, paade pakkhaalayassu te..
[22] phalaani khuddakappaani, bhu~nja brahme vara.m vara.m..
[22] tato piva mahaabrahme, sace tva.m abhika"nkhasii''ti..
[22] tamaha.m dassanamaagato, yadi jaanaasi sa.msa me''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^tamaha.m dassanamaagato^eb^ti ta.m aha.m dassanaaya aagato. taapaso aaha --
[27] ma~n~ne bhava.m patthayati, ra~n~no bhariya.m patibbata.m.
[22] ma~n~ne ka.nhaajina.m daasi.m, jaali.m daasa~nca icchasi..
[22] na tassa bhogaa vijjanti, dhana.m dha~n~na~nca braahma.naa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^na tassa bhogaa^eb^ti bho braahma.na, tassa vessantarassa ara~n~ne viharantassa neva bhogaa vijjanti, dhanadha~n~na~nca na vijjati, duggato hutvaa vasati, tassa santika.m gantvaa ki.m karissasiiti?
[22] tamaha.m dassanamaagato, yadi jaanaasi sa.msa me''ti..
